Question: py aych py
Answer: py aych py ayk mshhawr amwmy mksad ki askrptngh zaban hay jo khasa tawr par wyb dawylpmnt 1 kay liye mwzawn haay۔yha ayk srwr saiyda askrptngh zaban hay jo HTML main srayt krty hay aur mthark mwad ، dayta bys ، syshn sy bakhbr rhanay ، aur yahan tak keh pori ay kamrs saits 2 ki tamyr kay liye astamal hawty haay۔py aych py maiykrwsaft kay ASP3 jesay haryfwn kay liye wsya pymanay par astamal hony wala ، aazaad aur mwsar mtbadl haay۔yha mthark aur antrayktw wyb safhaat 3 bnanay kay liye ayk taaktwr twl haay۔ py aych py ki kuch klydy khsawsayat main shaml hayn: srwr saiyda askrptngh: py aych py kwda srwr 4 par aml main laya jata haay۔plyt farm ki mtaabkt: py aych py mkhtlf plyt farmza par chlty hay ، bshmwl wndawza ، lynks ، ywnks ، aur myk OS X45. dayta bys anzumam: py aych py ko apnay dayta bys main dayta ko shaml karnay ، hazaf karnay ، trmym karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔awr W3Schools ، kwda kydaymy ، aur tywtwryls pwaint 326 jesi wyb saitwn par kwrsza۔

Question: "ksy astyk ki nmaindghy karnay waly py aych py klas ko nafza karain aur psh ، pap aur jhanknay waly kamwn kay liye tarykay fraham kryn۔"
Answer: tarykha kar prwghramngh ayk prwghramngh madal hay jo kalngh kay tarykha kar kay tsawr ki bnyad par sakhty prwghramngh sy akhza kya gaya haay۔tarykha kar ، jsay mamwlat ، sbrwtainza ya afaal kay nam sy bhi jana jata hay ، sirf kmpywtyshnl akdamat ki ayk syryza par mushtamil hawta hay js ko anjam diya jaiay۔ksy prwghram kay phansy kay doran ، kesi bhi nktaha par kesi bhi nktaha par blaya jaskta hay ، bshmwl dusray tarykha kar ya khwd۔tarykha kar prwghramngh lkhnay kay tarykha kar ya afaal kay baray main hay jo dusri taraf ، dayta 12 par aapryshn anjam dytay hayn۔braay aur pychydha prwghramwn ko dayzaain karnay kay liye aw aw py ka astamal kya jata haay۔aw aw py main ، fwks dayta aarghnaizayshn aur tjryd par haay۔yha hamain sirf ayk tarykha kar kay bjaiay apnay prwghram kay baray main bat chyt karnay kay tsawrat kay tawr par swchnay ki kwshsh krta haay۔aabjykt par mbny prwghramngh kay tarykha kar kay prwghramngh kay bohat sy fwaid hain ، jesay tyza aur aasan amldraamd ، prwghramwn kay liye ayk wazuha dahanchha mhaya karna ، py aych py kwda ko khshk rkhnay main mdd karna ، aur kwda ko brkrar rkhnay main aasany pyda karna ، is main trmym karna ، is main trmym karna ، is main trmym karna ، is main trmym karna aasan bnana۔، aur daybgh۔aw aw py kam kwda aur kam trky kay wkt 12 kay sath mkml dwbarha kabl astamal ayply kyshnza bnana mmkn bnata haay۔ yahan py aych py main tarykha kar aur aabjykt par mbny prwghramngh ki kuch msaalyn hayn: tarykha kar prwghramngh msaal: <؟ py aych py fynkshn kylkwlytyrya ($ rdas) {$ rkbha = 3.14 * $rdas * $ rdas ؛wapsy $ rkbha} $ rdas = 5 ؛ $ alakha = kylkwlytyrya ($ rdas) ؛ ghwnj "dairay ka rkbha haay:"۔$ alakha ؛؟> aabjykt par mbny prwghramngh msaal: <؟ py aych py sy aylas srkl {njy $ rdas ؛njy $ alakha ؛awamy fnkshn __ knstrkt ($ rdas) {$ this-> rdas = $ rdas ؛} awamy fnkshn kylkwlytyrya () {$ yha-> alakha = 3.14 * $ yha-> rdas * $ yha-> rdas ؛} awamy fnkshn getArea () {wapsy $ this-> alakha ؛}} $ srkl = nya halkha (5) ؛ $ srkl-> kylkwlytyrya () ؛ ghwnj "dairay ka rkbha yeh haay:"۔$ srkl-> getArea () ؛؟> tarykha kar prwghramngh msaal main ، ayk dairay kay alakay ka hasab lghanay kay liye ayk fnkshn ki wzuahat ki hogi hay ، aur phir is fnkshn ko 5 kay rdas kay sath dairay kay alakay ka hasab lghanay aur zaahar karnay kay liye kaha jata haay۔aabjykt par mbny prwghramngh msaal ، ayk klas ko dairay ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye byan kya jata hay ، aur phir klas ki ayk msaal 5 kay rdas kay sath tshkyl di jati haay۔phr dairay kay alakay ko zaahar karnay kay liye ghytyrya () ka tarykha kaha jata haay۔

Question: py aych py main aatwlwdangh kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur braay pymanay par mnsawbwn main is kay fwaid ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: yahan ayk py aych py klas ka nfaza hay js main psh ، pap ، aur jhanknay kay tarykwn kay sath astyk ki nmaindghy hawty haay: py aych py sy ayl aay ays ays astyk {njy $ astyk ؛awamy fnkshn __ knstrkt () {$ this-> astyk = nya \ DS \ astyk () ؛} awamy fnkshn psh ($ kdr) {$ this-> astyk-> psh ($ kdr) ؛} awamy fnkshn pap () {wapsy $ this-> astyk-> pap () ؛} awamy fnkshn jhanknay () {wapsy $ this-> astyk-> jhanknay () ؛}} is klas main py aych py dayta dahanchay (DS) twsya 12 sy DS \ astyk klas ka astamal kya gaya haay۔__ knstrkt () ka tarykha ayk niay astyk aabjykt ko shrwa krta haay۔psh () ka tarykha DS \ astyk klas 1 kay psh () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey astyk kay awpry hasaay main ayk ansar ko shaml krta haay۔pap () ka tarykha day ays \ astyk klas 1 kay pap () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey astyk kay awpry ansar ko hatata hay aur waps krta haay۔jhanknay wala () tarykha day ays \ astyk klas 3 kay jhanknay waly () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey isy hataiay baghair astyk kay awpry ansar ko lwtata haay۔ astyk klas ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: py aych py $ astyk = nya astyk () ؛ $ astyk ($ astyk-> psh (1) ؛ $ astyk-> psh (2) ؛ $ astyk-> psh (3) ؛ aykw $ astyk-> jhanknay () ؛// aaؤt pt: 3echo $ astyk-> pap () ؛// aaؤt pt: 3echo $ astyk-> jhanknay () ؛// aaؤt pt: 2 un msaal kay tawr par ، ayk nya astyk aabjykt tshkyl diya gaya hay ، aur psh () ka tarykha astyk main tyn anasar shaml karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔as kay bad jhanknay wala () tarykha astyk kay awpry ansar ko zaahar karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jo 3 haay۔astyk kay niay tap ansar ko zaahar karnay kay liye dwbarha astamal kya gaya ، jo 2 haay۔

Question: "py aych py ki klas ko nafza karain jo kesi mnslk fharst ki nmaindghy karty hain aur andraj ، hazaf karnay aur trawrsl kay tarykay fraham karty hayn۔"
Answer: aatwlwdangh py aych py main ayk khsawsayt hay jo klaswn ko khud bkhwd lwda karnay ki ajazat dyty hay jab un ki zurwrt hawty hay ، baghair dsty shmwlyt ki zurwrt kay astamal ki zurwrt hawty hay ya is main byanat 12 shaml ki zurwrt hawty haay۔jb kesi klas ko blaya jata hay aur abhi tak shaml nahin kya jata hay tou ، aatwlwdar klas fail ki tlash krta hay aur is main shaml hawta hay agar yeh mwjwd haay۔aatwlwdangh khasa tawr par braay pymanay par mnsawbwn main mfyd hay jahan sykrawn ya hazaarwn klasza hawsktay hain ، kywnkha is sy hr klas fail ko dsty tawr par shaml karnay ki zurwrt khtm hawjaty haay۔ yahan braay pymanay par py aych py prwjykts main aatwlwdangh ka astamal karnay kay kuch fwaid hayn: dwbarha astamal krna: yeh bnata haay۔kwda ko anfrady klaswn aur nam ki jghhawn main alag krkay mkhtlf mnsawbwn ya madaywlza main kwda ko dwbarha astamal karna aasan haay۔ayk bar 14 main tamam klaswn ko lwda karnay kay bjaiay sirf un klaswn ko lwda krkay karkrdghy ko bhatr bna sakta haay۔، aatwlwdangh py aych py main ayk mfyd khsawsayt hay jo klaswn ko lwda karnay kay aml ko aasan bnaty hay aur braay pymanay par mnsawbwn main karkrdghy aur dykh bhal ko bhatr bna sakti haay۔klas failwn ko khud bkhwd un ki zurwrt kay mtaabk lwda krkay ، aatwlwdangh dsty shmwlyt kay byanat ki zurwrt ko khtm krdyty hay aur is kwda ki mkdar ko kam krty hay js ko lkhnay aur brkrar rkhnay ki zurwrt haay۔

Question: py aych py main nam ki jghhawn kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur woh kwda ko mnzam karnay aur namwn kay tnazaaat ko rwknay main kis tarah mdd karty hayn۔
Answer: py aych py klas ko nafza karnay kay l anction ، andraj ، hazaf karnay aur trywrsl kay tarykwn kay sath mnslk fharst ki nmaindghy karty hain ، hum ayk nwda klas ki wzuahat krsktay hain jo lnkda fharst main ayk hi nwda ki nmaindghy krta hay ، aur ayk lnkda lst klas jo lnkda fharst ki nmaindghy krta haay۔aan 1 par mbny ayk msaal kay nfaza: py aych py sy ayl aay ays nwda {awamy $ dayta ؛pblk $ aghla ؛awamy fnkshn __ knstrkt ($ dayta) {$ yha-> dayta = $ dayta ؛$ yha-> aghla = null ؛class} klas lnkda lst {pblk $ hayda ؛awamy fnkshn __ knstrkt () {$ this-> hayda = null ؛} awamy fnkshn dakhl karain ($ dayta) {$ newnode = nya nwda ($ dayta) ؛aghr ($ this-> hayda === null) {$ this-> hayda = $ newnode ؛} dusri {$ mwjwdha = $ yha-> hayda ؛jbkha ($ mwjwdha-> aghla! == null) {$ mwjwdha = $ mwjwdha-> aghla ؛} $ mwjwdha-> aghla = $ newnode ؛}} awamy fnkshn hazaf karain ($ dayta) {aghr ($ this-> hayda ==== null) {wapsy ؛} if ($ this-> hayda-> dayta === $ dayta) {$ this-> hayda = $ yha-> hayda-> aghla ؛wapsy ؛} $ mwjwdha = $ yha-> hayda ؛jbkha ($ mwjwdha-> aghla! == null) {ghwnj $ mwjwdha-> dayta۔"" ؛$ mwjwdha = $ mwjwdha-> aghla ؛}} this is nfaza main ، nwda klas lnkda fharst main ayk hi nwda ki nmaindghy krty hay ، js main nwda kay dayta ansar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye dayta praprty ، aur aghly nwda ka hawalha trtyb main zakhyrha karnay kay liye ayk aghly praprty haay۔lnkda lst klas lnkda fharst ki nmaindghy krty hay ، js main fharst main pehlay nwda ka hawalha denay kay liye hayda praprty kay sath ayk hayda praprty haay۔dakhl () ka tarykha fharst kay aakhr main dyiay gaye dayta kay sath ayk nya nwda dakhl krta haay۔hazaf () ka tarykha fharst sy dyiay gaye dayta kay sath pehla nwda ko hata dyta haay۔trawrs () ka tarykha fharst main tamam nwdas kay dayta anasar ko prnt krta haay۔ lnkda lst klas ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: py aych py $ fharst = niy lnkda lst () ؛ $ fharst-> dakhl karain (1) ؛ $ fharst-> dakhl kryn(2) ؛ $ fharst-> dakhl karain (3) ؛ $ fharst-> trawrs () ؛// aaؤt pt: 1 2 3 $ fharst-> hazaf karain (2) ؛ $ fharst-> trawrs () ؛// aaؤt pt: 1 3 un msaal kay tawr par ، ayk nya lnkda lst aabjykt tyar kya gaya hay ، aur dakhl () ka tarykha kar main dayta anasar 1 ، 2 ، aur 3 kay sath tyn nwdas shaml karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔as kay bad trawrs () ka tarykha fharst main mwjwd tamam nwdas kay dayta anasar ko zaahar karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jo 1 ، 2 ، aur 3 hayn۔ hazaf () ka tarykha kar sy dayta ansar 2 kay sath nwda ko hatanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔as kay bad trawrs () ka tarykha dwbarha fharst main mwjwd tamam nwdas kay dayta anasar ko zaahar karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jo 1 aur 3 hayn۔

Question: "bainry srch try ki nmaindghy karnay waly py aych py klas ko nafza karain aur andraj ، hazaf karnay aur tlash karnay kay tarykay fraham kryn۔"
Answer: py aych py main nam ki jghhayn ayk mntaky dahanchay kay andr klaswn ، afaal aur mstkl jesi ashyaa ko smytnay ka ayk tarykha hayn۔an ka astamal kwda bys kay mkhtlf hasawn main byan krdha ashyaa kay mabyn namwn kay tsaadm ko rwknay aur many khyza ghrwps 12 main kwda ko mnzam karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔aalan ki wrda 2 kay liay۔nam ki jghha main drst py aych py kwda shaml hawskta hay ، aur is sy klaswn (js main khlasaha aur khsaltyn shaml hayn) ، antrfys ، afaal ، aur mstkl 2 par asar prata haay۔ py aych py main nam ki jghhawn ko astamal karnay kay kuch fwaid hayn: namwn kay tnazaaat ki rwk tham: nam ki jghha mkhtlf hasawn main byan krdha ashyaa kay mabyn namwn kay tnazaaat ko rwkty haay۔kwda bys ko nam ki jghha 12 kay andr andr ghhyray main la kr۔ kwdangh kwda: nam ki jghhayn kwda ko many khyza ghrwhawn main trtyb denay ka ayk tarykha fraham krty hain ، js sy kwda ko tlash karna aur brkrar rkhna aasan hawjata hay aur kwda 12 ki prahnay ki ahalyt ko bhatr bnaya jata haay۔nam ki jghha main aaitmza ko smyt kar mkhtlf mnsawbwn main kwda ، dusray nam ki jghhawn sy kwda ko aasan draamd aur dwbarha astamal karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔ nam ki jghhawn ka astamal kwda ko mnzam karnay aur namwn kay tnazaaat ko rwknay main mdd krskta hay ، khasa tawr par braay pymanay par prwjykts main jahan synkrawn ya hazaarwn klasyn hawskty hayn۔، afaal ، aur mstkl.nam ki jghha main aaitmza ko ghhyrnay sy ، kwda ko tlash karna aur brkrar rkhna aasan hawjata hay ، aur is sy kwda ki prahnay ki ahalyt ko bhatr bnanay main bhi mdd mil sakti haay۔

Question: py aych py main jamd aur mthark taipngh kay darmiyan frk par tbadlha khyal karain aur hr ayk ki msaalyn fraham kryn۔
Answer: py aych py klas ko nafza karnay kay l bi bainry srch try ki nmaindghy karnay waly ، hazaf karnay ، aur tlash kay tarykwn kay sath ، hum ayk nwda klas ki wzuahat krsktay hain jo drkht main ayk hi nwda ki nmaindghy krta hay ، aur bainry srch try klas jo bainry srch drkht ki nmaindghy krta haay۔yhaan dstyab wsail par mbny ayk msaal aml haay: py aych py klas nwda {awamy $ dayta ؛awamy $ baien ؛awamy $ hak ؛awamy fnkshn __ knstrkt ($ dayta) {$ yha-> dayta = $ dayta ؛$ this-> baien = null ؛$ this-> hak = null ؛}} klas bainry srch try {awamy $ jra ؛awamy fnkshn __ knstrkt () {$ this-> jra = null ؛} awamy fnkshn dakhl karain ($ dayta) {$ newnode = nya nwda ($ dayta) ؛aghr ($ this-> jra === null) {$ this-> jra = $ newnode ؛} else {$ mwjwdha = $ yha-> jra ؛jbkha (sch) {aghr ($ dayta <$ mwjwdha-> dayta) {aghr ($ mwjwdha-> baien ==== null) {$ mwjwdha-> baien = $ newnode ؛bryk ؛} dusri {$ mwjwdha = $ mwjwdha-> baien ؛}} else {aghr ($ mwjwdha-> hak === null) {$ mwjwdha-> hak = $ newnode ؛bryk ؛} dusri {$ mwjwdha = $ mwjwdha-> hak ؛}}}}} awamy fnkshn hazaf karain ($ dayta) {$ this-> rwt = $ yha-> daylytynwda ($ yha-> jra ، $ dayta) ؛} njy fnkshn daylytynwda ($ nwda ، $ dayta) {if ($ nwda ==== null) {waps waps ؛} if ($ dayta === $ nwda-> dayta) {aghr ($ nwda-> baien === null && $ nwda-> dien ==== null) {waps waps ؛} if ($ nwda-> baien === null) {wapsy $ nwda-> dien ؛} if ($ nwda-> dien === null) {wapsy $ nwda-> baien ؛} $ tempnode = $ nwda-> sahayha ؛jbkha ($ tempnode-> baiyn! == null) {$ tempnode = $ tempnode-> baien ؛} $ nwda-> dayta = $ tymp nwda-> dayta ؛$ nwda-> hak = $ yha-> daylytynwda ($ nwda-> dien ، $ tymp nwda-> dayta) ؛wapsy $ nwda ؛} elseif ($ dayta <$ nwda-> dayta) {$ nwda-> baien = $ yha-> daylytynwda ($ nwda-> baien ، $ dayta) ؛wapsy $ nwda ؛} dusri {$ nwda-> hak = $ yha-> daylytynwda ($ nwda-> sahayha ، $ dayta) ؛wapsy $ nwda ؛}} awamy fnkshn ki tlash ($ dayta) {$ mwjwdha = $ yha-> jra ؛jbkha ($ mwjwdha! == null) {aghr ($ dayta === $ mwjwdha-> dayta) {sch waps ؛} elseif ($ dayta <$ mwjwdha-> dayta) {$ mwjwdha = $ mwjwdha-> baien ؛} dusri {$ mwjwdha = $ mwjwdha-> hak ؛}} ghalat lwtaiyn ؛} the is nfaza main ، nwda klas bainry srch try main ayk hi nwda ki nmaindghy krta hay ، js main nwda kay dayta ansar ko astwr karnay kay liye dayta praprty hawty hay ، aur baien aur dien bchwn kay nwdas kay hawalha jat ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye baien aur dien khsawsayat۔bainry srch try klas bainry srch try ki nmaindghy krty hay ، js main jra kay nwda ka hawalha denay kay liye jra ki jaiydad hawty haay۔dakhl () ka tarykha drkht main dyiay gaye dayta ansar kay sath ayk nya nwda dakhl krta haay۔hazaf () ka tarykha drkht sy dyiay gaye dayta ansar kay sath pehla nwda hatata haay۔tlash () ka tarykha dyiay gaye dayta ansar kay sath nwda kay liye drkht ki tlash krta haay۔ yahan bainry srch try klas ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: py aych py $ by ays ty = nya bainry srch try () ؛ $ by ays ty-> dakhl karain (5) ؛ $ by ays ty->dakhl karain (3) ؛ $ bst-> dakhl karain (7) ؛ $ bst-> dakhl karain (1) ؛ $ bst-> dakhl karain (4) ؛ $ bst-> dakhl karain (6) ؛ $ bst-> dakhl karain (8) ؛bazaghsht $ bst-> tlash (4) ؛// aaؤt pt: 1 (sch) $ bst-> hazaf (4) ؛ aykw $ bst-> tlash (4) ؛// aaؤt pt: 0 (ghlta) is msaal main ، ayk nya bainry srch try aabjykt tshkyl diya gaya hay ، aur dayta anasar 5 ، 3 ، 7 ، 1 ، 4 ، 6 ، aur 8 main sat nwdas shaml karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔drkhtas kay bad tlash () ka tarykha dayta ansar 4 kay sath nwda kay liye drkht ko tlash karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jo sch waps aata haay۔daylyt () ka tarykha drkht sy dayta ansar 4 kay sath nwda ko hatanay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔as kay bad tlash () ka tarykha dwbarha dayta ansar 4 kay sath nwda kay liye drkht ki tlash kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jo ghalat lwtta haay۔

Question: kesi ktaar ki nmaindghy karnay waly py aych py klas ko nafza karain aur ankyw aur day kywiw aapryshnza kay liye tarykay fraham kryn۔
Answer: py aych py smyt prwghramngh zabanwn main mtghyr taipngh kay liye jamd aur mthark taipngh do mkhtlf nktaha nzar hayn۔jamd taipngh main ، mtghyrat ko wazuha tawr par dayta ki ksm kay sath aalan kya jata hay ، aur taip chykngh mrtb wkt par ki jati haay۔as kay braks ، mthark taipngh mtghyr ko rn taim kay wkt kesi bhi dayta ki ksm tfwyzu karnay ki ajazat dyty hay ، aur ksm ki janch pratal rn taim 12 main ki jati haay۔ yahan py aych py main jamd aur mthark taipngh ki kuch msaalyn hayn: jamd taipngh msaal: py aych py fnskshn ayda (ant $ aay ، ant $ aay ، ant $)b): ant {wapsy $ a + $ b ؛} $ ntyjha = shaml karain (1 ، 2) ؛ ghwnj $ ntyjha ؛// aaؤt pt: 3 main is msaal main ، ADD () fnkshn do addy pyramytrza lyta hay aur ayk add waps krta haay۔pyramytrza aur rytrn wylyw kay dayta aksam ko fnkshn kay dstkhta main wazuha tawr par aalan kya gaya haay۔as fnkshn ko sirf antyjr pyramytrza kay sath kaha jaskta hay ، aur yeh hamyshha ayk addy taipngh msaal kay tawr par waps aye gha۔// aaؤt pt: 3.14 is msaal main ، rn taim kay wkt $ maiy nmbr mtghyr ko dayta ki mkhtlf aksam tfwyzu ki jati hain ، bshmwl antyjr ، strngh aur flwt۔mtghyr kay dayta ki ksm ko wazuha tawr par aalan nahin kya jata hay ، aur rn taim kay doran isy kesi bhi wkt tbdyl kya jaskta haay۔ astytk taipngh trkyaty aml main abtdaiy ghltaywn ko pkranay aur bhatr karkrdghy fraham karnay main mdd fraham krskty hay ، kywnkha ksm ki janch pratal mrtb wkt par ki jati haay۔taham ، yeh mthark taipngh sy zayada skht aur kam lchkdar bhi hawskta haay۔mthark taipngh zayada lchk aur tyza tr trky fraham krskty hay ، lekin agar rn taim 12 main aksam ko ahatyata sy janch nahin ki jati hay tou is sy zayada ghltay sy mtasarha kwda bhi hawskta haay۔

Question: py aych py main astsanyٰ sy nmtnay kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur yeh btaiyn keh mkhtlf ksm kay mstsanyat ko pkranay aur un sy nmtnay ka tarykha۔
Answer: kesi py aych py klas ko nafza karnay kay liye jo ayk ktaar ki nmaindghy karty hain js main ankyw aur day kyw aapryshnza kay tarykwn kay sath ، hum py aych py ki mayary py aych py laibryry (ays py ayl) 12 kay zaryaha fraham krdha asplkyw klas astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal aml haay: py aych py sy ayl aay ays ki ktaar {njy $ ktaar ؛awamy fnkshn __ knstrkt () {$ this-> ktaar = nya splqueue () ؛} awamy tkryb enqueue ($ kdr) {$ this-> ktaar-> enqueue ($ kdr) ؛} awamy tkryb dequeue () {wapsy $ this-> ktaar-> dequeue () ؛} this is nfaza main ، ktaar klas ktaar ko nafza karnay kay liye asplkyw klas ka astamal krty haay۔__ knstrkt () ka tarykha ayk niay splqueue aabjykt ko shrwa krta haay۔ankyw () ka tarykha splkyw klas 1 kay ankyw () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey ktaar kay aakhr main ayk ansar ko shaml krta haay۔day kyw () ka tarykha splkyw klas 1 kay day kyw () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey ktaar ka pehla ansar hatata hay aur waps krta haay۔(1) ؛ $ ktaar-> enqueue (2) ؛ $ ktaar-> enqueue (3) ؛ aykw $ ktaar-> dequeue () ؛// aaؤt pt: 1echo $ ktaar-> dequeue () ؛// aaؤt pt: 2echo $ ktaar-> dequeue () ؛// aaؤt pt: 3 main is msaal main ، ayk nya ktaar aabjykt tshkyl diya gaya hay ، aur ktaar main tyn anasar shaml karnay kay liye ankyw () ka tarykha astamal kya jata haay۔as kay bad daykyw () ka tarykha ktaar kay pehlay ansar ko hatanay aur zaahar karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jo 1 hay ، is kay bad dusray aur tesray anasar kay bad ، jo 2 aur 3 hayn۔

Question: "ayk haysh tybl ki nmaindghy karnay waly py aych py klas ko nafza karain aur andraj ، hazaf karnay aur bazayaft kay tarykay fraham kryn۔"
Answer: py aych py main astsanaa hayndalngh ayk aysa tarykha kar hay jo dawylprza ko rn taim ki ghltaywn ko snbhalnay ki ajazat dyta hay ، jsay kesi prwghram main mstsanyat bhi kaha jata haay۔mstsanyat ghair mtwka prwghram kay ntaij hain jo prwghram khud 12 kay zaryaha snbhal saktay hayn۔py aych py astsanaay hayndalngh kay l several kiy khsawsay klydy alfaza mhaya krty hay ، bshmwl kwshsh ، kych ، aur thrw۔ py aych py main raayt sy mtalk hayndalngh kis tarah kam krty haay: kwshsh blak kwda kay ayk blak ki nmaindghy krta hay js main mstsanyat pyda hawsktay hayn۔ kych blak kwda kay ayk blak ki nmaindghy krta hay jo hawgha۔jb kesi khasa astsanaa ko phynk diya gaya hay tou is par aml draamd kya jata haay۔ jab kesi khasa ghltay ki haalt hawty hay tou is ko astsanaa phynknay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ yahan py aych py main astsanyٰ hayndalngh ko kis tarah astamal kya jaye is ki ayk msaal haay: py aych py fnskshn tksym ($ aadad ، $ daynwmnytr) {aghr ($ ($daynwmnytr === 0) {niy raayt phynk dyn ("safr sy tksym") ؛} waps $ nmbr / $ daynwmnytr ؛} kwshsh karain {$ ntyjha = tksym (10 ، 0) ؛bazaghsht $ ntyjha ؛} kych (astsanaa $ ay) {ghwnj "raayt ki ghrft:"۔$ e-> getMessage () ؛} is msaal main ، tksym () fnkshn do pyramytrza lyta hay aur aadad ko tksym karnay kay ntyjay ko daynwmynytr kay zaryaha waps krta haay۔aghr frkha safr hay tou ، fnkshn "safr kay zaryaha dawyzen" kay pygham kay sath astsanaa phynk dyta haay۔kwshsh blak ka astamal tksym () fnkshn ko amly jamha phananay kay liye kya jata hay ، aur kych blak ko kesi bhi astsanaa ko pkranay kay liye astamal kya jata hay jo fnkshn kay zaryaha phynk diya jata haay۔aghr koi astsanaa pkraa jata hay tou ، "pkraay gaye astsanaa: dawyzen baiy safr" ka pygham zaahar hawta haay۔ py aych py main mkhtlf ksm kay mstsanyat ko pkranay aur snbhalnay kay l you ، aap mkhtlf astsanaa ki aksam kay sath mtadd kych blaks astamal krsktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr pr: phptry {// kuch kwda jo astsanaa phynk sakta haay} kych (astsanaa taip 1 $ e) {// astsanaa taip 1} kych (astsanaa taip 2 $ e) {// raayt taip 2} kych (astsanaa $ e) {// kesi bhi ko snbhalyndyghr mstsanyat} is msaal main ، try blak main kuch kwda mwjwd hay jo hawskta hay keh is main koi raayt haw۔phala kych blak ksm ki raayt taip 1 ki raaytwn ko pkranay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، dusra kych blak ksm ki raayt taip 2 ki astsanaa ko pkranay kay liye astamal hawta hay ، aur tesra kych blak kesi bhi dusray astsanaa ko pkranay kay liye astamal hawta hay jo pehlay do blaks kay zaryaha nahin pkraay jatay hayn۔mkhtlf astsanaa ki aksam kay sath ayk sy zayada kych blaks ka astamal krkay ، aap mkhtlf ksm kay mstsanyat ko mkhtlf tarykwn sy snbhal saktay hayn۔

Question: py aych py main ghmnam afaal (bndsh) kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur un kay astamal ki ayk msaal pysh kryn۔
Answer: py aych py klas ko nafza karnay kay l a haysh tybl ki nmaindghy karnay kay l intra ، andraj ، hazaf karnay aur bazayaft kay tarykwn kay sath ، hum py aych py ki mayary py aych py laibryry (ays py ayl) 12 kay zaryaha fraham krdha haysh tybl klas astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal aml haay: py aych py sy ayl aay ays haysh tybl {njy $ haysh tybl ؛awamy fnkshn __ knstrkt () {$ this-> haysh tybl = nya splhashtable () ؛} awamy fnkshn dakhl karain ($ klyd ، $ kdr) {$ this-> haysh tybl-> shaml karain ($ klyd ، $ kdr) ؛} awamy fnkshn hazaf karain ($ klyd) {$ this-> haysh tybl-> aafsytwn syt ($ klyd) ؛} awamy fnkshn bazayaft ($ klyd) {wapsy $ this-> haysh tybl-> aafsyt ghyt ($ klyd) ؛}} is nfaza main ، haysh tybl klas haysh tybl ko nafza karnay kay liye aspl hastybl klas ka astamal krty haay۔__ knstrkt () ka tarykha ayk niy splhastable aabjykt ki abtda krta haay۔dakhl () ka tarykha haysh tybl main ayk ansar ko shaml krta hay js main dyiay gaye klyd aur kdr kay sath asplhashtybl klas 1 kay ADD () fnkshn ka astamal kya jata haay۔hazaf () ka tarykha asplhashtybl klas 1 kay aafsytwn syt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey haysh tybl sy di hogi klyd kay sath ansar ko hata dyta haay۔bazayaft () ka tarykha aspl haytbl klas 1 kay aafsytt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey haysh tybl sy dyiay gaye klyd kay sath ansar ki kdr ko bazayaft krta haay۔ haysh tybl klas ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: py aych py $ haysh tybl = nya haysh tybl () ؛$ haysh tybl-> dakhl karain ("key1" ، "wylyw 1") ؛ hah haysh tybl-> dakhl karain ("key2" ، "wylyw 2") ؛ hah haysh tybl-> dakhl karain ("key3" ، "wylyw 3") ؛ aykw $ haysh tybl->bazayaft ("key2") ؛// aaؤt pt: wylyw 2 $ haysh tybl-> hazaf karain ("key2") ؛ aykw $ haysh tybl-> bazayaft ("key2") ؛// aaؤt pt: nwln is msaal kay tawr par ، ayk nya haysh tybl aabjykt tshkyl diya gaya hay ، aur dakhl () ka tarykha haysh tybl main chabyan "ky 1" ، "ky 2" ، aur "ky 3" aur "wylyw 1" kay sath haysh tybl main tyn anasar shaml karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔، "wylyw 2" ، aur "wylyw 3"۔as kay bad bazayaft () ka tarykha kar "key2" kay sath ansar ki kdr ko bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jo "wylyw 2" haay۔hazaf () ka tarykha haysh tybl sy klyd "ky 2" kay sath ansar ko hatanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔as kay bad bazayaft () ka tarykha kar phir klyd "ky 2" kay sath ansar ki kdr ko bazayaft karnay kay liye dwbarha astamal kya jata hay ، jo kaladm haay۔

Question: "ksy ghraf ki nmaindghy karnay waly py aych py klas ko nafza karain aur trawrsl kay liye tarykay mhaya karain ، mkhtsar trien rastha tlash karain ، aur chkrwn ka ptha lghaiyn۔"
Answer: ghmnam afaal ، jsay bndsh kay nam sy bhi jana jata hay ، woh afaal hain jo nam kay baghair byan kyay jatay hain aur py aych py 12 main akdar kay tawr par astamal hawsktay hayn۔wha aksar aaly aardar kay afaal kay dlail kay tawr par ya kesi aaly aardar fnkshn kay ntyjay main tamyr karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hain js main fnkshn 2 ko waps karnay ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ghmnam afaal mfyd hain jab aap ko kesi fnkshn ko kesi dusray fnkshn main dlyl kay tawr par mntkl karnay ki zurwrt hawty hay ، lekin aap aai ty 1 kay liye ayk alyhadha fnkshn ki wzuahat nahin karna chahti hayn۔ py aych py main ghmnam afaal ko kis tarah astamal kya jaiay: py aych py $ nmbr = [1، 2 ، 3 ، 4 ، 5] ؛ $ fltrda nmbrza = srny_fltr ($ nmbr ، fnkshn ($ nmbr) {wapsy $ nmbr ٪ 2 === 0 ؛}) ؛ prnt_ aar ($ fltrdanmbrs) ؛// aaؤt pt: srny ([1] => 2 [3] => 4) is msaal main ، ary_fltr () fnkshn kesi haalt ki bnyad par kesi saf kay anasar ko fltr karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ayk ghmnam fnkshn ko dusri dlyl kay tawr par Array_filter () kay liye mnzawr kya jata hay ، jo ayk hi pyramytr $ nmbr lyta hay aur agar $ nmbr bhi hay tou sch waps aajata haay۔srny_fltr () fnkshn ayk niy saf ko lwtata hay js main sirf asal saf kay anasar shaml hawtay hain jo haalt ko pora karty hayn۔ ghmnam afaal main astsanaa ko pkranay aur snbhalnay kay l you ، aap ghmnam fnkshn kay andr tryt kych blak astamal krsktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr pr: py aych py $ tksym = fnkshn ($ nmbr ، $ daynwmnytr) {kwshsh karain {aghr ($ daynwmnytr === 0) {niy raayt phynk dyn ("safr sy tksym") ؛} wapsy $ nmbr / $ daynwmynytr ؛} kych (astsanaa $ ay) {ghwnj "raayt ki ghrft:"۔$ e-> getMessage () ؛}} ؛ aykw $ tksym (10 ، 0) ؛// aaؤt pt: raayt ki pkray ghiy: safr kay zaryaha dawyzen is msaal kay tawr par ، ayk ghmnam fnkshn ki wzuahat ki hogi hay js main do pyramytrza $ aadad aur $ daynwmytr lytay hayn۔try kych blak ko kesi bhi astsanaa ko pkranay kay liye astamal kya jata hay jo fnkshn kay zaryaha phynk diya jata haay۔aghr koi astsanaa pkraa jata hay tou ، pygham "raayt: dawyzen braiay safr" zaahar hawta haay۔

Question: py aych py main dayta bys rabtaay kay asawlwn par tbadlha khyal karain aur yeh btaiyn keh knkshn kaim karnay aur ays kyw ayl kay swalat par amldraamd karnay ka tarykha haay۔

"py aych py klas ko nafza karain js main dahyr (km sy kam ya zayada sy zayada hayp) ki nmaindghy ki jaye aur kam sy kam ya zayada sy zayada ansar ko andraj ، hazaf karnay aur bazayaft kay tarykay fraham kryn۔"
Answer:
py aych py main dayta bys kay rabtaay main dayta bys sy rabtaha kaim karna aur dayta bys kay sath taaml kay liye ays kyw ayl kay swalat par amldraamd karna shaml haay۔yhaan py aych py: 1 main dayta bys rabtaay kay asawl hayn۔ayk dayta bys ka antkhab karain APIPHP kay pas ays kyw ayl dayta bys sy rabtaha kaim karnay kay liye tyn tarykay hain ، jnhyn dayta bys API kaha jata haay۔wha hayn: klasza 2 ka astamal karty hoey sadha fnkshn aabjykt par mbny wrzen (maiy ays kyw ayl aai ، py aych py dayta aabjykt (py day aw)) ka astamal karty hoey tarykha kar wrzen (ays kyw ayl_*)۔py aych py main dayta bys knkshn bnanay kay l a dayta bys knkshn bnaiyn ، is fnkshn ka astamal kryn۔as main char dlail lghtay hayn: srwr ka nam ، saarf nam ، pas wrda ، aur dayta bys ka nam۔yhaan ayk msaal haay: phprequire_once ('db_credentials.php') ؛ $ db = mysqli_connect (db_server ، db_user ، db_pass ، db_name) ؛ 3۔py aych py main ays kyw ayl kwirystw ko ays kyw ayl kay astfsar par amldraamd karain ، is fnkshn ka astamal kryn۔yha do dlail lyta haay: dayta bys knkshn hayndal aur bhyjnay kay liye ays kyw ayl astfsar۔yhaan ayk msaal haay: py aych py $ sql = "saarfyn sy * mntkhb kryn" ؛ $ ntyjha = mysqli_query ($ db ، $ sql) ؛ 4۔py aych py main ays kyw ayl astfsar kay ntaij ko bazayaft karain ، ntaij syt ki ksm kay lhaaza sy mnasb fnkshn ka astamal kryn۔msaal kay tawr par ، ayk hi ktaar lanay kay liye ، mysqli_fetch_row () astamal kryn۔yhaan ayk msaal haay: py aych py $ ktaar = mysqli_fetch_row ($ ntyjha) ؛ 5۔py aych py main dayta bys knkshn ko band karnay kay l the dayta bys knkshn ko band karain ، Mysqli_close () fnkshn astamal kryn۔yhaan ayk msaal yeh haay: py aych py aym ays kyw ly_klwza ($ day by) ؛ yahan ays kyw ayl aai aykstynshn ka astamal karty hoey py aych py main knkshn kaim karnay aur ays kyw ayl kay astfsar par aml karnay ki ayk msaal haay: py aych py // ayk dayta bys knkshn bnaiyn $ srwrynym = "lwkl hawst" ؛ $ saarf nam = "saarf nam =" saarf nam = "saarf nam =" saarf nam = "saarf nam =" saarf nam = "saarf nam =""؛ $ pas wrda =" pas wrda "؛ $ dbname =" mydb "؛ $ conn = mysqli_connect ($ srwr nam ، $ saarf nam ، $ pas wrda ، $ dbname) ؛ // chyk knkshnf (! $ kwn) {daaiy (" knkshn nakam:". mysqli_connect_error ()) ؛} // ayk SQL astfsar $ SQL =" ID ، pehla nam ، Myguests sy aakhry nam mntkhb karain "؛ $ ntyjha = mysqli_query ($ Con ، $ sql) ؛ // bazayaft kay ntaij (mysqli_num_rows (result)> 0) {// hr saf ka aaؤt pt dayta jabky ($ ktaar = mysqli_fetch_assoc ($ ntyjha)) {ghwnj "ID:"۔$ ktaar ["ID"]۔" - nam:".$ ktaar ["phala nam"]۔"".$ ktaar ["aakhry nam"]۔"
" ؛}} else {ghwnj "0 ntaij" ؛} // dayta bys knkshn ko band karain myssqli_close ($ CON) ؛ is msaal main ، ays kyw ayl ki twsya ka astamal karty hoey ays kyw ayl dayta bys sy ayk rabtaha kaim kya gaya haay۔ksy tybl sy dayta ko mntkhb karnay kay liye ayk ays kyw ayl astfsar par aml draamd kya jata hay ، aur is kay ntaij maiy kyly_fych_aswk () ka astamal karty hoey laiay jatay hayn۔as kay bad ntaij askryn par aaؤt pt hawtay hayn۔aakhr main ، dayta bys knkshn mysqli_close () ka astamal karty hoey band haay۔

Question: "py aych py klas ko nafza karain jo try (sabkha drkht) ki nmaindghy karty hain aur andraj ، hazaf karnay ، aur alfaza ki tlash kay tarykay fraham karty hayn۔"

syshn ko ayk anwkha ID tfwyzu kya gaya hay jo zakhyrha shuda akdar ko bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay 4. jab bhi syshn tyar kya jata hay tou ، ayk kwky js main mnfrd syshn ID hawta hay karnay kay liye ، syt kwky () fnkshn 56. kwky ko bazayaft karnay kay liye ، kwky ko haasal karnay kay liye ، kwky ka astamal kryn۔ kwky ko hazaf karnay kay liye ، is ki myaad khtm hony ka wkt mazuy ki Question: "srklr bfr (rngh bfr) ki nmaindghy karnay waly py aych py klas ko nafza karain aur ankyw ، day kywiw ، aur janch pratal kay liye tarykay fraham karain keh aya bfr mkml ya khaly hay ya nhayn۔"
Answer: py aych py main anhasaar kay antzaam main py aych py prwjykt kay anhasaar ka antzaam karna shaml hay ، jo byrwny laibryrywn ya pykyj hain jn par prwjykt anhasaar krta haay۔anhasaar ka antzaam aham hay kywnkha is sy yeh ykyny bnanay main mdd mlty hay keh is mnsawbay ko zurwry laibryrywn aur pykyjwn tak rsaiy haasal hay ، aur woh laibryry aur pykyj prwjykt kay sath tazaha trien aur mtaabkt rkhtay hayn۔ kmpwzar jesay twlwn ko pykjwn aur laibryrywn kay antzaam kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔py aych pykmpwzar py aych py kay liye anhasaar mynyjr hay jo dawylprza ko anhasaar karnay wali laibryrywn ko un kay mnsawbay ki zurwryat ka aalan karnay ki ajazat dyta hay aur woh inhain un kay prwjykt main un 12345 kay liye anstal kray gha۔kmpwzar ayk mft aur awpn swrs twl hay jo khasa tawr par py aych py 12345 kay liye bnaya gaya haay۔yha dawylprza ko un anhasaar ki fharst kay l comp kmpwzar.jsn namy fail fraham krkay kam krta hay jo woh astamal krrhaay hayn۔kmpwzar ko phir ptha chlta hay keh kon sy pykyjza ko anstal karnay ki zurwrt hay ، aur un ko anstal karnay ki zurwrt hay (js ka mtalb hay keh woh inhain prwjykt main daaؤn lwda krta haay) 34. kmpwzar ki khsawsayat main sy kuch shaml hayn: yeh aalmy staha par 64 kay bjaiay ، mnsawbay kay dahanchay main mkamy tawr par pykjwn ko anstal krta haay۔as sy dawylprza ko is pykyj kay ayn mtaabk wrzen ko kam karnay ki ajazat mlty hay js ki inhain zurwrt hawty haay۔ is sy dawylprza ko ryday myda pykyjza ko shaml karnay ki ajazat mlty hay jo aam prwghramngh rkawtwn ko hal karnay main un ki mdd karty hayn۔.yha py aych py prwjykt main anhasaar ko snbhalnay kay liye kmpwzar ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: apni mshyn par kmpwzar anstal kryn۔ ayk nya py aych py prwjykt tyar kryn۔ prwjykt ki rwt daairktry main ayk kmpwzar.jsn fail ko tyar kryn۔ prwjykt kay anhasaar ko byan kryn۔kmpwzar.jsn fail۔ anhasaar anstal karnay kay liye kmpwzar anstal kmanda haay۔ yahan ayk msaal kay tawr par kmpwzar ۔jsn fail hay jo mwnwlwgh/mwnwlwgh pykyj par anhasaar ka aalan krty haay: JSON {"zurwrt": {"aykwlwgh/mwnwlwgh": "^2.0"}} is msaal main ، kmpwzar.jsn fail kay zurwrt waly hasaay main aykwlwgh/mwnwlwgh pykyj par anhasaar ka aalan kya gaya hay ، js main version 2.0 kay wrzen ki rkawt haay۔as ka mtalb yeh hay keh kmpwzar mwnwlwgh/mwnwlwgh pykyj ka tazaha trien wrzen anstal kray ga jo wrzen 2.0 kay sath mtaabkt rkhta haay۔ ayk bar jab kmpwzar۔ json fail bnaiy hogi hay tou ، anhasaar anstal karnay kay liye kmpwzar anstal kmanda chlaiyn۔kmpwzar aykwwlwgh/mwnwlwgh pykyj ko daaؤn lwda aur anstal kray ga ، is kay sath sath kesi bhi dusray anhasaar kay sath jo prwjykt kay zaryaha drkar haay۔ akhttam par ، anhasaar ka antzaam py aych py ki trky ka ayk aham phalw hay ، aur kmpwzar jesay twlza py aych py ki anhasaar ka antzaam karna aasan bnatay hayn۔prwjyktkmpwzar ka astamal krkay ، dawylpr un prajykt laibryrywn ko un kay mnsawbay ki zurwrt ka aalan krsktay hain ، aur kmpwzar inhain un kay liye apnay prwjykt main anstal karain ghay۔as sy yeh ykyny bnanay main mdd mlty hay keh is mnsawbay ko zurwry laibryrywn aur pykyjwn tak rsaiy haasal hay ، aur yeh keh woh laibryry aur pykyj tazaha trien aur is mnsawbay kay sath mtaabkt rkhtay hayn۔

Question: py aych py ki khsawsayat kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur un ko mtadd klaswn main dwbarha kabl astamal kwda fraham karnay kay liye kis tarah astamal kya jaskta haay۔
Answer: ap lwda krdha failwn ki twsayk aur prwsysngh kay tarykwn kay sath fail ap lwda hayndalr ki nmaindghy karnay wali py aych py klas ko nafza karnay kay l we ، hum tlash kay ntaij main dstyab kwda ki msaalwn ko astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan dstyab kwda par mbny fail aplwda hayndalr ki nmaindghy karnay wali py aych py klas ka ayk msaal aml haay: py aych py sy ayl aay ays ays fail aplwdalr {njy $ ajazat di hogi aykstynshnza = srny () ؛njy $ myksfailaiza = 0 ؛njy $ aplwda daairyktry = '' ؛pblk fnkshn __ knstrkt ($ ajazat di hogi aykstynshnza ، $ myksfailaiza ، $ aplwda daairyktry) {$ this as-> ajazat di hogi aykstynshnza = $ ajazat di hogi aykstynshnza ؛$ this-> maxFilesize = $ myksfailaiza ؛$ yha-> aplwda daairyktry = $ aplwda daairyktry ؛} pblk fnkshn hayndalp lwda ($ fylda nam) {aghr (! isset ($ _ failyn [$ fylda nam])) {niy raayt phynk dyn ('fail nahin mly') ؛} $ fail = $ _files [$ fylda nam] ؛aghr ($ fail ['ghltay']! == aplwda_r_wk) {niy raayt phynk dyn ('ap lwda ki khraby') ؛} $ aykstynshn = path anfw ($ fail ['nam'] ، pathinfo_extention) ؛aghr (! in_array ($ aykstynshn ، $ yha-> di janay wali aykstynshnza)) {niy raayt ('ghlta fail ki ksm') phynk dyn۔} if ($ fail ['saiza']> $ this-> maxFilesize) {niy raayt phynk dyn ('fail bohat bray') ؛} $ mnzal = $ yha-> aplwda daairyktry۔'/'.$ fail ['nam'] ؛aghr (! move_uploaded_file ($ fail ['tmp_name'] ، $ mnzal)) {niy raayt phynk dyn ('ap lwda karnay main nakam') ؛} wapsy $ mnzal ؛}} is nfaza main ، fail aplwda hayndalr klas ayk fail ap lwda hayndalr ki nmaindghy krty hay ، js main ayk knstrktr hawta hay jo ajazat shuda fail aykstynshnza ، zayada sy zayada fail ka saiza ، aur aplwda daairktry ko shrwa krta haay۔hayndal lwda () ka tarykha fail ko ghltaywn kay l the fail ko chyk krkay ، fail ki ksm aur saiza ki twsayk krkay ، aur fail ko aplwda daairyktry main mntkl krkay fail ko hayndal krta haay۔ fail aplwda hayndalr klas ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: py aych py $ ajazat di hogi aykstynshnza = srny ('jpg '،' jpeg '،' png '،' gif ') ؛ $ maxFilesize = 1024 * 1024 ؛// 1 MB $ aplwda daairyktry = 'ap lwdaza' ؛ $ hayndalr = nya failwplwda hayndalr ($ ajazat di hogi aykstynshnza ، $ myksfailaiza ، $ aplwda daairyktry) ؛ kwshsh karain {$ mnzal = $ hayndalr-> hayndal ap ('fail') ؛bazaghsht 'fail ap lwda'۔$ mnzal ؛} kych (astsanaa $ ay) {ghwnj 'ghltay:'۔$ e-> getMessage () ؛} is msaal main ، ayk nya Fileuploadheandler aabjykt ajazat fail aykstynshnza ، zayada sy zayada fail ka saiza ، aur aplwda daairktry kay sath bnaya gaya haay۔as kay bad fail un pt fylda ka nam pas krkay fail ap lwda ko snbhalnay kay liye hayndal ap () ka tarykha astamal kya jata haay۔aghr fail ap lwda kamyab hay tou ، tarykha aplwda fail ka rastha waps krta hay ، jo is kay bad askryn par zaahar hawta haay۔aghr fail ap lwda kay doran koi ghltay waka hawty hay tou ، tarykha kar ayk astsanaa phynk dyta hay ، jo pkraa jata hay aur askryn par zaahar hawta haay۔

Question: "trjyhay ktaar ki nmaindghy karnay waly py aych py klas ko nafza karain aur aaly trjyhay ansar ki andraj ، hazaf karnay aur bazayaft kay tarykay fraham kryn۔"
Answer: py aych py ki khsawsayat ayk hi wrasat ki zabanwn main kwda kay dwbarha astamal kay liye ayk tarykha kar hain jesay py aych py 1234۔ayk khasayt ka mksad ayk dawylpr ko mkhtlf tabkaty drjha bndy 2534 main rhanay wali kiy aazaad klaswn main aazaadanha tawr par tarykwn kay sytwn ko dwbarha astamal karnay kay kabl bnanay kay zaryaha wahad wrasat ki kuch hadwd ko kam karna haay۔ayk khasayt ayk tjrydy tabkay ki tarah hay js ko khud hi anstynt nahin kya jaskta ، haalankha is ka zayada tr antrfys 25 kay mkablay main hawta haay۔ayk khasayt ayk klas ki tarah dwbarha astamal ki ayk akaiy hay ، lekin is ka mksad sirf ayk amdha aur mstkl way 4 main faalyt ko ghrwp karna haay۔as kay apnay 4 par ayk khasayt ko tyza karna mmkn nahin haay۔: ، aur $ yeh 5۔py aych py ki klasyn khsaltwn ka astamal krskty hain aur is main khsaltwn ka kwda 5 shaml krsktay hayn۔klas ko ayk khasayt astamal karnay kay l use ، astamal ki wrda ko astamal kya jata haay۔aysa karnay sy ، yeh is tarah hay jesay khsalt kay andr mwjwd tamam kwda ko klas 5 main kapy kya jata haay۔klas main ab tryt 5 main byan krdha tarykwn aur khsawsayat ki wzuahat ki hogi haay۔ yahan py aych py main ayk khasayt ka astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: py aych py tryt syghrytngh {njy $ nam = 'jan' ؛awamy tkryb syhaylw () {ghwnj 'haylw ، mera nam haay'۔$ yha-> nam ؛class} klas shkhsa {saygreating astamal karain ؛} $ shkhsa = nya shkhsa () ؛ $ shkhsa-> syhaylw () ؛// aaؤt pt: haylw ، mera nam janyn hay is msaal kay tawr par ، ayk syghrytngh ki khasayt ayk njy praprty $ nam aur awamy tarykha syhaylw () kay sath byan ki hogi haay۔ksy shkhsa ki klas ki wzuahat sy ghrytngh ki khasayt ko shaml karnay kay liye astamal ki wrda kay sath ki hogi haay۔shkhsa ki klas ki ayk msaal tkhlyk ki hogi hay ، aur syhaylw () ka tarykha kaha jata hay ، jo "haylw ، mera nam jan haay" ko aaؤt krta haay۔ akhttam par ، py aych py ki khsawsayat wrasat ki zurwrt kay baghair mtadd klaswn main kwda ko dwbarha astamal karnay ka ayk tarykha fraham krty haay۔kwda ko brkrar rkhnay aur is main trmym karna aasan 12534۔khsawsayat dawylprza ko mkhtlf klas haaiyrarchyza 2534 main aazaad klaswn main afky tawr par kwda ko dwbarha astamal karnay ki ajazat dyty hayn۔khsawsayat py aych py 5.4 main pysh ki janay wali ayk taaktwr khsawsayt hain ، aur woh prwghramrza ko kwda kay tkrawn ko dwbarha astamal karnay dytay hayn۔

Question: py aych py main bakaadha tasarat kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur un ki msaal fraham karain keh un ko pytrn mmasal aur mtn main hayra phyry kay l use kis tarah astamal kya jaiay۔
Answer: py aych py klas ko nafza karnay kay l the ، aaly trjyhay ansar kay andraj ، hazaf karnay ، aur bazayaft kay tarykwn kay sath trjyhay ktaar ki nmaindghy karain ، hum py aych py ki mayary py aych py laibryry (ays py ayl) 12 kay zaryaha fraham krdha asplpaiyryty kyw klas astamal krsktay hayn۔asplpyraityw kyw klas ayk trjyhay ktaar ki aham khsawsayat mhaya krty hay ، js ko zayada sy zayada hayp 2 ka astamal karty hoey nafza kya jata haay۔yhaan ayk py aych py klas ka ayk msaal hay jo asplpyryty kywiyw ka astamal karty hoey trjyhay ktaar ki nmaindghy krta haay: py aych py sy ayl aay ays ki trjyhay kywiw {njy $ ktaar ؛awamy fnkshn __ knstrkt () {$ this-> ktaar = nya splpriorityqueue () ؛} awamy fnkshn dakhl karain ($ kymt ، $ trjyha) {$ this-> ktaar-> dakhl karain ($ kdr ، $ trjyha) ؛} awamy fnkshn hazaf karain () {$ this-> ktaar-> nchwra () ؛} awamy fnkshn jhanknay () {wapsy $ this-> ktaar-> tap () ؛}} is aml main ، trjyhay tabkay ki klas ayk trjyhay ktaar ki nmaindghy krty hay ، js main ayk knstrktr hawta hay jo ayk nya splpriorityqueue aabjykt ko shrwa krta haay۔dakhl () ka tarykha tfwyzu krdha trjyha kay sath trjyhay ktaar main ansar dakhl krta haay۔hazaf () ka tarykha trjyhay ktaar sy aaly trjyhay ansar ko hata dyta haay۔jhanknay wala () tarykha trjyhay ktaar sy aaly trjyhay ansar ko is ko hataiay baghair lwtata haay۔ yahan trjyhay kwkyw klas ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: py aych py $ ktaar = niy trjyha kyw () ؛ $ ktaar-> dakhl karain ('aypl' ، 2)؛ $ ktaar-> dakhl karain ('kylay' ، 1) ؛ $ ktaar-> dakhl karain ('chyry' ، 3) ؛ aykw $ ktaar-> jhanknay () ؛// aaؤt pt: chyry $ ktaar-> hazaf () ؛ aykw $ ktaar-> jhanknay () ؛// aaؤt pt: ayplyn is msaal kay tawr par ، ayk niy trjyha kyw aabjykt tshkyl di hogi hay ، aur dakhl () ka tarykha astamal kya jata hay takha tfwyzu krdha trjyhaat kay sath trjyhay ktaar main tyn anasar ko shaml kya jaskay۔as kay bad jhanknay wala () tarykha trjyhay ktaar sy aaly trjyhay ansar ko bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jo "chyry" lwtta haay۔as kay bad hazaf () ka tarykha trjyhay ktaar sy aaly trjyhay ansar ko door karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔as kay bad PEEK () ka tarykha dwbarha trjyhay ktaar sy niay aaly trjyhay ansar ko bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jo "aypl" ko lwtata hay .kfkyshn main ، py aych py ki mayary py aych py laibryry (ays py ayl) kay zaryaha fraham krdha asplpyryty kyw klas ko py aych py klas ko nafza karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔aaly trjyhay ansar ki andraj ، hazaf karnay ، aur bazayaft kay tarykwn kay sath trjyhay ktaar ki nmaindghy krna۔asplpyraityw kyw klas ayk trjyhay ktaar ki aham khsawsayat mhaya krty hay ، js ko zayada sy zayada dahyr ka astamal karty hoey nafza kya jata haay۔trjyhay kwkyw klas ka astamal asplpyryty kyw klas ko lpytnay aur trjyhay ktaar kay sath kam karnay kay liye zayada aasan antrfys fraham karnay kay liye kya jaskta haay۔

Question: "bainry dahyr ki nmaindghy karnay waly py aych py klas ko nafza karain aur kam sy kam ya zayada sy zayada ansar ko dakhl karnay ، hazaf karnay ، aur bazayaft kay tarykay fraham kryn۔"
Answer: bakaadghy sy azahaar ، jsay aam tawr par "ryjyks" ya "ryjyks py" kay nam sy jana jata hay ، ayk khasa tawr par farmytda tykst dawr hain jo tykst 12345 main nmwnwn ko tlash karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔mwsar aur mwsar tykst prwsysngh aur hayra phyry 12345 kay liye aaj bhi bakaadha azahaar ayk taaktwr twl haay۔as bat ki tsadyk kay liye bakaadha azahaar ka astamal kya jaskta hay keh aya aadad wa shmar ki shkl yany saarf kay zaryaha dakhl krdha nam ، ay myl ، fwn nmbr ، wghyrha drst tha ya nahin ، tykst mwad kay andr mmasal tar ko tlash karain ya tbdyl karain ، aur isi tarah kay py aych py main ، bakaadha azahaarat hayn۔daymytrza ، ayk nmwnha ، aur akhtyary trmym karnay walon par mushtamil tar۔sb sy aam had bndy karnay wala farwrda slysh (/) hay ، lekin jab pytrn main farwrda slysh hawta hay tou ، dusray daymytrza jesay ya ~ 3 ka antkhab karna aasan hawta haay۔py aych py mkhtlf ksm kay afaal mhaya krty hay jo bakaadghy sy azahaar khyal kay sath kam karnay kay liye astamal ki jaskty hay ، jesay prygh_mch () ، prygh_mch_al () ، prygh_ry plys () ، aur prygh_splt () 46. yahan ayk msaal hay keh py aych py main bakaadghy sy azahaar ko kis tarah astamal kya jaye A ko mych karnay kay liye kis tarah astamal kya jaiay۔pytrn: py aych py $ strngh = 'tyza braؤn faks sst ktay par chhlangh lghata haay۔'pytrn nahin mla' ؛} is msaal main ، ayk tar ki wzuahat ki hogi hay ، aur farwrda slysh daymytr ka astamal karty hoey ayk nmwnha ki wzuahat ki hogi haay۔prygh_mch () fnkshn ka astamal tar kay khlaf pytrn sy mlnay kay liye kya jata hay ، aur agar pytrn mil jata hay tou ، askryn par "pytrn mla" zaahar hawta haay۔aghr pytrn nahin mila hay tou ، askryn par "pytrn nahin mla" dkhaya jata haay۔ yahan ayk aur msaal hay keh py aych py main ayk nmwnha ko tbdyl karnay kay liye bakaadghy sy azahaar kis tarah astamal kya jaiay: py aych py $ strngh = 'sst braؤn faks sst ktay par chhlangh lghata haay۔'؛ $ pytrn = '/quick/' ؛ $ mtbadl = 'sst' ؛ $ nywzatrngh = prygh_ry plys ($ pytrn ، $ mtbadl ، $ strngh) ؛ ghwnj $ nywzatrngh ؛ is msaal main ، ayk tar ki wzuahat ki hogi hay ، aur ayk nmwnha ki wzuahat ki hogi hay ، aur ayk nmwnha ki wzuahat ki hogi haay۔farwrda slysh daymytr ka astamal karty hawiay۔mtbadl ki tar ki wzuahat ki hogi haay۔prygh_ry plys () fnkshn ko astrngh main pytrn ko mtbadl tar kay sath tbdyl karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، aur niy tar askryn par zaahar hawty haay۔ akhttam par ، bakaadghy sy azahaar py aych py main pytrn mmasal aur mtn ki hayra phyry kay liye ayk taaktwr twl haay۔bakaadghy sy azahaar khyal karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay keh aya saarf kay zaryaha dakhl krdha dayta ki shkl drst thi ya nahin ، tykst mwad kay andr mmasal tar ko tlash ya tbdyl karain ، wghyrha۔py aych py mkhtlf ksm kay afaal mhaya krty hay jo bakaadghy sy azahaar khyal kay sath kam karnay kay liye astamal ki jaskty hay ، jesay prygh_mch () ، prygh_mch_al () ، prygh_ry plys () ، aur prygh_splt ()۔

Question: "py aych py main mhafwza kwdangh tarykwn kay asawlwn par tbadlha khyal karain ، jn main un pt ki twsayk ، dayta saaf karnay ، aur ays kyw ayl anjykshn aur kras sait askrptngh (ayks ays ays) hamlwn kay khlaf thafza shaml haay۔"
Answer: py aych py klas ko nafza karnay kay liye jo bainry hayp ki nmaindghy karty hain js main dakhl ، hazaf karnay ، aur kam sy kam ya zayada sy zayada ansar ki bazayaft kay tarykwn kay sath ، hum tlash kay ntaij main dstyab kwda ki msaalwn ka astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk py aych py klas ka ayk msaal hay jo bainry hayp ki nmaindghy krta hay ، js main dstyab kwda par mbny haay: py aych py sy ayl aay ays bainry hayp {njy $ hayp ؛njy $ saiza ؛njy $ ismaxheap ؛awamy fnkshn __ knstrkt ($ ismaxheap = true) {$ this-> hayp = srny () ؛$ yha-> saiza = 0 ؛$ this-> ismaxheap = $ ismaxheap ؛} awamy fnkshn dakhl karain ($ kdr) {$ this-> hayp [++ $ this-> saiza] = $ wylyw ؛$ this-> siftup ($ this-> saiza) ؛} awamy fnkshn hazaf karain () {$ jra = $ yha-> hayp [1] ؛$ yha-> hayp [1] = $ yha-> hayp [$ yha-> saiza--] ؛$ yha-> syft daawn (1) ؛wapsy $ jra ؛} awamy fnkshn jhanknay () {wapsy $ this-> hayp [1] ؛} njy fnkshn syft ap ($ andayks) {$ waldyn = $ andayks >> 1 ؛aghr ($ waldyn> 0 && $ yha-> mwazanha karain ($ andayks ، $ waldyn)) {$ yha-> swyp ($ andayks ، $ waldyn) ؛$ this-> siftup ($ waldyn) ؛}} njy fnkshn syft daawn ($ andayks) {$ baien = $ andayks << 1 ؛$ dien = $ baien + 1 ؛$ sab sy braa = $ andayks ؛aghr ($ baien <= $ this-> saiza && $ yha-> mwazanha karain ($ baien ، $ sab sy braa)) {$ sab sy braa = $ baien ؛} agar ($ hak <= $ this-> saiza && $ yha-> mwazanha karain ($ hak ، $ sab sy braa)) {$ sab sy braa = $ hak ؛} if ($ sab sy braa! == $ andayks) {$ yha-> swyp ($ andayks ، $ sab sy braa) ؛$ yha-> syft daawn ($ sab sy braa) ؛}} njy fnkshn ka mwazanha ($ a ، $ b) {aghr ($ this-> ismaxheap) {wapsy $ this-> hayp [$ a]> $ this-> hayp [$ b] ؛} dusri {wapsy $ this-> hayp [$ a] <$ this-> hayp [$ b] ؛}} njy fnkshn tbadlha ($ a ، $ b) {$ temp = $ this-> hayp [$ a] ؛$ yha-> hayp [$ a] = $ yha-> hayp [$ b] ؛$ yha-> hayp [$ b] = $ aarzuy ؛} the is nfaza main ، bainry hayp klas ayk bainry hayp ki nmaindghy krty hay ، js main ayk knstrktr hawta hay jo ayk niay dahyr ko ayk akhtyary pyramytr kay sath shrwa krta hay js ki wzuahat karnay kay liye keh yeh zayada sy zayada dahyr hay ya mnt ka dahyr haay۔dakhl () ka tarykha dahyr main ayk ansar dakhl krta hay aur hayp praprty ko brkrar rkhnay kay l if is ko alag krta haay۔hazaf () ka tarykha dahyr sy jra kay ansar ko hata dyta hay aur dahyr ki praprty ko brkrar rkhnay kay liye nechay ki taraf jata haay۔jhanknay wala () tarykha dahyr sy jra ansar ko hataiay baghair isy lwtata haay۔dahyr praprty ko brkrar rkhnay kay liye syft ap () ka tarykha ayk ansar ko dahyr krta haay۔syft daawn () ka tarykha dahyr ki praprty ko brkrar rkhnay kay liye dahyr kay nechay ansar ko alag krta haay۔mwazanha () ka tarykha dahyr main do anasar ka mwazanha krta hay is ki bnyad par keh yeh zayada sy zayada hayp hay ya mnt ka dahyr haay۔swyp () ka tarykha dahyr main do anasar ko tbdyl krta haay۔ yahan bainry hayp klas ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: py aych py $ hayp = nya bainry hayp (ghlta) ؛ $ hayp-> dakhl karain (5) ؛ $ hayp-> dakhl karain (3)؛ $ hayp-> dakhl karain (7) ؛ aykw $ hayp-> jhanknay () ؛// aaؤt pt: 3 $ hayp-> hazaf () ؛ aykw $ hayp-> jhanknay () ؛// aaؤt pt: 5 is msaal kay tawr par ، pyramytr ko jhwtay kay sath ayk nya bainry hayp aabjykt tyar kya gaya hay takha is bat ki nshandhay ki jaskay keh yeh ayk mnt ka dahyr haay۔dakhl () ka tarykha dahyr main tyn anasar shaml karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔as kay bad jhanknay wala () tarykha dahyr sy kam sy kam ansar ko bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jo lwtta haay۔ 3 hazaf () tarykha ko phir dahyr sy kam sy kam ansar ko door karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔as kay bad jhanknay wala () tarykha dwbarha dahyr sy niay kam sy kam ansar ko bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jo waps aata haay۔drkht 2 ki 'jra'۔bainry hayp klas ko py aych py klas ko nafza karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay js main bainry hayp ki nmaindghy hawty hay js main dakhl ، hazaf karnay ، aur kam sy kam ya zayada sy zayada ansar ki bazayaft kay tarykwn kay sath۔bainry hayp klas bainry dahyr ki aham khsawsayat mhaya krty hay ، jo sray ka astamal karty hoey nafza ki jati haay۔

Question: kyshay kay nzaam ki nmaindghy karnay waly py aych py klas ko nafza karain aur dayta ko mwsar andaza main bazayaft aur bazayaft kay tarykay fraham kryn۔
Answer: py aych py kay dawylprza kay liye mhafwza kwdangh kay tarykwn ko bdnyty par mbny hamlwn ko rwknay aur hasas malwmat ki hafazat kay liye zurwry haay۔yhaan py aych py main mhafwza kwdangh kay tarykwn kay kuch asawl hayn: kabhi bhi saarf kay un pt par aatmad nah kryn: py aych py kwda main zayada tr khtarat ayk aysay dawylpr ki wjha sy hawtay hain js nay saarf kay un pt 1 par mnasb tawr par adm aatmad nahin kya۔ays kyw ayl anjykshn aur kras sait askrptngh (ayks ays ays) hamlwn ko rwknay kay liye saarf kay un pt ko hamyshha twsayk aur safaiy kryn۔ apnay py aych py wrzen ko bakaadghy sy ap dayt kryn: apnay py aych py wrzen ko tazaha trien rakhien is bat ka ykyn karnay kay liye keh aap kay pas tazaha trien sykywrty pych aur bgh fks 2345 tyar hayn۔ays kyw ayl kay byanat: tyar krdha byanat ays kyw ayl kay swalat ko pyramytraiza karnay ka ayk tarykha hay ، jo ays kyw ayl anjykshn hamlwn ko rwknay main mdd fraham krskta haay۔ dayta saaf karnay ka astamal kryn: dayta saaf karnay ka aml dayta ki safaiy aur twsayk karnay ka aml hay takha yeh ykyny bnaya jaskay keh yeh astamal karna mhafwza haay۔abtdaiy tawr par un pt ko saaf karain ، aaؤt pt ko saaf kryn۔XSS hamlwn 234 sy bchanay kay liye aaؤt pt ankwdangh ka astamal kryn۔ HTTPS: HTTPS ayk mhafwza prwtwkwl hay jo klaint aur srwr kay mabyn rahadary main dayta ko khfyha krta haay۔ansanwn main drmyany hamlwn aur dyghr aksam kay hamlwn sy bchanay kay liye HTTPs ka astamal kryn۔ghyr mtwka un pt 4 ko rwknay kay liye blak lsts kay bjaiay ajazat namwn ka astamal kryn۔ apnay wyb srwr ko mhafwza kryn: ghair zurwry khdmat ko ghair faal krkay ، mzubwta pas wrdaza ka astamal krkay ، aur apnay saft wyir ko tazaha trien rkhyn۔ sykywrty kay liye kwkyza par anhasaar nahin karain ghay۔hamlha aawrwn kay zaryaha aasany sy jwra twra.sykywrty kay liye kwkyza par anhasaar nah kryn۔as kay bjaiay syshn twkn astamal kryn۔as main farm fyldaza ، yw aar ayl pyramytrza ، aur JSON pay lwda main dakhl krdha dayta shaml haay۔saarf kay dstyab kwda ki msaalwn ka astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan py aych py kyshay kay nzaam ko nafza karnay kay tarykha ki kuch msaalyn hayn: jamd klas ka astamal: py aych py sy ayl aay ays sy kyshay {njy jamd $ ، $ kdr) {khwd :: $ kyshay [$ klyd] = $ kdr ؛} awamy jamd fnkshn hazaf karain ($ klyd) {ghyr syt (khwd :: $ kyshay [$ klyd]) ؛} awamy jamd fnkshn wazuha () {khwd :: $ kyshay = srny () ؛} the is nfaza main ، kyshay ki klas kyshay kay nzaam ki nmaindghy krty hay ، js main kyshay kay aadad wa shmar ko haasal karnay ، trtyb denay ، hazaf karnay aur saaf karnay kay jamd tarykwn kay sath۔kyshay kay ('fw') ؛// aaؤt pt: barkych :: hazaf karain ('fw') ؛ aykw kyshay :: haasal karain ('fw' ، 'dayfalt') ؛// aaؤt pt: dayfalt is msaal kay tawr par ، syt () ka tarykha kyshay main klydy kdr ki jwray ko sstm main kyshay kay dayta ko mhafwza krty haay۔syt () ka tarykha kar myaad khtm hony kay wkt kay sath kyshay main klydy kdr ki jwray ko shaml karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔as kay bad kyshay sy klyd ki kymt ko bazayaft karnay kay liye GET () ka tarykha astamal kya jata haay۔hazaf () ka tarykha kyshay sy klydy kdr ki jwray ko hatanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔as kay bad ghyt () ka Question: kesi py aych py klas ko nafza karain jo hadayt shuda aysaiklk ghraf (day aay jy) ki nmaindghy karty hain aur tapwlwjykl chhantnay aur mkhtsar trien rastha tlash karnay kay tarykay fraham karty hayn۔

Question: ayk fainait astyt mshyn (ayf ays aym) ki nmaindghy karnay wali py aych py klas ko nafza karain aur ryastwn kay mabyn mntkly aur wakaat ko snbhalnay kay tarykay fraham kryn۔
Answer: ghltay sy nmtnay aur laghngh py aych py ki trky kay lazmi phalw hain takha yeh ykyny bnaya jaskay keh ayply kyshnza aasany sy chlty hain aur msail ki jld shnakht aur un ko thyk karnay kay l .۔yhaan py aych py main ghltay sy nmtnay aur lagh un karnay kay kuch asawl hayn: ghltay ki atalaa dhandghy ka astamal kryn: ghltay ki atalaa dhandghy py aych py main ayk blt un khsawsayt hay jo aap ko ghltaywn aur antbahaat ko dykhnay ki ajazat dyty hay jo aap kay kwda par aml draamd kay doran rwnma hawty haay۔apnay kwda main msail ki nshandhay karnay aur un ko thyk karnay kay liye ghltay ki atalaa dhandghy ka astamal kryn۔ kwshsh kych blaks ka astamal kryn: apnay kwda kay nfaza kay doran raayt ko haasal karnay aur un ko snbhalnay kay liye tr kych blaks ka astamal kryn۔as sy aap ghltaywn ko khwbsawrty sy snbhalnay aur apni drkhwast ko ghrnay sy rwknay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔an afaal ko apni ghltay sy nmtnay kay kwaad ki wzuahat karnay aur ghltaywn ko snbhalnay kay tarykay main trmym karnay kay liye astamal kryn۔ laghngh kay afaal ka astamal kryn: py aych py laghngh kay liye mtadd blt un afaal fraham krta hay ، jesay ghltay_lagh () aur syslagh ()۔an afaal ka astamal ghltaywn aur antbahaat ko kesi fail ya door draza ki mnzal par lagh un karnay kay liye kryn۔ ghltay kay kwda ka astamal kryn: mkhsawsa ghltaywn ki nshandhay karnay aur saarfyn aur dawylprza ko mazeed tfsayly malwmat fraham karnay kay liye ghltay kay kwda ka astamal kryn۔as sy daybghngh aur pryshany ka sragh lghanay main mdd mil sakti haay۔as sy daybghngh aur dshwarywn ka sragh lghanay main mdd mil sakti haay۔ mkhtlf ksm ki ghltaywn ka astamal kryn: mkhtlf ksm ki ghltaywn ka astamal karain ، jesay nwts ، antbahaat aur ghltayan ، msilay ki shdt ki nshandhay karnay kay liay۔as sy daybghngh aur dshwarywn ka azaalha karnay main mdd mil sakti haay۔ ghltay sy nmtnay aur laghngh kay frym wrk ko astamal kryn: ghltay sy nmtnay aur laghngh ko aasan bnanay aur azuafy khsawsayat jesay fltrngh ، farmytngh ، aur antbaha۔، ghltay sy nmtnay aur laghngh py aych py ki trky kay lazmi phalw hain takha yeh ykyny bnaya jaskay keh ayply kyshnza aasany sy chlty hain aur msail ki jld shnakht aur un ko thyk karnay kay l .۔py aych py main ghltay sy nmtnay aur lagh un karnay kay un asawlwn par aml karty hoey ، dawylpr is bat ko ykyny bnasktay hain keh un ki drkhwastyn mzubwta ، kabl aatmad aur brkrar rkhnay main aasan hayn۔

Question: py aych py main anhasaar anjykshn (DI) kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur yeh btaiyn keh yeh dahylay jwraay aur bhatr janch kay hasawl main kis tarah mdd krta haay۔
Answer: ryastwn kay mabyn mntkly aur wakaat ko snbhalnay kay tarykwn kay sath ayk fainait astyt mshyn (ayf ays aym) ki nmaindghy karnay wali py aych py klas ko nafza karnay kay l we ، hum tlash kay ntaij main dstyab kwda ki msaalwn ka astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan py aych py ayf ays aym ko nafza karnay kay tarykha ki kuch msaalyn hayn: ayf ays aym pykyj ka astamal karty hawiay: phprequire_once fsm-> trghr ('dwbarha shrwa') ؛ aykw $ fsm-> getState () ؛// aaؤt pt: is par aml draamd ، ayf ays aym klas ayk mhadwd ryasty mshyn ki nmaindghy krty hay ، js main tranzayshn shaml karnay aur wakaat ko mthark karnay kay tarykay hayn۔abtdaiy ryast 'aaf' par syt haay۔ryastwn kay mabyn mntkly ko shaml karnay kay liye aydatrynsyshn () ka tarykha astamal kya jata haay۔trghr () ka tarykha ryastwn kay mabyn wakaat aur mntkly ko mthark karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ghyt astyt () ka tarykha FSM ki mwjwdha haalt ko bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ mhadwd pykyj ka astamal karty hawiay: phprequire_once 'linite/statemachine.php' ؛ $ ryastyn = srny ('aaf' => srny ('say' => srny ('('') ،) ،' on '=> srny (' to '=> srny (' aaf '،' matal ') ،) ،' matal '=> srny (' sy '=> srny (' aan ') ،) ،) ؛ $ tranzayshn = srny ('trn_wn' => srny ('' => 'aaf' ، 'say' => 'aan' ،) ، 'trn_wf' => srny ('say' => 'aan'،' to '=>' aaf '،) ،' matal '=> srny (' '=>' sy '،' sy '=>' matal '،) ،' dwbarha shrwa '=> srny (' mnjanb '=> 'matal' ، 'to' => 'on' ،) ،) ؛ $ astyt mychyn = nya fainait \ astyt mychyn \ astyt mychyn () ؛ $ astyt mychyn-> syt astyts ($ ryastyn) ؛ $ astyt mychyn-> syt tranzayshn ($ tranzayshn)؛ $ statemachine-> setinitialstate ('aaf') ؛ $ astyt mychyn-> drkhwast dyn ('trn_wn') ؛ ghwnj $ astyt mychyn-> getCurrentState () ؛// aaؤt pt: aan $ astyt mychyn-> drkhwast dyn ('matal') ؛ aykw $ astyt mychyn-> getCurrentState () ؛// aaؤt pt: matal $ astyt mychyn-> drkhwast dyn ('ryzaywmay') ؛ aykw $ astyt mychyn-> getCurrentState () ؛// aaؤt pt: is par aml draamd ، mhadwd \ astyt mychyn \ astyt mychyn klas ayk mhadwd ryasty mshyn ki nmaindghy krty hay ، js main ryastwn ، mntkly aur abtdaiy haalt ko trtyb denay kay tarykwn kay sath۔ryastwn aur mntkly ki wzuahat safwn ka astamal karty hoey ki hogi haay۔drkhwast () ka tarykha ryastwn kay mabyn mntkly aur mntkly ko laghw karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔getCurrentState () ka tarykha FSM.in akhttam ki mwjwdha haalt ko bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، ayk mhadwd ryasty mshyn (FSM) ayk ryazuy ka madal hay jo kesi aysay nzaam ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye astamal hawta hay jo kesi bhi wkt 123 main ryastwn ki ayk mhadwd tadad main hawskta haay۔py aych py ayf ays aym ko nafza karnay kay liye mtadd pykyj mhaya krta hay ، jesay ayf ays aym aur fainait۔py aych py main ayf ays aym ko nafza krkay ، Question: "py aych py klas ko nafza karain jo dwghna mnslk fharst ki nmaindghy krta hay aur andraj ، hazaf karnay aur trawrsl kay tarykay fraham krta haay۔"
Answer: anhasaar anjykshn (DI) ayk dayzaain ka nmwnha hay jo saft wyir anjynirngh main astamal hawta hay takha alta kntrwl (IOC) ko nafza kya jaskay۔yha klas sy bahar mnhasar ashyaa ki tkhlyk ki ajazat dyta hay aur mkhtlf tarykwn sy 1234 kay zaryaay klas ko un ashyaa ko fraham krta haay۔day aai ka astamal karty hoey ، hum klas sy bahar mnhasar ashyaa ki tkhlyk aur pabnd ko mntkl karty hain jo un par mnhasar haay۔anhasaar anjykshn pytrn main klas ki tyn aksam shaml hayn: klaint klas: klaint klas (mnhasar klas) ayk klas hay jo srws klas par mnhasar haay۔ srws klas: srws klas (anhasaar) ayk klas hay jo klaint klas ko khdmt fraham krty haay۔anjyktr klas: anjyktr klas srws klas aabjykt ko klaint ki klas 1 main anjykshn dyta haay۔ anhasaar anjykshn ashyaa ki tamyr kay khdshat ko alag krkay aur un ka astamal karty hoey dahylay jwraay aur bhatr janch kay hasawl main mdd krta hay ، js ki wjha sy dahylay dahylay prwghramwn ka aaghaza hawta haay۔ksy shay kay mkhsawsa nfaza par klas kay anhasaar ko khtm krkay aur is kay bjaiay antrfys ya tjrydy tabkay par mnhasar hawta haay۔as sy anhasaar klasza 124 ko mtasar kyay baghair kesi shay kay nfaza ko tbdyl karna aasan hawjata haay۔janch kay doran frzuy ashyaa kay anjykshn ki ajazat dy kar bhatr janch ki ahalyt haasal ki jati hay ، jo hakyky ashyaa kay tarza aml ki tklyd krskty hay aur alag thlgh 124 main mnhasar klaswn ki janch karna aasan bna sakti haay۔، sytr anjykshn ، aur antrfys anjykshn 124۔knstrktr anjykshn main anhasaar klas kay tamyr knndha ko mntkl karna shaml haay۔sytr anjykshn main anhasaar ko klas kay syttr tarykwn par mntkl karna shaml haay۔antrfys anjykshn main ayk antrfys ko nafza karna shaml hay jo anhasaar ko anjykshn lghanay kay tarykwn ki wzuahat krta haay۔yha klas sy bahar mnhasar ashyaa ki tkhlyk ki ajazat dyta hay aur mkhtlf tarykwn sy un ashyaa ko klas ko fraham krta haay۔anhasaar anjykshn ashyaa ki tamyr aur un kay astamal kay khdshat ko alag krkay dahylay jwraay aur bhatr janch kay hasawl main mdd krta hay ، js sy dahylay dahylay prwghramwn ka baasa bnta haay۔py aych py main ، anhasaar anjykshn mkhtlf tknykwn ka astamal karty hoey nafza kya jaskta hay ، bshmwl knstrktr anjykshn ، syttr anjykshn ، aur antrfys anjykshn۔

Question: "py aych py main dayzaain kay nmwnwn kay tsawr par tbadlha khyal karain aur snghltn ، fyktry ، aur mbsaryn kay nmwnwn ki msaalyn fraham kryn۔"

Question: "py aych py klas ko nafza karain jo try (sabkha drkht) ki nmaindghy karty hain aur andraj ، hazaf karnay ، aur alfaza ki tlash kay tarykay fraham karty hayn۔"
Answer: dayzaain kay nmwnay aam saft wyir dayzaain kay msail kay kabl astamal hal hain jo wkt kay sath mwsar saabt hoey hayn۔wha kesi khasa msilay ko hal karnay ka ayk mayary tarykha fraham karty hain ، js sy kwda ko zayada brkrar rkhnay ، twsya pzayr aur dwbarha astamal kay kabl 12 bnatay hayn۔py aych py main ، wyb dawylpmnt main aam msail ko hal karnay kay liye dayzaain kay nmwnwn ka astamal kya jaskta hay ، jesay dayta bys tak rsaiy ، saarf ki twsayk ، aur kychngh 12۔ yahan py aych py main dayzaain kay nmwnwn ki kuch msaalyn hayn: snghltn pytrn: snghltn pytrn ayk tkhlyky dayzaain ka nmwnha hay jo ykyny bnata haay۔yha ayk tabkay ki sirf ayk msaal mwjwd hay aur is msaal kay tawr par 345 tak rsaiy ka aalmy nktaha fraham krta haay۔yha nmwnha mfyd hay jab hamain yeh ykyny bnana hoga keh klas ki sirf ayk msaal tshkyl di jaye ، jesay jab hum mshtrkha wsail tak rsaiy ko kntrwl karna chahti hain ya aalmy ryast ko brkrar rkhna chahti hayn۔snghltn pytrn ki ayk msaal ayk dayta bys knkshn klas hay jo is bat ko ykyny bnaty hay keh dayta bys sy sirf ayk hi knkshn tyar kya gaya hay aur is ko ayplykyshn 35 main shyir kya gaya haay۔ fyktry pytrn: fyktry ka nmwnha ayk tkhlykaty dayzaain ka nmwnha hay jo ayk spr klas main ashyaa bnanay kay liye ayk sadha antrfys fraham krta haay۔، lekin zayly tabkat ko is ksm ki ashyaa ko tbdyl karnay ki ajazat dyta hay jo tshkyl dyiay jien ghay۔yha nmwnha mfyd hay jab hamain kuch shraita ya pyramytrza ki bnyad par mthark tawr par ashyaa bnanay ki zurwrt hawty haay۔fyktry pytrn ki ayk msaal ayk klas hay jo API ki ksm ki ksm par mbny API ashyaa ki mkhtlf aksam ki tkhlyk krty haay۔ayk shay ki haalt bdl jati hay ، is kay tamam anhasaar ko mtala kya jata hay aur khud bkhwd 12 ko ap dayt kya jata haay۔yha nmwnha mfyd hay jab hamain aywnt sy chlnay waly nzaamwn ، jesay swshl mydaya ayps ya ryil taim chyt ayply kyshnza ko nafza karnay ki zurwrt haw۔aabzarwr pytrn ki ayk msaal ayk swshl mydaya ayp hay jo pyrwkarwn ki fydaza ko ap dayt krty hay jab saarf niay mwad ko pwst krta haay۔py aych py main ، wyb dawylpmnt main aam msail ko hal karnay kay liye dayzaain kay nmwnwn ka astamal kya jaskta hay ، jesay dayta bys tak rsaiy ، saarf ki twsayk ، aur kychngh۔snghltn ، fyktry ، aur mbsaryn kay nmwnay dayzaain kay nmwnwn ki kuch msaalyn hain jn ko py aych py main mkhsawsa msail ko hal karnay aur kwda ki bhaaly ، askyl ayblty aur dwbarha astamal ko bhatr bnanay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔

Question: "bainry srch try (by ays ty) ki nmaindghy karnay waly py aych py klas ko nafza karain aur andraj ، hazaf karnay aur tlash karnay kay tarykay fraham kryn۔"
Answer: aabjykt par mbny dayta bys (OODBs) aabjykt par mbny prwghramngh zabanwn jesay jawa aur paiythn 12 ki tarah ashyaa ko zakhyrha karnay aur un main hayra phyry karnay kay liye dayzaain kyay gaye hayn۔awdabs main ، shay khud aadad wa shmar ki nmaindghy kay bjaiay astwryj hay ، js sy aadad wa shmar kay pychydha dahanchay aur aabjykt 1 kay mabyn talkat ko zayada mwsar aur kdrty hayndalngh ki ajazat mlty haay۔OODBs aabjykt par mbny prwghramngh zabanwn kay sath achhy tarah sy kam karty hain aur pychydha dayta dahanchay ko achhy tarah sy snbhal saktay hayn۔py aych py ki drkhwastyn۔yha dawylprza ko py aych py klaswn main dayta bys tyblza ka nkshha bnanay ki ajazat dyta hay aur dayta bys 3 kay sath kam karnay kay liye ayk astfsar bldar aur twlza ka ayk syt fraham krta haay۔nzaryha OODB ki faalyt ko bhi is ki aabjykt prysns prt (OPL) kay zaryaay bhi spwrt krta hay ، jo dawylprza ko dayta bys 3 main ashyaa ko zakhyrha karnay aur bazayaft karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔yha dawylprza ko py aych py klaswn main dayta bys tyblza ka nkshha bnanay ki ajazat dyta hay aur dayta bys 4 kay sath kam karnay kay liye ayk astfsar bldar aur twlza ka ayk syt fraham krta haay۔prwpyl apni aabjykt prysnsty prt (aw py ayl) kay zaryaay aw aw day by ki faalyt ki bhi hamayt krta hay ، jo dawylprza ko dayta bys 4.mwngh day by main ashyaa ko zakhyrha karnay aur bazayaft karnay ki ajazat dyta haay: mwnghw day by ayk NOSQL dayta bys hay jo OODB faalyt ki hamayt krta haay۔yha dawylprza ko ashyaa kay mabyn pychydha dayta dahanchay aur talkat ko zakhyrha karnay aur bazayaft karnay ki ajazat dyta hay ، js sy yeh ayply kyshnza kay l a ayk achha antkhab hawta hay js main lchkdar dayta madalza ki zurwrt hawty haay۔awr azaghr۔py aych py main kiy aykstynshnza aur laibryryan hain jo aw day by ki faalyt ki hamayt krty hain ، bshmwl nzaryha ، prwpyl ، aur mwnghw day by۔an aykstynshnza aur laibryrywn ka astamal krkay ، py aych py dawylprza dayta bys main ashyaa ko zakhyrha aur bazayaft krsktay hain aur aadad wa shmar kay pychydha dahanchay aur ashyaa kay mabyn talkat ko mwsar andaza main snbhal saktay hayn۔
