Question: "ksy srny ka astamal karty hoey astyk ki nmaindghy karnay waly py aych py klas ko nafza karain aur psh ، pap aur jhanknay waly kamwn kay liye tarykay fraham kryn۔"
Answer: kychngh ayk aysy tknyk hay jo wyb ayply kyshnza ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye wyb dawylpmnt main astamal ki jati hay js main dayta bys sy dayta ko bazayaft karnay ya wyb pyj tyar karnay main wkt ki zurwrt hawty haay۔py aych py kychngh ki mtadd hakmt amly fraham krty hay ، jn main shaml hayn: un mymwry kychngh: un mymwry kychngh ayk aysy tknyk hay jo dayta bys ya dask par bjaiay mymwry main dayta ko mhafwza krty haay۔yha tknyk tyza aur mwsar hay ، kywnkha is sy dayta bys ya dask tak rsaiy haasal karnay ki zurwrt kay baghair dayta ko jldy sy bazayaft karnay ki ajazat mlty haay۔py aych py kiy aykstynshnza aur laibryryan mhaya krty hay jo mymwry kychngh main spwrt krty hay ، jesay aay py sy yw ، mym kychda ، aur rydays 12۔ dayta bys kychngh: dayta bys kychngh ayk aysy tknyk hay jo dayta bys kay bjaiay ksart sy dayta ko kyshay main mhafwza krty haay۔yha tknyk dayta bys par bwjh ko kam karnay aur wyb ayply kyshnza ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay l useful mfyd haay۔py aych py mtadd laibryrywn aur frym wrk mhaya krty hay jo dayta bys kychngh ki hamayt krty hay ، jesay nzaryha aur prwpyl 1۔ rydays kay sath kychngh: rydays ayk awpn swrs ، un mymwry main dayta dahanchha astwr hay jsay dayta bys ، kyshay aur mysj brwkr kay tawr par astamal kya jaskta haay۔rydays mtadd dayta dahanchay mhaya krta hay ، jesay dawr ، haysh aur fharstyn ، jo dayta ko jldy aur mwsar tarykay sy zakhyrha karnay aur bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal hawsktay hayn۔py aych py mtadd laibryrywn aur aykstynshnza ko fraham krty hay jo rydays ki hamayt krty hain ، jesay py aych py aar day aai ays aur prydays 12۔ mkhtlf kychngh ki hakmt amly kesi wyb ayply kyshn ki mkhsawsa zurwryat kay mtaabk astamal ki jaskty haay۔mymwry main kychngh ksart sy rsaiy waly dayta ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye karaamd hay jsay jldy sy bazayaft kya jaskta hay ، jabky dayta bys kychngh dayta ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye mfyd hay js tak kam ksart sy rsaiy haasal ki jati hay lekin phir bhi isy jldy sy bazayaft karnay ki zurwrt haay۔rydays kay sath kychngh dayta ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye karaamd hay js tak jld aur mwsar tarykay sy rsaiy haasal karnay ki zurwrt hay ، jesay syshn dayta ya ryil taim dayta۔ akhttam par ، kychngh wyb ayply kyshnza ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye wyb dawylpmnt main astamal hony wali ayk tknyk haay۔dayta bys sy dayta bazayaft karnay ya wyb pyj tyar karnay main lyta haay۔py aych py kychngh ki mtadd hakmt amly fraham krty hay ، js main mymwry kychngh ، dayta bys kychngh ، aur rydays kay sath kychngh shaml hayn۔kychngh ki un hakmt amlywn ka astamal krkay ، py aych py dawylprza apnay wyb ayply kyshnza ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bna saktay hain aur apnay srwrza par bwjh ko kam krsktay hayn۔

Question: py aych py main jnrytrza kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur is ki ayk msaal pysh karain keh un ko braay dayta sytwn par mwsar tkrar kay liye kis tarah astamal kya jaskta haay۔
Answer: psh ، pap ، aur jhanknay kay tarykwn kay sath ayk srny ka astamal karty hoey kesi astyk ki nmaindghy karnay waly py aych py klas ko nafza karnay kay l we ، hum tlash kay ntaij main dstyab kwda ki msaalwn ka astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan dstyab kwda par mbny ayk msaal aml haay: py aych py sy ayl aay ays ays astyk {mhafwza $ astyk ؛mhafwza $ had ؛awamy fnkshn __ knstrkt ($ had = 10) {$ this-> astyk = srny () ؛$ yha-> had = $ had ؛} awamy fnkshn psh ($ aaitm) {aghr (ghnty ($ this-> astyk) <$ this-> had) {srny_psh ($ yha-> astyk ، $ aaitm) ؛} dusri {nya rn taim aykspysyshn phynk dyn ('astyk bhra hoa haay!') ؛}} pblk fnkshn pap () {aghr ($ this-> isempty ()) {nya rn taim aykspysyshn phynk dyn ('astyk khaly haay!') ؛} else {wapsy array_pop ($ this-> astyk) ؛}} awamy fnkshn jhanknay () {wapsy akhttam ($ this-> astyk) ؛} awamy tkryb isempty () {khaly ($ this-> astyk) waps ؛} this is nfaza main ، astyk klas ayk srny ka astamal karty hoey ayk astyk ki nmaindghy krta hay ، js main psh ، pap ، jhanknay ، aur aaisty kam kay tarykwn kay tarykwn kay sath۔psh () ka tarykha kesi shay ko astyk par dhkylnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔pap () ka tarykha astyk sy kesi chyza ko pap karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔jhanknay wala () tarykha astamal kyay baghair astyk par upar ki shay ko waps karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔aaisympty () ka tarykha yeh chyk karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay keh aya astyk khaly hay ya nhayn۔ astyk klas ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: py aych py $ astyk = nya astyk () ؛ $ astyk-> psh ('aay') ؛ $ astyk->psh ('by') ؛ ghwnj $ astyk-> jhanknay () ؛// aaؤt pt: bychw $ astyk-> pap () ؛// aaؤt pt: bychw $ astyk-> pap () ؛// aaؤt pt: aecho $ astyk-> isempty () ؛// aaؤt pt: yeh msaal kay tawr par ، ayk nya astyk aabjykt tyar kya gaya hay ، aur do ashyaa ko astyk par dhkyl diya gaya haay۔as kay bad jhanknay wala () tarykha astyk par upar ki shay ko waps karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jo 'B' lwtta haay۔as kay bad pap () ka tarykha do bar astyk sy upar ki ashyaa ko pap karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jo baltrtyb 'B' aur 'A' lwtta haay۔as kay bad aaisympty () ka tarykha yeh chyk karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay keh aya astyk khaly hay ya nahin ، jo sch ko waps krta haay۔ akhttam par ، ayk astyk kmpywtr sains main astamal kya jata hay js main kmpywtr sains main astamal kya jata hay takha aakhry ، pehlay aaؤt (LIFO) main dayta astwr aur bazayaft kya jaskay۔aardar 123۔py aych py nay astyk ko nafza karnay kay tarykha kar ki mtadd msaalyn fraham kyn ، jesay upar dkhaiay janay waly astyk klas۔py aych py main astyk ko nafza krkay ، dawylprza mwsar andaza main dayta ko zakhyrha aur bazayaft krsktay hain aur LIFO trtyb main dayta ko bazayaft krsktay hain aur psh ، pap ، jhanknay aur aaisympty jesay kam anjam dy saktay hayn۔

Question: kesi hadayt namha ki nmaindghy karnay waly py aych py klas ko nafza karain aur dajkstra kay alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey mkhtsar trien rastha tlash karnay kay tarykay fraham kryn۔
Answer: py aych py main jnrytr aysay afaal hain jo mymwry main saf tyar karnay ki zurwrt kay baghair braay dayta sytwn par tkrar ki ajazat dytay hain ، jo mymwry kay msail ka sbb bn sakta haay۔ksy kdr ko waps karnay kay bjaiay ، ayk jnrytr atny hi akdar ki pydawar krta hay js ki zurwrt hawty hay ، braay dayta syt 123 par mwsar tkrar ki ajazat dyta haay۔jb kesi jnrytr ko blaya jata hay tou ، yeh ayk jnrytr aabjykt lwtata hay ، js ka astamal jnrytr kay zaryaha haasal krdha akdar par tkrar karnay kay liye kya jaskta haay۔jnrytrza ko braay aadad wa shmar kay sytwn ، jesay dayta bys kay swalat ya fail kay mndrjat par tkrar karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، baghair kesi aadad wa shmar ko ayk bar 24 main mymwry main lwda karnay ki zurwrt kay۔zurwrt haay۔yhaan ayk jnrytr ki ayk msaal hay jo pehlay panch nmbr haasal krty haay: py aych py fnskshn nmbr () {kay liye ($ i = 0 ؛ $ i <5 ؛ ++ $ i) {pydawar $ i ؛}} foreach (nums () as $ v) {ghwnj $ v."\ n" ؛} is msaal main ، nmbr () fnkshn ayk jnrytr hay jo pehlay panch nmbr haasal krta haay۔farch lwp jnrytr kay zaryaha haasal krdha akdar par tkrar karnay aur askryn par prnt karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ jnrytrza ko braay dayta sytwn ، jesay dayta bys kay swalat ya fail kay mndrjat par mwsar tkrar kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔yhaan ayk jnrytr ki ayk msaal hay jo fail sy lainyn prahty haay: py aych py fnskshn ghyt lainza ($ fail) {$ f = fopen ($ fail ، 'r') ؛kwshsh karain {jbkha ($ lain = fgets ($ f)) {pydawar $ lain ؛}} aakhr {fclose ($ f) ؛}} foreach (getLines ("file.txt") btawr $ n => $ lain) {aghr ($ n> 5) bryk ؛aykw $ lain ؛} is msaal main ، ghyt lainza () fnkshn ayk jnrytr hay jo fail sy lainwn ko prahta hay aur inhain ayk wkt main ayk haasal krta haay۔pysh ghwiy ka lwp jnrytr kay zaryaha haasal krdha lainwn par tkrar karnay aur askryn par prnt karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔aakhr main blak ko is bat ka ykyn karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay keh jab jnrytr khtm hawjata hay tou fail band hawjaty haay۔ akhttam par ، py aych py main jnrytr aysay kam hawtay hain jo mymwry main saf ko bnanay ki zurwrt kay baghair braay dayta sytwn par mwsar tkrar ki ajazat dytay hayn۔jnrytrza ko pydawar kay mtalwbha alfaza ka astamal karty hoey tkhlyk kya jata hay aur braay dayta sytwn ، jesay dayta bys kay swalat ya fail kay mshmwlat par tkrar kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، baghair kesi aadad wa shmar ko ayk hi wkt main mymwry main lwda karnay ki zurwrt kay۔jnrytrza ka astamal krkay ، py aych py dawylprza apni ayply kyshnza ki karkrdghy aur mymwry ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bna saktay hayn۔

Question: "py aych py frym wrk kay tsawr par tbadlha khyal karain ، jesay larywl ya symfwny ، aur tyza rftar trky ، kwda tnzaym ، aur askyl ayblty kay maamlay main un kay fwaid ki wzuahat kryn۔"
Answer: dayjkstra kay alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey mkhtsar trien rastha tlash karnay kay tarykwn kay sath kesi py aych py klas ko nafza karnay kay liye ، hum tlash kay ntaij main dstyab kwda ki msaalwn ka astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan dstyab kwda par mbny ayk msaal aml haay: py aych py sy ayl aay ays sy ghraf {njy $ amwdy ؛njy $ knarwn ؛awamy fnkshn __ knstrkt () {$ this-> amwdy = srny () ؛$ yha-> knarwn = srny () ؛} awamy fnkshn aydawrtyks ($ v) {$ this-> amwdy [$ v] = srny () ؛} awamy fnkshn aydajda ($ v1 ، $ v2 ، $ wzan) {if (! isset ($ this-> vertices [$ v1])) {$ this-> addvertex ($ v1) ؛} if (! isset ($ this-> vertices [$ v2])) {$ this-> addvertex ($ v2) ؛} $ yha-> knarwn [$ v1] [$ v2] = $ wzan ؛} awamy fnkshn mkhtsar trien rastha ($ shrwa ، $ khtm) {$ fasalwn = srny () ؛$ mlahazaha karain = srny () ؛$ pchhla = srny () ؛$ ktaar = nya splpriorityqueue () ؛foreach ($ this-> amwdy as as vertex => $ wylyw) {aghr ($ vertex == $ start) {$ fasalwn [$ ertex] = 0 ؛$ ktaar-> dakhl karain ($ wrtyks ، 0) ؛} else {$ fasalwn [$ vertex] = php_int_max ؛$ ktaar-> dakhl karain ($ wrtyks ، php_int_max) ؛} $ pchhla [$ vertex] = null ؛} jabky (! $ ktaar-> isempty ()) {$ u = $ ktaar-> nchwra () ؛aghr ($ u == $ khtm) {$ rastha = srny () ؛jbkha ($ pchhla [$ u]! = null) {array_unshift ($ rastha ، $ u) ؛$ u = $ pchhla [$ u] ؛} array_unshift ($ rastha ، $ shrwa) ؛wapsy $ rastha ؛} if (! isset ($ mlahazaha [$ u])) {$ mlahazaha kya [$ u] = sch ؛foreach ($ this-> knarwn [$ u] as $ v => $ wzan) {$ alt = $ fasalwn [$ u] + $ wzan ؛aghr ($ alt <$ fasalwn [$ v]) {$ fasalwn [$ v] = $ alt ؛$ pchhla [$ v] = $ u ؛$ ktaar-> dakhl karain ($ V ، -$ ALT) ؛}}}} ghalat waps ؛} this is aml main ، ghraf klas ayk hadayt namha ki nmaindghy krta hay ، js main amwdy aur knarwn ko shaml karnay kay tarykwn kay sath ، aur dajkstra kay alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey mkhtsar trien rastha tlash kya jata haay۔aydawrtyks () ka tarykha ghraf main ayk chwty ko shaml karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔aydajda () ka tarykha ghraf main ayk knaray shaml karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔mkhtsar trien path () tarykha astamal dajkstra kay alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey ghraf main do amwdy kay darmiyan mkhtsar trien rastha tlash karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ ghraf klas ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: py aych py $ ghraf = nya ghraf () ؛ $ ghraf-> aydajda ('aay'،' by '، 4) ؛ $ ghraf-b '،' d '، 5) ؛ $ ghraf-> aydajda (' c '،' d '، 8) ؛ $ rastha = $ ghraf-> mkhtsar trien rastha (' a '،' d ') ؛ agar ($ rastha){aykw amplwda (' ->' ، $ rastha) ؛// aaؤt pt: a -> b -> c -> d} else {ghwnj 'kwiy rastha nahin mla' ؛} is msaal main ، ayk nya ghraf aabjykt tyar kya gaya hay ، aur ghraf main panch knarwn ko shaml kya gaya haay۔as kay bad ghraf main do amwdywn kay darmiyan mkhtsar trien rastha tlash karnay kay liye mkhtsar trien () ka tarykha astamal kya jata hay ، jo mkhtsar trien rastay ki nmaindghy karnay waly amwdy hasaay ki ayk saf ko lwtata haay۔ampwda () fnkshn ko tar ko tar main shaml karnay aur askryn par prnt karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ akhttam kay akhttam par ، ayk hadayt wala ghraf ayk dayta dahanchha hay jo kmpywtr sains main astamal kya jata hay takha ashyaa kay ayk syt ki nmaindghy ki jaskay jahan kuch jwraay ashyaa sy mtalk haynWay2.py aych py mtadd msaalwn ki pysh ksh krty hay keh kis tarah hadayt waly ghraf ko nafza kya jaye ، jesay upar dkhaiay gaye ghraf klas۔py aych py main hadayt yaftha ghraf ko nafza krkay aur dayjkstra kay alghwrthm ka astamal krkay ، dawylprza ghraf main do amwdywn kay mabyn mwsar andaza main mkhtsar trien rastha tlash krsktay hayn۔

Question: kesi srny ka astamal karty hoey ktaar ki nmaindghy karnay wali py aych py klas ko nafza karain aur ankyw aur day kyw aapryshnza kay liye tarykay fraham kryn۔
Answer: py aych py frym wrk pehlay sy tamyr shuda ajzaaa aur laibryrywn ka mjmwaha hain jo ayk mwsar trkyaty nktaha nzar ki pysh ksh krkay wyb dawylpmnt ko aasan bnatay hain js main py aych py main hr chyza ko shrwa sy hi kwdangh ki zurwrt nahin hawty haay۔kchh anthaaiy mshhawr py aych py frym wrk main larywl ، symfwny ، kwdaghynytr ، kyk py aych py ، aur zaynda shaml hayn۔yhaan py aych py kay frym wrk kay astamal kay kuch fwaid hayn: rypda dawylpmnt: py aych py frym wrk mtadd kamwn ko khwdkar krta hay ، jesay twsayk ، syshn mynjmnt ، kychngh ، aur yw aar ayl mypngh ، jo trkyaty wkt ko tyza krta hay aur dawylprza ko wkt par mnsawbwn ko mkml aur fraham karnay kay kabl bnata haay۔py aych py frym wrk py aych py dawylprza ko prahnay kay kabl aur brkrar rkhnay waly kwda ko lkhnay kay kabl bna kar wyb sait ya wyb ayps ki dykh bhal ko aasan bnatay hayn۔aym wy sy aur astamal kay liye tyar kwda kay tkrawn jesi khsawsayat aap ki zurwryat kay mtaabk aap ki zurwryat kay mtaabk kwda ki trjmany aur trmym krty hayn۔py aych py kay frym wrk ka astamal ayk dusray dawylpr kay kwda par ayk dawylpr kay kam karnay kay amkany amwr ko khtm krta haay۔ askylyblty: py aych py frym wrk braay pymanay par ayply kyshnza ko snbhalnay kay liye bnaiay gaye hain aur zurwrt kay mtaabk aasany sy askyl ya nechay ki jaskty haay۔wha madaywlr fn tamyr ، blt un twlza ، aasan dayta bys hajrt ، askyl ayblty ، sykywrty khsawsayat ، aur antzaamyha jesi khsawsayat pysh karty hayn۔ kmywnty spwrt: py aych py kay frym wrk main bray aur faal kmywntyza hain jo mdd ، dstawyzaat aur ap dayt fraham krty hayn۔as sy yeh ykyny bnta hay keh frym wrk ko mstkl tawr par bhatr aur ap dayt kya jarhaa hay ، aur dawylpr aasany sy mdd aur wsail tlash krsktay hayn۔wha madaywlr aarkytykchr ، blt un twlza ، aasan dayta bys hajrt ، askyl aybltyblty ، sykywrty khsawsayat ، aur antzaamyha jesi khsawsayat pysh karty hayn۔ akhttam par ، py aych py frym wrk kiy fwaid pysh karty hain ، jn main tyzay sy trky ، kwda tnzaym ، askyl ayblty ، aur kmywnty spwrt shaml hayn۔py aych py kay frym wrk ka astamal krkay ، dawylprza wkt aur kwshsh ki bcht krsktay hain ، brkrar rkhnay wala kwda lkh saktay hain ، aur zurwrt kay mtaabk un ki ayply kyshnza ko aasany sy pymanha krsktay hayn۔

Question: py aych py main syshn aur kwkyza kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur yeh saarf ki haalt ko snbhalnay aur saarf ki twsayk ko snbhalnay kay liye kis tarah astamal hawsktay hayn۔
Answer: py aych py klas ko nafza karnay kay l an kesi ktaar ki nmaindghy karty hoey ankyw aur day kyw aapryshnza kay tarykwn kay sath ayk saf ka astamal karty hoey ، hum tlash kay ntaij main dstyab kwda ki msaalwn ka astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan dstyab kwda par mbny ayk msaal aml haay: py aych py sy ayl aay ays sy ktaar {mhafwza $ ktaar ؛awamy fnkshn __ knstrkt () {$ this-> ktaar = srny () ؛} awamy tkryb enqueue ($ aaitm) {srny_psh ($ yha-> ktaar ، $ aaitm) ؛} awamy fnkshn dequeue () {if ($ this-> isempty ()) {nya rn taim aykspysyshn phynk dyn ('ktaar khaly haay!') ؛} else {wapsy array_shift ($ this-> ktaar) ؛}} awamy tkryb isempty () {khaly ($ this-> ktaar) waps ؛} this is nfaza main ، ktaar ki klas ayk saf ki nmaindghy krty hay ، js main ayk sray ka astamal kya jata hay ، js main ankyw ، day kywiw ، aur aaisty fyty aapryshnza kay tarykay hayn۔enqueue () ka tarykha kesi chyza ko ktaar main daalnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔daykwi () ka tarykha ktaar sy kesi shay ko khtm karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔aaisympty () ka tarykha yeh chyk karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay keh ktaar khaly hay ya nhayn۔ ktaar klas ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: py aych py $ ktaar = niy ktaar () ؛ $ ktaar-> ankyw ('aay') ؛ $ ktaar->enqueue ('b') ؛ aykw $ ktaar-> dequeue () ؛// aaؤt pt: aecho $ ktaar-> dequeue () ؛// aaؤt pt: bychw $ ktaar-> isempty () ؛// aaؤt pt: yeh msaal kay tawr par ، ayk niy ktaar aabjykt tyar ki hogi hay ، aur do ashyaa ko ktaar main lghaya gaya haay۔as kay bad daykwi () ka tarykha do bar ktaar sy aaitmza ko kam karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jo baltrtyb 'A' aur 'B' lwtta haay۔as kay bad aaisympty () ka tarykha yeh chyk karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay keh ktaar khaly hay ya nahin ، jo sch haay۔ ntyjha yeh hay keh ، ayk ktaar kmpywtr sains main astamal hony wala dayta dahanchha hay jo pehlay ، aaؤt aaؤt (FIFO) main dayta ko zakhyrha karnay aur bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔aardar 123۔py aych py ktaar ko nafza karnay kay tarykha kar ki mtadd msaalyn pysh krty hay ، jesay upar dkhaiy hogi ktaar klas۔py aych py main ktaar ko nafza krkay ، dawylprza ayf aai ayf aw aardar main dayta ko mwsar andaza main astwr aur bazayaft krsktay hain aur ankyw ، day kywiw ، aur aaisympty jesay kam anjam dy saktay hayn۔

Question: "py aych py klas ko nafza karain jo haysh tybl ki nmaindghy karty hain jo ayk saf ka astamal karty hoey astamal karty hain aur andraj ، hazaf karnay aur bazayaft kay tarykay fraham karty hayn۔"
Answer: syshn aur kwkyza py aych py main do aham tsawrat hain jo saarf ki haalt ko snbhalnay aur saarf ki twsayk ko snbhalnay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔yhaan hr ayk ki ayk mkhtsar wzuahat haay: syshnza: ayk syshn mtadd drkhwastwn main saarf kay baray main malwmat ko zakhyrha karnay ka ayk tarykha haay۔jb saarf kesi wyb sait par jata hay tou ، ayk anwkha syshn ID tyar hawta hay ، jo saarf kay kmpywtr par kwky main mhafwza hawta haay۔as syshn aai day ka astamal saarf ki shnakht aur un kay syshn kay aadad wa shmar ko bazayaft karnay kay liye kya jata hay ، js main un ka saarf nam ، trjyhaat aur khrydary ki twkry kay mndrjat jesi malwmat shaml hawskty hayn۔syshn aam tawr par saarf ki twsayk aur kesi wyb sait kay mtadd safhaat par saarf ki haalt ko brkrar rkhnay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔ kwky: kwky dayta ka ayk chhwta sa tkraa hay jo kesi wyb sait kay zaryaha saarf kay kmpywtr par mhafwza hawta haay۔kwkyza ko aam tawr par saarf ki trjyhaat ، jesay un ki zaban ya fwnt saiza kay baray main malwmat zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، ya wyb sait par un ki srghrmy ko tryk karnay kay liay۔kwkyza ko saarf ki twsayk kay liye bhi astamal kya jaskta hay ، ayk mnfrd shnakht knndha ko zakhyrha krkay jo saarf ko mtadd drkhwastwn par shnakht karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ yahan kuch aysay tarykay hain jn main syshn aur kwkyza saarf ki haalt ko snbhalnay aur saarf ki twsayk ko snbhalnay kay liye astamal ki jaskty hayn: saarf ki twsayk: syshn aur syshn aur syshn awrkwkyza ko kesi wyb sait par saarfyn ki twsayk karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔jb saarf lagh un hawta hay tou ، un kay saarf nam aur pas wrda ki tsadyk hawjaty hay ، aur mtadd drkhwastwn main saarf ko shnakht karnay kay liye syshn ID ya kwky tyar ki jati haay۔as sy saarf ko wyb sait kay mhadwd alakwn tak rsaiy haasal karnay aur aysy karrwaiywn ko anjam denay ki ajazat mlty hay js kay liye twsayk ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ aym ay aym ay aym aym ay ki faalyt: kwkyza ko "mjhay yad rkhyn" faalyt ko nafza karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، js sy saarfyn apnay braؤzar ko band karnay kay bad bhi lagh un rhanay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔jb saarf "mjhay yad rkhyn" ka aapshn mntkhb krta hay tou ، ayk kwky tyar ki jati hay jo un kay lagh un ki asnad ko mhafwza krty haay۔aghly bar jab saarf wyb sait par jata hay tou ، kwky ko khud bkhwd lagh un karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ shapngh karts: syshnza ko mtadd drkhwastwn main saarf ki shapngh kart kay baray main malwmat ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔jb saarf un ki twkry main kesi shay ko shaml krta hay tou ، aaitm un kay syshn kay aadad wa shmar main mhafwza hawta haay۔jb saarf chyk aaؤt krta hay tou ، syshn kay aadad wa shmar ko un ki twkry main mwjwd ashyaa ko bazayaft karnay aur aardar par karrwaiy karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ akhttam par ، syshn aur kwkyza py aych py main aham tsawrat hain jo saarf ki haalt ko snbhalnay aur saarf ki twsayk ko snbhalnay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔syshn aur kwkyza ka astamal krkay ، py aych py dawylpr aysy wyb saityn tshkyl dy saktay hain jo zayada saarf dwst aur mhafwza hon ، aur saarf ka bhatr tjrbha fraham krskyn۔

Question: py aych py main dayta bys lyn dyn kay tsawr par tbadlha khyal karain aur yeh btaiyn keh tranzaykshnl aapryshnza ka astamal karty hoey dayta ki salmyt aur mstkl mzaajy ko ykyny bnanay ka tarykha۔
Answer: py aych py klas ko laghw karnay ، hazaf karnay ، aur bazayaft kay tarykwn kay sath ayk haysh tybl ki nmaindghy karnay waly haysh tybl ki nmaindghy karnay kay l we ، hum tlash kay ntaij main dstyab kwda ki msaalwn ka astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan dstyab kwda par mbny ayk msaal aml haay: py aych py sy ayl aay ays haysh tybl {mhafwza $ haysh tybl ؛awamy fnkshn __ knstrkt () {$ this-> haysh tybl = srny () ؛} awamy fnkshn dakhl karain ($ klyd ، $ kdr) {$ andayks = $ yha-> haysh ($ klyd) ؛$ yha-> haysh tybl [$ asharyha] [$ klyd] = $ wylyw ؛} awamy fnkshn hazaf karain ($ klyd) {$ andayks = $ yha-> haysh ($ klyd) ؛unset ($ this-> haysh tybl [$ asharyha] [$ key]) ؛} awamy fnkshn haasal karain ($ klyd) {$ andayks = $ yha-> haysh ($ klyd) ؛rytrn ayst ($ this-> haysh tybl [$ andayks] [$ klyd])؟$ yha-> haysh tybl [$ asharyha] [$ klyd]: null ؛} mhafwza fnkshn haysh ($ klyd) {rytrn astrln ($ klyd) ٪ ghnty ($ yha-> haysh tybl) ؛} this is nfaza main ، haysh tybl klas ayk haysh tybl ki nmaindghy krta hay js main andraj ، hazaf karnay aur bazayaft kay tarykwn kay sath ayk saf ka astamal kya jata haay۔dakhl () ka tarykha haysh tybl main klydy kdr ki jwray dakhl karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔hazaf () ka tarykha haysh tybl sy klydy kdr ki jwray ko hazaf karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔get () tarykha astamal kya jata hay takha haysh tybl sy ayk klyd di hogi kymt ko bazayaft kya jaskay۔haysh () ka tarykha haysh tybl main klydy kdr ki jwray kay asharyha ki ghnty kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ yahan haysh tybl klas ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: py aych py $ haysh tybl = nya haysh tybl () ؛ $ haysh tybl-> dakhl karain ('ky 1'،' value1 ') ؛ $ haysh tybl-> dakhl karain (' key2 '،' wylyw 2 ') ؛ aykw $ haysh tybl-> haasal karain (' key1 ') ؛// aaؤt pt: wylyw 1 $ haysh tybl-> hazaf karain ('ky 2') ؛ aykw $ haysh tybl-> haasal karain ('key2') ؛// aaؤt pt: is msaal kay tawr par ، ayk nya haysh tybl aabjykt tyar kya gaya hay ، aur haysh tybl main do klydy kymt kay jwraay daalay gaye hayn۔as kay bad 'key1' sy wabstha kdr ko bazayaft karnay kay liye get () ka tarykha astamal kya jata hay ، jo 'wylyw 1' lwtta haay۔as kay bad hazaf () ka tarykha 'key2' sy wabstha klydy kdr ki jwray ko hazaf karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔as kay bad 'key2' sy wabstha kdr ko bazayaft karnay kay liye get () ka tarykha astamal kya jata hay ، jo null.in akhttam ko waps krta hay ، ayk haysh tybl kmpywtr sains main ayk dayta dahanchha hay jo kesi ayswsy aytyw srny ya lght 1 main dayta ko zakhyrha karnay aur bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔py aych py haysh tybl ko kis tarah nafza karnay ki mtadd msaalyn pysh krta hay ، jesay upar dkhaya gaya haysh tybl klas۔py aych py main haysh tybl par aml draamd krkay ، dawylprza kesi ayswsy aytw srny ya lght main dayta ko mwsar andaza main astwr aur bazayaft krsktay hain aur andraj ، hazaf karnay aur bazayaft jesay kam anjam dy saktay hayn۔

Question: "ksy srny ka astamal karty hoey dahyr (km sy kam ya zayada sy zayada hayp) ki nmaindghy karnay waly py aych py klas ko nafza karain aur kam sy kam ya zayada sy zayada ansar ko dakhl karnay ، hazaf karnay aur bazayaft kay tarykay fraham kryn۔"
Answer: py aych py main dayta bys lyn dyn dayta bys main tbdylyan karty wkt dayta ki salmyt aur mstkl mzaajy ko ykyny bnanay ka ayk tarykha haay۔ayk lyn dyn aapryshnwn ka ayk mjmwaha hay jo kam kay wahad mntaky akaiy kay tawr par anjam diya jata haay۔lyn dyn main char khsawsayat hain ، jn ko aysda kaha jata haay: aytmyty: ayk lyn dyn jwhary hay ، is ka mtalb hay keh yeh ya tou is ki pori tarah sy mkml hawta hay ya balkl nhayn۔aghr lyn dyn ka koi bhi hasaha nakam hawjata hay tou ، pora lyn dyn waps hawjata hay ، aur dayta bys ko is ki sabkha haalt main waps krdya jata haay۔ mstkl mzaajy: ayk lyn dyn is bat ko ykyny bnata hay keh dayta bys tranzaykshn sy pehlay aur is kay bad mstkl haalt main haay۔as ka mtalb yeh hay keh aadad wa shmar drst hain aur kesi bhi rkawtwn ya kwaad kay mtaabk hain jn ki wzuahat ki hogi haay۔as sy yeh ykyny bnta hay keh ayk hi wkt main mtadd lyn dyn ki wjha sy aadad wa shmar khrab ya mtzuad nahin hayn۔ bdanwany: ayk lyn dyn paiydar hawta hay ، is ka mtalb yeh hay keh ayk bar is ka artkab karnay kay bad ، dayta bys main ki janay wali tbdylyan mstkl hawjaty hain aur is kay ntyjay main hony wali kesi bhi nakamy sy bch jien gi yakrysh۔ dayta ki salmyt aur mstkl mzaajy ko ykyny bnanay kay l transaction tranzaykshnl aapryshnza ka astamal karty hoey ، py aych py dawylpr mndrjha zayl tarykwn ka astamal krsktay hayn: shrwaat ka aaghaza (): yeh tarykha tranzaykshn shrwa karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔jb is tarykha kar ko kaha jata hay tou ، dayta bys ko tranzaykshnl haalt main daal diya jata hay ، aur jab tak lyn dyn mkml nahin hawta hay is wkt tak dayta bys main ki janay wali kesi bhi tbdyly ka artkab nahin kya jata haay۔jb is tarykha ko blaya jata hay tou ، lyn dyn kay doran dayta bys main ki janay wali kesi bhi tbdyly ka artkab kya jata hay ، aur dayta bys ko is ki mamwl ki haalt main waps krdya jata haay۔ rwl byk (): yeh tarykha tranzaykshn ko waps karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔jb is tarykha ko blaya jata hay tou ، lyn dyn kay doran dayta bys main ki janay wali kesi bhi tbdyly ko khtm krdya jata hay ، aur dayta bys ko is ki sabkha ryast main waps krdya jata haay۔ un tarykwn ka astamal karty hoey ، py aych py dawylpr is bat ko ykyny bnasktay hain keh dayta bys main tbdylyan mstkl aur kabl aatmad andaza main ki ghiyn۔، aur is dayta ki salmyt brkrar haay۔lyn dyn khasa tawr par un karrwaiywn kay l useful mfyd hay js main ayk sy zayada dayta bys kay swalat ya ap dayts shaml hain ، jesay ay kamrs tranzaykshnza ya maly lyn dyn۔ aakhr main ، py aych py main dayta bys tranzaykshn dayta bys main tbdyly karty wkt dayta ki salmyt aur mstkl mzaajy ko ykyny bnanay ka ayk tarykha haay۔tranzaykshnl aapryshnza ka astamal krkay ، py aych py dawylprza is bat ko ykyny bnasktay hain keh dayta bys main tbdylyan mstkl aur kabl aatmad andaza main ki gain ، aur is dayta ki salmyt ko brkrar rakha jaiay۔lyn dyn khasa tawr par un karrwaiywn kay l useful mfyd hay js main ayk sy zayada dayta bys kay swalat ya ap dayts shaml hain ، jesay ay kamrs tranzaykshnza ya maly lyn dyn۔

trtyb main dayta ko zakhyrha karnay aur bazayaft karnay kay liye kmpywtr sains main astamal kya jata hay ، jesay ayk kam hayp ya zayada sy zayada hayp 12۔py aych py nay dahyr ko nafza karnay kay Question: "ayk srny ka astamal karty hoey srklr bfr (rngh bfr) ki nmaindghy karnay waly py aych py klas ko nafza karain aur ankyw ، day kywiw ، aur janch pratal kay tarykay fraham karain keh aya bfr mkml ya khaly hay ya nhayn۔"
Answer: py aych py tymplytngh anjn laibryry ya frym wrk hain jo pryzantyshn prt (aych ty aym ayl ، sy ays ays) ko ayply kyshn mntak sy alag karnay kay liye ayk mnzam nktaha nzar fraham karty hayn۔yhaan kuch aysay tarykay hain jn sy py aych py tymplytngh anjn ayply kyshn mntak sy pryzantyshn mntak ki alyhadghy ki shawlt fraham karty hayn: aym wy sy aarkytykchr: py aych py tymplytngh anjn madal wyw kntrwlr (aym wy sy) fn tamyr ka astamal karty hain ، jo ayply kyshn mntak (madal) ko pryzantyshn lajk (dykhyn) sy alag krta hay (dykhyn)awr ywzar antrfys (kntrwlr)۔khdshat ki is alyhadghy sy kwda bys ko brkrar rkhnay aur is main trmym karna aasan hawjata haay۔as sy kwda ko dwbarha astamal karna aur ayplykyshn main mstkl mzaajy brkrar rkhna aasan hawjata haay۔ saintyks: py aych py tymplytngh anjn ayk aysa nhaw astamal karty hain jo py aych py sy alag hay ، js ki wjha sy dayzaainrza aur frnt aynda dawylprza ko py aych py ko jannay ki zurwrt kay baghair tymplyts kay sath kam karna aasan hawjata haay۔khdshat ki yeh alyhadghy dawylprza aur dayzaainrza ko ayk dusray ko pryshan kyay baghair anhay alakwn par kam karnay ki ajazat dyty haay۔yha kychngh prt wyb ayply kyshnza kay liye ayk aur kychngh prt haay۔ kuch mshhawr py aych py tymplytngh anjnwn main twygh ، asmart aur blyda shaml hayn۔yha tymplytngh anjn bohat sy khsawsayat pysh karty hain ، jesay tymplyt wrasat ، kychngh ، aur nhaw jo pryzantyshn mntak ko ayply kyshn mntak sy alag karna aasan bnatay hayn۔py aych py tymplytngh anjn ka astamal krkay ، dawylprza zayada brkrar rkhnay aur askyl aybl ayply kyshnza tshkyl dy saktay hain jo wkt kay sath sath is main trmym aur twsya karna aasan hayn۔

Question: "dayta bys ko mamwl par lanay kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur py aych py dayta bys dayzaain main mkhtlf mamwl kay farm (jysay ، 1NF ، 2NF ، 3NF) ki msaalyn fraham kryn۔"
Answer: kesi srklr bfr (rngh bfr) ki nmaindghy karnay waly py aych py klas ko nafza karnay kay liye ، ankyw ، day kywiw ، aur janch pratal kay tarykwn kay sath ayk sray ka astamal karty hoey bfr mkml ya khaly hay ya nahin ، hum tlash kay ntaij main dstyab kwda ki msaalwn ko astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan dstyab kwda par mbny ayk msaal aml haay: py aych py sy ayl aay ays sy srklr bfr {mhafwza $ bfr ؛mhafwza $ saiza ؛mhafwza $ hayda ؛mhafwza $ dm ؛awamy fnkshn __ knstrkt ($ saiza) {$ this-> bfr = srny () ؛$ yha-> saiza = $ saiza ؛$ yha-> hayda = 0 ؛$ yha-> dm = 0 ؛} awamy fnkshn enqueue ($ kdr) {aghr ($ this-> isfull ()) {nya rn taim aykspysyshn phynk dyn ('bfr bhra hoa haay!') ؛} $ this-> bfr [$ this-> dm] = $ wylyw ؛$ this-> dm = ($ yha-> dm + 1) ٪ $ yha-> saiza ؛} awamy fnkshn dequeue () {aghr ($ this-> isempty ()) {nya rn taim aykspshn phynk dyn ('bfr khaly haay!') ؛} $ kdr = $ yha-> bfr [$ yha-> hayda] ؛$ yha-> hayda = ($ yha-> hayda + 1) ٪ $ yha-> saiza ؛wapsy $ kymt ؛} awamy krta hay ، js main ayk srny ka astamal kya jata hay ، js main ankyw ، day kywiw ، aur janch pratal kay tarykwn kay sath bfr mkml ya khaly hay ya nhayn۔enqueue () ka tarykha bfr main kesi kdr ko brahanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔bfr sy kesi kdr ko kam karnay kay liye day kyw () ka tarykha astamal kya jata haay۔isfull () ka tarykha yeh chyk karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay keh aya bfr bhra hoa hay ya nhayn۔aaisympty () ka tarykha yeh chyk karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay keh aya bfr khaly haay۔ yahan srklr bfr klas ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: py aych py $ bfr = nya srklr bfr (3) ؛ $ bfr-> ankyw (1) ؛ $ bfr-> aynkyw(2) ؛ $ bfr-> enqueue (3) ؛ aykw $ bfr-> isfull () ؛// aaؤt pt: sch $ bfr-> dequeue () ؛ $ bfr-> enqueue (4) ؛ aykw $ bfr-> isempty () ؛// aaؤt pt: rtaws is msaal kay tawr par ، ayk nya srklr bfr aabjykt 3 kay saiza kay sath tyar kya gaya hay ، aur tyn akdar ko bfr main shaml kya jata haay۔as kay bad yeh malwm karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay keh aya bfr bhra hoa hay ya nahin ، jo sch haay۔as kay bad day kywi () ka tarykha bfr sy kesi kdr ko kam karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، aur ayk niy kdr ko bfr main dakhl kya jata haay۔as kay bad asatmty () ka tarykha yeh chyk karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay keh aya bfr khaly hay ، jo jhwtay ko waps krta haay۔ akhttam par ، ayk srklr bfr (rngh bfr) kmpywtr sains main astamal kya jata hay jo kmpywtr sains main srklr andaza 12 main dayta ko zakhyrha karnay aur bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔py aych py srklr bfr ko kis tarah nafza karnay ki mtadd msaalyn fraham krty hay ، jesay upar dkhaiay janay waly srklr bfr klas۔py aych py main srklr bfr ko nafza karnay sy ، dawylprza mؤsar tarykay sy srklr andaza main dayta ko astwr aur bazayaft krsktay hain aur ankyw ، day kywiw ، aur janch pratal krsktay hain keh aya bfr mkml ya khaly hay ya nhayn۔

Question: "ksy srny ka astamal karty hoey trjyhay ktaar ki nmaindghy karnay waly py aych py klas ko nafza karain aur aaly trjyhay ansar ki andraj ، hazaf karnay aur bazayaft kay tarykay fraham kryn۔"
Answer: dayta bys ko mamwl par lana dayta bys main dayta ko mnzam karnay ka aml hay takha dayta ki faltw pn ko kam kya jaskay aur dayta ki salmyt ko bhatr bnaya jaskay۔as main dayta bys ko do ya zayada jdwlwn main tksym karna aur un kay mabyn talkat ki wzuahat shaml haay۔narmlaizayshn narml farmza namy kwaad kay ayk syt par aml krkay haasal ki jati haay۔yhaan mamwl kay mkhtlf shklwn ki kuch msaalyn hayn: pehla aam shkl (1NF): 1NF main ، hr tybl syl main ayk hi kymt honi chahaiay ، aur hr kalm ka ayk anwkha nam hona chahaiay۔msaal kay tawr par ، talbaa kay baray main malwmat par mushtamil ayk tybl kay pas isi kalm main "talbaa ka nam" aur "talbaa ka ptha" kay liye kalm nahin hona chahaiay۔ syknda narml farm (2 ayn ayf): 2 ayn ayf main ، tybl 1NF main honi chahaiay ، aur hr ayk ghyrklydy kalm pori bnyady klyd par mnhasar hona chahaiay۔msaal kay tawr par ، aardar kay baray main malwmat par mushtamil ayk tybl main ayk hi kalm main "aardar nmbr" aur "prwdakt ka nam" kay liye kalm nahin hona chahaiay۔ tesra aam shkl (3NF): 3NF main ، tybl 2NF main hona chahaiay ، aur hr ghyr-klydy kalm sirf bnyady klyd par mnhasar hona chahaiay۔msaal kay tawr par ، ghahakwn kay baray main malwmat par mushtamil ayk tybl main isi kalm main "kstmr ka nam" aur "kstmr aydarys" kay liye kalm nahin hona chahaiay۔an kay mabyn myzayn aur talkat ki wzuahat kryn۔mamwl par lanay kay kwaad par aml karty hoey ، py aych py dawylprza aysay dayta bys tshkyl dy saktay hain jo zayada mwsar ، twsya pzayr aur brkrar rkhnay waly hon ، aur jo aadad wa shmar ki bhatr salmyt aur mstkl mzaajy fraham karty hayn۔

Question: py aych py kay nam ki jghhawn kay tsawr par tbadlha khyal karain aur woh braay mnsawbwn main namy tnazaaat ko mnzam karnay aur un sy bchnay main kis tarah mdd karty hayn۔
Answer: trjyhay ktaar ayk dayta dahanchha hay jo un ki trjyhay akdar ki bnyad par anasar ka ahatmam krta haay۔aaly trjyhay akdar waly anasar ko pehlay pysh kya jata haay۔py aych py ki mtadd msaalyn fraham krty hain keh kis tarah kesi saf ka astamal karty hoey trjyhay ktaar ko nafza kya jaye ، jesay ays py ayl aykstynshn main dstyab trjyhay kwkyw klas۔yhaan ayk py aych py klas ka ayk msaal aml hay jo kesi saf ka astamal karty hoey trjyhay ktaar ki nmaindghy krta haay: py aych py sy ayl aay ays ki trjyhay kywi {mhafwza $ ktaar ؛mhafwza $ ghnty ؛awamy fnkshn __ knstrkt () {$ this-> ktaar = srny () ؛$ yha-> ghnty = 0 ؛} awamy fnkshn dakhl karain ($ kdr ، $ trjyha) {$ this-> ktaar [$ yha-> ghnty ++] = srny ('wylyw' => $ kdr ، 'trjyha' => $ trjyha) ؛usort ($ this-> ktaar ، fnkshn ($ a ، $ b) {wapsy $ a ['trjyha'] - $ b ['trjyha'] ؛}) ؛} awamy fnkshn hazaf karain () {aghr ($ this-> isempty ()) {nya rn taim aykspshn phynk dyn ('ktaar khaly haay!') ؛} wapsy array_shift ($ this-> ktaar) ['kdr'] ؛} awamy fnkshn jhanknay () {if ($ this-> isempty ()) {nya rn taim aykspysyshn ('ktaar khaly haay!') phynk dyn۔} wapsy $ this-> ktaar [0] ['wylyw'] ؛} awamy tkryb isempty () {khaly ($ this-> ktaar) waps ؛} the is nfaza main ، trjyhay tabkaty tabkha ayk saf ka astamal karty hoey trjyhay ktaar ki nmaindghy krta hay ، js main dakhl ، hazaf karnay aur aaly trjyhay ansar ki bazayaft kay tarykwn kay sath۔dakhl () ka tarykha ayk di hogi trjyha kay sath ktaar main ayk kdr dakhl karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔hazaf () ka tarykha ktaar sy aaly trjyhay kymt ko hazaf karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔jhanknay wala () tarykha astamal kyay baghair ktaar sy aaly trjyhay kymt ko bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔aaisympty () ka tarykha yeh chyk karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay keh ktaar khaly hay ya nhayn۔ yahan trjyhay kyw klas ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: py aych py $ ktaar = niy trjyha kywi () ؛ $ ktaar-> dakhl karain ('aay' ، 2) ؛ $ ktaar-> dakhl karain ('B' ، 1) ؛ $ ktaar-> dakhl karain ('C' ، 3) ؛ aykw $ ktaar-> jhanknay () ؛// aaؤt pt: bychw $ ktaar-> hazaf karain () ؛// aaؤt pt: bychw $ ktaar-> jhanknay () ؛// aaؤt pt: is msaal kay tawr par ، ayk niy trjyha kywiyw aabjykt tshkyl di hogi hay ، aur mkhtlf trjyhaat kay sath ktaar main tyn akdar dakhl ki jati hayn۔as kay bad jhanknay wala () tarykha ktaar sy aaly trjyhay kymt ko bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jo 'B' lwtta haay۔as kay bad hazaf () ka tarykha ktaar sy aaly trjyhay kymt ko hazaf karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jo 'B' lwtta haay۔as kay bad jhanknay wala () tarykha dwbarha ktaar sy niy aaly trjyhay kymt ko bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jo 'a'.in ntyjha waps krta hay ، trjyhay ktaar ayk mkhsawsa trtyb main dayta ko zakhyrha karnay aur bazayaft karnay kay liye kmpywtr sains main astamal hony wala dayta dahanchha haay۔trjyhay akdar 12 pr۔py aych py ki trjyhay ktaar ko kis tarah nafza karnay ki mtadd msaalyn fraham krty hain ، jesay mzakwrha bala trjyhay klas۔py aych py main trjyhay ktaar ko nafza karnay sy ، dawylprza trjyhay akdar par mbny ayk mkhsawsa trtyb main dayta ko mؤsar tarykay sy astwr aur bazayaft krsktay hain aur aaly trjyhay ansar ki andraj ، hazaf ، aur bazayaft jesay kam anjam dy saktay hayn۔

Question: "ksy ghraf ki nmaindghy karnay waly py aych py klas ko nafza karain aur trawrsl kay liye tarykay mhaya karain ، mkhtsar trien rastha tlash karain ، aur chkrwn ka ptha lghaiyn۔"
Answer: py aych py kay nam ki jghhayn ayk mntaky dahanchay kay andr klaswn ، afaal aur mstkl jesi ashyaa ko smytnay ka ayk tarykha hayn۔an ka astamal kwda bys kay mkhtlf hasawn main byan krdha ashyaa kay mabyn namwn kay tsaadm ko rwknay aur kwda ko many khyza ghrwhawn main trtyb denay ka ayk tarykha fraham karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔yhaan kuch tarykay hain keh py aych py kay nam ki jghhayn braay mnsawbwn main nam kay tnazaaat ko mnzam karnay aur un sy bchnay main mdd krty hayn: kwda tnzaym ko bhatr bnata haay: nam ki jghhayn kwda ko many khyza ghrwhawn main mnzam karnay ka ayk tarykha fraham krty hayn۔as sy kwda ko tlash karna aur brkrar rkhna aasan hawjata hay ، aur is sy aap kay kwda ki prahnay ki ahalyt ko bhatr bnanay main bhi mdd mil sakti haay۔ ayblza kwda dwbarha astamal: nam ki jghhawn sy mkhtlf mnsawbwn main kwda ko dwbarha astamal karna aasan hawjata haay۔nam ki jghha main aaitmza ko ghhyrnay kay zaryaha ، aap aasany sy dusray nam ki jghhawn sy kwda draamd aur dwbarha astamal krsktay hayn۔ tnazaaat ka nam lenay waly afrad: nam ki jghhayn kwda bys kay mkhtlf hasawn main byan krdha ashyaa kay mabyn namwn kay tsaadm ko rwkty hayn۔nam ki jghhawn ka astamal krkay ، aap tnazaaat kay nam sy bch saktay hain aur is bat ko ykyny bnasktay hain keh aap ka kwda zayada brkrar rkhnay aur twsya pzayr haay۔ ghrwp sy mtalkha ashyaa ka ayk tarykha fraham krta haay: nam ki jghhayn ghrwp sy mtalk klaswn ، antrfys ، afaal aur mstkl ko ghrwp sy ayk tarykha fraham krty hayn۔as sy mkhtlf ashyaa kay mabyn talkat ko smjhna aur kwda bys main mstkl mzaajy brkrar rkhna aasan hawjata haay۔ py aych py kay nam ki jghhawn ka astamal karty hoey ، dawylprza zayada brkrar rkhnay aur twsya pzayr ayply kyshnza tshkyl dy saktay hain jo wkt kay sath sath is main trmym aur twsya karna aasan hayn۔py aych py nam ki jghhawn ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki mtadd msaalyn pysh krta hay ، jesay nam ki jghha ki wrda aur astamal kay byan۔nam ki jghhawn ko astamal karnay kay bhatryn tarykwn par aml karty hoey ، dawylpr tnazaaat kay nam sy bch saktay hain aur apnay kwda ko is tarah mnzam krsktay hain jo zayada brkrar rkhnay aur twsya pzayr haw۔

Question: py aych py main bakaadha tasarat kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur un ki msaal fraham karain keh un ko pytrn mmasal aur strngh hayra phyry kay liye kis tarah astamal kya jaiay۔

"ksy srny ka astamal karty hoey bainry hayp ki nmaindghy karnay waly py aych py klas ko nafza karain aur kam sy kam ya zayada sy zayada ansar ko andraj ، hazaf karnay aur bazayaft kay tarykay fraham kryn۔"
Answer: bakaadghy sy azahaar ، jsay aam tawr par "ryjyks" ya "ryjyks py" kay nam sy jana jata hay ، khasa tawr par farmytda tykst dawr hain jo mtn main nmwnwn ko tlash karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔py aych py main ، bakaadha azahaarat daymytrza ، ayk nmwnha ، aur akhtyary trmym karnay walon par mushtamil tar hawtay hayn۔had bndy karnay wala koi bhi krdar hawskta hay jo khta ، nmbr ، byk slysh ، ya jghha nahin haay۔sb sy aam had bndy karnay wala farwrda slysh (/) hay ، lekin jab pytrn main farwrda slysh hawta hay tou ، dusray daymytrza jesay ya ~ ka antkhab karna aasan hawta haay۔bakaadghy sy azahaar ko hr ksm kay mtn ki tlash aur mtn ko tbdyl karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ is ki kuch msaalyn hain keh py aych py main pytrn mmasal aur strngh hayra phyry kay liye bakaadghy sy azahaar kis tarah astamal kryn: ayk strngh main pytrn sy mlap: py aych py $ strngh = 'kwiykbraؤn faks sst ktay par chhlangh laga dyta haay۔as msaal main ، prygh_mch () fnkshn ka astamal tar main 'kwiyk' kay nmwnha ki tlash kay liye kya jata hay 'tyza braؤn faks sst ktay kay upar chhlangh lghata haay۔'aghr pytrn mil jata hay tou ، aaؤt pt 'mych mil jaye gha!' hawgha۔ ayk nmwnha ko tar main tbdyl krna: py aych py $ strngh = 'kwal braؤn faks sst ktay par chhlangh lghata haay۔' ؛ $ pytrn = '/kwiyk/' ؛ $ ؛tbdyly = 'sst' ؛ $ new_string = preg_replace ($ pytrn ، $ mtbadl ، $ strngh) ؛ aykw $ new_string ؛ is msaal main ، preg_replace () fnkshn ko 'fwry' kay sath mtbadl tar 'sst' kay sath tbdyl karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔tar main 'kwiyk braؤn faks sst ktay kay upar chhlangh laga dyta haay۔'aaؤt pt 'sst braؤn faks ko sst ktay kay upar chhlangh lghaiay gha۔'-z0-9 ._ ٪+-]+@[a-za-Z0-9 .-]+\. [a-za-z] {2 ،}/'؛ if (preg_match ($ pytrn ، $ strngh ،$ mychza)) {ghwnj 'ay myl aydarys mla:'۔mets mychza [0] ؛} else {ghwnj 'ay myl aydarys nahin mla۔' ؛} is msaal main ، prygh_mch () fnkshn ka astamal tar main ay myl aydarys pytrn ki tlash kay liye kya jata hay 'myra ay myl aydarys johan@example.com haay۔. '.aghr pytrn mil jata hay tou ، aaؤt pt 'ay myl aydarys mil jaye gha: johan@example.com'.in ntyjha akhza kya jaye ga ، py aych py main pytrn mmasal aur strngh hayra phyry kay liye bakaadha azahaar ayk taaktwr twl haay۔bakaadha azahaar ka astamal karty hoey ، dawylpr mkhtlf tarykwn sy mtn ko mwsar andaza main tlash aur un main hayra phyry krsktay hayn۔py aych py bakaadha azahaar kay sath kam karnay kay liye mtadd blt un afaal mhaya krty hay ، jesay prygh_mch () aur prygh_ry plys ()۔bakaadha azahaar kay astamal kay l best bhatryn tarykwn par aml karty hoey ، dawylprza zayada brkrar rkhnay aur twsya pzayr ayply kyshnza tshkyl dy saktay hain jo wkt kay sath sath is main trmym karna aur brahana aasan hayn۔

Question: "py aych py kay hafazaty akdamat kay tsawr par tbadlha khyal karain ، jesay un pt ki twsayk ، aaؤt pt ankwdangh ، aur mshtrkha wyb khtarat jesay ayks ays ays aur sy ays aar ayf hamlwn sy thafza۔"
Answer: kam sy kam ya zayada sy zayada ansar ki andraj ، hazaf karnay ، aur bazayaft kay tarykwn kay sath bainry hayp ki nmaindghy karnay waly py aych py klas ko nafza karnay kay l we ، hum tlash kay ntaij main dstyab kwda ki msaalwn ka astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan py aych py klaswn ki kuch msaalyn hain jo bainry hayps ki nmaindghy krty hayn: aspl hayp klas ka astamal: aspl hayp klas ayk blt main py aych py klas hay jo dahyr ki aham khsawsayat fraham krty haay۔yhaan ayk msaal kay nfaza haay: py aych py sy ayl aay ays bainry hayp nay asplp {awamy fnkshn ka mwazanha ($ wylyw 1 ، $ wylyw 2) {wapsy $ wylyw 1 - $ wylyw 2 ؛} the is nfaza main ، bainry hayp klas aspl hayp klas main twsya krty hay aur dahyr kay liye mwazanha ki tkryb ki wzuahat karnay kay liye mwazanha () kay tarykha kar ko awwr raida krty haay۔bainry hayp tabkay ko kam sy kam ya zayada sy zayada ansar ko andraj ، hazaf karnay ، aur bazayaft kay tarykwn kay sath bainry hayp bnanay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ kstm par aml draamd ka astamal karty hawiay: yahan kstm bainry hayp klas ka ayk msaal aml haay: py aych py sy ayl aay ays bainry hayp {mhafwza $ hayp ؛mhafwza $ saiza ؛awamy fnkshn __ knstrkt () {$ this-> hayp = srny () ؛$ yha-> saiza = 0 ؛} awamy fnkshn dakhl karain ($ kdr) {$ this-> hayp [++ $ this-> saiza] = $ wylyw ؛$ this-> siftup ($ this-> saiza) ؛} awamy fnkshn hazaf karain () {$ mnt = $ yha-> hayp [1] ؛$ yha-> hayp [1] = $ yha-> hayp [$ yha-> saiza--] ؛$ yha-> syft daawn (1) ؛ghyr syt ($ yha-> hayp [$ yha-> saiza + 1]) ؛wapsy $ mnt ؛} awamy fnkshn getMin () {wapsy $ this-> hayp [1] ؛} mhafwza fnkshn syft ap ($ andayks) {$ waldyn = $ andayks >> 1 ؛aghr ($ waldyn> 0 && $ yha-> hayp [$ andayks] <$ this-> hayp [$ waldyn]) {$ yha-> swyp ($ andayks ، $ waldyn) ؛$ this-> siftup ($ waldyn) ؛}} mhafwza fnkshn syft daawn ($ andayks) {$ baien = $ andayks << 1 ؛$ dien = $ baien + 1 ؛$ sab sy chhwta = $ andayks ؛aghr ($ baien <= $ this-> saiza && $ yha-> hayp [$ baiyn] <$ this-> hayp [$ sab sy chhwta]) {$ sab sy chhwta = $ baien ؛} if ($ dien <= $ this-> size && $ this-> hayp [$ hak] <$ this-> hayp [$ sab sy chhwta]) {$ sab sy chhwta = $ hak ؛} agar ($ sab sy chhwta! = $ andayks) {$ yha-> swyp ($ andayks ، $ sab sy chhwta) ؛$ yha-> syft daawn ($ sab sy chhwta) ؛}} mhafwza fnkshn swyp ($ andayks 1 ، $ andayks 2) {$ aarzuy = $ yha-> hayp [$ andayks 1] ؛$ yha-> hayp [$ andayks 1] = $ yha-> hayp [$ andayks 2] ؛$ yha-> hayp [$ andayks 2] = $ aarzuy ؛} this is nfaza main ، bainry hayp klas ayk srny ka astamal karty hoey ayk bainry hayp ki nmaindghy krta hay ، js main dakhl ، hazaf karnay aur kam sy kam ansar ki bazayaft kay tarykwn kay sath۔dakhl () ka tarykha dahyr main kdr dakhl karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔hazaf () ka tarykha dahyr sy kam sy kam kymt ko hazaf karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ghyt myn () ka tarykha isy hazaf kyay baghair dahyr sy kam sy kam kymt bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ bainry hayp klas ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: py aych py $ hayp = nya bainry hayp () ؛ $ hayp-> dakhl karain (3) ؛ $ hayp-> dakhl karain (1) ؛ $ hayp-> dakhl karain (2) ؛ aykw $ hayp-> ghyt myn () ؛// aaؤt pt: 1echo $ hayp-> hazaf karain () ؛// aaؤt pt: 1echo $ hayp-> ghyt myn () ؛// aaؤt pt: 2 main yeh msaal ، ayk nya bainry hayp aabjykt tshkyl diya gaya hay ، aur tyn akdar dahyr main daal dyiay gaye hayn۔as kay bad ghyt myn () ka tarykha dahyr sy kam sy kam kymt ko bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jo lwtta haay۔ is kay bad hazaf () ka tarykha dahyr sy kam sy kam kymt ko hazaf karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jo lwtta haay۔ phir ghyt myn () ka tarykha astamal kya jata haay۔ayk bar phir dahyr sy niy kam sy kam kymt ko bazayaft karnay kay liye ، jo 2. aakhr main waps aata hay ، bainry hayp ayk dayta dahanchha hay jo kmpywtr sains main astamal kya jata hay takha trjyhay akdar 12 ki bnyad par ayk mkhsawsa trtyb main dayta ko zakhyrha aur bazayaft kya jaskay۔py aych py nay mtadd msaalyn pysh kyn keh bainry hayp ko kesay nafza kya jaye ، jesay aspl hayp klas aur bainry hayp klas jo upar dkhaya gaya haay۔py aych py main bainry hayp ko nafza krkay ، dawylprza trjyhay akdar par mbny ayk mkhsawsa trtyb main dayta ko mؤsar tarykay sy astwr aur bazayaft krsktay hain aur kam sy kam ya zayada sy zayada ansar ki andraj ، hazaf ، aur bazayaft jesay kam anjam dy saktay hayn۔

Question: kyshay kay nzaam ki nmaindghy karnay waly py aych py klas ko nafza karain aur dayta ko mwsar andaza main bazayaft aur bazayaft kay tarykay fraham kryn۔
Answer: wyb ayply kyshnza ko mkhtlf ksm kay hamlwn aur khtarat sy bchanay kay liye py aych py kay hafazaty akdamat zurwry hayn۔yhaan kuch anthaaiy aham py aych py sykywrty akdamat hayn: un pt ki twsayk: tamam saarf un pt ko drkhwast main dakhl karnay sy pehlay is ki twsayk ، tsadyk aur saaf karna chahaiay۔as sy ays kyw ayl anjykshn ، kras sait askrptngh (ayks ays ays) ، aur dyghr aksam kay hamlwn ko rwknay main mdd mlty hay jo saarf kay un pt ka asthasaal karty hayn۔dawylprza ko py aych py kay afaal jesay fltr_wr () aur aych ty aym ayl ays aspyshlchars () jesay saarf un pt ko drst karnay aur saaf karnay kay liye astamal karna chahaiay۔ aaؤt pt ankwdangh: ayks ays ays hamlwn ko rwknay kay liye tamam aaؤt pt ko ankwda kya jana chahaiay۔dawylprza ko py aych py kay afaal jesay HTMLSpecialchars () aur HTMlentities () ko aaؤt pt ko ankwda karnay kay liye astamal karna chahaiay۔ aam wyb ki kmzawrywn kay khlaf prwtykshn: dawylprza ko mshtrkha wyb khtarat jesay XSS aur CSRF hamlwn sy bchna chahaiay۔ayks ays ays hamlwn ko rwknay kay l developly ، dawylprza ko aaؤt pt ankwdangh ka astamal karna chahaiay aur aywl () aur prygh_ry plys () afaal kay astamal sy prhayza kryn۔sy ays aar ayf hamlwn ko rwknay kay liye ، dawylprza ko sy ays aar ayf twkn ka astamal karna chahaiay aur hasas karrwaiywn kay liye drkhwastyn haasal karnay sy prhayza karna chahaiay۔ ryghwlrly tawr par py aych py wrzen ko ap dayt kryn: dawylprza ko apnay py aych py wrzen ko bakaadghy sy tazaha trien msthakm rylyza main ap dayt karna chahaiay takha yeh ykyny bnaya jaskay keh sykywrty kay nam sy jana jata haay۔: dawylprza ko sykywrty kay mmknha khtarat aur khtarat ki nshandhay karnay kay liye apnay mwjwdha anfrastrkchr ko smjhna aur dstawyza karna chahaiay۔ astamal karain ays kyw ayl kay byanat: dawylprza ko ays kyw ayl anjykshn hamlwn ko rwknay kay liye tyar ays kyw ayl kay byanat ka astamal karna chahaiay۔ py aych py kay sykywrty akdamat kay bad ، dawylprza zayada mhafwza wyb ayply kyshnza tshkyl dy saktay hain jo hayn۔hamlwn aur kmzawrywn ka kam khtarha۔trkyaty aml kay aaghaza sy sykywrty ko trjyha dena aur py aych py wrzen aur hafazaty akdamat ko bakaadghy sy ap dayt karna zurwry hay takha yeh ykyny bnaya jaskay keh wyb ayply kyshnza ko tazaha trien khtarat sy mhafwza rakha jaiay۔

Question: py aych py aatwlwdangh kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur yeh keh dsty kay baghair klas failwn ko shaml karnay ko kis tarah aasan bnata hay is ki zurwrt hawty hay ya is main byanat shaml hawtay hayn۔
Answer: py aych py klas ko nafza karnay kay l cach ، jo dayta ko mwsar andaza main kychngh aur bazayaft karnay kay tarykwn kay sath kyshay kay nzaam ki nmaindghy krta hay ، hum tlash kay ntaij main dstyab kwda ki msaalwn aur laibryrywn ko astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan py aych py kyshay ki klaswn aur laibryrywn ki kuch msaalyn hayn: kstm par aml draamd ka astamal: yahan kstm kyshay klas ka ayk msaal aml haay: py aych py sy ayl aay ays sy kyshay {mhafwza $ kyshay_dayr ؛mhafwza $ kyshay_ taim ؛awamy fnkshn __ knstrkt ($ kych_dayr ، $ kysh_ taim) {$ this-> kysh_dayr = $ kysh_dayr ؛$ yha-> kyshay_ taim = $ kysh_ taim ؛} awamy fnkshn haasal karain ($ klyd) {$ fail = $ yha-> kyshay_dayr۔'/'.MD5 ($ klyd)'.cache' ؛aghr (file_exists ($ fail) && (wkt () - failm taim ($ fail)) <$ this-> kysh_ taim) {ghyr snjydha (file_get_contents ($ fail)) ؛} jhwty lwt ؛} awamy fnkshn syt ($ klyd ، $ kdr) {$ fail = $ yha-> kyshay_dayr۔'/'.MD5 ($ klyd)'.cache' ؛file_put_contents ($ fail ، syrylaiza ($ kdr)) ؛} the is nfaza main ، kysh klas fail sstm ka astamal karty hoey kyshay kay nzaam ki nmaindghy krty hay ، js main dayta ko mwsar andaza main kychngh aur bazayaft karnay kay tarykay hayn۔get () tarykha astamal kyshay sy kesi dyiay gaye klyd kay sath ayk kdr bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔syt () ka tarykha kesi dyiay gaye klyd kay sath kyshay main ayk kdr dakhl karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ yahan kyshay ki klas ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: py aych py $ kyshay = nya kyshay ('/rastha/say/kyshay' ، 3600) ؛ $ ؛ $dayta = $ kyshay-> get ('my_key') ؛ if (! $ dayta) {$ dayta = mhangha_aapryshn () ؛$ kyshay-> syt ('my_key' ، $ dayta) ؛} is msaal main ، ayk nya kyshay aabjykt kysh daairktry aur kyshay ka wkt 3600 syknda kay sath bnaya gaya haay۔as kay bad ghyt () ka tarykha astamal kya jata hay takha kyshay sy klyd 'my_key' kay sath ayk kdr bazayaft ki jaskay۔aghr kymt kyshay main nahin mlty hay tou ، kymt pyda karnay kay liye ayk mhangha aapryshn anjam diya jata hay ، aur syt () ka tarykha astamal kya jata hay takha kyshay main kymt ko 'my_key' kay sath kyshay main dakhl kya jaskay۔py aych py kyshay ki laibryryan dstyab hain ، jesay ght hab par dstyab sadha py aych py kych laibryry۔yhaan is laibryry ka astamal karty hoey ayk msaal aml haay: phprequire_once 'simplecache.php' ؛ $ kyshay = nya sadha kych () ؛ $ dayta = $ kyshay-> haasal karain ('my_key') ؛ agar (! $ dayta) {$ dayta = mhangha_apryshn ()؛$ kyshay-> syt ('my_key' ، $ dayta) ؛ this is nfaza main ، sadha kych laibryry ko kysh aabjykt bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔as kay bad ghyt () ka tarykha astamal kya jata hay takha kyshay sy klyd 'my_key' kay sath ayk kdr bazayaft ki jaskay۔aghr kymt kyshay main nahin mlty hay tou ، kymt pyda karnay kay liye ayk mhangha aapryshn anjam diya jata hay ، aur syt () ka tarykha astamal kya jata hay takha klyd 'my_key'.in akhttam kay sath kyshay main kymt dakhl ki jaskay ، ayk kyshay ka nzaam ayk haay۔kmpywtr sains main dayta dahanchha astamal kya jata hay takha dayta ko mؤsar tarykay sy astwr aur bazayaft kya jaskay۔py aych py kyshay kay nzaam ko kis tarah nafza karnay ki mtadd msaalyn fraham krty hay ، jesay kyshay ki klas aur mzakwrha bala sadha kych laibryry۔py aych py main kyshay kay nzaam ko nafza karnay sy ، dawylprza mؤsar tarykay sy dayta ko astwr aur bazayaft krsktay hain aur dayta ko mwsar andaza main haasal karnay jesay kamwn ko anjam dy saktay hain aur kam anjam dy saktay hayn۔

Question: kesi py aych py klas ko nafza karain jo hadayt shuda aysaiklk ghraf (day aay jy) ki nmaindghy karty hain aur tapwlwjykl chhantnay aur mkhtsar trien rastha tlash karnay kay tarykay fraham karty hayn۔
Answer: py aych py aatwlwdangh ayk aysy khsawsayt hay jo dawylprza ko khud bkhwd klas failwn ko apnay kwda main shaml karnay ki ajazat dyty hay baghair dsty tawr par astamal ki zurwrt hawty hay ya byanat shaml krdy jati haay۔aatwlwdangh klas failwn ko shaml karnay kay aml ko aasan bnaty hay aur fail sstm kay kamwn ki tadad ko kam krkay py aych py ayply kyshnza ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay main mdd krty haay۔ py aych py aatwlwdangh kay baray main kuch aham nkat hayn: aatwwlwdangh khud bkhwd apnay kwda main kesi prwjykt ki klas failwn ko shaml karnay ka ayk tarykha haay۔aatwlwdangh kay baghair ، dawylprza ko dsty tawr par hr klas fail ko apnay kwda main shaml karna paray ga ، jo wkt talb aur ghltay ka shkar hawskta haay۔ aatw laؤdangh ayk aatwlwdar fnkshn ki wzuahat krkay haasal ki jati hay jsay jab bhi klas astamal kya jata hay lekin abhi tak is ki wzuahat nahin ki jati haay۔aatwlwdar fnkshn klas ka nam ayk dlyl kay tawr par lyta hay aur is sy mtalkha klas fail daat py py py ko aatwwlwdangh kay l several kiy blt un afaal fraham krta hay ، jesay spl_autoload_register () aur __outoload ()daairyktryza ya nam ki jghhayn۔ py aych py main aatwlwdangh ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: phpspl_autoload_register (fnkshn ($ class_name) {$ fail = __dir__۔'/'.str_replace ('\\' ، '/' ، $ class_name)۔'.php' ؛if (file_exists ($ fail)) {requent_once $ fail ؛}}) ؛ is msaal main ، spl_autoload_register () fnkshn ayk aatwlwdar fnkshn ko rjstr karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay jo mwjwdha daairktry sy klas failwn ko lwda krta haay۔aatwlwdar fnkshn klas kay nam ko dlyl kay tawr par lyta hay ، byk slysh ko farwrda slyshs kay sath la jata hay ، aur fail kay nam main .PHP twsya ko shaml krta haay۔aghr fail mwjwd hay tou ، ayk bar klas ko lwda karnay ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ akhttam par ، py aych py aatwlwdangh ayk taaktwr khsawsayt hay jo py aych py ayply kyshnza main klas failwn ko shaml karnay kay aml ko aasan bnaty haay۔aatwlwdangh ka astamal krkay ، dawylpr apni ayply kyshnza ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bna saktay hain aur klas failwn ko shaml karnay kay liye drkar kwda ki mkdar ko kam krsktay hayn۔py aych py aatwlwdangh kay l several kiy blt un afaal fraham krty hay ، aur dawylprza mkhsawsa daairyktrywn ya nam ki jghhawn sy klaswn ko lwda karnay kay liye apnay kstm aatwlwdar afaal bhi tshkyl dy saktay hayn۔

Question: py aych py main ghltay sy nmtnay aur lagh un karnay kay tsawr par tbadlha khyal karain aur yeh btaiyn keh mkhtlf ksm ki ghltaywn aur mstsanyat ko snbhalnay aur lagh un karnay ka tarykha۔
ayk fainait astyt mshyn (ayf ays aym) ki nmaindghy karnay wali py aych py klas ko nafza karain aur ryastwn kay mabyn mntkly aur wakaat ko snbhalnay kay tarykay fraham kryn۔
Answer: ghltay sy nmtnay aur laghngh py aych py ki trky kay lazmi phalw hayn۔ghltay sy nmtnay sy kesi prwghram kay zaryaha athaiay gaye ghltaywn ko pkranay aur mnasb karrwaiy karnay ka aml haay۔lagh un ghltaywn aur dyghr wakaat ko bad main tjzayha kay l a lagh fail main rykarda karnay ka aml haay۔py aych py main ghltay sy nmtnay aur lagh un karnay kay baray main kuch aham nkat yeh hayn: py aych py ghltay sy nmtnay aur laghngh kay l several kiy blt un afaal fraham krta hay ، jesay ghltay_ rypwrtngh () ، syt_rwr_ hayndalr () ، trghr_rwr () ، aur ghltay_lagh ()۔ dawylpr un afaal ko astamal krsktay hayn۔an ki apni ghltay ko snbhalnay kay kwaad ki wzuahat karnay kay liye ، ghltaywn ko zaahar karnay ya lagh un karnay kay tarykay main trmym karain ، aur failwn ko lagh un karnay kay liye ghltayan lkhyn۔ py aych py astsanaa hayndalngh bhi fraham krta hay ، jo dawylprza ko kesi prwghram kay zaryaha athaiay gaye astsanaa ko pkranay aur snbhalnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔، kych ، aur aakhr main blaks ، aur dawylprza ko ghltaywn ko khwbsawrty sy snbhalnay aur prwghram ko krysh hony sy rwknay ki ajazat dyta haay۔ dawylprza laghngh laibryrywn jesay aykwlwgh ya laghly jesay lagh un ki ghltaywn aur dyghr wakaat ko zayada sakhty aur mnzam tarykay sy astamal krsktay hayn۔ laibryrywn ko azuafy fraham krta haay۔py aych py main lagh un ghrdsh ، lagh fltrngh ، aur lagh un tjzayha jesi khsawsayat۔، $ ayrfail ، $ ayrr lain) {ghltay_lagh ("ghltay: [$ ayrnw] $ ghltay main $ ghltay par lain $ ghltay") ؛nya astsanaa ($ errstr ، $ errno) ؛} // syt ghltay hayndalrsyt_rwr_ hayndalr ("hayndal ayrr") ؛ // astsana hayndalr fnkshn fnkshn hayndal aykspyns ($ e) {ghltay_lagh ("astsanaa:". $ e-> getMessage () ki wzuahat kryn۔"in". $ e-> getFile (). "aan lain". $ e-> getline ()) ؛bahar nklyn ("ayk ghltay waka hui haay۔ braha krm bad main dwbarha kwshsh kryn۔") ؛} // astsana hayndalrsyt_kspysyshn_ hayndalr ("hayndal aykspynshn" ") ؛ // msaal kwda jo ghltayan ya astsanaay ko braha sakta hay {$ fail = fwpyn (" koi wjwd_fail.tst "،" ، "r ") ؛aghr (! $ fail) {niy raayt phynk dyn ("fail khwlnay main nakam۔") ؛} // fail} kych (astsanaa $ ay) kay sath kuch karain {// astsana ko hayndal kryn} is msaal main ، ghltay_rypwrtngh () fnkshn ko hr ksm ki ghltaywn ko shaml karnay kay liye ghltay ki atalaa dhandghy ki staha ko taay karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔hayndal ayrr () fnkshn ki wzuahat ghltaywn ko lagh un karnay aur astsanaa ko phynknay kay liye ki hogi haay۔SET_ERROR_HANDLER () fnkshn ko hayndal ayrr () fnkshn main ghltay kay hayndalr ko syt karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔hayndal aykspyns () fnkshn ki wzuahat mstsanyat ko lagh un karnay aur prwghram sy bahar nklnay kay liye ki hogi haay۔set_exception_handler () fnkshn ko hayndal aykspyns () fnkshn main astsanaa hayndalr ko trtyb denay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔aakhr main ، msaal kay tawr par kwda shaml kya gaya hay jo ghltayan ya astsanaa ko braha sakta hay ، aur kwshsh aur kych blaks astsanaa ko snbhalnay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔ ntyjha main ، ghltay sy nmtnay aur laghngh py aych py ki trky kay lazmi phalw hayn۔blt un afaal aur laghngh laibryrywn ka astamal krkay ، dawylprza apni ghltay sy nmtnay kay kwaad ki wzuahat krsktay hain ، js tarah ghltaywn ko zaahar karnay ya lagh un hawtay hain is main trmym krsktay hain ، aur failwn ko lagh un karnay kay liye ghltayan lkh saktay hayn۔astsanaa hayndalngh dawylprza ko ghltaywn ko khwbsawrty sy snbhalnay aur inhain prwghram ko haadsaay sy rwknay ki ajazat dyty haay۔ghltay sy nmtnay aur lagh un karnay kay liye bhatryn tarykwn par aml karty hoey ، dawylprza zayada kabl aatmad aur brkrar rkhnay waly py aych py ayply kyshnza tshkyl dy saktay hayn۔

Question: py aych py main aabjykt syrylaizayshn aur daysyrylaizayshn kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur JSON ko ashyaa ko syrylaiza karnay ya inhain dayta bys main astwr karnay ki msaalyn fraham kryn۔
Answer: ryastwn kay mabyn mntkly aur wakaat ko snbhalnay kay tarykwn kay sath ayk fainait astyt mshyn (ayf ays aym) ki nmaindghy karnay wali py aych py klas ko nafza karnay kay l we ، hum tlash kay ntaij main dstyab kwda ki msaalwn aur laibryrywn ka astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan py aych py ayf ays aym klaswn aur laibryrywn ki kuch msaalyn hayn: ayf ays aym pykyj ka astamal: ayf ays aym pykyj ayk py aych py pykyj hay jo ayk mhadwd astyt mshyn ko nafza karnay kay liye ayk aasan klas mhaya krta haay۔yhaan ayk msaal aml haay: phprequire_once 'fsm/fsm.php' ؛ $ fsm = new fsm ('state1') ؛ $ fsm-> addTransition ('state1' ، 'aywnt 1' ، 'astyt 2') ؛ $ fsm-> addTransition ('astyt 2' ، 'aywnt 2' ، 'astyt 3') ؛ $ fsm-> addTransition ('state3' ، 'aywnt 3' ، 'astyt 1') ؛ $ fsm-> prwsys aywnt ('aywnt 1') ؛ aykw $ fsm-> getCurrentState () ؛// aaؤt pt: astyt 2 is par aml draamd main ، ayf ays aym klas ko tyn ryastwn aur tyn tranzayshn kay sath ayk mhadwd ryasty mshyn bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔prwsys aywnt () ka tarykha kesi wakaay par karrwaiy aur aghly ryast main mntkly kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ghyt krynt astyt () ka tarykha ayf ays aym ki mwjwdha haalt ko bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ mhadwd laibryry ka astamal karty hawiay: mhadwd laibryry ayk py aych py laibryry hay jo ayk sadha ryasty mshyn par aml draamd fraham krty haay۔yhaan ayk msaal aml haay: phprequire_once 'wyndar/aatwwlwda daat py py py' ؛ mhadwd \ astyt mychyn \ astyt mychyn ka astamal karain lin faiynait \ ryast \ ryast ka astamal karain \ mntkly \ mntkly \ mntkly ؛ $ ays aym = nya astyt mychyn ('aabjykt') ؛ $ state1 = newryast ('state1') ؛ $ state2 = niy ryast ('state2') ؛ $ state3 = niy ryast ('astyt 3') ؛ $ mntkly 1 = nya mntkly ('mntkly 1' ، $ State1 ، $ State2) ؛ $ mntkly 2 = nyamntkly ('tranzayshn 2' ، $ astyt 2 ، $ astyt 3) ؛ $ mntkly 3 = nya mntkly ('mntkly 3' ، $ astyt 3 ، $ astyt 1) ؛ $ SM-> aydastyt ($ State1) ؛ $ SM-> aydastyt ($ state2) ؛$ sm-> addState ($ state3) ؛ $ sm-> addransition ($ transition1) ؛ $ sm-> addransition ($ mntkly 2) ؛ sm- sm-> addransition ($ mntkly 3) ؛ sm-> setinitialstate ('state1')؛ $ sm-> abtdaa () ؛ $ sm-> drkhwast dyn ('mntkly 1') ؛ aykw $ sm-> getCurrentState ()-> getName () ؛// aaؤt pt: astyt 2 is par aml draamd main ، astyt mychyn klas ko tyn ryastwn aur tyn tranzayshn kay sath ayk ryasty mshyn bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔laghw () tarykha ko aghly ryast main mntkly aur mntkly ka atalak karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ghyt krynt astyt () ka tarykha ryasty mshyn ki mwjwdha haalt ko bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ akhttam kay akhttam par ، ayk mhadwd astyt mshyn (ayf ays aym) ayk dayta dahanchha hay jo kmpywtr sains main astamal hawta hay takha sstm 12 main ryasty mntkly ko madal bnaya jaskay۔py aych py ayf ays aym ko kis tarah nafza karnay ki mtadd msaalyn pysh krty hay ، jesay ayf ays aym pykyj aur upar dkhaiay gaye mhadwd laibryry۔py aych py main ayf ays aym ko nafza krkay ، dawylprza kesi sstm main ryasty mntkly ko mwsar andaza main madal bna saktay hain aur ryastwn kay mabyn mntkly aur wakaat ko snbhalnay jesay kam anjam dy saktay hayn۔

Question: blwm fltr ki nmaindghy karnay waly py aych py klas ko nafza karain aur anasar ko shaml karnay aur kam ghalat msabt shrha kay sath mmbrshp ki janch pratal kay tarykay fraham kryn۔
Answer: aabjykt syrylaizayshn kesi shay ko kesi aysy shkl main tbdyl karnay ka aml hay jsay zakhyrha ya mntkl kya jaskta hay ، jesay tar ya bainry dayta۔syrylaizayshn kesi dayta bys main ashyaa ko zakhyrha karnay ya nyt wrk par mntkl karnay kay liye mfyd haay۔daysyrylaizayshn syrylaizada dayta ko kesi shay main waps tbdyl karnay ka aml haay۔py aych py syrylaizangh aur daysyrylaizangh ashyaa ، jesay syrylaiza () ، ghair syraiaiza () ، aur JSON_ENCODE () kay liye mtadd blt un afaal fraham krta haay۔yhaan py aych py main ashyaa ko syrylaiza karnay ki kuch msaalyn hayn: syrylaiza () fnkshn ka astamal karty hawiay: py aych py klas shkhsa {awamy $ nam ؛awamy $ amr ؛awamy fnkshn __ knstrkt ($ nam ، $ amr) {$ yha-> nam = $ nam ؛$ yha-> amr = $ amr ؛}} $ shkhsa = nya shkhsa ("jan" ، 30) ؛ $ syrylaizada = syrylaiza ($ shkhsa) ؛ bazaghsht $ syrylaizada ؛// aaؤt pt: o: 6: "shkhsa": 2: {s: 4: "nam" ؛ s: 4: "jan" ؛ s: 3: "amr" ؛ i: 30 ؛} is msaal main ، ayk shkhsaklas ki wzuahat do khsawsayat kay sath ki hogi haay: nam aur amr۔as shkhsa ki klas ki ayk msaal "jan" aur amr 30 kay sath tkhlyk ki hogi haay۔ phir syrylaiza () fnkshn ko is chyza ko tar main syrylaiza karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔awamy $ amr ؛awamy fnkshn __ knstrkt ($ nam ، $ amr) {$ yha-> nam = $ nam ؛$ yha-> amr = $ amr ؛}} $ shkhsa = nya shkhsa ("jan" ، 30) ؛ $ syrylaizada = JSON_ENCODE ($ shkhsa) ؛ aykw $ syrylaizada ؛// aaؤt pt: {"nam": "jan" ، "amr": 30} is msaal main ، ayk shkhsa ki klas ki wzuahat do khsawsayat kay sath ki hogi haay: nam aur amr۔as shkhsa ki klas ki ayk msaal "jan" aur amr 30 kay sath tkhlyk ki hogi haay۔ phir JSON_ENCODE () fnkshn ko is chyza ko JSON strngh main syrylaiza karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ yahan kuch aysy msaalyn hain keh ayk dayta bys main syrylaizada ashyaa ko kis tarah astwr kryn:ays kyw ayl: py aych py $ py day aw = nya py day aw ("ays kyw ayl: hawst = lwkl hawst ؛ day by nam = maiy dayta bys" ، "saarf nam" ، "pas wrda") ؛ $ shkhsa = nya shkhsa ("jan" ، 30) ؛ $ syrylaizada = syrylaiza ($ shkhsa) ؛ $ stmt = $ pdo-> tyar karain ("lwghwn main dakhl karain (nam ، amr) akdar (؟ ،؟)") ؛ $ stmt-> amldraamd (srny ($ syrylaiza)) ؛ is msaal main ، ayk PDO aabjykt haayays kyw ayl dayta bys sy rabtaha kaim karnay kay liye tshkyl diya gaya haay۔as shkhsa ki klas ki ayk msaal "jan" aur amr 30 kay nam sy tyar ki hogi haay۔ phir syrylaiza () fnkshn ko is chyza ko tar main syrylaiza karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔as kay bad syrylaizada aabjykt ko ays kyw ayl dayta bys main tyar kya jata haay۔$ shkhsa = nya shkhsa ("jan" ، 30) ؛ $ syrylaizada = syrylaiza ($ shkhsa) ؛ $ dstawyza = srny ("syrylaizada" => $ syrylaizada) ؛ $ ntyjha = $ jma krna-> dakhlha ($ dstawyza) in inas msaal kay tawr par ، mnghw day by \ klaint aabjykt mwnghw day by dayta bys sy mrbwta hony kay liye tshkyl diya gaya haay۔as shkhsa ki klas ki ayk msaal "jan" aur amr 30 kay nam sy tyar ki hogi haay۔ phir syrylaiza () fnkshn ko is chyza ko tar main syrylaiza karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔as kay bad syrylaizada aabjykt ko ayk mwnghw day by kay mjmwaha main dstawyza kay btawr zakhyrha kya jata haay۔ akhttam par ، aabjykt syrylaizayshn aur daysyrylaizayshn py aych py ki trky main aham tsawrat hayn۔blt un afaal jesay syrylaiza () ، ghair syrylaiza () ، aur JSON_ENCODE () ka astamal krkay ، dawylprza aasany sy py aych py main ashyaa ko syrylaiza aur daysyrylaiza krsktay hayn۔syrylaizada ashyaa ko dayta bys main zakhyrha kya jaskta hay ya kesi nyt wrk kay upar mntkl kya jaskta haay۔aabjykt syrylaizayshn aur daysyrylaizayshn kay bhatryn tarykwn par aml karty hoey ، dawylprza zayada mwsar aur brkrar rkhnay waly py aych py ayply kyshnza tshkyl dy saktay hayn۔

Question: py aych py ki twsya kay tsawr par tbadlha khyal karain aur mkbwl twsya ki msaalyn fraham karain jo py aych py ki faalyt ko braha dytay hayn۔
Answer: py aych py klas ko nafza karnay kay l a blwm fltr ki nmaindghy karty hoey anasar ko shaml karnay aur kam ghalat msabt shrha kay sath mmbrshp ki janch pratal kay tarykwn kay sath ، hum tlash kay ntaij main dstyab kwda ki msaalwn aur laibryrywn ka astamal krsktay hayn۔blwm fltrza kay baray main kuch aham nkat yeh hayn: ayk blwm fltr ayk khlaiy mwsar amkany aadad wa shmar ka dahanchha hay jo yeh janchnay kay liye astamal hawta hay keh aya ansar kesi syt ka mmbr hay ya nhayn۔ blwm fltrza main kam ghalat msabt shrha hay ، is ka mtalb hay keh woh bazu awkat rpwrt krsktay hayn۔yha keh ansar syt main hawta hay jab yeh nahin hawta hay ، lekin woh kabhi yeh atalaa nahin dyn ga keh ansar syt main nahin hawta hay jab yeh hawta haay۔ blwm fltr ki ghalat msabt shrha ko fltr kay saiza aur nmbr ko aydajst krkay kntrwl kya jaskta haay۔astamal shuda haysh afaal main say۔ py aych py blwm fltrza ko nafza karnay kay liye mtadd laibryrywn ko mhaya krty hay ، jesay py aych py blwm fltr laibryry ghytwb par dstyab haay۔ py aych py blwm fltr laibryry ka astamal karty hoey py aych py main blwm fltr ki ayk msaal kay tawr par aml draamd: Phprequire_once 'wyndar/'autoload.php '؛ blwm \ fltr astamal karain ؛ klas blwm fltr {mhafwza $ fltr ؛pblk fnkshn __ knstrkt ($ saiza ، $ haysh) {$ this-> fltr = nya fltr ($ saiza ، $ haysh) ؛} awamy tkryb shaml karain ($ ansar) {$ this-> fltr-> shaml karain ($ ansar) ؛} awamy tkryb main ($ ansar) {wapsy $ this-> fltr-> hay ($ ansar) ؛}} $ bf = nya blwmfltr (1000000 ، 5) ؛ $ bf-> shaml karain ("haylw") ؛ $ bf-> add ("dnya") ؛ aykw $ bf-> hay ("haylw") ؛// aaؤt pt: 1echo $ bf-> hay ("dnya") ؛// aaؤt pt: 1echo $ bf-> hay ("fw") ؛// aaؤt pt: 0 is msaal kay tawr par ، ayk blwm fltr klas ki wzuahat anasar ko shaml karnay aur mmbrshp ki janch pratal kay tarykwn kay sath ki hogi haay۔py aych py blwm fltr laibryry 1000000 bts aur 5 haysh afaal kay saiza kay sath blwm fltr bnanay kay liye astamal hawty haay۔ADD () ka tarykha fltr main anasar ko shaml karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، aur fltr main anasar ki rknyt ki janch pratal kay liye () ka tarykha astamal kya jata haay۔ akhttam par ، ayk blwm fltr ayk khlaiy mwsar amkany aadad wa shmar ka dahanchha hay jo janch kay liye astamal hawta haay۔chahaay koi ansar kesi syt ka mmbr ho js main kam ghalat msabt shrha haay۔py aych py blwm fltr jesi laibryrywn ka astamal krkay ، dawylprza py aych py main blwm fltrza ko aasany sy anasar ko shaml karnay aur mmbrshp ki janch pratal kay tarykwn kay sath nafza krsktay hayn۔blwm fltrza un ayply kyshnza kay l useful mfyd hain jahan kam ghltay ki shrha ko brdasht kya jaskta hay ، aur woh dusray dayta dahanchay kay mkablay main astwryj ki ayk bray jghha ko bcha saktay hayn۔

Question: "py aych py klas ko nafza karain jo khud twazan bainry tlash kay drkht ki nmaindghy krta hay ، jesay aay wy ayl drkht ya srkh rngh kay drkht۔"
Answer: py aych py ki twsya laibryryan ya plgh un hain jo py aych py ko azuafy faalyt fraham krty hayn۔an ka astamal py aych py main niy khsawsayat shaml karnay ، karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay ، ya dusray saft wyir kay sath mrbwta karnay kay liye kya jaskta haay۔mkbwl py aych py ki twsya ki kuch msaalyn yeh hayn: py day aw (py aych py dayta aabjykt): py aych py main dayta bys tak rsaiy kay l a ayk mstkl antrfys fraham krta hay ، js sy dawylprza ko dayta bys sy aazaad kwda lkhnay ki ajazat mlty haay۔wyb srwsza aur APIS.OPENSSL kay sath taaml: py aych py kay liye khfyha kary aur daykrypshn afaal fraham krta hay ، js sy dawylprza ko nyt wrk par mntkl krdha dayta ko mhafwza bnanay ki ajazat mlty haay۔ aai aym aay jy aai sy: py aych py kay liye amyj hayra phyry kay afaal fraham krta hay ، js sy dawylprza ko tsaawyr tkhlyk ، trmym aur tbdyl karnay ki ajazat mlty haay۔ aay py py sy yw (mtbadl۔py aych py kyshay): py aych py kay liye ayk kychngh mykanzam fraham krta hay ، js sy dawylprza ko dayta bys kay swalat aur fail sstm aapryshnza ki tadad ko kam krkay apni ayply kyshnza ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay ki ajazat mlty haay۔prfarmns.mym kychda: py aych py kay liye tksym shuda kychngh sstm mhaya krta hay ، js sy dawylprza ko mtadd srwrza main dayta astwr aur bazayaft karnay ki ajazat mlty haay۔ ntyjha akhza karnay main ، py aych py ki twsya py aych py ki trky ka ayk aham hasaha hay ، jo azuafy faalyt fraham krty hay aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bnaty haay۔py day aw ، krl ، awpn ays ayl ، amyjk ، aay py sy yw ، ayks daybgh ، aur mym kych jesay py day aw ، awpn ays ayl ، awpn ays ayl ، awpn ays ayl ، amyjk ، aay py sy yw ، ayks daybgh ، aur mymkchda jesay mshhawr py aych py aykstynshnza ka astamal krkay ، dawylprza apni ayply kyshnza main niy khsawsayat shaml krsktay hain ، karkrdghy ko bhatr bna saktay hain ، aur dusray saft wyir kay sath mrbwta hawsktay hayn۔py aych py ki twsya ko msthakm tawr par py aych py main mrtb kya jaskta hay ya rn taim kay wkt mthark tawr par bhry jaskty hay ، aur py ay sy ayl (py aych py aykstynshn kmywnty laibryry) jesay zakhyrwn main paya jaskta haay۔

Question: py aych py main anhasaar kay antzaam kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur prwjykt anhasaar kay antzaam kay liye kmpwzar kay astamal par tbadlha khyal kryn۔
Answer: bainry srch ka ayk khud twazan drkht ayk khasa ksm ka bainry srch drkht hay jo drkht ki awnchaiy ya staha ki awnchaiy ya tadad ko hr wkt khud bkhwd aydajst krkay kam rkhnay ki kwshsh krta haay۔khwd twazan bainry tlash kay drkhtwn ki mtadd ksmyn hain ، jesay aay wy ayl kay drkht aur srkh syaha drkht۔yhaan py aych py ki klaswn ki kuch msaalyn hain jo khud twazan bainry tlash kay drkhtwn ki nmaindghy krty hayn: kstm par aml draamd ka astamal karty hawiay: yahan ayk kstm aawltry klas ka ayk msaal aml haay: py aych py sy ayl aay ays aywltry {mhafwza $ jra ؛awamy fnkshn __ knstrkt () {$ this-> jra = null ؛} awamy fnkshn dakhl karain ($ klyd ، $ kdr) {$ this-> rwt = $ yha-> _ dakhl karain ($ yha-> jra ، $ klyd ، $ kdr) ؛} mhafwza fnkshn _ anrt ($ nwda ، $ klyd ، $ wylyw) {aghr ($ nwda == null) {nya avlnode ($ klyd ، $ kdr) waps karain ؛} if ($ key <$ node-> key) {$ nwda-> baien = $ yha-> _ dakhl karain ($ nwda-> baien ، $ klyd ، $ kdr) ؛} dusri {$ nwda-> hak = $ yha-> _ dakhl karain ($ nwda-> dien ، $ klyd ، $ kdr) ؛} $ nwda-> awnchaiy = zayada sy zayada ($ yha-> _ awnchaiy ($ nwda-> baiyn) ، $ yha-> _ awnchaiy ($ nwda-> daiyn)) + 1 ؛$ bylns = $ yha-> _ bylns ($ nwda) ؛aghr ($ bylns> 1 && $ klyd <$ nwda-> baiyn-> klyd) {wapsy $ as-> _ rwtyrait ($ nwda) ؛} if ($ bylns <-1 && $ key> $ nwda-> rait-> klyd) {wapsy $ as-> _ rwttylyft ($ nwda) ؛} if ($ bylns> 1 && $ & key> $ nwda-> baiyn-> klyd) {$ nwda-> baien = $ yha-> _ rwtyt aylft ($ nwda-> baiyn) ؛waps $ yha-> _ rwtyrait ($ nwda) ؛} agar ($ bylns <-1 && $ KEY <$ nwda-> rait-> klyd) {$ nwda-> hak = $ yha-> _ rwtyrait ($ nwda-> sahayha) ؛waps $ yha-> _ rwtytylft ($ nwda) ؛} wapsy $ nwda ؛} mhafwza fnkshn _ haait ($ nwda) {aghr ($ nwda == null) {wapsy 0 ؛} wapsy $ nwda-> awnchaiy ؛} mhafwza fnkshn _ bylns ($ nwda) {aghr ($ nwda == null) {waps 0 ؛} wapsy $ as-> _ awnchaiy ($ nwda-> baiyn)-$ yha-> _ awnchaiy ($ nwda-> daiyn) ؛} mhafwza fnkshn _rotateleft ($ nwda) {$ x = $ nwda-> sahayha ؛$ y = $ x-> baien ؛$ x-> baien = $ nwda ؛$ nwda-> hak = $ y ؛$ nwda-> awnchaiy = zayada sy zayada ($ yha-> _ awnchaiy ($ nwda-> baiyn) ، $ yha-> _ awnchaiy ($ nwda-> daiyn)) + 1 ؛$ x-> awnchaiy = zayada sy zayada ($ yha-> _ awnchaiy ($ x-> baiyn) ، $ yha-> _ awnchaiy ($ x-> daiyn)) + 1 ؛wapsy $ x ؛} mhafwza fnkshn _rotateright ($ nwda) {$ x = $ nwda-> baien ؛$ y = $ x-> thyk ؛$ x-> hak = $ nwda ؛$ nwda-> baien = $ y ؛$ nwda-> awnchaiy = zayada sy zayada ($ yha-> _ awnchaiy ($ nwda-> baiyn) ، $ yha-> _ awnchaiy ($ nwda-> daiyn)) + 1 ؛$ x-> awnchaiy = zayada sy zayada ($ yha-> _ awnchaiy ($ x-> baiyn) ، $ yha-> _ awnchaiy ($ x-> daiyn)) + 1 ؛wapsy $ x ؛}} klas avlnode {awamy $ klyd ؛awamy $ kdr ؛awamy $ baien ؛awamy $ hak ؛awamy $ awnchaiy ؛awamy fnkshn __ knstrkt ($ klyd ، $ kdr) {$ this-> key = $ key ؛$ yha-> wylyw = $ wylyw ؛$ this-> baien = null ؛$ this-> hak = null ؛$ yha-> awnchaiy = 1 ؛} this is nfaza main ، Avltree klas ayk AVL drkht ki nmaindghy krty hay ، jo ayk ksm ka khud twazan bainry tlash kay drkht ki nmaindghy krta haay۔_ anrt () ka tarykha drkht main ayk nya nwda dakhl karnay kay liye astamal hawta hay ، aur drkht ko mtwazan karnay kay liye baien aur dien ghrdshwn ko anjam denay kay liye _rotateleft () aur _rotateright () tarykwn ka astamal kya jata haay۔Avlnode klas drkht main ayk nwda ki nmaindghy krta hay ، js main klyd ، kdr ، baien bchay ، dien bchay aur awnchaiy ki khsawsayat hayn۔ Avltree klas ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: php $ drkht = nya avltree () ؛ $ drkht-> dakhl karain (5 ، "aypl") ؛ $ drkht-> dakhl karain (3 ، "kylay") ؛ $ drkht-> dakhl karain (7 ، "sntry") ؛ $ drkht-> dakhl karain (2 ، "anghwr") ؛ $ ؛drkht-> dakhl karain (4 ، "nashpatyan") ؛ $ drkht-> dakhl karain (6 ، "pych") ؛ $ drkht-> dakhl karain (8 ، "byr") ؛ is msaal main ، ayk nya aawltry aabjykt tyar kya gaya hay aur mtaddnwdas drkht main daalay jatay hayn۔km awnchaiy ko brkrar rkhnay kay liye hr andraj kay bad drkht khud bkhwd mtwazan hawjata haay۔ py aych py-day ays laibryry ka astamal karty hawiay: py aych py-day ays laibryry ayk py aych py ki twsya hay jo mtadd dayta dahanchay mhaya krty hay ، js main srkh syaha drkht bhi shaml haay۔yhaan ayk msaal aml haay: phprequire_once 'wyndar/aatwwlwda daat py py py' D day ays \ nkshha astamal karain ؛ $ drkht = nya nkshha () ؛ $ drkht-> daalyn (5 ، "aypl") ؛ $ drkht-> daala (3 ، "kyla") ؛ tree drkht-> daalyn (7 ،" awrnj ") ؛ $ drkht-> daalyn (2 ،" anghwr ") ؛ $ drkht-> daalyn (4 ،" nashpatyan ") ؛ $ drkht-> daalyn (6 ،"aaraw") ؛ $ drkht-> daalyn (8 ، "byr") ؛ is nfaza main ، py aych py-day ays laibryry ka astamal karty hoey ayk nya nkshha aabjykt tshkyl diya gaya hay ، jo srkh syaha drkht ko nafza krta haay۔pwt () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey drkht main kiy klydy kdr kay jwraay shaml kyay jatay hayn۔ akhttam par ، khud twazan bainry tlash kay drkht jesay aay wy ayl kay drkht aur srkh syaha drkht kam awnchaiy ko brkrar rkhnay aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay l data dayta dahanchay hayn۔py aych py-day ays jesi apni mrzuy kay mtaabk nfaza ya laibryrywn ka astamal krkay ، dawylpr aasany sy py aych py main khud twazan bainry tlash kay drkhtwn ko aasany sy nwdas dakhl karnay aur tlash karnay kay tarykwn kay sath nafza krsktay hayn۔

Question: ayk lahakha srny ki nmaindghy karnay waly py aych py klas ko nafza karain aur mwsar astrngh tlash aur pytrn mmasalt kay liye tarykay fraham kryn۔
Answer: anhasaar ka antzaam byrwny laibryrywn aur pykyjwn kay antzaam ka aml hay js par py aych py prwjykt ka anhasaar hawta haay۔as main un pykjwn kay wrzen par nzar rkhna ، un ko anstal karna ، aur jab zurwry ho tou un ko ap dayt karna shaml haay۔anhasaar ka antzaam zurwry hay kywnkha is sy yeh ykyny bnanay main mdd mlty hay keh koi prwjykt is par mnhasar pykyjwn kay sahayha wrzen astamal krrhaa hay ، aur yeh keh yeh pykyj ayk dusray kay sath mtaabkt rkhtay hayn۔yha kmpwzar.jsn namy fail fraham krkay kam krta hay js main aap apnay prwjykt ki zurwrt kay anhasaar ki fharst bnasktay hayn۔kmpwzar phir un anhasaar ko khud bkhwd daaؤn lwda aur anstal krta hay ، is kay sath sath kesi bhi dusray anhasaar kay sath sath un ki zurwrt hawty haay۔kmpwzar un anhasaar kay wrzen ka bhi antzaam krta hay ، is bat ko ykyny bnatay hoey keh sahayha wrzen anstal hain aur woh ayk dusray kay sath mtaabkt rkhtay hayn۔ yahan py aych py anhasaar kay antzaam kay liye kmpwzar kay astamal kay kuch fwaid hayn: tnsayb ko khwdkar aur ap dayt karnay kay zaryaha anhasaar ka antzaam karnay kay aml ko aasan bnata haay۔pykyjza۔ pykyjwn kay sahayha wrzen anstal hain aur woh ayk dusray kay sath mtaabkt rkhtay hayn۔ pykyjwn ka ayk mrkzay zakhyrha fraham krta hay js ko aasany sy tlash aur anstal kya jaskta haay۔ kstm pykjwn ki tkhlyk aur ashtrak kay liye bahar۔ kmpwzar astamal karnay kay l you ، aap ko zurwrt hay ، aap ko zurwrt haay۔asay apnay sstm par anstal karnay aur apnay prwjykt daairktry main ayk kmpwzar. json fail bnanay kay l .۔kmpwzar.jsn fail un pykyjwn ki fharst dyty hay jo aap kay prwjykt par anhasaar karty hain ، un kay wrzen kay sath۔yhaan ayk msaal kmpwzar ۔jsn fail haay: JSON {"zurwrt": {"mwnwlwgh/mwnwwlwgh": "^2.0" ، "ghwzaly aych ty ty py/ghwzal": "^7.0"}} is msaal main ، mtalwbha
