sykshn main do pykyj ki fharst di hogi hay js main haayprwjykt is par mnhasar haay: aykwlwgh/aykwlwgh aur ghwzaly aych ty ty py/ghwzal۔^ alamt is bat ki nshandhay krty hay keh is mnsawbay kay liye pykyj kay ayk wrzen ki zurwrt hawty hay jo mwnwlwgh/mwnwlwgh kay liye wrzen 2.0 ya is sy zayada kay sath mtaabkt rkhta ho aur ghwzaly aych ty ty py/ghwzal kay liye wrzen 7.0 ya is sy zayadha۔prwjykt daairktry main kmpwzar anstal kmanda۔kmpwzar phir prwjykt main ayk wyndar daairktry main pykyjza aur un kay anhasaar ko daaؤn lwda aur anstal krta haay۔ akhttam par ، anhasaar ka antzaam py aych py ki trky ka ayk aham phalw hay ، aur kmpwzar py aych py anhasaar kay antzaam kay liye ayk mkbwl twl haay۔kmpwzar ka astamal krkay ، dawylpr anhasaar kay antzaam kay aml ko aasan bna saktay hain ، is bat ko ykyny bna saktay hain keh pykyjwn kay sahayha wrzen anstal hon ، aur pykyjwn kay mrkzay zakhyray sy faidha athaiyn۔

Question: "py aych py main dayta bys andayksngh kay tsawr par tbadlha khyal karain aur mkhtlf ksm kay asharyha ، jesay by try ya haysh andayks ، aur un kay fwaid ki wzuahat kryn۔"
Answer: ayk lahakha srny ayk dayta dahanchha hay jo kesi dyiay gaye tar main mwsar astrngh srch aur pytrn mmasal kay liye astamal hawta haay۔yha tar kay tamam lahakha ki ayk trtyb shuda saf hay ، aur O (M + lagh N) wkt main astrngh main nmwnwn ki tlash kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، jahan aym pytrn ki lmbaiy hay aur N tar ki lmbaiy haay۔yhaan ayk py aych py klas ka ayk msaal hay jo ayk lahakha srny ki nmaindghy krta haay: py aych py sy ayl aay ays ays lahakha {mhafwza $ lahakha ؛mhafwza $ n ؛awamy fnkshn __ knstrkt ($ strngh) {$ this-> n = strlen ($ strngh) ؛$ yha-> lahakha = srny () ؛($ i = 0 ؛ $ i <$ this-> n ؛ $ i ++) {$ this-> lahakha [$ i] = nya lahakha ($ i ، substr ($ string ، $ i)) ؛} usort ($ this-> lahakha ، fnkshn ($ a ، $ b) {wapsy strcmp ($ a-> lahakha ، $ b-> lahakha) ؛}) ؛} awamy fnkshn ki tlash ($ pytrn) {$ m = strlen ($ pytrn) ؛$ l = 0 ؛$ r = $ this-> n - 1 ؛jbkha ($ l <= $ r) {$ MID = $ l + flwr (($ r - $ l) / 2) ؛$ lahakha = $ yha-> lahakha [$ wsta]-> lahakha ؛aghr (strncmp ($ pytrn ، $ lahakha ، $ m) <0) {$ r = $ wsta - 1 ؛} wrnha agar (strncmp ($ pytrn ، $ lahakha ، $ m)> 0) {$ l = $ wsta + 1 ؛} dusri {wapsy $ this-> lahakha [$ wsta]-> andayks ؛}} wapsy -1 ؛}} klas lahakha {pblk $ andayks ؛awamy $ lahakha ؛awamy fnkshn __ knstrkt ($ andayks ، $ lahakha) {$ this-> andayks = $ andayks ؛$ yha-> lahakha = $ lahakha ؛} this is aml main ، lahakha klas ayk lahakha srny ki nmaindghy krta hay ، js main saf ki tamyr aur nmwnwn ki tlash kay tarykay hayn۔lahakha klas tar kay lahakha ki nmaindghy krta hay ، js main andayks aur khud hi lahakha kay liye khsawsayat hayn۔tlash () ka tarykha lahakha srny main ayk nmwnha tlash karnay kay liye bainry srch ka astamal krta haay۔ is ki ayk msaal hay keh lahakha klas ko kis tarah astamal kya jaiay: py aych py $ strngh = "kylay" ؛ $ lahakha$ lanty-> tlash ("ana") ؛ aykw $ andayks ؛// aaؤt pt: 1 main yeh msaal ، ayk nya lahakha aabjykt "kylay" kay tar kay sath tyar kya gaya haay۔as kay bad tlash () kay tarykha kar ko lahakha sray main "ana" kay nmwnay ki tlash kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، aur pytrn kay pehlay wakaay ka andayks waps karty hawiay۔ akhttam par ، ayk lahakha srny mwsar astrngh srch aur pytrn mmasal kay liye ayk mfyd dayta dahanchha haay۔ayk dyiay gaye tar mynmzakwrha bala lahakha klas jesay kstm par aml draamd ka astamal krkay ، dawylpr aasany sy lahakha srny ki tamyr krsktay hain aur tar main nmwnwn ki tlash krsktay hayn۔

Question: kesi py aych py klas ko nafza karain jo rydaks try ki nmaindghy karty hain aur mwsar strngh pryfks tlash aur bazayaft kay liye tarykay fraham karty hayn۔
Answer: dayta bys andayksngh ayk aysy tknyk hay jo dayta bys kay swalat ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye astamal ki jati hay js ko askyn karnay ki zurwrt hay is dayta ki mkdar ko kam krkay۔andayks dayta dahanchay hain jo ayk ya zayada kalmwn ki akdar ki bnyad par dayta tak tyzay sy rsaiy ki ajazat dytay hayn۔py aych py main ، andayks aam tawr par rshtha dar dayta bys jesay ays kyw ayl kay sath mil kar astamal hawtay hayn۔asharyha ki kuch aksam aur un kay fwaid yeh hayn: by try: zayada tr ays kyw ayl andayks ، bshmwl praimry kyza ، mnfrd chabyan aur bakaadha asharyha ، by trywn main mhafwza hayn۔by try mtwazan drkhtwn kay dahanchay hain jo mwsar tlash ، andraj aur aadad wa shmar ko hazaf karnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔wha braay daytasyts kay liye achhy tarah sy mwzawn hain aur bohat sary swalat ko mwsar andaza main snbhal saktay hayn۔wha is ksm kay swalat kay l fast tyza aur mwsar hain ، lekin rynj kay swalat ya jzawy mychwn kay l well mnasb nahin hayn۔ bt myp andayks: bt myp andayks kam kardaynlty kalmwn kay liye astamal hawtay hain ، jahan alag alag akdar ki tadad nsbta small chhwty hawty haay۔wha kalm main hr alag kdr kay liye bt myp bna kar kam karty hain ، is bat ki nshandhay karty hain keh kon sy ktaar main is kdr par mushtamil haay۔wha is ksm kay swalat kay l fast tyza aur mwsar hain ، lekin aaly kardaynyty kalmwn kay liye sst hawsktay hayn۔ py aych py main asharyha astamal karnay kay kuch fwaid hayn: dayta ki mkdar ko kam krkay dayta bys kay swalat ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnata haay۔ayk ya zayada kalmwn ki akdar par mbny aadad wa shmar tak tyzay sy rsaiy kay l .۔ kya bohat sy swalat ko hayndal kya jaskta haay۔tkhlyk andayks jesay ays kyw ayl kay byanat ka astamal karty hoey tkhlyk kya gaya haay۔msaal kay tawr par ، mndrjha zayl ays kyw ayl byan saarfyn kay nam kay kalm par ayk andayks tshkyl dyta hay tybl: ays kyw ayl kryt andayks nam_ andayks aan saarfyn (nam) ؛ aakhr main ، py aych py main dayta bys kay swalat ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye dayta bys andayksngh ayk aham tknyk haay۔asharyha jat ka astamal krkay ، dawylprza dayta ki mkdar ko kam krsktay hain jn ko askyn karnay ki zurwrt hay aur ayk ya zayada kalmwn ki akdar ki bnyad par dayta tak tyzay sy rsaiy ki ajazat di jaskty haay۔mkhtlf ksm kay asharyha ، jesay by try ، haysh andayks ، aur bt myp andayks ، mkhtlf fwaid rkhtay hain aur mkhtlf ksm kay swalat kay l suited mwzawn hayn۔

Question: py aych py main akasy kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur rn taim kay wkt klaswn aur ashyaa ko maainha karnay aur un main hayra phyry karnay kay liye akasy ko kis tarah astamal karain is ki msaalyn fraham kryn۔
Answer: rydaks try ayk dayta dahanchha hay jo mwsar strngh pryfks tlash aur bazayaft kay liye astamal hawta haay۔yha ayk ksm ki try hay jo tarwn ko anfrady krdarwn main twra kar aur drkhtwn ki tarah dahanchay main astwr krkay astwr krty haay۔py aych py main ، rydaks ki kwshshwn kay liye mtadd laibryryan aur nfaza dstyab hayn۔yhaan kuch msaalyn hayn: kwshshyn laibryry ka astamal: kwshshyn laibryry try ، rydakstry ، aur lahakha dayta dahanchay ka py aych py ka nfaza haay۔yhaan ayk rydakstry klas ka ayk msaal hay jo kwshshyn laibryry ka astamal karty hayn: phprequire_once 'Wendor/autoload.php' ؛ astamal ki kwshsh karain \ Radixtrie ؛ klas Radixtraysearch {mhafwza $ TRIE ؛awamy fnkshn __ knstrkt () {$ this-> trie = new Radixtrie () ؛} awamy fnkshn dakhl karain ($ strngh) {$ this-> trie-> dakhl karain ($ strngh) ؛} awamy fnkshn ki tlash ($ sabkha) {wapsy $ this-> trie-> tlash ($ sabkha) ؛}} is aml main ، rydakstrys srch klas ayk rydaks try ki nmaindghy krty hay ، js main tarwn ko dakhl karnay aur sabkay ki tlash kay tarykwn kay sath۔kwshshwn \ rydakstry klas ko rydaks try ko nafza karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ rydakstrys srch klas ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: py aych py $ try = nya rydakstrys srch () ؛ $ try-> dakhl karain ("aypl") ؛ $ try-> dakhl karain (dakhl kryn۔"kylay") ؛ $ try-> dakhl karain ("awrnj") ؛ $ try-> dakhl karain ("aaraw") ؛ $ try-> dakhl karain ("nashpatyan") ؛ $ try-> dakhl karain ("byr") ؛ $ ؛ $ntaij = $ try-> tlash ("pyi") ؛ prnt_ aar ($ ntaij) ؛// aaؤt pt: srny ([0] => aaraw [1] => nashpatyan) is msaal main ، ayk nya rydakstrys srch aabjykt tshkyl diya gaya hay ، aur dakhl () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey kiy dawrwn ko traiy main dakhl kya jata haay۔as kay bad tlash () kay tarykha kar ko "pyi" kay sabkha tarwn ki tlash kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jo mmasal tarwn ki ayk saf ko waps karty hayn۔ kstm par aml draamd ka astamal karty hawiay: yahan kstm rydakstry klas ka ayk msaal aml haay: py aych py sy ayl aay ays ays rydakstry {mhafwza $ jra ؛awamy fnkshn __ knstrkt () {$ this-> rwt = nya rydakstrynwda ("") ؛} awamy fnkshn dakhl karain ($ strngh) {$ this-> rwt-> dakhl karain ($ strngh) ؛} awamy fnkshn ki tlash ($ sabkha) {wapsy $ this-> rwt-> tlash ($ sabkha) ؛class} klas rydakstrynwda {awamy $ kdr ؛awamy $ bchay ؛awamy fnkshn __ knstrkt ($ kdr) {$ this-> wylyw = $ wylyw ؛$ yha-> bchay = srny () ؛} awamy fnkshn dakhl karain ($ strngh) {aghr (khaly ($ strngh)) {wapsy ؛} foreach ($ this-> bchay btawr bchay))) ؛wapsy ؛}} $ this-> bchay [] = nya rydakstrynwda ($ strngh) ؛} awamy fnkshn ki tlash ($ sabkha) {$ ntaij = srny () ؛aghr (strpos ($ this-> wylyw ، $ sabkha) === 0) {$ ntaij [] = $ yha-> wylyw ؛} foreach ($ this-> bchay btawr btawr bchha) {aghr (strpos ($ child-> value ، $ prec) === 0) {$ ntaij = srny_mryj ($ ntaij ، $ bchay-> tlash ($ sabkha))؛}} wapsy $ ntaij ؛} this is nfaza main ، rydakstry klas ayk rydaks try ki nmaindghy krty hay ، js main tarwn ko dakhl karnay aur sabkha ki tlash kay tarykwn kay sath۔rydakstryinwda klas try main ayk nwda ki nmaindghy krty hay ، js main kdr kay l properties khsawsayat aur bchwn kay nwdas ki ayk saf hawty haay۔dakhl () ka tarykha traiy main tar dakhl karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، aur tlash () ka tarykha kesi dyiay gaye sabkha kay sath tarwn ki tlash kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ yahan rydakstry klas ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: py aych py $ try = nya rydakstry (nya rydakstry () ؛ $ try-> dakhl karain ("aypl") ؛ $ try-> dakhl karain ("kylay") ؛ $ try-> dakhl karain ("awrnj") ؛ $ try-> dakhl karain ("aaraw") ؛ $ try->dakhl karain ("nashpatyan") ؛ $ try-> dakhl karain ("byr") ؛ $ ntaij = $ try-> tlash ("pyi") ؛ prnt_ aar ($ ntaij) ؛// aaؤt pt: srny ([0] => aaraw [1] => nashpatyan) is msaal main ، ayk nya rydakstry aabjykt tshkyl diya gaya hay ، aur dakhl () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey kiy dawrwn ko traiy main dakhl kya jata haay۔as kay bad tlash () ka tarykha "pyi" kay sath tarwn ki tlash kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، mmasal tarwn ki ayk saf ko waps karty hawiay۔ akhttam par ، ayk rydaks try mwsar strngh pryfks tlash aur bazayaft kay liye ayk mfyd dayta dahanchha haay۔kstm nfaza ya laibryry jesay kwshshwn ka astamal krkay ، dawylpr aasany sy py aych py main ayk rydaks try ko aasany sy tarwn ko dakhl karnay aur sabkha ki tlash kay tarykwn kay sath nafza krsktay hayn۔

Question: kesi py aych py klas ko nafza karain jo hadayt shuda wzan waly ghraf ki nmaindghy karty hain aur dajkstra kay alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey mkhtsar trien rastha tlash karnay kay tarykay fraham karty hayn۔
Answer: py aych py main akasy ayk aysa tarykha kar hay jo kesi prwghram ko rn taim kay wkt apnay dahanchay ka maainha aur trmym karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔yha ayk taaktwr khsawsayt hay jo klaswn ، ashyaa aur afaal ko mthark tawr par janchnay aur un main hayra phyry karnay kay liye astamal ki jaskty haay۔yhaan py aych py main akasy ko astamal karnay kay tarykay ki kuch msaalyn hayn: klaswn ka maainha krna: akasy klas klas ko klas ki khsawsayat ، tarykwn aur mstkl tawr par maainha karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔yhaan ayk msaal haay: py aych py klas maiklas {pblk $ praprty 1 ؛mhafwza $ praprty 2 ؛njy $ praprty 3 ؛awamy fnkshn ka tarykha 1 () {} mhafwza fnkshn tarykha 2 () {} njy fnkshn ka tarykha 3 () {}} $ ref akasy = nya akasy klas ('maiklas') ؛ $ praprtyza = $ akasy-> getProperties () ؛ $ tarykwn = $ akasy-> getMethods () ؛ $ constants = $ akasy-> getConstants () ؛ print_r ($ praprtyza) ؛ prnt_ aar ($ tarykay) ؛ prnt_ aar ($ msthakm) ؛ is msaal main ، maiklas klas kay liye ayk nya akasy klas aabjykt tshkyl diya gaya haay۔as kay bad klas kay baray main malwmat ko bazayaft karnay kay liye ghyt prwprtyza () ، ghyt mythwdas () ، aur ghytkwnstnts () kay tarykwn ka astamal kya jata haay۔yhaan ayk msaal haay: py aych py klas maiklas {pblk $ praprty 1 ؛mhafwza $ praprty 2 ؛njy $ praprty 3 ؛awamy fnkshn ka tarykha 1 () {} mhafwza fnkshn tarykha 2 () {} njy fnkshn ka tarykha 3 () {}} $ aabjykt = nya maiklas () ؛ $ akasy = nya akasy aabjykt ($ aabjykt) ؛ $ praprtyza = $ akasy-> getProperties ()؛ $ tarykay = $ akasy-> getMethods () ؛ print_r ($ praprtyza) ؛ prnt_ aar ($ tarykwn) ؛ is msaal main ، ayk nya maiklas aabjykt tshkyl diya gaya hay ، aur aabjykt kay liye ayk nya akas aabjykt aabjykt tshkyl diya gaya haay۔as kay bad getProperties () aur getMethods () tarykwn ka astamal aabjykt kay baray main malwmat ko bazayaft karnay kay liye kya jata haay۔yhaan ayk msaal haay: py aych py klas maiklas {pblk $ praprty 1 ؛mhafwza $ praprty 2 ؛njy $ praprty 3 ؛awamy fnkshn ka tarykha 1 () {} mhafwza fnkshn tarykha 2 () {} njy fnkshn tarykha 3 () {}} $ aabjykt = nya maiklas () ؛ $ akasy = nya akasy prwprty ('maiklas' ، 'praprty 1') ؛ $ akasy-> syt wylyw($ aabjykt ، 'niy kymt') ؛ aykw $ aabjykt-> praprty 1 ؛// aaؤt pt: niy wylywyn is msaal kay tawr par ، ayk nya maiklas aabjykt tshkyl diya gaya hay ، aur praprty 1 praprty kay liye ayk nya ryflykshn prwprty aabjykt tshkyl diya gaya haay۔as kay bad syt wylyw () ka tarykha praprty ki kymt ko "niy kdr" par syt karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ akhttam par ، akasy py aych py ki ayk taaktwr khsawsayt hay jo rn taim kay wkt kesi prwghram ko apnay dahanchay ka maainha aur trmym karnay ki ajazat dyty haay۔akasy klas ، ryflykshn aabjykt ، aur ryflykshn prwprty jesi klaswn ka astamal krkay ، dawylprza klaswn ، ashyaa aur afaal ko mthark tawr par janch saktay hain aur un main hayra phyry krsktay hayn۔akasy ka astamal aaly drjay ki khsawsayat jesay anhasaar anjykshn aur mthark tarykha ki drkhwast ko nafza karnay kay liye kya jaskta haay۔

Question: "py aych py main mhafwza kwdangh tarykwn kay asawlwn par tbadlha khyal karain ، jn main un pt ki twsayk ، dayta saaf karnay ، aur ays kyw ayl anjykshn aur kras sait askrptngh (ayks ays ays) hamlwn kay khlaf thafza shaml haay۔"
Answer: yahan ayk py aych py klas ka nfaza hay jo hadayt shuda wzan waly ghraf ki nmaindghy krta hay aur dayjkstra kay alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey mkhtsar trien rastha tlash karnay kay tarykay fraham krta haay: py aych py sy ayl aay ays sy ghraf {mhafwza $ amwdy ؛mhafwza $ knarwn ؛awamy fnkshn __ knstrkt () {$ this-> amwdy = srny () ؛$ yha-> knarwn = srny () ؛} awamy fnkshn aydawrtyks ($ wrtyks) {$ this-> amwdy [] = $ wrtyks ؛$ yha-> knarwn [$ wrtyks] = srny () ؛} awamy fnkshn aydaj ($ ، $ sy ، $ wzan) {$ this-> knarwn [$ say] [$ say] = $ wzan ؛} awamy fnkshn mkhtsar trien rastha ($ astart ، $ akhttam) {$ fasalwn = srny () ؛$ pchhla = srny () ؛$ ktaar = srny () ؛foreach ($ this-> amwdy as as vertex) {if ($ vertex == $ start) {$ fasalwn [$ vertex] = 0 ؛$ ktaar [$ wrtyks] = 0 ؛} else {$ fasalwn [$ vertex] = inf ؛$ ktaar [$ wrtyks] = anf ؛} $ pchhla [$ vertex] = null ؛} jabky (! khaly ($ ktaar)) {$ min = array_search (min ($ ktaar) ، $ ktaar) ؛aghr ($ min == $ akhttam) {bryk ؛} foreach ($ this-> knarwn [$ min] btawr $ prawsy => $ kdr) {$ alt = $ fasalwn [$ mnt] + $ wylyw ؛aghr ($ alt <$ dwry [$ prawsy]) {$ fasalwn [$ prawsy] = $ alt ؛$ pchhla [$ prawsy] = $ mnt ؛$ ktaar [$ prawsy] = $ ALT ؛}} unset ($ ktaar [$ mnt]) ؛} $ rastha = srny () ؛$ mwjwdha = $ akhttam ؛jbkha ($ mwjwdha! = null) {$ rastha [] = $ mwjwdha ؛$ mwjwdha = $ pchhla [$ mwjwdha] ؛} wapsy srny_rwrs ($ rastha) ؛} this is aml main ، ghraf klas ayk hadayt shuda wzan waly ghraf ki nmaindghy krta hay ، js main amwdy aur knarwn ko shaml karnay kay tarykwn kay sath ، aur dajkstra kay alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey do amwdy kay darmiyan mkhtsar trien rastha tlash kya jata haay۔aydawrtyks () ka tarykha ghraf main ayk chwty ko shaml karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، aydajda () ka tarykha ayk dyiay gaye wzan kay sath do amwdy kay darmiyan ayk knaray shaml karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، aur do amwdywn kay darmiyan mkhtsar trien rastha tlash karnay kay liye mkhtsar trien () tarykha astamal kya jata haay۔.yha ghraf klas ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: py aych py $ ghraf = nya ghraf () ؛ $ ghraf-> aydawrtyks ("aay") ؛ $ ghraf-> aydawrtyks ("by") ؛ $ ghraf-> aydawrtyks ("C ") ؛ $ ghraf-A "،" C "، 2) ؛ $ ghraf-> aydajda (" B "،" C "، 1) ؛ $ ghraf-> aydajda (" B "،" D "، 5) ؛ $ ghraf-> aydajda ("sy" ، "day" ، 8) ؛ $ ghraf-> aydajda ("sy" ، "ay" ، 10) ؛ $ ghraf-> aydajda ("day" ، "ay" ، 2) ؛ $ rastha = $ ghraf-> mkhtsar trien rastha ("A" ، "E") ؛ prnt_ aar ($ rastha) ؛// aaؤt pt: srny ([0] => a [1] => c [2] => b [3] => d [4] => e) is msaal main ، ayk nya ghraf aabjykt tyar kya gaya hay ، aur mtaddaydawrtyks () aur aydajda () tarykwn ka astamal karty hoey ghraf main amwdy aur knarwn ko shaml kya jata haay۔as kay bad mkhtsar trien rastha () tarykha astamal kya jata hay takha chwtywn ki nmaindghy karnay waly amwdy hasaay ki ayk saf ko waps karty hoey ، amwdy "A" aur "E" kay mabyn mkhtsar trien rastha tlash kya jaskay۔wzanmzakwrha bala ghraf klas jesay kstm par aml draamd ka astamal krkay ، dawylprza aasany sy py aych py main hadayt shuda wzan waly ghraf ko aasany sy nafza krsktay hain js main dayjkstra kay alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey do amwdy kay darmiyan mkhtsar trien rastha tlash karnay kay tarykwn kay sath۔

Question: kesi dhaghay kay talab ki nmaindghy karnay waly py aych py klas ko nafza karain aur mtwazay tawr par kamwn ko jma karnay aur is par aml draamd kay tarykay fraham kryn۔
Answer: py aych py kay dawylprza kay liye mhafwza kwdangh kay tarykwn ko bdnyty par mbny hamlwn ko rwknay aur hasas aadad wa shmar ki hafazat kay l essential zurwry haay۔yhaan py aych py main mhafwza kwdangh kay tarykwn kay kuch asawl hayn: kabhi bhi saarf kay un pt par bhrwsha nah kryn: py aych py kwda main zayada tr khtarat ayk aysay dawylpr ki wjha sy hawtay hain js nay saarf kay un pt par mnasb tawr par adm aatmad nahin kya۔ays kyw ayl anjykshn aur kras sait askrptngh (ayks ays ays) hamlwn ko rwknay kay liye saarf kay un pt ko hamyshha twsayk karain aur isy saaf kryn۔ py aych py wrzen ko bakaadghy sy ap dayt kryn: apnay py aych py wrzen ko tazaha trien rakhien is bat ka ykyn karnay kay liye keh aap kay pas tazaha trien sykywrty pych aur bgh fksza hayn۔ tyar krdha ays kyw ayl kay byanat:tyar krdha byanat ays kyw ayl kay swalat ko pyramytraiza karnay ka ayk tarykha hay ، jo ays kyw ayl anjykshn hamlwn ko rwknay main mdd fraham krskta haay۔ HTTPS astamal kryn: wyb ayply kyshnza kay liye HTTPS prwtwkwl astamal karain takha ghair aatmad shuda saitwn kay liye mhafwza aur khfyha krdha tarykwn ko kabl bnaiyn۔apnay wyb ayps ya wyb saitwn main ays ays ayl srtyfkyt anstal karna HTTPS ko nafza krta hay ، jo XSS hamlwn aur ankrpt ko bhyjay gaye aadad wa shmar sy bchata haay۔ blak lsts kay bjaiay ajazat namay ki fharst: blak lsts (blyk lsts) ki wzuahat karnay kay liye ajazat namha (sabkha wait lst) astamal kryn۔ajazat nahin haay.as sy ghair mtwka un pt ko karrwaiy sy rwknay main mdd mil sakti haay۔ saarf kay un pt ko byan kryn: aap kay py aych py kwda kay zaryaha is par karrwaiy karnay sy pehlay tamam saarf un pt ki twsayk ki jany chahaiay۔as main farm fyldaza ، yw aar ayl pyramytrza ، aur JSON pay lwda main dakhl krdha dayta shaml haay۔saarf kay un pt ki twsayk krkay ، aap ayks ays ays hamlwn aur dyghr aksam ki bdnyty par mbny un pt ko rwknay main mdd krsktay hayn۔ tazaha trien kwda anhasaar aur tesri party kay ajzaaa ka astamal kryn: apnay kwda par anhasaar aur tesri party kay ajzaaa ko tazaha trien rkhyntazaha trien sykywrty pych aur bgh fkss۔ apnay wyb srwr ko mhafwza kryn: aplwda daairyktrywn main py aych py main py aych py failwn par aml draamd ko rwknay sy ، kuch saarf namwn ko astamal karnay ، aur py aych py main py aych py failwn par aml draamd ko rwknay sy apnay wyb srwr ko mhafwza bnaiyn۔ py aych py main mhafwza kwdangh kay un asawlwn par aml kryn۔، dawylpr is bat ko ykyny bnasktay hain keh un ka kwda mhafwza aur bdnyty par mbny hamlwn sy mhafwza haay۔trky kay aaghaza sy sykywrty ko trjyha dena aur hafazaty akdamat ko bakaadghy sy ap dayt aur brkrar rkhna zurwry haay۔

Question: py aych py kay nam ki jghhawn kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur woh braay mnsawbwn main tnazaaat kay nam lenay aur un sy bchnay main kis tarah mdd karty hayn۔
Answer: kesi thryda pwl ki nmaindghy karnay waly py aych py klas ko nafza karnay aur mtwazay tawr par kamwn ko jma karnay aur is par aml draamd kay tarykay fraham karnay kay l we ، hum py aych py main pwl klas astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal kay nfaza haay: py aych py sy ayl aay ays thryda pwl {mhafwza $ pwl ؛awamy fnkshn __ knstrkt ($ saiza) {$ this-> pwl = nya pwl ($ saiza) ؛} awamy fnkshn jma krwaiyn ($ task ، $ aarghs) {$ this-> pwl-> jma krwaiyn (nya kam ($ task ، $ aarghs)) ؛} awamy fnkshn antzaar () {$ this-> pwl-> sht daaؤn () ؛class} klas task thrydada {mhafwza $ task main twsya krta haay۔mhafwza $ aarghs ؛awamy fnkshn __ knstrkt ($ task ، $ aarghs) {$ this-> task = $ task ؛$ yha-> aarghs = $ aarghs ؛} awamy fnkshn rn () {call_user_func_array ($ yha-> task ، $ yha-> aarghs) ؛} the is nfaza main ، thryda pwl klas ayk thryda pwl ki nmaindghy krty hay ، js main kam jma krwanay aur un kay mkml hony ka antzaar karnay kay tarykay hayn۔pwl klas ka astamal dhaghwn ko snbhalnay kay liye kya jata hay ، aur task klas kesi dhaghay main phansy denay waly ayk kam ki nmaindghy krta haay۔ thryda pwl klas ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: py aych py fynkshn maiy task ($ aargh 1 ، $ aargh 2) {// kuch kam krynyhaan} $ pwl = nya thryda pwl (4) ؛ $ pwl-> jma krwaiyn ('maiy task' ، srny ('aargh 1' ، 'aargh 2')) ؛ $ pwl-> jma krwaiyn ('maiy task' ، srny ('aargh 3' ، 'arg4 ')) ؛ $ pwl-> jma krwaiyn (' maiy task '، srny (' aargh 5 '،' aargh 6 ')) ؛ $ pwl-> jma krwaiyn (' maiy task '، srny (' aargh 7 '،' aargh 8 ')) ؛ $ ؛pwl-> antzaar () ؛ is msaal main ، ayk nya thryda pwl aabjykt 4 dhaghwn kay saiza kay sath tyar kya gaya haay۔as kay bad mtadd kamwn ko jma kranay () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey thryda pwl main pysh kya jata hay ، hr ayk fnkshn ka nam aur dlail ki ayk saf kay sath۔as kay bad antzaar () ka tarykha astamal kya jata hay takha tamam kamwn kay mkml hony ka antzaar kya jaskay۔ akhttam par ، ayk thryda pwl py aych py main mtwazay kamwn ko anjam denay kay liye ayk mfyd tknyk haay۔pwl klas aur kstm nfaza jesay thrydapwl klas ka astamal krkay ، dawylprza py aych py main thryda pwl ko aasany sy mtwazay tawr par kamwn ko jma karnay aur is par aml draamd kay tarykwn kay sath nafza krsktay hayn۔

Question: py aych py klas ko nafza karain jo traiy par mbny aatwmplyt sstm ki nmaindghy karty hain aur dyiay gaye sabkha ki bnyad par tkmyl tjwyza karnay kay tarykay fraham karty hayn۔
Answer: py aych py kay nam ki jghhayn ashyaa ، jesay klasza ، afaal ، antrfys aur mstkl mzaajy ka ayk tarykha hain ، takha tnazaaat ka nam lenay kay baghair ayk hi namwn ko dwbarha astamal kya jaskay۔nam ki jghhayn mtzuad taryfwn sy bchnay aur kwda bys main zayada lchk aur tnzaym ko mtaarf kranay kay liye astamal hawty hayn۔yhaan py aych py main nam ki jghhawn kay astamal kay kuch fwaid hayn: namwn kay tnazaaat sy prhayza kryn: nam ki jghhayn dawylprza ko namngh tnazaaat ki wjha sy baghair mkhtlf ashyaa kay liye ayk hi nam astamal karnay ki ajazat dyty hayn۔kwda aarghnaizayshn: nam ki jghhayn kwda ko mntaky ghrwhawn main trtyb denay ka ayk tarykha fraham krty hain ، js sy smjhnay aur brkrar rkhnay main aasany hawty haay۔ kwda dwbarha astamal ki salahayt: nam ki jghhayn dawylprza ko namngh tnazaaat ka sbb bnaiay baghair mkhtlf mnsawbwn main kwda ko dwbarha astamal karnay ki ajazat dyty hayn۔ksy bhi dusray kwda sy pehlay py aych py fail kay awpry hasaay main nam ki jghha ki wrda ka astamal karty hoey nam ki jghha۔yhaan ayk msaal yeh haay: py aych py ayn aay aym ays py aay sy ay aym aai aym ays aspys klas maiklas {// klas kwda yhaan} fnkshn maiy fynkshn () {// fnkshn kwda yhaan} is msaal main ، maiklas klas aur maiy fynkshn fnkshn ko maiyms aspys nam ki jghha main aalan kya gaya haay۔an ashyaa ko kesi aur fail main astamal karnay kay l the ، nam ki jghha ko astamal ki wrda ka astamal karty hoey draamd karna zurwry haay۔as ki ayk msaal yeh haay: py aych py ays ay aym nam ki jghha \ maiklas ؛ fnkshn maiy nam ki jghha \ maiy fynkshn ka astamal karain ؛ $ OBJ = nya MyClass () My Myfunction () ؛ is msaal main ، MyClass klas aur Myfunction fnkshn astamal klydy lfza ka astamal karty hoey MynameSpace nam ki jghha sy draamd kya jata haay۔as kay bad woh namwn kay tnazaaat ki wjha bnay baghair mwjwdha fail main astamal hawsktay hayn۔ akhttam par ، py aych py kay nam ki jghhayn ayk taaktwr khsawsayt hain jo dawylprza ko kwda ko mnzam karnay ، namwn kay tnazaaat sy bchnay aur kwda ki dwbarha astamal main azuafay ki ajazat dyty hayn۔nam ki jghhawn ka astamal krkay ، dawylprza mtalkha ashyaa ko ayk sath jwra saktay hain aur tnazaaat kay nam sy bch saktay hain ، js sy kwda ko smjhnay aur brkrar rkhnay main aasany hawty haay۔

Question: py aych py main syshn mynjmnt kay tsawr par tbadlha khyal karain aur syshnwn ko mhafwza bnanay aur syshn haaiy jykngh ko rwknay kay liye tknyk ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: try par mbny aatwmplyt sstm ayk dayta dahanchha hay jsay dyiay gaye sabkha ki bnyad par tkmyl tjwyza karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔yha nzaam ayk sha rkhy par mbny hay ، jo drkhtwn ki tarah ka dayta dahanchha hay jo tarwn ko anfrady krdarwn main twra kar aur drkhtwn ki tarah dahanchay main mhafwza krkay astwr krta haay۔yhaan ayk py aych py klas ka ayk msaal hay js main traiy par mbny aatwmplyt sstm ki nmaindghy hawty haay: py aych py sy ayl aay ays ays aatwkwmplyt {mhafwza $ try ؛awamy fnkshn __ knstrkt () {$ this-> trie = new trie () ؛} awamy fnkshn aydawrda ($ wrda) {$ this-> trie-> dakhl karain ($ lfza) ؛} awamy fnkshn tjwyza kmplyshn ($ sabkha) {$ ntaij = srny () ؛$ nwda = $ yha-> try-> srchnwda ($ sabkha) ؛aghr ($ nwda! = null) {$ this-> traverse ($ nwda ، $ sabkha ، $ ntaij) ؛} wapsy $ ntaij ؛} mhafwza fnkshn trawrs ($ nwda ، $ pryfks ، aur $ ntaij) {aghr ($ nwda-> isendofword ()) {$ ntaij [] = $ pryfks ؛} foreach ($ node-> getChildren () btawr $ key => $ bchha) {$ this-> traverse ($ child ، $ pryfks. $ klyd ، $ ntaij) ؛}} this is nfaza main ، aatwmplyt klas ayk sha rkhy par mbny aatwmplyt sstm ki nmaindghy krty hay ، js main alfaza shaml karnay aur dyiay gaye sabkha ki bnyad par tkmyl tjwyza karnay kay tarykay hayn۔try klas ko try dayta dahanchay ko nafza karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ yahan aatwmplyt klas ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: py aych py $ aatwkwmplyt = nya aatwkwmplyt () ؛ $ aatwkwmplyt-> aydawrda ("aypl") ؛ $ aatwkwmplyt-> aydawrda ("kylay ") ؛ $ aatwkwmplyt-> aydawrda (" awrnj ") ؛ $ aatwkwmplyt-> aydawrda (" aaraw ") ؛ $ khud kar= $ aatwmplyt-> tjwyza kmplyshn ("pyi") ؛ prnt_ aar ($ ntaij) ؛// aaؤt pt: srny ([0] => aaraw [1] => nashpatyan) is msaal main ، ayk nya aatwmkplyt aabjykt tshkyl diya gaya hay ، aur aydawrda () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey traiy main mtadd alfaza shaml krdyiay gaye hayn۔as kay bad tjwyza kmplyshnza () ka tarykha astamal "pyi" kay liye tkmyl tjwyza karnay kay liye kya jata hay ، mmasal alfaza ki ayk saf ko waps karty hawiay۔ akhttam par ، ayk try par mbny aatwmplyt sstm dyiay gaye sabkha ki bnyad par tkmyl ki tjwyza karnay kay liye ayk mfyd dayta dahanchha haay۔mzakwrha bala aatwwmplyt klas jesay kstm par aml draamd ka astamal krkay ، dawylprza py aych py main try par mbny aatwmplyt sstm ko aasany sy nafza krsktay hain js main alfaza shaml karnay aur dyiay gaye sabkha ki bnyad par tkmyl tjwyza karnay kay tarykwn kay sath۔

Question: "lnkda fharst ka astamal karty hoey kesi astyk ki nmaindghy karnay waly py aych py klas ko nafza karain aur psh ، pap aur jhanknay waly kamwn kay tarykay fraham kryn۔"
Answer: syshn mynjmnt py aych py main wyb ayplykyshn sykywrty ka ayk lazmi phalw haay۔syshn astamal knndha kay mkhsawsa aadad wa shmar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal kyay jatay hain ، jesay lagh un ki asnad ، shapngh kart kay mndrjat ، aur saarf ki trjyhaat۔syshnwn ko mhafwza bnanay aur syshn haaiy jykngh ki rwk tham kay liye yahan kuch tknykyn hayn: ayk mzubwta syshn ID astamal kryn: hamlwn ka andazaha lghanay sy bchnay kay liye kafy ayntrwpy kay sath ayk mzubwta syshn ID kymt ka astamal kryn۔OWASP dhwkha dhay ki shyt syshn IDs kay liye kam sy kam 64 bts antrwpy astamal karnay ki sfarsh krty haay۔ ryjynryt syshn ID: syshn fksngh hamlwn ko rwknay kay liye saarf lagh un karnay kay bad syshn ID ko dwbarha tkhlyk kryn۔nya syshn ID tyar karnay kay liye syshn_ryjynryt_ aai day () fnkshn ka astamal kryn۔apnay wyb ayps ya wyb saitwn main ays ays ayl srtyfkyt anstal karna HTTPS ko nafza krta hay ، jo syshn haaiy jykngh aur ankrpt bhyjay hoey dayta sy bchata haay۔ IP aydarys aur saarf ayjnt chyk kryn: syshn kay baray main malwmat kay khlaf IP aydarys aur saarf ayjnt ko syshn kay baray main zakhyrha karnay kay liye chyk kryn۔hamlayaghr IP aydarys ya saarf ayjnt mmasal nahin hay tou ، syshn ko khtm krdyn۔ syt syshn kwky kay akhtyarat: syshn haaiy jykngh hamlwn ko rwknay kay liye syshn kwky kay akhtyarat jesay sykywr ، HTTPonly ، aur SameSite syt kryn۔mhafwza aapshn is bat ko ykyny bnata hay keh kwky sirf HTTPS par bhyjy hogi hay ، HTTPonly aapshn klaint saiyda askrpts ko kwky tak rsaiy sy rwkta hay ، aur symyt aapshn kras sait ki drkhwast jalsazay (CSRF) hamlwn sy rwkta haay۔syshn haaiy jykngh hamlwn ko rwknay kay liye syshn۔syshn ko khtm krdyn agar aakhry rsaiy ayks ghhntwn sy zayada haay۔ akhttam par ، syshn mynjmnt py aych py main wyb ayplykyshn sykywrty ka ayk aham phalw haay۔mzakwrha bala tknykwn ka astamal krkay ، dawylpr syshn ko mhafwza bnasktay hain aur syshn haaiy jykngh hamlwn ko rwk saktay hayn۔trky kay aaghaza sy syshn sykywrty ko trjyha dena aur hafazaty akdamat ko bakaadghy sy ap dayt karnay aur brkrar rkhna zurwry haay۔

Question: "py aych py main kychngh ki hakmt amly kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain ، jesay mymwry kychngh ، fail kychngh ، ya rydas kay sath kychngh ، aur un kay pyshha aur mwafk par tbadlha khyal kryn۔"
Answer: lnkda lst ka astamal karty hoey kesi astyk ki nmaindghy karnay waly py aych py klas ko nafza karnay kay l we ، hum py aych py 1 main aspl astyk klas astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal aml haay: py aych py sy ayl aay ays ays astyk {mhafwza $ astyk ؛awamy fnkshn __ knstrkt () {$ this-> astyk = nya splstack () ؛} awamy fnkshn psh ($ aaitm) {$ yha-> astyk-> psh ($ aaitm) ؛} awamy fnkshn pap () {wapsy $ this-> astyk-> pap () ؛} awamy fnkshn jhanknay () {wapsy $ this-> astyk-> tap () ؛} the is nfaza main ، astyk klas ayk lnkda fharst ka astamal karty hoey ayk astyk ki nmaindghy krta hay ، js main psh ، pap ، aur jhanknay kay kamwn kay tarykwn kay sath۔aspl astyk klas ko mnslk fharst ko nafza karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ yahan astyk klas ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: py aych py $ astyk = nya astyk () ؛ $ astyk-> psh ("aaitm 1") ؛ $ astyk-> psh ("aaitm 2") ؛ $ astyk-> psh (" aaitm 3 ") ؛ aykw $ astyk-> pap () ؛// aaؤt pt: aaitm 3 ay sy aych aw $ astyk-> jhanknay () ؛// aaؤt pt: aaitm 2 un msaal kay tawr par ، ayk nya astyk aabjykt tyar kya jata hay ، aur psh () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey astyk main kiy aaitmza shaml krdyiay jatay hayn۔as kay bad pap () ka tarykha astyk sy awpry aaitm ko hatanay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، aur jhanknay wala () tarykha astamal kyay baghair awpry aaitm ko bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ aakhr main ، ayk astyk aakhry main aaitmza kay antzaam kay liye ayk mfyd dayta dahanchha haay۔-in ، pehla aaؤt (LIFO) aardar۔kstm nfaza ka astamal karty hoey jesay astyk klas upar dkhaya gaya hay ، dawylprza py aych py main lnkda fharst ka astamal karty hoey psh ، pap ، aur jhanknay kay tarykwn kay sath aasany sy astyk ko nafza krsktay hayn۔

Question: "ayk py aych py klas ko nafza karain jo dabl akhttamy ktaar (dayk) ki nmaindghy karty hain aur dono srwn sy andraj ، hazaf karnay aur trawrsl kay liye tarykay fraham karty hayn۔"
Answer: kychngh ayk aarzuy astwryj kay mkam par ksart sy haasal krdha dayta ko zakhyrha karnay ka ayk tarykha hay takha aadad wa shmar ko is kay asal astwryj kay mkam sy bazayaft karnay ki zurwrt hawty haay۔as sy kesi wyb sait ya ayply kyshn ki karkrdghy ko bohat bhatr bnaya jaskta hay ، kywnkha kyshay sy dayta tak rsaiy aam tawr par is kay makhza sy rsaiy sy kahain zayada tyza hawty haay۔py aych py main ، kychngh ki mtadd hakmt amlyyn hain jo karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye astamal ki jaskty hayn: un mymwry kychngh: un mymwry kychngh nay srwr ki mymwry main dayta astwr kya hay ، js ko ayply kyshn kay zaryaha jldy sy haasal kya jaskta haay۔as ksm ki kychngh ksart sy haasal krdha dayta ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye mfyd hay js ki ghnty karna mhangha hay ، jesay dayta bys kay swalat ya API rdaml۔taham ، un mymwry kychngh bohat zayada mymwry ka astamal krskty hay ، jo braay daytasyts kay liye ayk msilha hawskty haay۔as ksm ki kychngh ksart sy haasal krdha dayta ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye mfyd hay js ki ghnty karna mhangha hay ، jesay dayta bys kay swalat ya API rdaml۔taham ، fail kychngh bohat sari dask ki jghha astamal krskty hay ، jo braay daytasyts kay liye ayk msilha hawskta haay۔ rydays kay sath kychngh: rydays ayk mymwry main dayta dahanchha astwr hay jsay kyshay kay tawr par astamal kya jaskta haay۔rydays ksart sy rsaiy waly dayta ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye mfyd hay js ki ghnty karna mhangha hay ، jesay dayta bys kay swalat ya API rdaml۔rydays tyza aur mwsar hay ، aur braay daytasyts ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ yahan hr kychngh ki hakmt amly kay kuch pyshha aur mwafk hayn: mymwry main kychngh: pyshha: fast tak rsaiy kay awkat ، aksar rsaiy waly dayta kay liye mfyd haay۔mymwry ، jo braay daytasyts kay liye ayk msilha bn sakta haay۔ fail kychngh: pyshha: tyza rftar tak rsaiy kay awkat ، jo aksar rsaiy waly dayta kay liye mfyd hayn۔ kyns: dask ki bohat sy jghha astamal krsktay hain ، jo braay daytasyts kay liye ayk msilha hawskta haay۔: tyza aur mwsar ، aksar rsaiy waly dayta kay l useful karaamd۔kychngh ki hakmt amly jesay mymwry kychngh ، fail kychngh ، ya rydays kay sath kychngh ka astamal krkay ، dawylprza apni ayply kyshnza ki rftar aur karkrdghy ko bohat bhatr bna saktay hayn۔mkhsawsa astamal kay maamlay kay liye kychngh ki sahayha hakmt amly ka antkhab karna aur zayada sy zayada karkrdghy ko ykyny bnanay kay liye bakaadghy sy nghrany aur brkrar rkhna zurwry haay۔

Question: "py aych py frym wrk kay tsawr par tbadlha khyal karain ، jesay larywl ya symfwny ، aur tyza rftar trky ، kwda tnzaym ، aur askyl ayblty kay maamlay main un kay fwaid ki wzuahat kryn۔"
Answer: py aych py klas ko nafza karnay kay l double dabl aynda ktaar (day ay kyw) ki nmaindghy karnay kay l we ، hum py aych py 12 main aspldawbly lnkda lst klas astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal kay nfaza haay: py aych py sy ayl aay ays day dayk {mhafwza $ dayk ؛awamy fnkshn __ knstrkt () {$ this-> deque = new spldoublylinkedlist () ؛} awamy fnkshn psh frnt ($ aaitm) {$ this-> deque-> unshift ($ aaitm) ؛} awamy fnkshn psh byk ($ aaitm) {$ this-> deque-> psh ($ aaitm) ؛} awamy fnkshn pap frnt () {wapsy $ this-> deque-> shft () ؛} awamy fnkshn pap byk () {wapsy $ this-> deque-> pap () ؛} awamy fnkshn trawrs () {$ this-> deque-> rewind () ؛jbkha ($ this-> deque-> drst ()) {ghwnj $ this-> deque-> mwjwdha ()۔"\ n" ؛$ this-> deque-> aghla () ؛}} this is nfaza main ، dayk klas ayk dwhary ktaar ki nmaindghy krty hay ، js main dakhl karnay ، hazaf karnay aur dono srwn sy trawrsl kay tarykwn kay sath۔spldoublylinkedList klas lnkda lst ko nafza karnay kay liye astamal ki jati haay۔ dayk klas ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: py aych py $ dayk = nya dayk () ؛ $ dayk-> psh frnt ("aaitm 1") ؛ $ dayk-> psh byk ("aaitm 2") ؛ $ deque-> psh frnt (" aaitm 3 ") ؛ $ deque-> psh byk (" aaitm 4 ") ؛ aykw $ dayk-> pap frnt ()۔"\ n" ؛// aaؤt pt: aaitm 3 ay sy aych aw $ dayk-> pap byk ()۔"\ n" ؛// aaؤt pt: aaitm 4 $ deque-> traverse () ؛// aaؤt pt: aaitm 1 \ NITEM2 \ n is msaal kay tawr par ، ayk nya dayk aabjykt tyar kya jata hay ، aur psh frnt () aur psh byk () tarykwn ka astamal karty hoey mtadd ashyaa ko dayk main shaml kya jata haay۔as kay bad pap frnt () aur pap byk () tarykwn ka astamal dayk sy ashyaa ko hatanay kay liye kya jata hay ، aur trawrs () tarykha astamal kya jata haay۔ktaar jesay andaza main aaitmza dono srwn sy ashyaa ko shaml karnay aur isy hatanay ki salahayt kay sath۔mzakwrha bala dayk klas jesay kstm par aml draamd ka astamal krkay ، dawylpr aasany sy py aych py main lnkda fharst ka astamal karty hoey dabl aynda ktaar ko aasany sy nafza krsktay hain js main dakhl ، hazaf karnay aur dono srwn sy trawrsl kay tarykwn kay sath۔

Question: kesi py aych py klas ko nafza karain jo hadayt shuda aysaiklk wrda ghraf (day aay dablyw jy) ki nmaindghy karty hain aur mwsar alfaza ki tlash aur azuafay kay liye tarykay fraham karty hayn۔
Answer: py aych py kay frym wrk pehlay sy tamyr shuda laibryrywn aur awzaar hain jo wyb ayply kyshnza ko tyar karnay ka ayk mayary tarykha fraham karty hayn۔wha dwbarha kabl astamal ajzaaa ka ayk syt pysh karty hain jo trkyaty aml ko tyza karnay aur kwda ki mkdar ko kam karnay kay liye astamal hawsktay hain js ko shrwa sy lkhnay ki zurwrt haay۔yhaan py aych py kay frym wrk kay astamal kay kuch fwaid hayn: rypda dawylpmnt: py aych py frym wrk mtadd kamwn ko khwdkar krta hay ، jesay twsayk ، syshn mynjmnt ، kychngh ، aur yw aar ayl mypngh ، jo trkyaty aml ko tyza krta hay aur dawylprza ko wkt par mnsawbwn ko mkml karnay kay kabl bnata haay۔frym wrk kwda ko mnzam karnay ka ayk mayary tarykha fraham karty hain ، js ki wjha sy smjhnay aur brkrar rkhnay main aasany hawty haay۔wha aksar madal wyw-kntrwlr (aym wy sy) fn tamyr ka astamal karty hain ، jo ayply kyshn ki mntak ko pryzantyshn prt sy alag krta haay۔ askylyblty: py aych py frym wrk ko twsya pzayr hony kay liye dayzaain kya gaya hay ، js ka mtalb hay keh woh bray mkdar main tryfk aur dayta ko snbhal saktay hayn۔an main aksar karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye kychngh ، bwjh main twazan ، aur dayta bys shardangh jesi khsawsayat shaml hawty hayn۔ sykywrty: py aych py frym wrk main aksar un pt ki twsayk ، khfyha kary ، aur ays kyw ayl anjykshn aur kras sait askrptngh (ayks ays ays) hamlwn kay khlaf thafza jesi hafazaty khsawsayat shaml hawty hayn۔wha mhafwza kwdangh kay liye bhatryn tarykwn par bhi aml karty hain ، jo khtarat ko rwknay main mdd krta haay۔ py aych py kay mtadd frym wrk dstyab hain ، jn main larywl ، symfwny ، kwdaghnytr ، kyk py aych py aur zaynda shaml hayn۔har frym wrk ki apni apni taakt aur kmzawry hawty hay ، aur dawylprza ko un ki zurwryat ka antkhab karna chahaiay jo un ki zurwryat ko bhatryn tawr par ft bythta haay۔ akhttam par ، py aych py frym wrk wyb ayply kyshn dawylpmnt kay l several kiy fwaid pysh karty hain ، js main rypda dawylpmnt ، kwda tnzaym ، askyl ayblty aur sykywrty shaml hayn۔py aych py kay frym wrk ka astamal krkay ، dawylprza trkyaty aml ko tyza krsktay hain ، kwda ki mkdar ko kam krsktay hain js ko shrwa sy lkhnay ki zurwrt hay ، aur un kay kwda kay mjmway mayar ko bhatr bnaya jaskta haay۔

Question: py aych py main sst lwdangh kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur yeh keh jab zurwrt pranay par wsail ko lwda krkay ayply kyshnza ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnaya jaskay۔
Answer: kesi py aych py klas ko nafza karnay kay liye jo hadayt shuda aysaiklk wrda ghraf (day aay dablyw jy) ki nmaindghy karty hain aur mwsar alfaza ki tlash aur azuafay kay tarykay fraham karty hain ، hum day aay dablyw jy dayta dahanchha 12345 astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal aml haay: py aych py sy ayl aay ays day dawghnwda {pblk $ ayjza = srny () ؛pblk $ hatmy = ghalat ؛} klas daagh {mhafwza $ jra ؛awamy fnkshn __ knstrkt () {$ this-> rwt = nya daaghnwda () ؛} awamy fnkshn dakhl karain ($ lfza) {$ nwda = $ yha-> jra ؛$ lyn = strlen ($ lfza) ؛($ i = 0 ؛ $ i <$ lyn ؛ $ i ++) {$ char = $ wrda [$ i] ؛aghr (! isset ($ nwda-> knarwn [$ char])) {$ nwda-> knarwn [$ char] = nya daawghnwda () ؛} $ nwda = $ nwda-> knarwn [$ char] ؛} $ nwda-> hatmy = sch ؛} awamy tkryb main ($ wrda) {$ nwda = $ yha-> jra par mushtamil haay۔$ lyn = strlen ($ lfza) ؛($ i = 0 ؛ $ i <$ lyn ؛ $ i ++) {$ char = $ wrda [$ i] ؛if (! isset ($ nwda-> knarwn [$ char])) {ghlta lwtaiyn ؛} $ nwda = $ nwda-> knarwn [$ char] ؛} wapsy $ nwda-> fainl ؛} the is nfaza main ، dawghnwda klas day aay dablyw jy main ayk nwda ki nmaindghy krty hay ، js main dusray nwdas aur ayk jhndaa hawta hay js sy yeh zaahar hawta hay keh aya nwda kesi lfza kay akhttam ki nmaindghy krta hay ya nhayn۔day aay dablyw jy klas day aay dablyw jy dayta dahanchay ki nmaindghy krty hay ، alfaza dakhl karnay kay tarykwn kay sath aur yeh janch pratal karnay kay tarykwn kay sath keh aya koi lfza day aay dablyw jy main mwjwd haay۔ day aay dablyw jy klas ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: py aych py $ daagh = nyw daagh () ؛ $ daagh-> dakhl kryn۔("aypl") ؛ $ daagh-> dakhl karain ("kylay") ؛ $ daagh-> dakhl karain ("awrnj") ؛ $ daagh-> dakhl karain ("aaraw") ؛ $ daagh-> dakhl karain ("nashpatyan") ؛$ dawg-> dakhl karain ("plum") ؛ aykw $ dawg-> par mushtamil hay ("aaraw")۔"\ n" ؛// aaؤt pt: 1echo $ dawg-> par mushtamil hay ("anghwr")۔"\ n" ؛// aaؤt pt: 0 is msaal kay tawr par ، ayk nya DAWG aabjykt tyar kya gaya hay ، aur dakhl () tarykha astamal krkay DAWG main kiy alfaza shaml krdyiay gaye hayn۔as kay bad () ka tarykha yeh chyk karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay keh aya "aaraw" aur "anghwr" kay alfaza DAWG.in akhttam par mwjwd hain ، ayk hadayt shuda aykaiklk wrda ghraf (DAWG) mwsar alfaza ki tlash aur azuafay kay liye ayk mfyd dayta dahanchha haay۔mzakwrha bala DAWG klas jesay kstm nfaza ka astamal krkay ، dawylprza py aych py main ayk DAWG ko aasany sy alfaza dakhl karnay kay tarykwn kay sath nafza krsktay hain aur janch pratal karty hain keh aya DAWG main koi lfza mwjwd hay ya nhayn۔

Question: "bainry hayp ka astamal karty hoey trjyhay ktaar ki nmaindghy karnay wali py aych py klas ko nafza karain aur aaly trjyhay ansar ki andraj ، hazaf karnay aur bazayaft kay tarykay fraham kryn۔"
Answer: sst lwdangh ayk aysy tknyk hay jo py aych py main astamal ki jati hay takha sirf zurwrt pranay par wsail ko lwda krkay ayply kyshnza ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnaya jaskay۔yha tknyk mfyd hay jab bray mkdar main dayta ya wsail sy nmtnay kay liye jn ki fwry zurwrt nahin hawty hay ، jesay tsaawyr ، wydaywza ، ya dayta bys kay swalat۔yhaan py aych py main sst lwdangh kay astamal kay kuch fwaid hayn: tyza rftar safhaha bwjh kay awkat: wsail ko lwda karnay sy sirf jab zurwrt ho tou ، sst lwdangh main kesi safhaay ko lwda karnay kay liye wkt ko nmayan tawr par kam kya jaskta hay ، khasa tawr par braay pymanay par dayta ya wsail waly safhaat kay liay۔srwr bwjh: jab zurwrt ho tou wsail ko lwda karnay sy ، sst lwdangh srwr par bwjh ko kam krskty hay ، jo ayply kyshn ki mjmway karkrdghy ko bhatr bna sakti haay۔ saarf kay tjrbay ko bhatr bna sakta haay: jab zurwrt ho tou wsail ko lwda krkay ، sst lwdangh saarf kay tjrbay ko kam krkay bhatr bna sakti haay۔ksy safhaay ko lwda karnay aur ayply kyshn ki rdaml ko bhatr bnanay main kitna wkt lghta haay۔ py aych py main sst lwdangh ko nafza karnay kay mtadd tarykay hain ، js main sst lwdangh dayzaain pytrn ka astamal ، py aych py aur jawa askrpt ka astamal karty hoey sst lwdangh amyjza ka astamal karna ، aur sst astamal karna bhi shaml haay۔praksy aabjykt lwda ho raha haay۔sst lwdangh dayzaain ka nmwnha ayk saft wyir dayzaain ka nmwnha hay jahan kesi shay ki abtda isi wkt hawty hay jab is ki zurwrt hawty hay aur is sy pehlay nahin keh astamal ki sadghy ko brkrar rkhnay aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liay۔py aych py aur jawa askrpt ka astamal karty hoey sst lwdangh tsaawyr ayk aysy tknyk hay jo tsaawyr ko sirf is wkt lwda krty hay jab woh wyw pwrt main dkhaiy dyty hain ، jo 23 ko lwda karnay main kesi safhaay kay l takes wkt ko nmayan tawr par kam krskty haay۔jb ghlwbl aabjykt 4 kay sath kam karty wkt lagh un aur mymwry ki bcht kay liye myrasay kwda kay sath kam karnay ki kwshsh karty ho tou sst lwdangh praksy aabjykt ka astamal mfyd haay۔sst lwdangh ka astamal krkay ، dawylprza safhaay kay bwjh kay awkat ko nmayan tawr par kam krsktay hain ، srwr ka bwjh kam krsktay hain ، aur saarf kay tjrbay ko bhatr bna saktay hayn۔mkhsawsa astamal kay maamlay kay liye sahayha sst lwdangh tknyk ka antkhab karna aur zayada sy zayada karkrdghy ko ykyny bnanay kay liye bakaadghy sy nghrany aur brkrar rkhna zurwry haay۔

Question: py aych py ki bndsh kay tsawr par tbadlha khyal karain aur aas pas kay dairha kar sy mtghyr tak rsaiy kay sath ghmnam afaal pyda karnay main un kay astamal ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: bainry hayp ka astamal karty hoey trjyhay ktaar ki nmaindghy karnay wali py aych py klas ko nafza karnay kay l we ، hum py aych py 1 main asplpaiyryty kyw klas astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal aml haay: py aych py sy ayl aay ays ki trjyhay kywiw {mhafwza $ ktaar ؛awamy fnkshn __ knstrkt () {$ this-> ktaar = nya splpriorityqueue () ؛} awamy fnkshn dakhl karain ($ aaitm ، $ trjyha) {$ this-> ktaar-> dakhl karain ($ aaitm ، $ trjyha) ؛} awamy fnkshn hazaf karain () {$ this-> ktaar-> nchwra () ؛} awamy fnkshn jhanknay () {wapsy $ this-> ktaar-> tap () ؛} the is nfaza main ، trjyhay tabkaty tabkha bainry hayp ka astamal karty hoey trjyhay ktaar ki nmaindghy krta hay ، js main dakhl ، hazaf karnay aur aaly trjyhay ansar ki bazayaft kay tarykwn kay sath۔bainry hayp ko nafza karnay kay liye splpriorityqueue klas ka astamal kya jata haay۔ yahan trjyhay kwkyw klas ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: py aych py $ ktaar = niy trjyhay kywi () ؛ $ ktaar-> dakhl karain ("aaitm 1" ، 3) ؛ $ ktaar-> dakhl karain (dakhl kryn۔"aaitm 2" ، 1) ؛ $ ktaar-> dakhl karain ("aaitm 3" ، 2) ؛ aykw $ ktaar-> jhanknay ()۔"\ n" ؛// aaؤt pt: aaitm 2 $ ktaar-> hazaf () ؛ aykw $ ktaar-> jhanknay ()۔"\ n" ؛// aaؤt pt: aaitm 3 main yeh msaal kay tawr par ، ayk niy trjyha kywiyw aabjykt tyar ki hogi hay ، aur un ki mtalkha trjyhaat kay sath dakhl () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey ktaar main kiy ashyaa shaml ki jati hayn۔as kay bad jhanknay waly () ka tarykha astamal kyay baghair aaly trjyhay ansar ko bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، aur hazaf () ka tarykha ktaar sy aaly trjyhay ansar ko door karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ akhttam par ، trjyhay ktaar ashyaa ko snbhalnay kay liye ayk mfyd dayta dahanchha haay۔ktaar jesay andaza main un ki trjyha ki bnyad par ashyaa ko trjyha denay ki salahayt kay sath۔mzakwrha bala trjyhay tabkaty tabkay jesay kstm nfaza ka astamal krkay ، dawylprza aasany sy py aych py main bainry hayp ka astamal karty hoey trjyhay ktaar ko aasany sy nafza krsktay hain ، js main azuafay ، hazaf karnay aur aaly trjyhay ansar ki bazayaft kay tarykwn kay sath۔

Question: "ayk aay wy ayl drkht ki nmaindghy karnay waly py aych py klas ko nafza karain aur mtwazan awnchaiy kay sath andraj ، hazaf karnay ، aur tlash karnay kay tarykay fraham kryn۔"
Answer: py aych py klas ko nafza karnay kay l an ، aay wy ayl kay drkht ki nmaindghy karnay kay l atture ، andraj ، hazaf karnay ، aur mtwazan awnchaiy kay sath tlash karnay kay tarykwn kay sath ، hum nechay dyiay gaye akdamat ki pyrwy krsktay hayn: AVLTERE namy klas ki wzuahat kryn۔ AVL drkht ki jra nwda ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye ayk njy praprty ki wzuahat kryn۔. nwda ki awnchaiy ka hasab lghanay kay liye ghythait namy ayk njy tarykha ki wzuahat kryn۔ nwda kay bylns ansar ka hasab lghanay kay liye ghyt bylns fyktr kay nam sy ayk njy tarykha ki wzuahat kryn۔ nwda par baien ghrdsh ko anjam denay kay liye rwtylyt namy ayk njy tarykha ki wzuahat kryn۔ ayk njy tarykha namzad kryn۔nwda par sahayha ghrdsh karnay kay liye rwtyrait۔ ayk njy tarykha ki wzuahat karain js ka nam ayk dakhlha ya hazaf karnay kay bad aay wy ayl kay drkht ko twazan kay liye twazan ka nam diya jaiay۔ AVL drkht main ayk nya nwda dakhl karnay kay liye dakhl karnay kay liye ayk awamy tarykha ki wzuahat kryn۔ hazaf namy ayk awamy tarykha ki wzuahat kryn۔aay wy ayl try sy nwda ko hazaf karnay kay liay۔ aay wy ayl try main nwda ki tlash kay l search tlash kay nam sy ayk awamy tarykha ki wzuahat kryn۔ un tarykwn ko nafza karnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl wsail ka hawalha dy saktay hayn: 1 waldyn nwda pwaintrza aur tarykwn kay sath aay wy ayl kay drkhtwn ki wzuahat ki wzuahat kryn۔dakhl karnay ، hazaf karnay ، aur tlash kay ljawa ki karrwaiywn aur pychydghywn ki msaalwn kay sath ۔5 bainry srch drkhtwn aur aay wy ayl drkhtwn kay mabyn khud twazan aur ghrdsh ki msaalwn kay sath mwazanha pysh kya jata haay۔ hum un wsail ko py aych py klas ko laghw karnay kay tarykwn kay sath py aych py klas ko nafza karnay kay liye ayk hawalha kay tawr par astamal krsktay hain ، hazaf karnay kay tarykwn kay sath، aur mtwazan awnchaiy kay sath tlash krna۔

Question: py aych py main aalmghyryt (I18N) aur lwklaizayshn (L10N) kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur ksayr lsany ayply kyshnza ki tamyr kay liye tknyk par tbadlha khyal kryn۔
Answer: py aych py klas ko nafza karnay kay l an ، aay wy ayl kay drkht ki nmaindghy karnay kay l atture ، andraj ، hazaf karnay ، aur mtwazan awnchaiy kay sath tlash karnay kay tarykwn kay sath ، hum nechay dyiay gaye akdamat ki pyrwy krsktay hayn: AVLTERE namy klas ki wzuahat kryn۔ AVL drkht ki jra nwda ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye ayk njy praprty ki wzuahat kryn۔. nwda ki awnchaiy ka hasab lghanay kay liye ghythait namy ayk njy tarykha ki wzuahat kryn۔ nwda kay bylns ansar ka hasab lghanay kay liye ghyt bylns fyktr kay nam sy ayk njy tarykha ki wzuahat kryn۔ nwda par baien ghrdsh ko anjam denay kay liye rwtylyt namy ayk njy tarykha ki wzuahat kryn۔ ayk njy tarykha namzad kryn۔nwda par sahayha ghrdsh karnay kay liye rwtyrait۔ ayk njy tarykha ki wzuahat karain js ka nam ayk dakhlha ya hazaf karnay kay bad aay wy ayl kay drkht ko twazan kay liye twazan ka nam diya jaiay۔ AVL drkht main ayk nya nwda dakhl karnay kay liye dakhl karnay kay liye ayk awamy tarykha ki wzuahat kryn۔ hazaf namy ayk awamy tarykha ki wzuahat kryn۔aay wy ayl try sy nwda ko hazaf karnay kay liay۔ aay wy ayl try main nwda ki tlash kay l search tlash kay nam sy ayk awamy tarykha ki wzuahat kryn۔ un tarykwn ko nafza karnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl wsail ka hawalha dy saktay hayn: 1 waldyn nwda pwaintrza aur tarykwn kay sath aay wy ayl kay drkhtwn ki wzuahat ki wzuahat kryn۔dakhl karnay ، hazaf karnay ، aur tlash kay ljawa ki karrwaiywn aur pychydghywn ki msaalwn kay sath ۔5 bainry srch drkhtwn aur aay wy ayl drkhtwn kay mabyn khud twazan aur ghrdsh ki msaalwn kay sath mwazanha pysh kya jata haay۔ hum un wsail ko py aych py klas ko laghw karnay kay tarykwn kay sath py aych py klas ko nafza karnay kay liye ayk hawalha kay tawr par astamal krsktay hain ، hazaf karnay kay tarykwn kay sath، aur mtwazan awnchaiy kay sath tlash krna۔

Question: "km sy kam aur zayada sy zayada anasar ko dakhl karnay ، hazaf karnay aur bazayaft karnay kay tarykay fraham karnay waly py aych py klas ko nafza karnay waly ayk py aych py klas ko nafza karain aur dakhl ، hazaf karnay aur bazayaft kay tarykay fraham kryn۔"
Answer: antrnyshnlaizayshn (I18N) saft wyir ayply kyshnza ko dayzaain aur tyar karnay ka aml hay jsay makhza kwda main tbdyly ki zurwrt kay baghair mkhtlf zabanwn ، khtawn aur sakaftwn kay mtaabk dahal liya jaskta haay۔lwklaizayshn (L10N) kesi khasa jghha par kesi drkhwast kay mwad ko dahalnay ka aml hay ، bshmwl zaban ، krnsy ، tarykh aur wkt ki shklyn ، aur dyghr sakafty knwnshnza۔ py aych py main ، ksayr lsany ayply kyshnza ki tamyr kay liye mtadd tknykyn hain ، bshmwl py aych py ka astamalsrny aur wzuahat byan: is tarykha kar main zaban ki failyn bnana shaml hay js main klydy kdr kay jwraay ki safyn shaml hain ، jahan chabyan asal mtn kay tarwn hain aur akdar trjmha shuda mtn kay tar hayn۔byan krdha byan kay tarykha kar main hr trjmha shuda tar kay liye mstkl tawr par byan karna shaml haay۔ghyt tykst tarykha main .PO aur .MO failyn shaml karna shaml hain jn main trjmha shuda tykst dawr shaml hayn۔ py aych py lwklaizayshn laibryry ka astamal karty hawiay: py aych py lwklaizayshn ki mtadd laibryryan dstyab hain ، jesay symfwny trjmay kay ajzaaa ، larywl lwklaizayshn ، aur YII I18N۔yha laibryryan py aych py ayply kyshnza main trjmay aur lwklaizayshn kay antzaam kay l functions afaal aur klaswn ka ayk syt fraham krty hayn۔ mwad kay antzaam kay nzaam (CMS) ka astamal karty hawiay: bohat sy sy aym ays plyt farm ، jesay wrdaprys aur darwpl ، ksayr lsany mwad kay liye blt un spwrt fraham karty hayn۔yha plyt farm dawylprza ko saarf dwst antrfys kay zaryaha mwad kay trjmay bnanay aur un ka nzam karnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔lwklaizayshn ki tknyk ka antkhab karty wkt astamal main aasany ، askyl ayblty aur dykh bhal jesay awaml par ghwr karna zurwry haay۔

Question: py aych py main ghltay sy nmtnay aur lagh un karnay kay tsawr par tbadlha khyal karain aur yeh btaiyn keh mkhtlf ksm ki ghltaywn aur mstsanyat ko snbhalnay aur lagh un karnay ka tarykha۔
Answer: kam sy kam aur zayada sy zayada anasar kay andraj ، hazaf karnay ، aur bazayaft kay tarykwn kay sath ayk kam myks dahyr ki nmaindghy karnay waly py aych py klas ko nafza karnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl akdamat ka astamal krsktay hayn: mnymak hayp namy klas ki wzuahat kryn۔mn myks hayp kay anasar۔ dahyr ki zayada sy zayada praprty ko brkrar rkhnay kay liye myks haaipaiy namy ayk njy tarykha ki wzuahat kryn۔ ghyt pyrynt andayks namy ayk njy tarykha ki wzuahat kryn۔ksy dyiay gaye nwda kay pyrnt nwda ka andayks۔ ghyt mynchlda andayks namy ayk njy tarykha ki wzuahat karain takha bchay nwda ka andayks kesi dyiay gaye nwda ki kam sy kam kymt kay sath haasal kya jaskay۔ ghyt mykschlda andayks namy ayk njy tarykha ki wzuahat karain takha bchay kay nwda ka andayks haasal kya jaskay۔dyiay gaye nwda ki zayada sy zayada kymt۔ dahyr main do nwdas ki akdar ko tbdyl karnay kay liye tbdyl shuda ayk njy tarykha ki wzuahat kryn۔ ayk awamy tarykha ki wzuahat karain js ka nam dakhl kya gaya hay js main ayk nya ansar ko kam sy zayada hayp main dakhl kryn۔mn myks hayp sy kam sy kam ansar۔ mn myks hayp sy zayada sy zayada ansar ko hazaf karnay kay liye daylytymyks namy ayk awamy tarykha ki wzuahat kryn۔ kam sy kam ansar ko mn myks hayp sy kam sy kam ansar ki bazayaft karnay kay liye ayk awamy tarykha ki wzuahat kryn۔ ayk awamy tarykha ki wzuahat kryn۔an tarykwn ko nafza karnay kay liye kam sy zayada ansar ko kam sy zayada ansar ki bazayaft karnay kay liye ghyt myks ka nam diya gaya haay۔awr zayada sy zayada anasar ۔2 py aych py main dahyrwn ki wzuahat myny ay aay py ، myksyp ، aur trjyhay ktaar ki msaal kay sath ays py ayl laibryry ka astamal karty hawiay۔aapryshnza aur pychydghy ki msaalwn kay sath mn myks kay dahyr۔

Question: "ghnty kay sath blwm fltr ki nmaindghy karnay waly py aych py klas ko nafza karain aur anasar ko shaml karnay ، mmbrshp ki janch pratal ، aur kardaynlty ka tkhmynha lghanay kay tarykay fraham kryn۔"
Answer: ghltay sy nmtnay aur laghngh py aych py ki trky kay aham phalw hain kywnkha woh dawylprza ko un ki drkhwastwn main msail ki nshandhay karnay aur hal karnay main mdd karty hayn۔ghltay sy nmtnay main py aych py kwda par aml draamd kay doran rwnma hony wali ghltaywn aur mstsanyat ka ptha lghana aur is ka jwab dena shaml haay۔laghngh main ghltay kay pyghamat aur dyghr mtalkha malwmat ko bad main tjzayha kay liye lagh fail ya dayta bys main rykarda karna shaml haay۔ py aych py main mkhtlf ksm ki ghltaywn aur astsanaa ko snbhalnay aur lagh un karnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl tknykwn ka astamal krsktay hayn: kwshsh kych blaks: hum kwshsh kych astamal krsktay hayn۔py aych py kwda par aml draamd kay doran raayt ko pkranay aur snbhalnay kay liye blaks۔aazamaishy blak main kwda hawta hay jo ayk astsanaa phynk sakta hay ، aur kych blak main woh kwda hawta hay jo astsanaa ko snbhalta haay۔ham kwda ko amly jamha phananay kay liye aakhr main blak ka astamal bhi krsktay hain jo hamyshha chlna chahaiay ، ktaa nzar is sy ktaa nzar keh koi astsanaa phynk diya gaya tha ya nhayn۔ham laghngh laibryry jesay mwnwwlwj laibryry ka astamal karty hoey astsanaay pygham aur dyghr mtalkha malwmat ko lagh un krsktay hayn۔ham rn taim par ghltay ki atalaa dhandghy ki staha ko taay karnay kay liye INI_SET () fnkshn ka astamal bhi krsktay hayn۔ham laghngh laibryry jesay mwnwwlwj daat aykspyns hayndalngh ka astamal karty hoey ghltay kay pyghamat ko lagh un krsktay hayn: hum kstm astsanaa pyda karnay kay liye blt main py aych py astsanaa klas ka astamal krsktay hain jo hamari drkhwast main mkhsawsa ghltay ki sawrthaal ki nmaindghy karty hayn۔ham un astsanaa ko tr kych blaks ka astamal karty hoey pkra saktay hain aur laghngh laibryry jesay mwnwwlwj laibryrywn ka astamal karty hoey lagh un krsktay hayn۔dayta bysyha laibryryan lagh un ko snbhalnay aur lagh anza ki tshkyl kay l functions afaal aur klaswn ka ayk syt mhaya krty hayn۔ khlasaha ، ghltay sy nmtnay aur laghngh py aych py ki nshwwnma kay l essential zurwry hain ، aur dawylprza ko apni ayply kyshnza main mkhtlf ksm ki ghltaywn aur astsanaa ko snbhalnay aur lagh un karnay kay liye mnasb tknyk ka astamal karna chahaiay۔aysa karnay sy ، woh apnay ayply kyshnza kay mjmway mayar aur wshwsnyyta ko bhatr bnatay hoey ، maamlat ko jld aur mwsar andaza main shnakht aur hal krsktay hayn۔

Question: py aych py ki khsawsayat kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur un ko mtadd klaswn main dwbarha kabl astamal kwda fraham karnay kay liye kis tarah astamal kya jaskta haay۔
Answer: ghnty kay sath blwm fltr ki nmaindghy karnay waly py aych py klas ko nafza karnay aur anasar ko shaml karnay ، mmbrshp ki janch pratal ، aur kardanlty ka tkhmynha lghanay kay tarykay fraham karnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl akdamat astamal krsktay hayn: blwmfltr namy klas ki wzuahat kryn۔blwm fltr۔ ayk njy praprty ki wzuahat karain js main haysh fnkshn ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye haysh fnkshn ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔blwm fltr main shaml krdha anasar ky۔ kesi khasa haysh fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey dyiay gaye ansar kay liye haysh wylyw pyda karnay kay liye haysh namy ayk njy tarykha ki wzuahat kryn۔ namzad ayk awamy tarykha ki wzuahat karain keh blwm fltr main ansar shaml karnay kay liye shaml krynansar ki haysh akdar۔ namzad ayk awamy tarykha kar ki wzuahat karain keh aya ansar blwm fltr ka mmbr hay ya nahin janch kar kay keh aya ansar ki haysh akdar sy wabstha tamam bts mrtb kyay gaye hayn۔blwm fltr main shaml anasar ki tadad bt srny main bts ki kal tadad main syt bts kay tnasb ka hasab lghatay hawiay۔ un tarykwn ko nafza karnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl wsail ka hawalha dy saktay hayn: 1 kay zaryaha blwm fltrza ki wzuahat kay sath ayk azaghr kay nfaza kay sath blwm fltrza ki wzuahatayk bnyady blwm fltr ۔2 njy syt talkat aur aaؤt swrs ays ayl aay ki twsayk kay liye blwm fltrza kay astamal kay baray main ayk thakyky mkalha tyar krta hay ۔3 thndaa lekin ghair wazuha dayta dahanchay kay baray main haykr nywza par bhasa ، bshmwl blwm fltrza۔ayk mhadwd saiza kay mnt ka dahyr ۔5 amkany aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay kay liye maashy drstghy aur razadary sy mtalk ayk thakyky mkalha pysh krta haay۔anasar ko shaml karnay ، mmbrshp ki janch pratal ، aur kardanlty ka tkhmynha lghanay kay liye ghnty aur tarykwn kay sath ayk blwm fltr۔

Question: wzan waly hadayt waly ghraf ki nmaindghy karnay waly py aych py klas ko nafza karain aur byl myn fwrda alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey mkhtsar trien rastha tlash karnay kay tarykay fraham kryn۔
Answer: py aych py ki khsawsayat mtadd klaswn main dwbarha kabl astamal kwda fraham karnay ka ayk tarykha haay۔ayk khasayt ayk py aych py ki tamyr hay jo dawylprza ko mkhtlf klaswn main ayk hi kwda ko dwbarha astamal karnay ki ajazat dyty haay۔khsaltwn main tarykay aur khsawsayat shaml hawskty hain ، aur woh mriyt aaprytrza ، jamd tarykay aur khsawsayat ، aur klas aaprytrza jesay waldyn :: ، khud :: ، aur $ is ki hamayt karty hayn۔astamal kay mtalwbha alfaza ka astamal karty hoey isy klas main shaml kryn۔aysa karnay sy ، yeh is tarah hay jesay khsalt kay andr mwjwd tamam kwda ko klas main kapy kya jata haay۔klas main ab khasayt main byan krdha tarykwn aur khsawsayat tak rsaiy haasal haay۔tjrydy klaswn kay braks ، khsaltwn ko khud hi fwry nahin kya jaskta۔antrfys kay braks ، khsaltyn sirf ayk maahadha nahin blkha asal aml draamd ka kwda mhaya krty hayn۔ khlasaha main ، khsawsayat py aych py main ayk taaktwr khsawsayt hain jo dawylprza ko mtadd klaswn main afky tawr par kwda kay tkrawn ko dwbarha astamal karnay ki ajazat dyty hayn۔wha dwbarha astamal kay kabl kwda fraham karnay aur kwda tnzaym aur brkrar rkhnay ko bhatr bnanay kay lchkdar aur mwsar tarykha pysh karty hayn۔

Question: larywl main rwtngh kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur mkhtlf HTTP tarykwn kay liye rastwn ki wzuahat kesay kryn۔
Answer: py aych py klas ko nafza karnay kay liye ayk wzan waly hadayt waly ghraf ki nmaindghy karnay aur byl myn fwrda alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey mkhtsar trien rastha tlash karnay kay tarykay fraham karnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl akdamat astamal krsktay hayn: wytda daairykt ghraf namy ayk klas ki wzuahat kryn۔ghraf.fain ghraf kay knarwn ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye ayk njy praprty ka nam dyn۔ ghraf main ayk wrtyks shaml karnay kay liye aydawrtyks namy ayk awamy tarykha ki wzuahat kryn۔ ghraf main ayk knaray ko shaml karnay kay liye aydaj namy ayk awamy tarykha ki wzuahat kryn۔byl myn fwrda alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey do amwdywn kay darmiyan mkhtsar trien rastha tlash karnay kay l get ، ghytshwrtst path kay tarykha kar main byl myn fwrda alghwrthm ko do amwdywn kay mabyn mkhtsar trien rastay ka hasab ktab karnay kay liay۔swrs wrtyks kay liye ، jo 0 par syt kya gaya haay۔ knarwn kay wzan ki bnyad par amwdy hasawn kay fasalwn ko ap dayt krkay ghraf kay knarwn ko aaram karnay kay liye aaram dha aur prskwn namwn kay nam sy ayk njy tarykha ki wzuahat ki hogi haay۔ is bat ki janch karnay kay liye keh ghraf ki janch pratal kay liye haasnyghtyw saiykl namy ayk njy tarykha ki wzuahat kryn۔ayk mnfy saiykl par mushtamil haay۔ un tarykwn ko nafza karnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl wsail ka hawalha dy saktay hayn: 1 wzan waly hadayt waly ghraf main mkhtsar trien rastha tlash karnay kay liye byl myn fwrda alghwrthm kay py aych py par aml draamd۔azaghr aur sy ++ main is kay nfaza kay baray myn۔jawa aur sy ++ main is kay nfaza ki msaalwn kay sath byl myn fwrda alghwrthm۔awr byl myn fwrda alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey mkhtsar trien rastha tlash karnay kay tarykay fraham karty hayn۔

Question: larywl main mdal wyir kya hayn؟an ka astamal HTTP drkhwastwn aur jwabat main trmym karnay kay liye kesay kya jaskta haay؟
Answer: larywl main rwtngh kesi atalak kay liye yw aar ayl dahanchay ki wzuahat karnay aur un aamal ki wzuahat karnay ka aml hay jo kesi mkhsawsa akhttamy nktaha tak rsaiy haasal karnay par anjam dyiay jaiyn۔larwl rwt kay aghst ka astamal karty hoey rastwn ki wzuahat karnay ka ayk aasan aur azahaar karnay wala tarykha fraham krta haay۔ larywl main mkhtlf HTTP tarykwn kay liye rastwn ki wzuahat karnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl tknykwn ko astamal krsktay hayn: bnyady rwtngh: sab sy bnyady larywl rastay sirf URI aur bndsh ko kbwl karty hayn۔ham mndrjha zayl tarykwn ka astamal karty hoey mkhtlf HTTP tarykwn kay liye rastwn ki wzuahat krsktay hayn: rwt :: get ($ uri ، $ kal byk) rwt :: pwst ($ uri ، $ kal byk) rwt :: daal ($ uri ، $ kal byk) rwt :: hazaf kryn.msaal kay tawr par ، rwt :: haasal karain ('saarfyn/{ID}' ، fnkshn ($ ID) {wapsy 'saarf'۔msaal kay tawr par ، rwt :: haasal karain ('saarfyn/{ID}' ، fnkshn ($ ID) {wapsy 'saarf'۔jw ghrwp kay tarykha kar ko astamal karty hoey ayk hi safat ، jesay mdal wyir ya nam ki jghhawn ka ashtrak karty hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، rwt :: mdal wyir (['auth'])-> ghrwp (fnkshn () {rwt :: get ('/' ، fnkshn () {//}) ؛ rwt :: get ('/daysh bwrda' ،fnkshn () {//}) ؛}) ؛ CSRF prwtykshn: larywl wyb rastwn kay liye blt un CSRF thafza fraham krta hay js ka astamal karty hain tou wyryfyk ays aar ayf twkyn mdal wyir۔ un smry۔aghwaraaham apnay rastwn ko mazeed tkhsaysa karnay kay liye rwt pyramytrza ، namzad rastay ، rwt ghrwps ، aur CSRF thafza ka astamal bhi krsktay hayn۔

Question: aap larywl main kntrwlrza ki wzuahat aur astamal kesay karty hayn؟CRUD aapryshnza kay tarykwn kay sath ayk kntrwlr ki ayk msaal pysh kryn۔
Answer: larywl main mdal wyir kesi drkhwast main dakhl hony waly HTTP drkhwastwn ka maainha aur fltr karnay ka ayk tarykha kar haay۔wha ayply kyshn kay kntrwlrza tak phanchnay sy pehlay aych ty ty py ki drkhwastwn aur rdaml ko rwk kar un main mdakhlt krkay un main trmym karnay ka ayk aasan tarykha fraham karty hayn۔mdal wyir ko mtadd kamwn kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، jesay twsayk ، laghngh ، aur dayta transfarmyshn۔ yahan kuch aysay tarykay hain jo mdal wyir ko larywl main HTTP drkhwastwn aur rdaml main trmym karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay: twsayk: mdal wyir ki tsadyk kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay keh saarf ki twsayk ki hogi haay۔drkhwast kay kuch hasawn tak rsaiy haasal karnay ki ajazat denay sy phalay۔msaal kay tawr par ، larywl main ayk mdal wyir shaml hay jo tsadyk krta hay keh drkhwast kay saarf ki twsayk ki hogi haay۔aghr saarf ki twsayk nahin ki hogi hay tou ، mdal wyir saarf ko ayply kyshn ki lagh un askryn par bhyj dy gha۔ laghngh: mdal wyir ko aanay wali drkhwastwn ko drkhwast main lagh un karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔msaal kay tawr par ، lagh un mdal wyir ayply kyshn main aanay wali tamam drkhwastwn ko lagh un krskta haay۔ dayta transfarmyshn: mdal wyir ko ayply kyshn kay kntrwlrza tak phanchnay sy pehlay kesi HTTP drkhwast main dayta main trmym karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔msaal kay tawr par ، ayk mdal wyir klas ko drkhwast kay aadad wa shmar ko tbdyl karnay kay liye tshkyl diya jaskta hay is sy pehlay keh kntrwlr drkhwast ko snbhalta haw۔ sy ays aar ayf prwtykshn: larywl nay tsadyky sy ays aar ayf twkn mdal wyir ka astamal karty hoey wyb rastwn kay liye blt un sy ays aar ayf thafza fraham kya۔yha mdal wyir chyk krta hay keh drkhwast main sy ays aar ayf twkn syshn main mhafwza krdha twkn sy mmasal haay۔ larywl main ayk nya mdal wyir bnanay kay l we ، hum myk ko astamal krsktay hayn: mdal wyir aartysn kmanda۔ham shawlt kay l our apni ayply kyshn ki dana fail main mdal wyir ko bhi arfat tfwyzu krsktay hayn۔larywl main tamam mdal wyir ayp/aych ty ty py/mdal wyir daairktry main waka hayn۔

Question: larywl main hajrt kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur un ko dayta bys askyma main tbdylywn kay antzaam kay liye kis tarah astamal kya jaskta haay۔
Answer:
larywl main kntrwlrza py aych py ki klasyn hain jo aanay wali HTTP drkhwastwn ko snbhalty hain aur un drkhwastwn par drkhwast kay rdaml ka antzaam krty hayn۔wha aym wy sy (madal wyw kntrwlr) pytrn main madal (dayta) aur wyw (UI) kay mabyn ayk bychwan ki haysayt sy kam karty hayn۔kntrwlrza main aysay tarykwn par mushtamil hawta hay jo un akdamat ki wzuahat karty hain jo wsail par liye jasktay hain ، jesay dayta bnana ، prahna ، ap dayt karna ، aur hazaf krna۔kntrwlr karyghr kmanda۔msaal kay tawr par ، CRUD aapryshnza kay tarykwn kay sath pwst kntrwlr bnanay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl kmanda chla saktay hayn: py aych py aartysn myk: kntrwlr pwst kntrwlr -pwst kntrwlr klas main CRUD aapryshn kay tarykwn ko dwbarha trtyb dyn۔msaal kay tawr par ، andayks ka tarykha dayta bys sy tamam pwsts ko bazayaft krskta hay aur ayk aysa nzaarha waps krskta hay jo un ko dkhata haay۔tkhlyk ka tarykha ayk aysa nzaarha waps krskta hay jo ayk niy pwst bnanay kay liye ayk farm dkhata haay۔astwr ka tarykha kar sy dayta ko drst krskta hay aur niy pwst ko dayta bys main mhafwza krskta haay۔trmym ka tarykha dayta bys sy ayk mkhsawsa pwst ko bazayaft krskta hay aur ayk aysa nzaarha waps krskta hay jo is main trmym karnay kay liye ayk farm dkhata haay۔ap dayt ka tarykha kar sy dayta ko twsayk krskta hay aur dayta bys main pwst ko ap dayt krskta haay۔tbaha karnay ka tarykha dayta bys sy ayk mkhsawsa pwst ko hazaf krskta haay۔ wyb daat py aych py fail main pwst kntrwlr tarykwn kay rastwn ki wzuahat kryn۔msaal kay tawr par ، andayks kay tarykha kar kay liye kesi rastay ki wzuahat karnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl kwda ka astamal krsktay hayn: rwt :: haasal karain ('/pwsts' ، 'pwst kntrwlr@andayks') ؛ dayta ko zaahar karnay aur jwra twra karnay kay liye nzaryat main pwst kntrwlr kay tarykwn ka astamal kryn۔msaal kay tawr par ، tamam pwsts ko kesi nzaaray main zaahar karnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl kwda ka astamal krsktay hayn:@fwwrch ($ pwst kay tawr par $ pwst)

{{$ pwst-> anwan}}

{{$ pwst-> baday}}

endforeachin ka khlasaha ، larywl main kntrwlrza py aych py klas hain jo aanay wali HTTP drkhwastwn ko snbhaltay hain aur un drkhwastwn kay liye drkhwast kay rdaml ka nzam karty hayn۔an ka astamal CRUD aapryshnza aur wsail sy mtalk dyghr akdamat kay tarykwn ki wzuahat kay liye kya jaskta haay۔larywl main kntrwlr astamal karnay kay l we ، hamain ayk nya kntrwlr bnanay ، is kay tarykwn ki wzuahat karnay ، tarykwn kay liye rastwn ki wzuahat karnay aur tarykwn ko astamal karnay ki zurwrt haay۔

Question: aap larywl main fsaahat madal ki wzuahat aur astamal kesay karty hayn؟talkat aur astfsar kay tarykwn waly madal ki ayk msaal pysh kryn۔
Answer: larywl main hajrt ka ayk tarykha hay keh woh ayk sakhty aur wrzen par kabw panay waly andaza main dayta bys askyma main tbdylywn ka antzaam kryn۔wha dawylprza ko sadha aur jama py aych py kwda ka astamal karty hoey dayta bys tyblza ، kalmwn aur asharyha jat ko bnanay ، un main trmym karnay aur hazaf karnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔larywl main hajrt sy mtalk kuch klydy tsawrat yeh hayn: hajrt aap kay dayta bys kay liye wrzen kntrwl ki tarah hawty hay ، js sy aap ki tym ko ayply kyshn kay dayta bys askyma main trmym aur un ka ashtrak karnay ki ajazat mlty haay۔ hajrt aam tawr par larywl kay askyma bldar kay sath jwraa bnaiy jati hay takha aap ki ayply kyshn ka dayta bys askyma tyar kya jaskay۔taaktwr hajrt ka nzaam jo dawylprza ko dayta bys ko jldy sy bnanay aur is main trmym karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔ hajrt wkt kay sath sath dayta bys askyma main ki janay wali tbdylywn ko tryk karnay ka ayk tarykha pysh krty hay ، js sy agar zurwry ho tou tbdylywn ko waps karna aasan hawjata haay۔ayk tym kay liye taawn kay msail۔aap ki tym kay mmbrwn ko jab bhi aap ki tbdylywn ko makhza kntrwl sy khynchtay hain tou apnay dayta bys ko dsty tawr par ap dayt karnay ki zurwrt nahin hawghy۔ larwl dayta bys kay andr phansy shuda mntkly ko tryk krta haay۔as kay ntyjay main ، dayta bys tyar hawta hay jesay hi ayply kyshn tyar hawty haay۔ larywl main hajrt pyda karnay kay liye ، hum myk ko astamal krsktay hayn: hajrt karyghr kmanda۔as kay bad hum larywl kay zaryaha fraham krdha askyma bldar tarykwn ka astamal karty hoey hajrt fail main askyma ki tbdylywn ki wzuahat krsktay hayn۔ayk bar jab hajrt ki wzuahat hawjaiay tou ، hum isy hajrt karnay waly karyghr kmanda ka astamal krkay chla saktay hayn۔larywl rwl byk aartyzan kmanda ka astamal karty hoey hajrt ko waps karnay ka ayk tarykha bhi fraham krta haay۔ amyghryshnza ko CRUD aapryshnza kay liye dayta bys askyma ki tbdylywn ka antzaam karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔yhaan CRUD aapryshnza kay tarykwn kay sath ayk kntrwlr ki ayk msaal haay: klas pwst kntrwlr kntrwlr {pblk fnkshn andayks () {$ pwsts = pwst :: tamam () ؛rytrn wyw ('pwsts۔ andayks' ، kmpykt ('pwsts')) ؛} awamy fnkshn bnaiyn () {wapsy ka nzaarha ('posts.create') ؛} awamy fnkshn astwr (drkhwast $ drkhwast) {$ pwst = niy pwst () ؛$ pwst-> anwan = $ drkhwast-> un pt ('anwan') ؛$ pwst-> baday = $ drkhwast-> un pt ('baday') ؛$ pwst-> mhafwza karain () ؛wapsy ry daairykt ()-> rwt ('pwsts۔ andayks') ؛} awamy fnkshn main trmym (pwst $ pwst) {rytrn wyw ('pwsts۔ aydat' ، kmpykt ('pwst')) ؛} awamy fnkshn ap dayt (drkhwast $ drkhwast ، pwst $ pwst) {$ pwst-> anwan = $ drkhwast-> un pt ('anwan') ؛$ pwst-> baday = $ drkhwast-> un pt ('baday') ؛$ pwst-> mhafwza karain () ؛wapsy ry daairykt ()-> rwt ('pwsts۔ andayks') ؛} awamy fnkshn tbaha (pwst $ pwst) {$ pwst-> hazaf karain () ؛wapsy ry daairykt ()-> rwt ('pwsts۔ andayks') ؛}} is msaal main ، pwst kntrwlr klas tamam pwsts ki nmaish ، ayk niy pwst bnanay ، dayta bys main ayk niy pwst ko astwr karnay ، mwjwdha pwst main trmym karnay ، dayta bys main ayk mwjwdha pwst ko ap dayt karnay ، aur dayta bys sy mwjwdha pwst ko hazaf karnay kay tarykwn ki wzuahat krta haay۔an tarykwn ko mkml tawr par faal CRUD ayply kyshn bnanay kay liye rastwn aur nzaarwn kay sath mil kar astamal kya jaskta haay۔

Question: larywl kay blyda tymplytngh anjn ka mksad kya haay؟aap larywl main tymplyts ki wzuahat aur astamal kesay karty hayn؟
Answer: fsaahat larywl ka aabjykt sy mtalkha mypr (ORM) hay jo dayta bys kay sath bat chyt karnay ka ayk aasan tarykha fraham krta haay۔as sy dawylprza ko dayta bys tyblza main (CRUD) aapryshnza bnanay ، bazayaft karnay ، ap dayt karnay aur hazaf karnay ki shawlt mlty haay۔fsaahat madal py aych py klas hain jo maawn dayta bys main dayta bys tyblza aur talkat ki nmaindghy karty hayn۔dayta bys tybl ka nam aam tawr par madal kay nam sy ، ksart ki shkl main smjha jata haay۔msaal kay tawr par ، lnk namy ayk madal lnks ko apnay dayfalt tybl nam kay tawr par astamal kray gha۔ham apni ayply kyshn kay liye niay madal tyar karnay kay liye myk ap: madal aartyzan kmanda astamal krsktay hayn۔ yahan talkat aur astfsar kay tarykwn kay sath ayk madal ki ayk msaal haay: klas saarf madal {awamy fnkshn pwsts () {wapsy $ as-> haasmyn (pwst:: klas) ؛} awamy fnkshn kay tbsaray () {wapsy $ this-> haasmyn (tbsarha :: klas) ؛} awamy fnkshn askwpyktyw ($ astfsar) {wapsy $ astfsar-> kahan ('faal' ، sch) ؛} awamy fnkshn askwppwplwlr ($ astfsar) {wapsy $ astfsar-> kahan ('khyalat' ، '>' ، 1000) ؛}} is msaal main ، saarf kay madal kay pas haasmany tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey pwst aur kmnt madal kay sath talkat hayn۔as main dairha kar kay tarykha kar ko astamal karty hoey ، do astfsar kay tarykwn ki bhi wzuahat ki hogi haay۔astfsar kay un tarykwn ko astfsar kay ntaij ko fltr karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ hum dayta bys kay sath taaml kay liye apnay kntrwlrza main fsaahat madal astamal krsktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، tamam faal aur mkbwl saarfyn ko bazayaft karnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl kwda ka astamal krsktay hayn: $ saarfyn = saarf :: ayktw ()-> mkbwl ()-> get () ؛ yeh kwda un tamam saarfyn ko bazayaft kray ga jo mthark hain aur is sy zayada haay۔1000 sy zayada aaraa۔ham dayta bys main rykarda bnanay ، ap dayt karnay aur hazaf karnay kay liye fsaahat madal bhi astamal krsktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، saarf kay liye ayk niy pwst bnanay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl kwda ka astamal krsktay hayn: $ saarf = saarf :: tlash karain (1) ؛ $ pwst = niy pwst () ؛ $ pwst-> anwan = 'nya pwst' ؛ $ $pwst-> baday = 'yha ayk niy pwst haay۔' ؛ $ saarf-> pwsts ()-> mhafwza karain ($ pwst) ؛ yeh kwda aai day 1 waly saarf kay liye ayk niy pwst bnaiay gha۔ hum fsaahat madal bhi astamal krsktay hayn۔ap dayt ka astamal karty hoey dayta bys main rykarda ko ap dayt aur hazaf karain aur tarykwn ko hazaf kryn۔

Question: aap larywl main farm ki twsayk ko kis tarah snbhal saktay hayn؟twsayk kay kwaad ki wzuahat karnay aur ghltay kay pyghamat ki nmaish karnay ki ayk msaal pysh kryn۔
Answer:
blyda larywl main ayk tymplytngh anjn hay jo pehlay sy taay shuda nzaaray ko brahata hay ya snbhalta haay۔yha ayk kabl tymplytngh anjn hay jo dawylprza ko dwbarha kabl astamal aur madaywlr tymplyts bnanay ki ajazat dyta haay۔blyda tymplyts ko sadha py aych py kwda main mrtb kya jata hay aur jab tak keh woh tbdyl nahin hawjatay ، is ka mtalb hay keh blyda is drkhwast main bnyady tawr par safr awwr hayda ka azuafha krta haay۔blyda tymplyts .blade.php fail aykstynshn ka astamal karty hain aur aam tawr par wsail/nzaryat ki daairktry main mhafwza hawtay hayn۔ larywl main tymplyts ki wzuahat aur astamal karnay kay l we ، hum un mrahal par aml krsktay hayn: .blade.php fail twsya ka astamal karty hoey ayk nya blyda tymplyt bnaiyn۔msaal kay tawr par ، pwsts ki fharst ki nmaish kay liye ayk tymplyt bnanay kay l we ، hum wsail/nzaryat ki daairktry main pwstwn kay nam sy ayk fail bna saktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، pwsts ki fharst ko zaahar karnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl kwda ko astamal krsktay hayn:@farwrch ($ pwst kay tawr par $ pwst)

{{$ pwst-> anwan}}

{{{{$ pwst-> baday}}

endforeachass dayta ko kntrwlr ya rastay sy tymplyt main dayta۔msaal kay tawr par ، pwsts ki fharst ko pwsts tymplyt par mntkl karnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl kwda ka astamal krsktay hayn: $ pwsts = pwst :: tamam () ؛ rytrn wyw ('pwsts' ، ['pwsts' => $ pwsts]) ؛ astamal karain ؛ astamal kryn۔pas shuda dayta kay sath tymplyt ko pysh karnay kay liye wyw fnkshn۔msaal kay tawr par ، pwsts ki fharst kay sath pwsts tymplyt ko pysh karnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl kwda ka astamal krsktay hayn: rytrn wyw ('pwsts' ، ['pwsts' => $ pwsts])) bnyady tymplyts kay alawha ، blyda tymplyt wrasat ki bhi hamayt krta haay۔، hasaay ، aur kntrwl dahanchay۔ham un khsawsayat ko zayada pychydha aur dwbarha kabl astamal tymplyts bnanay kay liye astamal krsktay hayn۔ khlasaha main ، blyda larywl main ayk taaktwr tymplytngh anjn hay jo dawylprza ko dwbarha kabl astamal aur madaywlr tymplyts bnanay ki ajazat dyta haay۔ham ayk nya blyda tymplyt tshkyl dy kar ، larywl main tymplyts ki wzuahat aur astamal krsktay hain ، blyda nhaw ka astamal karty hoey HTML dahanchay ki wzuahat karty hain ، dayta ko tymplyt main mntkl karty hain ، aur wyw fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey tymplyt ko pysh karty hayn۔

Question: larywl main mdal wyir ghrwpwn kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur un sy mtalk mdal wyir ko ghrwp karnay kay liye kis tarah astamal kya jaskta haay۔
Answer: farm ki twsayk wyb dawylpmnt ka ayk lazmi hasaha hay ، aur larywl farm ki twsayk ko snbhalnay ka ayk aasan aur khwbsawrt tarykha fraham krta haay۔larywl ki farm ki twsayk ki khsawsayt dawylprza ko is par karrwaiy karnay sy pehlay saarf kay un pt dayta ko drst karnay ki ajazat dyty haay۔as sy yeh ykyny bnanay main mdd mlty hay keh dayta drst aur mhafwza hay ، aur is sy ghalat drkhwastwn ki tadad ko kam krkay wkt ki bcht hawty hay js par karrwaiy karnay ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ larywl main twsayk kay kwaad ki wzuahat karnay kay liye ، hum alywmynyt \ HTTP \ drkhwast kay zaryaha fraham krdha twsayk ka tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔chyza.ham kntrwlr kay tarykha kar main twsayk kay kwaad ki wzuahat krsktay hain jo farm jma kranay ko snbhalta haay۔msaal kay tawr par ، nam ، ay myl ، aur pas wrda kay liye fyldaza kay sath kesi farm ki twsayk karnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl kwda ka astamal krsktay hayn: pblk fnkshn astwr (drkhwast $ drkhwast) {$ drst dayta = $ drkhwast-> twsayk (['nam' => 'zurwry haay)| zayada sy zayadha: 255 '،' ay myl '=>' mtalwbha | ay myl | mnfrd: saarf | zayada sy zayadha: 255 '،' pas wrda '=>' mtalwb | kam sy km: 8 | zayada sy zayadha: 255 '،]) ؛// farm dayta par karrwaiy karain ...} is msaal main ، hum twsayk kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey nam ، ay myl aur pas wrda kay shabwn kay liye twsayk kay kwaad ki wzuahat karty hayn۔mtalwbha kaadha is bat ko ykyny bnata hay keh fylda khaly nahin hay ، ay myl ka kaadha is bat ko ykyny bnata hay keh fylda main ayk drst ay myl ptha mwjwd ho ، anwkha kaadha is bat ko ykyny bnata hay keh saarfyn ki myza main fylda wylyw mnfrd hay ، aur kam sy kam aur zayada sy zayada kwaad is bat ko ykyny bnatay hain keh fylda wylywayk khasa lmbaiy ki had main haay۔ larwl main ghltay kay pyghamat ko zaahar karnay kay liye ، hum larywl kay zaryaha fraham krdha $ ghltaywn ka mtghyr astamal krsktay hayn۔ham kesi mkhsawsa fylda kay liye ghltay ka pygham zaahar karnay kay liye @ayrr hadayt ka astamal krsktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، nam kay fylda kay liye ghltay ka pygham zaahar karnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl kwda ko astamal krsktay hayn: @ghltay (ghltay ('nam') {{$ pygham}} enderrorin is msaal kay tawr par ، hum pranay fnkshn ko nam kay fylda ki pehlay pysh krdha kymt ko zaahar karnay kay liye astamal karty hayn۔as kay bad hum ghltay ka pygham zaahar karnay kay liye
