@ayrr daairyktyw ka astamal karty hain agar nam ka fylda twsayk main nakam hawjata haay۔ khlasaha main ، larywl farm ki twsayk ko snbhalnay ka ayk aasan aur khwbsawrt tarykha fraham krta haay۔ham twsayk kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey twsayk kay kwaad ki wzuahat krsktay hain aur $ ghltaywn kay mtghyr aur @ayrr daairyktyw ka astamal karty hoey ghltay kay pyghamat dasplay krsktay hayn۔as sy yeh ykyny bnanay main mdd mlty hay keh dayta drst aur mhafwza hay ، aur is sy ghalat drkhwastwn ki tadad ko kam krkay wkt ki bcht hawty hay jn par karrwaiy karnay ki zurwrt haay۔

Question: aap larywl main fail ap lwda ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟ap lwda failwn ko wsawl karnay aur astwr karnay kay aml ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: larywl main mdal wyir ghrwps ayk hi klyd kay that mdal wyir sy mtalk ghrwp ka ayk tarykha hain takha inhain rastwn ko tfwyzu karna aasan bnaiay۔wha dawylprza ko kwda ki ayk lain waly rastay ya rastwn kay ghrwp main mtadd mdal wyir lghanay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔mdal wyir ghrwpwn ki wzuahat HTTP dana ki middle mdal wyir ghrwpwn ki praprty main ki jaskty haay۔larywl do dayfalt mdal wyir ghrwps ، wyb aur API kay sath aata hay ، js main baltrtyb wyb UI aur API rastwn kay liye mshtrkha mdal wyir par mushtamil hawta haay۔ yahan kuch aysay tarykay hain jo mdal wyir ghrwps ko larywl main astamal kya jaskta haay: twsayk: hum twsayk sy mtalk mdal wyir kay liye mdal wyir ghrwp ki wzuahat krsktay hayn۔، jesay msanf aur mhaman۔as sy mtadd rastwn ya rastwn kay ghrwpwn par twsayk mdal wyir ka atalak aasan hawjata haay۔ aay py aai thrwtlngh: hum API thrwtlngh sy mtalk mdal wyir ، jesay thrwtl kay liye ayk mdal wyir ghrwp ki wzuahat krsktay hayn۔as sy API thrwtlngh mdal wyir ko ayk sy zayada API rastwn ya API rastwn kay ghrwpwn par lghana aasan hawjata haay۔as sy mtadd rastwn ya rastwn kay ghrwpwn par laghngh mdal wyir ka atalak karna aasan hawjata haay۔ larywl main mdal wyir ghrwp ki wzuahat karnay kay liye ، hum HTTP dana ki middle mdal wyir ghrwpwn ki praprty main dakhlha shaml krsktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، aydamn namy ayk mdal wyir ghrwp ki wzuahat karnay kay liye js main aath aur aydamn mdal wyir shaml hain ، hum mndrjha zayl kwda astamal krsktay hayn: mhafwza $ mdal wyir ghrwp = ['wyb' => [// ...] ، 'API' => [ // ...] ، 'aydamn' => ['auth' ، 'aydamn' ،] ،] ؛ is msaal main ، hum aydamn namy ayk mdal wyir ghrwp ki wzuahat karty hain js main msanf aur aydamn mdal wyir shaml hayn۔as kay bad hum is mdal wyir ghrwp ko mdal wyir kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey rastay ya rastwn kay ghrwp main laghw krsktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، aydamn mdal wyir ghrwp ko aydamn rwts kay ayk ghrwp main laghw karnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl kwda ka astamal krsktay hayn: rwt :: mdal wyir (['aydamn'])-> ghrwp (fnkshn () {// ...}) ؛khlasaha yeh hay keh ، larywl main mdal wyir ghrwps ayk wahad klyd kay that mdal wyir sy mtalk ghrwp ka ayk tarykha hain takha inhain rastwn ko tfwyzu karna aasan bnaya jaskay۔wha dawylprza ko kwda ki ayk lain waly rastay ya rastwn kay ghrwp main mtadd mdal wyir lghanay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔mdal wyir ghrwpwn ki wzuahat HTTP dana ki middle mdal wyir ghrwpwn ki praprty main ki jaskty haay۔

Question: larywl srws fraham karnay waly kya hayn؟aap larywl main khdmt fraham karnay walon ko kis tarah rjstr aur astamal karty hayn؟
Answer:
larywl main fail ap lwdaza ko snbhalnay kay l we ، hum un mrahal par aml krsktay hayn: ayk wyw fail bnaiyn jahan saarf ap lwda karnay kay liye ayk fail mntkhb krskta hay aur ayk kntrwlr jahan ap lwda krdha failwn par karrwaiy hawghy۔ dekhain fail main ، hamain fail un pt tyar karnay ki zurwrt haay۔kwda ki mndrjha zayl lain shaml krna: farm :: fail ('fail_ nam') ؛ farm main :: khwlyn () ، hamain failwn ko shaml karnay ki zurwrt hay takha farm ko mtadd hasawn main ap lwda karnay ki shawlt fraham ki jaskay۔ kntrwlr main ، hamain zurwrt haay۔fail ap lwda ko snbhalnay kay liye kesi tarykha ki wzuahat karnay kay liay۔ham ayk mkhsawsa daairktry main ap lwda krdha fail ko astwr karnay kay liye larwyl ki ap lwda krdha fail klas kay zaryaha fraham krdha astwr kay tarykha kar ka astamal krsktay hayn۔ hum larywl kay alywyl \ HTTP \ drkhwast aabjykt kay zaryaha fraham krdha twsayk kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey ap lwda krdha fail kay liye twsayk kay kwaad ki bhi wzuahat krsktay hayn۔ hum ghltay kay pyghamat ko zaahar krsktay hayn۔larwyl kay zaryaha fraham krdha $ ghltaywn kay mtghyr ka astamal karty hoey twsayk ki ghltaywn kay liay۔ is ki ayk msaal hay keh larywl main fail ap lwda ko kis tarah snbhalyn: pblk fnkshn astwr (drkhwast $ drkhwast) {$ twsayk shuda dayta = $ drkhwast-> twsayk karain (['fail' =>'mtalwbha | fail | mimes: JPEG ، PNG ، PDF | zayada sy zayadha: 2048' ،]) ؛$ fail = $ drkhwast-> fail ('fail') ؛$ fail nam = wkt ()۔'_'۔$ fail-> getClientoriginalname () ؛$ fail-> astwryza ('ap lwdaza' ، $ fail ka nam) ؛waps waps ()-> ('kamyaby' ، 'fail ko kamyaby kay sath ap lwda kya gaya haay۔') ؛} is msaal kay tawr par ، hum astwr namy ayk tarykha ki wzuahat karty hain jo fail ko aplwda snbhalta haay۔ham twsayk kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey fail fylda kay liye twsayk kay kwaad ki wzuahat karty hayn۔as kay bad hum fail kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey ap lwda krdha fail ko bazayaft karty hain aur taim fnkshn aur asal fail ka nam astamal krkay fail ka ayk anwkha nam tyar karty hayn۔ham astwryyas kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey aplwda daairyktry main ap lwda krdha fail ko astwr karty hayn۔aakhr main ، hum saarf ko kamyaby kay pygham kay sath pchhlay safhaay par waps bhyj dytay hayn۔ twsayk ki ghltaywn kay liye ghltay kay pyghamat zaahar karnay kay liye ، hum larywl kay zaryaha fraham krdha $ ghltaywn kay mtghyr ko astamal krsktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، fail fylda kay liye ghltay ka pygham zaahar karnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl kwda ka astamal krsktay hayn: @ghltay ('fail')
{{$ pygham}}
enderrorin is msaal kay tawr par ، hum ghltay ka pygham zaahar karnay kay liye @ayrr daairyktyw ka astamal karty hain agar fail fylda twsayk main nakam hawjata haay۔ smry main ، larywl main fail ap lwda ko snbhalnay main ayk wyw fail bnana shaml hawta hay jahan koi saarf hawta haay۔ap lwda karnay kay liye ayk fail aur ayk kntrwlr ka antkhab krsktay hain jahan ap lwda krdha failwn par karrwaiy hawghy۔ham twsayk kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey ap lwda krdha fail kay liye twsayk kay kwaad ki wzuahat krsktay hain aur $ ghltaywn kay mtghyr aur @ayrr daairktyw ka astamal karty hoey ghltay kay pyghamat dasplay krsktay hayn۔ham larywl ki ap lwda fail klas kay zaryaha fraham krdha astwryza tarykha ka astamal karty hoey ayk mkhsawsa daairktry main ap lwda krdha fail ko astwr krsktay hayn۔

Question: larywl kay samnay waly tsawrat kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur woh kis tarah bnyady klaswn ko ayk aasan antrfys fraham karty hayn۔
Answer: larywl srws fraham karnay waly klas hain jn main drkhwast ko bwtstryp karnay aur khdmat ko rjstr karnay ki mntak par mushtamil haay۔wha tamam larywl ayply kyshn bwtstrypngh kay liye mrkzay jghha hayn۔larywl ki bnyady khdmat ، nyza dawylpr ki apni drkhwast ، khdmt fraham karnay walon kay zaryaha bwtstrypda hayn۔srws fraham karnay waly knfgh/ayp daat py py py knfyghryshn fail main rjstrda hain ، js main ayk fraham knndghan ki saf mwjwd hay jahan hum apnay srws fraham karnay walon kay klas namwn ki fharst bnasktay hayn۔ larwl main srws fraham karnay waly ko rjstr karnay aur astamal karnay kay akdamat hayn: ayk kstm srws fraham knndha bnaiyn: bazaria kstm srws fraham karnay wala bnaiynalywmynyt \ spwrt \ srws prwwaidar klas main twsya krna۔ khdmt fraham karnay waly main rjstr aur bwt kay tarykwn ki wzuahat kryn۔rjstr ka tarykha kntynr sy khdmat ko pabnd karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jabky bwt ka tarykha kesi bhi dusray zurwry bwtstrypngh ko anjam denay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ kstm srws fraham knndha ko knfgh/ayp.py py ayf fail main fraham karnay waly sray main andraj shaml krkay۔ rjstrda ko astamal kryn۔khdmt fraham knndha is kay tarykwn ko kal krkay ya is ki khsawsayat tak rsaiy haasal krkay۔ is ki ayk msaal hay keh kis tarah larywl main kstm srws fraham karnay waly ko rjstr aur astamal kya jaiay: // ayk kstm srws fraham karnay waly mysrwys prwwaidar ko srws prwwaidar {pblk fnkshn rjstr () {$ this-> ayp bnaiyn۔-> pabnd ('mysrwais' ، fnkshn () {nya mysrwais waps karain () ؛}) ؛} pblk fnkshn bwt () {// koi bhi zurwry bwtstrypngh anjam dyn}} // kstm srws fraham knndha ko knfgh/ayp.fp fail 'prwwydarza' => [// ... ayp \ fraham knndghan \ mysrwys prwwaidar :: klas ، main rjstr kryn۔] ، // rjstrda srws fraham knndha $ mysrwais = ayp ('mysrwais') ؛ $ MyService-> dosomething () ؛ is msaal kay tawr par ، hum mysrwys prwwydar namy ayk kstm srws fraham knndha tshkyl dytay hain jo mysrwys namy khdmt ko kntynr sy bandhta haay۔as kay bad hum kstm srws fraham knndha ko fraham knndghan ki saf main andraj shaml krkay knfgh/ayp py py py fail main rjstr karty hayn۔aakhr main ، hum rjstrda srws fraham knndha ko is kay tarykwn ko kal krkay ya is ki khsawsayat tak rsaiy haasal karty hayn۔ khlasaha yeh hay keh ، larywl srws fraham karnay waly klas hain jn main drkhwast ko bwtstryp karnay aur khdmat ko rjstr karnay ki mntak par mushtamil haay۔ham kstm srws fraham karnay waly ko tshkyl dy kar ، rjstr aur bwt kay tarykwn ki wzuahat ، kstm srws fraham karnay waly ko knfgh/ayp daat py aych py fail main rjstr kar kay ، aur rjstrda srws fraham karnay waly ko is kay tarykwn par kal krkay ya rsaiy tak rsaiy haasal krkay ، kstm srws fraham karnay waly ko rjstr aur astamal krsktay hayn۔as ki khsawsayat

Question: "aap larywl main twsayk aur ajazat ko kis tarah snbhal saktay hayn؟ saarf kay andraj ، lagh un ، aur rsaiy kntrwl kay aml ki wzuahat kryn۔"
Answer: larywl kay samnay waly hasaay ki khdmt kay kntynr main bnyady klaswn ko ayk aasan antrfys mhaya karty hayn۔wha bnyady klaswn main "jamd praksy" kay tawr par kam karty hain ، jo rwayty jamd tarykwn sy kahain zayada janch aur lchk ko brkrar rkhtay hoey tyrs aur azahaar khyal nhaw fraham karty hayn۔fysdaza py aych py ki klasyn hain jo kntynr kay andr khdmat ko msthakm jesi antrfys mhaya krty hayn۔wha dawylprza ko klaswn ko anstytyt karnay ya anhasaar anjykshn kay astamal kay baghair larywl ki khsawsayat tak rsaiy haasal karnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔bhat sy phalwؤn kay sath larywl jhaaza jo larywl ki tkryba all tamam khsawsayat ، jesay rwt ، day by ، atht ، aur nzaaray tak rsaiy fraham karty hayn۔dawylprza py aych py klas bna kar apnay kstm fkray bhi tshkyl dy saktay hain js main rwshn \ spwrt \ facades \ fasade klas main twsya hawty haay۔ larywl main ayk aghwaraa astamal karnay kay liye ، hum is kay tarykwn ko kal krsktay hain ya aghwaraay kay jamd tarykwn ka astamal karty hoey is ki khsawsayat tak rsaiy haasal krsktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، larywl main kesi rwt ki wzuahat kay liye rwt kay aghwaraay ko astamal karnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl kwda ka astamal krsktay hayn: rwt :: haasal karain ('/' ، fnkshn () {wapsy ka nzaarha ('astkbal') ؛}) ؛ is msaal main ،ham is rastay ki wzuahat kay liye rwt kay aghwaraay ka astamal karty hain jo wylkm namy ayk nzaarha waps krta haay۔hamyn is khsawsayt ko astamal karnay kay l the rwt klas ko fwry tawr par astamal karnay ya anhasaar anjykshn astamal karnay ki zurwrt nahin haay۔ khlasaha main ، larywl kay samnay waly hasaay ki khdmt kay kntynr main bnyady klaswn ko ayk aasan antrfys fraham karty hayn۔wha dawylprza ko klaswn ko fwry tawr par bnanay ya anhasaar anjykshn kay astamal kay baghair larywl ki khsawsayat tak rsaiy haasal karnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔aghlay hasaay main alywmynyt \ spwrt \ facades nam ki jghha main tay .n ki hogi hay aur knfgh/app.php knfyghryshn fail main rjstrda hayn۔dawylprza py aych py klas tshkyl dy kar apnay kstm fkray bhi tshkyl dy saktay hain jo rwshn \ spwrt \ facades \ facade klas main twsya krta haay۔

Question: larywl kay karyghr kmanda lain twl ka mksad kya haay؟aam karyghr ahakamat aur un kay astamal ki msaalyn fraham kryn۔
Answer: twsayk aur ajazat wyb dawylpmnt kay lazmi hasaay hain ، aur larywl un ko snbhalnay ka ayk aasan aur khwbsawrt tarykha fraham krta haay۔twsayk kesi saarf ki shnakht ki tsadyk karnay ka aml hay ، jabky ajazat is bat ka tayn karnay ka aml hay keh saarf ko kon sy akdamat karnay ki ajazat haay۔larywl main ، hum mndrjha zayl mrahal ka astamal karty hoey twsayk aur ajazat ko snbhal saktay hayn: saarf rjstryshn: ayk rjstryshn farm bnaiyn jo saarf ka nam ، ay myl aur pas wrda jma krta haay۔ ayk aysay rastay ki wzuahat karain jo farm ko jma kranay ko snbhalta hay aur saarf kay madal par tkhlyk ka tarykha kal krta haay۔ayk nya saarf bnaiyn۔ larywl kay zaryaha fraham krdha Bcrypt fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey saarf ka pas wrda hash kryn۔ saarf ko lagh un safhaay par kamyaby kay pygham kay sath dwbarha hadayt kryn۔ saarf lagh an: ayk lagh un farm bnaiyn jo saarf ka ay myl aur pas wrda jma krta haay۔ ayk aysa rastha byan karain jo is ko snbhalta haay۔farm jma krwaiyn aur saarf ko twsayk karnay kay liye Auth facad par kwshsh kay tarykha kar ko kal kryn۔ agar saarf ki twsayk ki jati hay tou ، saarf ko kamyaby kay pygham kay sath hawm pyj par ry daairykt kryn۔bsawrt dyghr ، saarf ko kesi ghltay kay pygham kay sath lagh un pyj par waps bhyj dyn۔ya wsail۔ mdal wyir ko un rastwn ya wsail par lghaiyn jn kay liye ajazat ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ yahan saarf ki rjstryshn ، lagh un ، aur larwl main rsaiy kntrwl ko snbhalnay ki ayk msaal haay: // saarf rjstryshn jmaha ki tkryb rjstr (drkhwast $ drkhwast) {$ drst dayta = $drkhwast-> twsayk (['nam' => 'mtalwbha | zayada sy zayadha: 255' ، 'ay myl' => 'mtalwbha | ay myl | anwkha: saarfyn | zayada sy zayadha: 255' ، 'pas wrda' => 'mtalwbha | kam sy km: 8 |zayadha sy zayadha: 255 '،]) ؛$ saarf = saarf :: bnaiyn (['name' => $ drst dayta ['nam'] ، 'ay myl' => $ drst dayta ['ay myl'] ، 'pas wrda' => bcrypt ($ drst dayta ['pas wrda'])،]) ؛wapsy ry daairykt ('/lagh an')-> kay sath ('kamyaby' ، 'saarf kamyaby kay sath rjstrda haay۔') ؛} // saarf lagh un pblk fnkshn lagh un (drkhwast $ drkhwast) {$ asnad = $ drkhwast-> twsayk (['ay myl' '=> 'mtalwbha | ay myl' ، 'pas wrda' => 'mtalwbha' ،]) ؛aghr (auth :: kwshsh ($ asnad)) {lwt lwt ry daairykt ('/ghhr')-> kay sath ('kamyaby' ، 'lagh un kamyab۔') ؛} dusri {lwt lwt kar daairykt ('/lagh an')-> kay sath ('ghltay' ، 'ghlta asnad۔') ؛}} // ayksys kntrwl jmhawryha fnkshn andayks () {$ this-> akhtyar ('dykhyn' ، pwst :: klas) ؛$ pwsts = pwst :: tamam () ؛rytrn wyw ('pwsts daat andayks' ، kmpykt ('pwsts')) ؛} is msaal main ، hum ayk rjstr kay tarykha kar ki wzuahat karty hain jo saarf kay andraj ، ayk lagh un ka tarykha hayndal krta hay jo saarf kay lagh un ko snbhalta hay ، aur ayk andayks tarykha jo rsaiy kntrwl ko snbhalta haay۔ham saarf kay un pt dayta aur by sy aar ay py ty fnkshn ko saarf kay pas wrda haysh kay l lar larwyl ki blt un twsayk ki khsawsayat ka astamal karty hayn۔ham saarf aur larywl ki blt un ajazat ki khsawsayat ko kesi khasa wsail tak rsaiy ki twsayk karnay kay liye larwyl ki blt un twsayk ki khsawsayat ka astamal karty hayn۔ khlasaha main ، larywl twsayk aur ajazat ko snbhalnay ka ayk aasan aur khwbsawrt tarykha fraham krta haay۔ham larwyl ki blt un khsawsayat ، jesay twsayk ، twsayk ، aur ajazat ka astamal karty hoey saarf ki rjstryshn ، lagh un ، aur ayksys kntrwl ko snbhal saktay hayn۔ham twsayk aur ajazat ko snbhalnay kay liye larywl kay blt un aghwada ، jesay msanf ka astamal krsktay hayn۔

Question: dayta bys ki karrwaiywn ko anjam denay kay l Lar aap larywl kay dayta bys kay astfsar bldar ki wzuahat aur astamal kesay karty hayn؟
Answer: larywl ka karyghr kmanda lain twl ayk taaktwr twl hay jo dawylprza ko apni ayply kyshnza tyar karty wkt astamal karnay kay liye mtadd mddghar kmanda fraham krta haay۔yha taaktwr symfwny knswl jzaw kay zaryaha karfrma hay aur larywl kay sath shaml haay۔karyghr mtadd mddghar kmanda fraham krta hay jo un ki drkhwast ki tamyr kay doran dawylprza ki mdd krsktay hayn۔mshtrkha karyghr kay kmandaza aur un kay astamal ki kuch msaalyn yeh hayn: py aych py aartyzan lst: is kmanda main tamam dstyab karyghr kmanda ki fharst di hogi haay۔kntrwl klrnym daat py py py kay nam sy ayk nya kntrwlr klas tyar krta haay۔shyl jahan dawylpr apnay ayply kyshn kay kwda aur dayta kay sath bat chyt krsktay hayn۔ py aych py aartyzan srw: yeh kmanda mkamy mshyn par ayk trkyaty srwr shrwa krta haay۔ py aych py aartyzan rwt: fharst: yeh kmanda ayply kyshn main mwjwd tamam rjstrda rastwn ki fharst main haay۔yha kmanda ayk niy mdal wyir klas tyar krty hay js ka nam mdal wyir nam daat kam hay ، larywl ka karyghr kmanda lain twl ayk taaktwr twl hay jo dawylprza ko apni ayply kyshnza tyar karty wkt astamal karnay kay liye mtadd mddghar kmanda fraham krta haay۔karyghr kmandaza ko niay madal ، kntrwlrza ، hajrt ، mdal wyir aur bohat kuch tyar karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔karyghr dayta bys ki mntkly chlanay ، trkyaty srwr shrwa karnay ، aur ayply kyshn kay kwda aur dayta kay sath bat chyt karnay kay liye kmanda bhi fraham krta haay۔

Question: larywl main bay chyn lwdangh kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur is ko talkat kay sath dayta bys kay swalat ko bhatr bnanay kay liye kis tarah astamal kya jaskta haay۔
Answer: larywl ka dayta bys astfsar bldar dayta bys kay swalat bnanay aur chlanay kay liye ayk aasan aur rwany antrfys mhaya krta haay۔as ka astamal aap ki ayply kyshn main zayada tr dayta bys aapryshnza ko anjam denay kay liye kya jaskta hay aur larywl kay spwrtda dayta bys sstm kay sath balkl kam krta haay۔astfsar bldar ays kyw ayl anjykshn hamlwn kay khlaf aap ki drkhwast ko bchanay kay liye py day aw pyramytr baindangh ka astamal krta haay۔astfsar bldar ko ghzarnay waly tar ko saaf karnay ya saaf karnay ki zurwrt nahin haay۔\ spwrt \ facades \ db ؛ ayk nya astfsar bldar msaal shrwa karnay kay liye DB :: tybl ka tarykha astamal kryn۔msaal kay tawr par ، saarfyn kay jdwl sy tamam rykarda mntkhb karnay kay liye ، hum mndrjha zayl kwda ka astamal krsktay hayn: $ saarfyn = DB :: tybl ('saarfyn')-> get () ؛ astfsar main shkwn ko shaml karnay kay liye astfsar bldar kay tarykwn ka astamal kryn۔msaal kay tawr par ، saarfyn kay tybl sy sirf nam aur ay myl kalmwn ko mntkhb karnay kay liye ، hum mndrjha zayl kwda ka astamal krsktay hayn: $ saarfyn = DB :: tybl ('saarfyn')-> mntkhb karain ('nam' ، 'ay myl')-> haasal kryn() ؛ astfsar bldar kay tarykwn ka astamal karain jahan astfsar ki shkyn shaml kryn۔msaal kay tawr par ، sirf 1 ki shnakht waly saarfyn ko mntkhb karnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl kwda ka astamal krsktay hayn: $ saarfyn = DB :: tybl ('saarfyn')-> kahan ('ID' ، 1)-> haasal karain () astamal karain ؛ astamal kryn۔astfsar bldar kay tarykay sy astfsar main shkwn kay zaryaha aardar shaml karnay kay tarykay۔msaal kay tawr par ، saarfyn ko nzawly trtyb main un kay nam sy aardar karnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl kwda astamal krsktay hayn: $ saarfyn = DB :: tybl ('saarfyn')-> aardar baiy ('nam' ، 'daysk')-> haasal karain () ()the astfsar main had aur aafsyt shkwn ko shaml karnay kay liye astfsar bldar kay tarykwn ka astamal kryn۔msaal kay tawr par ، sirf pehlay 10 saarfyn ko mntkhb karnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl kwda ka astamal krsktay hayn: $ saarfyn = DB :: tybl ('saarfyn')-> had (10)-> get () get mjmway anjam denay kay liye astfsar bldar kay tarykwn ka astamal krynastfsar par afaal۔msaal kay tawr par ، saarfyn ki tadad ko ghnnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl kwda ka astamal krsktay hayn: $ ghnty = day by :: tybl ('saarfyn')-> ghnty () ؛ khlasaha main ، larywl ka dayta bys astfsar bldar bnanay kay liye ayk aasan aur rwany antrfys mhaya krta haay۔awr dayta bys kay swalat chlaiyn۔ham ayk nya astfsar bldar msaal shrwa karnay kay liye day by ka aghwaraa astamal krsktay hain aur astfsar main shkwn ko shaml karnay kay liye astfsar bldar kay tarykwn ka astamal krsktay hayn۔ham apni drkhwast main zayada tr dayta bys aapryshn anjam denay kay liye astfsar bldar ka astamal krsktay hain aur larywl kay maawn dayta bys sstm kay sath balkl kam karty hayn۔

Question: aap larywl main ay myl kesay bhyj saktay hayn؟myl daraiywrwn ki tshkyl aur ay myl bhyjnay kay aml ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: larywl main bay chyn lwdangh ayk aysy tknyk hay jo talkat kay sath dayta bys kay swalat ko bhatr bnanay kay liye astamal hawty haay۔jb khsawsayat kay tawr par fsaahat talkat tak rsaiy haasal karty ho tou ، talkat ka dayta "sst bhry hawiy" hawta hay ، yany talkat ka dayta drasal is wkt tak bhry nahin hawta jab tak keh aap pehli bar praprty tak rsaiy haasal nah kryn۔taham ، jab aap waldyn kay madal sy astfsar karty hain tou fsaahat kay talkat "bay chyn" talkat ko "bay chyn" krsktay hayn۔bay chyn lwdangh N + 1 astfsar kay msilay ko khtm krta hay ، jo is wkt hawta hay jab mtalkha aadad wa shmar ko bazayaft karnay kay ntyjay main hr rykarda kay liye astfsar kya jata haay۔ yahan larywl main bay chyn lwdangh astamal karnay kay akdamat hayn: fsaahat kay talkat kay tarykwn ka astamal karty hoey madalza kay mabyn talkat ki wzuahat kryn۔، jesay haaswn ، haasmany ، ka talk hay ، aur is ka talk astw myn haay۔ mtalkha madalza ko bay chyn hony kay l specified tarykha ki wzuahat karnay kay liye tarykha kay sath astamal kryn۔msaal kay tawr par ، pwst madal kay liye tbsaray kay talkat ko bay chyn karnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl kwda ka astamal krsktay hayn: $ pwsts = pwst :: ('tbsaray')-> haasal karain () () () sy mtalkha ki ghnty ko bay chyn karnay kay liye sath kaؤnt ka tarykha astamal kryn۔madalza۔msaal kay tawr par ، kesi pwst madal kay liye tbsaray ki ghnty ko bay chyn karnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl kwda ka astamal krsktay hayn: $ pwsts = pwst :: kay sath akaؤnt ('tbsaray')-> haasal karain () (()) get () get is kay bad rshtha ko lwda karnay kay liye bwjh ka tarykha astamal kryn۔waldyn ka madal pehlay hi bazayaft hochuka haay۔msaal kay tawr par ، ayk mkhsawsa pwst madal kay liye tbsaray kay talkat ko sst karnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl kwda ko astamal krsktay hayn: $ pwst = pwst :: tlash karain (1) ؛$ pwst-> lwda ('tbsaray') ؛ khlasaha yeh keh larywl main bay chyn lwdangh ayk aysy tknyk hay jo talkat kay sath dayta bys kay swalat ko bhatr bnanay kay liye astamal hawty haay۔ham fsaahat kay talkat kay tarykwn ka astamal karty hoey madalza kay mabyn talkat ki wzuahat krsktay hain aur mtalkha madalza ko bay chyn hony kay l specific wzuahat karnay kay liye tarykha kar astamal krsktay hayn۔ham waldyn kay madal ko pehlay hi bazayaft karnay kay bad rshtha ko lwda karnay kay liye mtalkha madalza ki ghnty aur bwjh kay tarykha kar ko bay chyn karnay kay liye bhi sath kaؤnt ka tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔bay chyn lwdangh N + 1 astfsar kay msilay ko khtm krty hay aur talkat kay sath dayta bys kay swalat ki karkrdghy ko nmayan tawr par bhatr bna sakti haay۔

Question: "larywl kay mjmwaay kya hayn؟ aap mjmwawn par aapryshn kesay karty hain ، jesay fltrngh ، mypngh ، aur kam krna؟"
Answer: larywl main ay myl bhyjnay kay l we ، hum un akdamat par aml pyra hawsktay hayn: myl daraiywrwn ki tshkyl: larywl ays aym ty py ، mylghn ، pwst mark ، aymyzawn ays ay ays ، aur bhyjnay kay zaryaay ay myl bhyjnay kay liye daraiywr fraham krta haay۔ham myl daraiywrwn ko knfygh/myl daat py py py knfyghryshn fail main tshkyl dy saktay hayn۔ ayk myl kabl klas tyar kryn: larywl main ay myl bhyjnay kay l we ، hamain ayk myl aybl klas bnana hoga ، aur hr ksm ka ay myl alag alag hawgha۔jb hum un main sy ayk bhyjna chahti hain tou ، hum ay myl bhyjnay kay liye myl aghwaraay ka astamal krsktay hayn۔ ay myl bhyjnay kay liye myl aghwaraay ka astamal kryn: hum larywl main ay mylza bhyjnay kay liye myl aghwaraay ka astamal krsktay hayn۔ham ay myl wsawl knndha ، mzumwn ، aur mwad ki wzuahat karnay kay liye ، sy sy ، by sy sy ، sbjykt ، aur wyw kay tarykwn ka astamal krsktay hayn۔ ay myl pyghamat ki hamayt kryn: chwnkha ay myl pyghamat bhyjna hamari drkhwast kay rdaml kay wkt par mnfy asar daal sakta hay ، lhazaa bohat sy dawylprza ay myl ki ktaar lghanay ka antkhab karty hayn۔ps mnzar bhyjnay kay pyghamat۔larywl nay apni blt un ywnyfaiyda ktaar API ka astamal karty hoey isy aasan bna diya haay۔myl pygham ki ktaar lghanay kay l we ، hum myl kay sath ktaar ka tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔ yahan larwyl main ay myl bhyjnay ki ayk msaal haay: // myl driversmail_driver=smtpmail_host=smtp.g myl..commail_password = aap ka email-passwordmail_encryption = tls // ayk myl kabl klas py aych py aartyzan bnaiyn: myl wylkm myl bnaiyn // myl ka astamal ay myl sws ko bhyjnay kay liye astamal karain \ spwrt \ facades \ myl \ myl \ wylkm myl \ myl \ myl ؛$ drkhwast-> saarf ())-> bhyjyn (nya wylkm myl ()) ؛ // ktaar ay myl pyghamat myl :: sy ($ drkhwast-> saarf ())-> sy sy ($ mazeed kam karnay walay)-> by sy sy ($ aywanwraizarza)-> ktaar (niay aardar hapda ($ aardar)) ؛ is msaal main ، hum myl daraiywrwn ko tshkyl/myl daat py aych py knfyghryshn fail main tshkyl dytay hayn۔ham myk: myl aartysn kmanda ka astamal karty hoey wylkm myl kay nam sy ayk myl kabl klas bnatay hayn۔ham ay myl wsawl knndha ، mzumwn aur mwad ki wzuahat karty hoey ، larywl main ay myl bhyjnay kay liye myl aghwaraay ka astamal karty hayn۔ham myl fhash kay liye ktaar ka tarykha astamal karty hain js main ay myl kay pyghamat ko byk ghraؤnda bhyjnay kay liye ktaar kay pyghamat mltay hayn۔ khlasaha main ، larwyl main ay myl bhyjnay main myl daraiywrwn ki tshkyl ، ayk myl klas tyar karna ، ay myl bhyjnay kay liye myl fhash ka astamal karna ، aur ps mnzar bhyjnay kay liye ay myl pyghamat ktaar lghana shaml hayn۔ham knfgh/myl daat py aych py knfyghryshn fail main myl daraiywrwn ko tshkyl dy saktay hain aur myk: myl aartysn kmanda ka astamal karty hoey ayk myl aybl klas tshkyl dy saktay hayn۔ham ay myl wsawl knndha ، mzumwn ، aur mwad ki wzuahat karty hoey ، larywl main ay myl bhyjnay kay liye myl aghwaraay ka astamal krsktay hayn۔ham ps mnzar bhyjnay kay liye ay myl kay pyghamat ki ktaar main myl kay bad ktaar ka tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔

Question: drkhwast ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay l Lar larywl main kychngh kay tsawr aur larywl kay kychngh mykanzam ko kis tarah astamal kya jaye is ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: larywl kay mjmwaay aadad wa shmar ki safwn kay sath kam karnay kay liye ayk taaktwr twl hayn۔wha fltrngh ، chhantnay aur dayta ko jwra twra karnay kay liye ayk rwany ، zanjyr wala API fraham karty hayn۔mjmwaay nakabl tskhyr hain ، yany hr jma karnay ka tarykha mkml tawr par nya mjmwaha msaal lwtata haay۔larywl kay zakhyray ko jma karnay waly mddghar fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey ya kesi sray par jma karnay kay tarykha kar ko kal krkay tshkyl diya jaskta haay۔ yahan kuch aam karwaiyan hain jo larywl kay mjmwawn par anjam di jaskty hayn: fltrngh: hum dyiay gaye kal byk ka astamal karty hoey kesi mjmwaha ko fltr karnay kay liye fltr kay tarykha kar ka astamal krsktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، saarfyn kay kesi mjmwaha ko fltr karnay kay liye sirf 21 sy zayada amr kay afrad ko shaml karnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl kwda ko astamal krsktay hayn: $ fltrda = $ saarfyn-> fltr (fnkshn ($ saarf) {wapsy $ saarf-> amr> 21؛}) ؛ nkshha sazay: hum hr ansar par dyiay gaye kal byk ka atalak krkay kesi mjmwaha ko tbdyl karnay kay liye nkshha ka tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، saarfyn kay zakhyray ko sirf un kay namwn ko shaml karnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl kwda ko astamal krsktay hayn: $ nam = $ saarfyn-> nkshha (fnkshn ($ saarf) {wapsy $ saarf-> nam ؛}) ؛ kam krna: hamhar ansar par dyiay gaye kal byk ka atalak krkay kesi ayk kymt par kesi ayk zakhyray ko kam karnay kay liye kam karnay ka tarykha astamal krskta haay۔msaal kay tawr par ، nmbrwn kay zakhyray ki rkm ka hasab lghanay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl kwda ka astamal krsktay hayn: $ SUM = $ nmbr-> kam karain (fnkshn ($ kyry ، $ nmbr) {wapsy $ kyry + $ nmbr ؛} ، 0) ؛zanjyr: hum ayk mjmwaha par pychydha kam anjam denay kay liye ayk sath mil kar jma karnay kay mtadd tarykwn ki zanjyr bnasktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، saarfyn kay kesi mjmwaha ko fltr karnay kay liye sirf 21 sy zayada amr waly afrad ko shaml karnay kay l and aur phir is kay ntyjay main jma karnay waly mjmwaha ka nkshha sirf un kay nam shaml karnay kay liye ، hum mndrjha zayl kwda ko astamal krsktay hayn: $ nam = $ saarfyn-> fltr (fnkshn (fnkshn ($)saarf) {rytrn $ saarf-> amr> 21 ؛})-> nkshha (fnkshn ($ saarf) {wapsy $ saarf-> nam ؛}) ؛ khlasaha yeh keh larywl kay mjmwaay aadad wa shmar ki safwn kay sath kam karnay ka ayk taaktwr zaryaha hayn۔larywl kay zaryaha fraham krdha mjmwaha kay tarykwn ka astamal karty hoey ، hum jma karnay ، jesay fltrngh ، mypngh ، aur kam karna ، kam anjam dy saktay hayn۔ham ayk mjmwaha par pychydha karwaiyan karnay kay liye ayk sath mil kar jma karnay kay mtadd tarykwn ki zanjyr bhi bnasktay hayn۔mjmwaay nakabl tskhyr hain ، yany hr jma karnay ka tarykha mkml tawr par nya mjmwaha msaal lwtata haay۔

Question: larywl main aap astsanaa aur ghltaywn ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟kstm astsanaa hayndalrza aur ghltay kay safhaat ki wzuahat kay aml ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: wyb ayply kyshnza ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye kychngh ayk lazmi tknyk hay ، aur larywl dayta kychngh kay l several kiy mykanzam mhaya krty haay۔kychngh main mymwry ya dask par ksart sy rsaiy waly dayta ko zakhyrha karna shaml hay takha mhanghay kmpywtyshn ya dayta bys kay swalat ko anjam dyiay baghair isy jldy sy bazayaft kya jaskay۔kychngh srwr aur dayta bys par bwjh ko kam krkay wyb ayply kyshnza ki karkrdghy ko nmayan tawr par bhatr bna sakti haay۔ yahan ayply kyshn ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay l la larywl kay kychngh mykanzam ko astamal karnay kay kuch tarykay hayn: kyshay aksar rsaiy waly dayta ko astamal krsktay hayn۔، jesay knfyghryshn failyn ، dayta bys kay swalat ، aur API rdaml۔ham kyshda dayta ko zakhyrha karnay aur bazayaft karnay kay liye kyshay haylpr fnkshn ya kyshay aghwaraay ka astamal krsktay hayn۔ rwt kychngh ka astamal kryn: rwt kychngh ayk bhatryn khsawsayt hay ، khasa tawr par ayply kyshnza kay liye jo bray tadad main trtyb aur kwda main phylay hoey rastay hayn۔yha aap kay rastwn ko dsty tawr par chart karnay kay tklyf dha kam ko kam karnay main mdd kay liye ayk hi kmanda main bhry hui rastwn ka ayk ghrwp haay۔as kay ntyjay main ، aap ki wyb sait kay safhaat bohat tyzay sy lwda hon ghay۔rwt kychngh larywl ko hr niay saarf kay liye ghraؤnda ap sy shrwa karnay kay bjaiay pehlay sy tyar shuda kyshay sy wkta fwkta rwts bazayaft karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔ aartyzan kmandaza aur kyshay mؤsar tarykay sy astamal kryn: aartysn ayk mshhawr kmanda lain twl hay jo larywl kay sath aata haay۔dawylprza kay liye bar bar chlnay aur pychydha kamwn ko khud bkhwd anjam dena aasan bnata haay۔wyb sait tkhlyk kar isy tyst krwanay aur kmanda tyar karnay kay liye bhi astamal krsktay hayn۔karyghr kmandawn ka astamal chalaky sy larywl ayply kyshnza ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay main mdd krskta haay۔jb bhi astfsar par aml draamd hawta hay tou hr bar dayta bys ko nshanha bnanay kay bjaiay ، hum astfsar kay ntaij ko kysh krsktay hain aur zurwrt pranay par inhain kyshay sy bazayaft krsktay hayn۔ khlasaha main ، wyb ayply kyshnza ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye kychngh ayk lazmi tknyk hay ، aur larywl kiy mykanzam fraham krta haay۔dayta kychngh kay liay۔ham larywl kay kychngh mykanzam ko ksart sy haasal karnay waly dayta ، jesay knfyghryshn failwn ، dayta bys kay swalat aur API rdaml kay liye astamal krsktay hayn۔larywl ayply kyshnza ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye hum rwt kychngh ، karyghr kmandaza ، aur dayta bys kychngh ka astamal bhi krsktay hayn۔dayta kychngh kay zaryaha ، hum srwr aur dayta bys par bwjh ko nmayan tawr par kam krsktay hain ، js kay ntyjay main tyza aur zayada zamha dar wyb ayply kyshnza mlty hayn۔

Question: "larywl ka aywnt sstm kya haay؟ aap wakaat ki wzuahat aur bhyjnay ka tarykha kis tarah karty hain ، aur samayn un wakaat ka kya jwab dy saktay hayn؟"
Answer: larywl main ، kstm astsanaa hayndalrza aur ghltay kay safhaat ka astamal karty hoey astsanaa aur ghltaywn ko snbhala jaskta haay۔larywl main kstm astsanaa hayndalrza aur ghltay kay safhaat ki wzuahat karnay kay akdamat yeh hayn: apni mrzuy kay mtaabk astsanaa hayndalrza ki wzuahat kryn: larywl ayp/mstsanyat/hayndalr.py py fail main dayfalt astsanaa hayndalr fraham krta haay۔ham is tabkay ko braha kar aur is kay tarykwn ko zayr kar kay kstm astsanaa hayndalrza ki wzuahat krsktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، kesi khasa ksm ki astsana ko snbhalnay kay l we ، hum ayk ryndar tarykha ki wzuahat krsktay hain jo kstm ghltay ka safhaha ya rspans waps krta haay۔ apni mrzuy kay mtaabk ghltay kay safhaat ki wzuahat kryn: larywl aam HTTP ghltaywn ، jesay 404 aur 500 ghltaywn kay liye pehlay sy taay shuda ghltay kay safhaat fraham krta haay۔ham wsail/khyalat/ghltaywn ki daairktry main blyda tymplyts tshkyl dy kar kstm ghltay kay safhaat ki wzuahat krsktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، 404 ghltay kay liye kstm ghltay kay safhaay ki wzuahat karnay kay l we ، hum wsail/khyalat/ghltaywn ki daairktry main 404.blade.php fail tshkyl dy saktay hayn۔ kstm raayt hayndalrza ko rjstr kar saktay hayn: hum ayp \ astsanaa \ main kstm astsanaa hayndalrza ko rjstr krsktay hayn۔hayndalr klas apni rpwrt ko awwr kar kay aur tarykwn ko pysh karty hayn۔ham ayp \ fraham knndghan \ aypzarwais prwwaidar klas main bhi kstm astsanaa hayndalrza ko ayp :: bainda ka astamal krkay rjstr krsktay hayn۔{awamy fnkshn ryndar ($ drkhwast ، astsanaa $ astsanaa) {aghr ($ astsanyٰ msaal kay tawr par kstwmyksyshn) {wapsy ka jwab ()-> dekhain ('ghltayan۔ kstwm' ، [] ، 500) ؛} waldyn ki wapsy :: ryndar ($ drkhwast ، $ astsanaa) ؛}} // apni mrzuy kay mtaabk ghltay kay safhaat kay zaryaha/khyalat/ghltayan/404.blade.phpresources/khyalat/ghltayan/500.blade.php // rjstr kstm raayt hayndalr ayp :: bainda (raayt hayndalr :: klas ، kstwmyksyshn hayndalr :: klas) ؛as msaal kay tawr par ، hum kstm aykspysyshn hayndalr kay nam sy ayk kstm astsanyٰ waly hayndalr ki wzuahat karty hain jo kstm aykspysyshn kay liye kstm ghltay ka safhaha waps karnay kay liye ryndar kay tarykha kar ko awwr raida krta haay۔ham wsail/khyalat/ghltaywn ki daairktry main blyda tymplyts bna kar 404 aur 500 ghltaywn kay liye kstm ghltay kay safhaat ki wzuahat karty hayn۔ham ayp \ fraham knndghan \ AppserviceProvider klas main kstm raayt hayndalr ko ayp :: bainda tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey rjstr karty hayn۔ khlasaha yeh hay keh hum kstm astsanaa hayndalrza aur ghltay kay safhaat ka astamal karty hoey larywl main astsanaa aur ghltaywn ko snbhal saktay hayn۔ham astsanaa hayndalr klas ko braha kar aur is kay tarykwn ko zayr krkay kstm astsanaa hayndalrza ki wzuahat krsktay hayn۔ham wsail/khyalat/ghltaywn ki daairktry main blyda tymplyts tshkyl dy kar kstm ghltay kay safhaat ki wzuahat krsktay hayn۔ham ayp \ mstsanyat \ hayndalr klas ya ayp \ fraham knndghan \ Appserviceprovider klas main kstm raayt hayndalrza ko rjstr krsktay hayn۔apny mrzuy kay mtaabk astsanaa hayndalrza aur ghltay kay safhaat ki wzuahat krkay ، hum saarf ka bhatr tjrbha fraham krsktay hain aur apnay larywl ayply kyshnza ki mzubwtay ko bhatr bna saktay hayn۔

Question: larywl kay task shydawlngh kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur larywl kay shydawlr ka astamal karty hoey shydawl kamwn ki wzuahat kesay kryn۔
Answer: larywl ka aywnt sstm ayk taaktwr twl hay jo dawylprza ko un ki drkhwast main pysh aanay waly mkhtlf wakaat ko sbskraib karnay aur snnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔aywnt ka nzaam ayk sadha mbsaryn pytrn par aml draamd fraham krta hay ، js sy dawylprza ko un ki drkhwast main ajzaaa ko daykwpl karnay ki ajazat mlty hay js kay ntyjay main dusri sawrt main mzubwtay sy jwraay hoey kwda ka ntyjha hawgha۔wakaat ki wzuahat aur bhyjnay kay akdamat aur snnay waly un wakaat ka kya jwab dy saktay hayn: wakaat ki wzuahat: wakaat ki taryf klaswn kay tawr par ki jati hay jo rwshn \ faؤndayshn \ wakaat \ daspyt aybl klas ko brahatay hayn۔ham apni larywl ayply kyshn ki ayp/aywnts daairktry main wakaat ki wzuahat krsktay hayn۔ snnay walon ki wzuahat kryn: snnay walon ko klaswn kay tawr par byan kya gaya hay jo rwshn \ maahadwn \ ktaar \ kwkyw antrfys ko nafza karty hayn۔ham apni larywl ayply kyshn ki ayp/snnay walon ki daairktry main samayn ki wzuahat krsktay hayn۔ ryghystr wakaat aur snnay walwn: hum ayp \ fraham knndghan \ aywnts srws prwwaidar klas main wakaat aur samayn ko rjstr krsktay hayn۔snnay wali praprty main tamam wakaat aur un kay snnay walon ki ayk saf haay۔ham is saf main zayada sy zayada wakaat shaml krsktay hain jtna hamari drkhwast ki zurwrt hawty haay۔msaal kay tawr par ، kesi saarf ko bhyjnay waly wakaha ko bhyjnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl kwda: aywnt (nya astamal shuda ($ saarf)) astamal krsktay hain Events wakaat ka jwab dyn: snnay waly hayndal kay tarykha kar ko nafza krkay wakaat ka jwab dytay hayn۔hayndal ka tarykha aywnt ki msaal haasal krta hay aur koi zurwry akdamat krskta haay۔msaal kay tawr par ، kesi saarf ko rjstr hony par khwsh aamdyd ay myl bhyjnay kay l we ، hum ayk bhyjnay waly myl snnay walon ki wzuahat krsktay hain jo hayndal kay tarykha kar ko nafza krta haay۔ yahan wakaat ki wzuahat aur bhyjnay kay tarykha ki ayk msaal hay aur snnay waly un wakaat ka jwab kesay dy saktay hayn: // is ki wzuahat kryn۔wakaat ka klas astamal shuda {daspych aybl astamal karain ؛awamy $ saarf ؛awamy fnkshn __ knstrkt ($ saarf) {$ this-> saarf = $ saarf ؛}} // samayn ki wzuahat karain synda wylkym myl ki wzuahat karain {awamy fnkshn hayndal (astamal shuda $ wakaha) {myl :: sy ($ wakaha-> saarf-> ay myl)-> bhyjyn (nya wylkm myl ($ wakaha-> saarf)) ؛}} // wakaat aur snnay walon ko rjstrda $ snyn = [userregstred :: class => [bhyjnay wala myl :: klas ،] ،] ؛ // daspych aywnts aywnt (nya astamal shuda ($ saarf)) ؛ is msaal main ، hum ayk saarf kay prwghram ki wzuahat karty hayn۔awr ayk bhyjnay wala myl snnay wala۔ham ayp \ fraham knndghan \ aywnts srws prwwydar klas main saarf kay mtaabk aywnt aur bhyjnay waly myl snnay walon ko rjstr karty hayn۔ham aywnt kay mddghar fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey ayk saarf kay prwghram ko bhyjtay hayn۔bhyjnay wala myl snnay wala saarf ko khwsh aamdyd ay myl bhyj kar astamal shuda aywnt ka jwab dyta haay۔ khlasaha main ، larwyl ka aywnt sstm ayk taaktwr twl hay jo dawylprza ko un ki drkhwast main pysh aanay waly mkhtlf wakaat ko sbskraib karnay aur snnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔ham wakaat aur snnay walon ki wzuahat krsktay hain ، wakaat aur snnay walon ko rjstr krsktay hain ، wakaat bhyj saktay hain ، aur snnay walon ka astamal karty hoey wakaat ka jwab dy saktay hayn۔larywl kay aywnt sstm ka astamal krkay ، hum apnay atalak main ajzaaa ko daykpl krsktay hain aur apnay kwda ki dykh bhal aur askyl ayblty ko bhatr bna saktay hayn۔

Question: aap larywl main API ki twsayk ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟twkn ya OAUTH ka astamal karty hoey API ki drkhwastwn ki twsayk kay aml ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: larywl ki task shydawlngh ayk aysy khsawsayt hay jo dawylprza ko bar bar kamwn ko taay shuda wkfwn par khud bkhwd chlanay kay liye shydawl karnay ki ajazat dyty haay۔task shydaywlr larywl main bnaya gaya hay aur dawylprza ko rwany ، azahaar aamyza nhaw ka astamal karty hoey kamwn ki wzuahat karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔larwyl kay shydawlr ka astamal karty hoey shydawl kamwn ki wzuahat karnay kay akdamat yeh hayn: shydawl task ki wzuahat kryn: shydawl task ki wzuahat ayp/knswl/krnl daat py aych py fail kay shydawl kay tarykha kar main ki hogi haay۔ham mkhsawsa wkfwn par chlnay waly kamwn ki wzuahat kay liye shydawlr kay rwany kay nhaw ka astamal krsktay hain ، jesay hr mnt ، ghhntha ، rwzaanha ، haftha war ، ya mahaanha۔ task kmandaza ki wzuahat: task kmandaza ko karyghr kay ahakamat kay tawr par byan kya gaya hay jo kam anjam dytay hayn۔ham myk: kmanda aartyzan kmanda ka astamal karty hoey task kmandaza ki wzuahat krsktay hayn۔ rjstr shydawl tasks: hum shydawl task ko shydawl knswl \ krnl klas main shydawl kay tarykha kar main shaml krkay rjstr krsktay hayn۔ham shydawlr kay rwany kay nhaw ka astamal is bat ki wzuahat karnay kay liye krsktay hain keh kam ko kab chlana chahaiay aur kon sa kmanda aml main laya jana chahaiay۔yha kmanda wkta fwkta kesi krwn jab ya kesi task shydaywlr ka astamal karty hoey chlaiy jany chahaiay۔ is ki ayk msaal hay keh larywl kay shydawlr ka astamal karty hoey shydawl task ki wzuahat kesay ki jaiay: // shydawl task spwrtda fnkshn shydawl (shydawl $ shydawl) {$ shydawl-> kmanda ('ay mylza) ki wzuahat kryn۔: bhyjyn ')-> rwzaanha () ؛$ shydawl-> kmanda ('rpwrts: jnryt')-> haftha war () ؛$ shydawl-> kmanda ('byk ap: bnaiyn')-> dayly aay ty ('23: 00 ') ؛} // task kmanda ays py py aartsn ki wzuahat kryn: kmanda bhyjnay waly myl ays py py aartyzan bnaiyn: kmanda jnrytry pwrt ays py py aartyzan bnaiyn: kmanda tkhlyk byk ap // rjstr shydawl task spwrtda $kmandaza = [kmandaza \ synda mylza :: klas ، kmandaza \ jnrytry pwrt :: klas ، kmandaza \ tkhlyk byk ap :: klas ،] ؛ // shydawlr chlaiyn * * * * * * sy day/rastha sy aap ki prwjykt aur py py py aartyn shydawl:chlaiyn >> /dev /null 2> & 1 main is msaal kay tawr par ، hum ayp kay shydawlr kay rwany kay nhaw ka astamal karty hoey shydawl kamwn ki wzuahat karty hain jo ayp \ knswl \ krnl klas kay shydawl kay tarykha kar main hayn۔ham myk: kmanda aartysn kmanda ka astamal karty hoey task kmandaza ki wzuahat karty hayn۔ham kmandaza praprty main shaml krkay ayp \ knswl \ krnl klas main shydawl kamwn ko rjstr karty hayn۔ham shydawlr ko ayk krwn jab ka astamal karty hoey chlatay hain jo shydawl chlata haay: wkta fwkta aartyzan kmanda chlata haay۔ khlasaha main ، larwyl ki task shydawlngh ayk aysy khsawsayt hay jo dawylprza ko bar bar kamwn ko shydawl karnay ki ajazat dyty hay takha woh mkhsawsa wkfwn par khud bkhwd chlaiay۔ham ayp \ knswl \ krnl klas kay shydawl kay tarykha kar main shydawlr kay rwany kay nhaw ka astamal karty hoey shydawl kamwn ki wzuahat krsktay hayn۔ham myk: kmanda aartyzan kmanda ka astamal karty hoey task kmanda ki wzuahat krsktay hain aur ayp \ knswl \ krnl klas main shydawl task rjstr kar saktay hayn۔ham krwn jab ya task shydawlr ka astamal karty hoey shydawlr chla saktay hayn۔larywl kay task shydawlngh ka astamal krkay ، hum bar bar kamwn ko khwdkar krsktay hain aur apni ayply kyshnza ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bna saktay hayn۔

Question: larywl afk kya haay؟larywl main ktaar ki nghrany aur un ka antzaam karnay kay liye aap afk ka astamal kesay krsktay hayn؟
Answer: larywl main API ki twsayk ko twkn ya OAUTH ka astamal karty hoey snbhala jaskta haay۔twkn ya OAUTH ka astamal karty hoey API ki drkhwastwn ki twsayk karnay kay akdamat yeh hayn: twkn par mbny twsayk: larywl aap ki drkhwast kay hr saarf ko tfwyzu krdha bay trtyb twkn kay zaryaha API ki twsayk ka ayk aasan hal fraham krta haay۔phalay sy taay shuda tawr par ، larywl jhaaza aap ki drkhwast kay hr saarf ko tfwyzu krdha bay trtyb twkn kay zaryaha API ki twsayk kay ayk aasan hal kay sath jhaaza krta haay۔aap ki tshkyl/auth.php knfyghryshn fail main ، ayk API gharda pehlay hi byan kya gaya hay aur twkn daraiywr ko astamal krta haay۔ham STR :: bay trtyb tarykha astamal karty hoey saarfyn kay liye twkn tyar krsktay hain aur inhain saarfyn kay tybl kay API_TOKEN kalm main astwr krsktay hayn۔as kay bad hum drkhwast kay ajazat namay kay haydar main twkn pas krkay API ki drkhwastwn ki twsayk krsktay hayn۔ aawt par mbny twsayk: larywl larywl paspwrt ka astamal karty hoey API ki twsayk kay liye ayk mkml OAUTH2 srwr aml draamd bhi fraham krta haay۔paspwrt kesi ayp kay API main OAuth2 ko shaml karnay ka saaf sthra ، sydha sydha rastha fraham krta haay۔ham kmpwzar ka astamal karty hoey paspwrt anstal krsktay hain aur phir paspwrt chla saktay hayn: paspwrt kay liye drkar ankrpshn kyza aur dayta bys hajrt pyda karnay kay liye aartyzan kmanda anstal kryn۔as kay bad hum OAUTH2 ki twsayk aur ajazat kay l required mtalwbha rastwn aur kntrwlrza ki wzuahat krsktay hayn۔ khlasaha main ، larywl API ki twsayk ko snbhalnay kay liye do tarykay fraham krta haay: larywl paspwrt ka astamal karty hoey twkn par mbny twsayk aur OAUTH par mbny twsayk۔twkn par mbny twsayk main saarfyn kay liye twkn tyar karna aur inhain drkhwast kay atharty haydar main mntkl karna shaml haay۔OAUTH par mbny twsayk main API ki twsayk aur ajazat kay liye mkml OAUTH2 srwr ko nafza karnay kay liye larywl paspwrt ka astamal shaml haay۔larywl kay API twsayk kay tarykha kar ka astamal krkay ، hum apnay APIs ko mhafwza bnasktay hain aur apnay saarfyn kay dayta ki hafazat krsktay hayn۔

Question: larywl kay aywnt bradakastngh kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur yeh srwr aur mؤkl kay mabyn hakyky wkt kay mwasalat ko kis tarah kabl bnata haay۔
Answer: larywl hawraizan ayk pykyj hay jo larywl ayply kyshnza main ktaar kay antzaam aur nghrany kay liye ayk khwbsawrt daysh bwrda aur kwda sy chlnay wali trtyb fraham krta haay۔as sy dawylprza ko aasany sy apnay ktaar kay nzaam ki klydy pymaish ki nghrany karnay ki ajazat mlty hay ، jesay mlazamt kay zaryaay thrwpt ، rn taim ، aur mlazamt ki nakamy۔larywl afk ki kuch aham khsawsayat yeh hayn: yeh ayk awpn swrs pykyj haay۔ yeh ayk khwbsawrt daysh bwrda ka astamal karty hoey tamam ktaar aur mlazamt ki malwmat dkhata haay۔ yeh zayr altwaa mlazamtwn ، mkml mlazamtwn ، aur nakam mlazamtwn kay baray main malwmat fraham krta haay۔ yeh mytrks ka astamal karty hoey ktaar aur mlazamt ki malwmat fraham krta haay۔.azulanha mlazamtwn par nzar daaltay hayn۔larywl afk ko anstal karnay kay bad ، hamain py aych py karyghr afk ko chlanay ki zurwrt haay: knfyghryshn fail aur afk asaasawn ko shaia karnay kay liye kmanda anstal kryn۔as fail main rydays knkshn ، karknwn kay aml ki tadad ، aur dyghr aapshnza ki trtybat shaml hayn۔ larywl afk aml ko shrwa kryn: hum py aych py karyghr afk kmanda ka astamal karty hoey larywl afk aml ko shrwa krsktay hayn۔yha kmanda larywl afk kay aml ko shrwa krta hay aur daysh bwrda url.monitor ko zaahar krta hay aur ktaar ka antzaam krta haay: hum larywl afk daysh bwrda ko apni larywl ayply kyshn main ktaar ki nghrany aur antzaam kay liye astamal krsktay hayn۔daysh bwrda zayr altwa mlazamtwn ، mlazamtwn ko mkml karnay aur nakam mlazamtwn kay baray main malwmat dkhata haay۔ham mlazamtwn ki nghrany kay liye daysh bwrda ka astamal bhi krsktay hayn۔ham larywl afk ko anstal aur tshkyl dy saktay hain aur apni larywl ayply kyshn main ktaarwn ki nghrany aur un ka antzaam karnay kay liye daysh bwrda ka astamal krsktay hayn۔larywl afk ka astamal krkay ، hum aasany sy apnay ktaar kay nzaam ki klydy pymaish ki nghrany krsktay hain aur apni drkhwast ki karkrdghy aur wshwsnyyta ko bhatr bna saktay hayn۔

Question: aap larywl main safhaha bndy ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟dayta bys kay ntaij ko safhaha bndy karnay aur safhaha bndy kay lnks ko pysh karnay ki ayk msaal pysh kryn۔
Answer: larywl ki aywnt bradakastngh ayk khsawsayt hay jo srwr aur mؤkl kay mabyn hakyky wkt kay mwasalat ko kabl bnaty haay۔as sy dawylprza ko wyb skat ya dyghr nshryaty daraiywrwn ka astamal karty hoey saarfyn ko sbskraib karnay kay prwghram nshr karnay ki ajazat mlty haay۔yha hay keh larywl ka wakaha nshryat kis tarah kam krta haay: wakaat ki wzuahat kryn: wakaat ki taryf klaswn kay tawr par ki hogi hay jo alywmynyt \ faؤndayshn \ wakaat \ daspyt aybl klas main twsya krty hayn۔ham apni larywl ayply kyshn ki ayp/aywnts daairktry main wakaat ki wzuahat krsktay hayn۔ snnay walon ki wzuahat kryn: snnay walon ko klaswn kay tawr par byan kya gaya hay jo rwshn \ maahadwn \ ktaar \ kwkyw antrfys ko nafza karty hayn۔ham apni larywl ayply kyshn ki ayp/snnay walon ki daairktry main samayn ki wzuahat krsktay hayn۔ ryghystr wakaat aur snnay walwn: hum ayp \ fraham knndghan \ aywnts srws prwwaidar klas main wakaat aur samayn ko rjstr krsktay hayn۔snnay wali praprty main tamam wakaat aur un kay snnay walon ki ayk saf haay۔ham is saf main zayada sy zayada wakaat shaml krsktay hain jtna hamari drkhwast ki zurwrt hawty haay۔yha tarykha aywnt ko wyb skat ya dyghr bradakastngh daraiywrwn ka astamal karty hoey tamam saarfyn kay liye nshr krta haay۔ wakaat kay liye lstn: klaint jawa askrpt aur larywl aykw laibryry ka astamal karty hoey aywnts ko sn saktay hayn۔larywl aykw laibryry chynlza ko sbskraib karnay aur wakaat ki snnay kay liye ayk sadha API mhaya krty haay۔ khlasaha main ، larywl ki aywnt bradakastngh ayk aysy khsawsayt hay jo srwr aur mؤkl kay mabyn hakyky wkt kay mwasalat ko kabl bnaty haay۔ham wakaat aur samayn ki wzuahat krsktay hain ، wakaat aur snnay walon ko rjstr krsktay hain ، nshryaty prwghramwn ko nshr krsktay hain ، aur jawa askrpt aur larywl aykw laibryry ka astamal karty hoey aywnts kay liye sn saktay hayn۔larywl kay aywnt bradakastngh ka astamal krkay ، hum ryil taim ayply kyshnza tyar krsktay hain jo saarf ka bhatr tjrbha fraham karty hain aur apni ayply kyshnza ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnatay hayn۔

Question: larywl ki lwklaizayshn ki khsawsayt kya haay؟ksy drkhwast main mtadd zabanwn ki mdd kay liye aap lwklaizayshn ko kis tarah tshkyl dytay hain aur astamal karty hayn؟
Answer: wyb ayply kyshnza kay liye safhaha bndy ayk aam zurwrt hay ، aur larywl ayk aasan aur aasan astamal main safhaha bndy ka nzaam fraham krta haay۔yhaan dayta bys kay ntaij ka safhaha bndy karnay aur larywl main safhaha bndy kay lnks ko pysh karnay ka tarykha haay: safhaha bndy dayta bys kay ntaij: larywl ayk safhaha bndy ka tarykha fraham krta hay js ko dayta bys kay ntaij ko safhaha bndy karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ham yeh tarykha astfsar bldar ya fsaahat madal par astamal krsktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، astfsar bldar kay ntaij ka safhaha bndy karnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl kwda ko astamal krsktay hayn: $ saarfyn = DB :: tybl ('saarfyn')-> safhaha bndy (15) ؛.yha kwda fy safhaha 15 saarfyn ko bazayaft krta haay۔ham is tarykha ko apnay blyda tymplyts main safhaha bndy kay lnks ko zaahar karnay kay liye astamal krsktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، upar byan krdha $ saarfyn kay mtghyr kay liye safhaha bndy kay lnks ko zaahar karnay kay liye ، hum mndrjha zayl kwda ka astamal krsktay hayn: {{$ saarfyn-> lnk ()}}۔yha kwda $ saarfyn kay mtghyr kay liye safhaha bndy kay lnks ko pysh krta haay۔ is ki ayk msaal hay keh kis tarah dayta bys kay ntaij ka safhaha bndy kya jaye aur larywl main safhaha bndy kay lnks ko pysh kya jaiay: // pyjynytngh dayta bys kay ntaij $ saarfyn = DB :: tybl ('saarfyn')-> safhaha bndy (15) ؛ // safhaha bndy kay lnks {{$ saarfyn-> lnk ()}} is msaal main ، hum saarfyn ki myza sy fy safhaha 15 saarfyn ko bazayaft karnay kay liye safhaha bndy ka tarykha astamal karty hayn۔as kay bad hum apnay blyda tymplyt main safhaha bndy kay lnks ko pysh karnay kay l links lnks ka tarykha astamal karty hayn۔ khlasaha main ، larywl ayk aasan aur aasan astamal main safhaha bndy ka nzaam fraham krta hay jsay dayta bys kay ntaij ko safhaha bndy karnay aur safhaha bndy kay lnks ko pysh karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ham hr safhaay par rykarda ki ayk mkhsawsa tadad ko bazayaft karnay kay liye safhaha bndy ka tarykha astamal krsktay hain ، aur hum apnay blyda tymplyts main safhaha bndy kay lnks ko pysh karnay kay l links lnks ka tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔larywl kay safhaha bndy kay nzaam ka astamal krkay ، hum apnay wyb ayply kyshnza kay saarf kay tjrbay ko bhatr bnasktay hain aur inhain zayada mwsar bna saktay hayn۔

Question: larywl ki ajazat ki palysywn kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur un ka astamal danay dar rsaiy kntrwl kay kwaad ki wzuahat kay liye kis tarah kya jaskta haay۔
Answer: larywl ki lwklaizayshn ki khsawsayt dawylprza ko un ki drkhwastwn main mtadd zabanwn ki hamayt karnay ki ajazat dyty haay۔lwklaizayshn main kesi drkhwast ya wyb sait ko mtadd zabanwn main trjmha karna shaml haay۔larywl main lwklaizayshn ki tshkyl aur astamal kay akdamat yeh hayn: zaban ki failwn ki wzuahat kryn: zaban ki failwn ko py aych py ki safwn kay tawr par byan kya gaya hay js main hr maawn zaban kay trjmay hawtay hayn۔ham apni larywl ayply kyshn kay wsail/lyngh daairktry main zaban ki failwn ki wzuahat krsktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، anghryzay kay l a kesi zaban ki fail ki wzuahat karnay kay l we ، hum wsail/lyngh daairktry main ayk EN.PHP fail tshkyl dy saktay hayn۔ lwklaizayshn ko astamal karnay kay liye ayply kyshn ki tshkyl kryn: hum knfygh main mkamy aapshn ko trtyb dy kar lwklaizayshn ko astamal karnay kay liye ayply kyshn ko tshkyl dy saktay hayn۔app.php knfyghryshn fail۔ham saarf ki trjyhaat ya dyghr awaml ki bnyad par mthark tawr par lwkl ko taay karnay kay liye ayp :: sytlwkyl ka tarykha bhi astamal krsktay hayn۔ lwklaizayshn ko nzaaray main astamal kryn: hum trans ya __ mddghar afaal ka astamal krkay apnay khyalat main lwklaizayshn ka astamal krsktay hayn۔yha afaal mwjwdha mkam main di hogi klyd kay liye trjmha bazayaft karty hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، kesi nzaaray main trjmha shuda tar ko zaahar karnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl kwda ka astamal krsktay hayn: {{__ ('pyghamat۔ wylkm')}}. zabanwn kay mabyn swich: hum zaban kay swichr ka astamal krkay zabanwn kay mabyn swich krsktay hayn۔zaban ka swichr ayk darap daaؤn ya dyghr UI ansar hawta hay jo saarfyn ko apni trjyhay zaban mntkhb karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔ham saarf kay antkhab ki bnyad par mthark tawr par lwkl ko taay karnay kay liye ayp :: sytlwkyl ka tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔ is ki ayk msaal hay keh larwl main lwklaizayshn ko kis tarah tshkyl aur astamal kya jaiay: // zaban failyswrsza/lyngh/ayn.fprytn ki wzuahat karain ['astkbal' '=> 'myry ayply kyshn main khwsh aamdyd' ،] ؛ // lwklaizayshn knfygh/app.php'locale '=>' en 'astamal karnay kay liye ayply kyshn ko tshkyl dyn ، // lwklaizayshn ko mlahazaha karain {{__ __ (' pyghamat۔ wylkm ')}}// zabanwn kay darmiyan swich anghryzay fransysy // mkamy mthark tawr par rwt syt karain :: haasal karain ('lwkl/{lwkl}' ، fnkshn ($ lwkl) {ayp :: sytlwkyl ($ lwkl) ؛ wapsy ry daairykt ()-> byk () ؛}})-> nam ('lwkl') ؛ is msaal main ، hum anghryzay kay liye ayk zaban ki fail ki wzuahat karty hain js main wylkm klyd ka trjmha hawta haay۔ham knfygh/ayp.py py py py py py py knfyghryshn fail main EN lwkl astamal karnay kay liye ayply kyshn ko tshkyl dytay hayn۔ham trans haylpr fnkshn ka astamal ayk nzaaray main trjmha shuda tar ko zaahar karnay kay liye karty hayn۔ham ayk aysy zaban ka swichr ki wzuahat karty hain jo saarfyn ko anghryzay aur fransysy kay mabyn swich karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔ham ayp :: sytlwkyl ka tarykha astamal karty hain takha saarf kay antkhab ki bnyad par mthark tawr par mkam taay kya jaskay۔ khlasaha main ، larywl ki lwklaizayshn ki khsawsayt dawylprza ko apni drkhwastwn main mtadd zabanwn ki hamayt karnay ki ajazat dyty haay۔ham zaban ki failwn ki wzuahat krsktay hain ، lwklaizayshn kay astamal kay l application drkhwast ko tshkyl dy saktay hain ، lwklaizayshn ko nzaaray main astamal krsktay hain ، zabanwn kay mabyn swich krsktay hain ، aur lwkl ko mthark tawr par mrtb krsktay hayn۔larywl ki lwklaizayshn ki khsawsayt ka astamal krkay ، hum apni ayply kyshnza ko dnya bhr kay mkhtlf alakwn aur sakaftwn kay saarfyn kay liye kabl rsaiy bna saktay hayn۔

Question: aap larywl main byrwny API kay sath kis tarah bat chyt krsktay hayn؟HTTP drkhwastyn bnanay aur API kay rdaml par karrwaiy karnay kay aml ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: larywl ki ajazat ki palysyan ayk aysy khsawsayt hain jo dawylprza ko un ki drkhwastwn kay liye danay dar rsaiy kntrwl kay kwaad ki wzuahat karnay ki ajazat dyty hayn۔palysyan klas hain jo kesi khasa madal ya wsail kay ard ghrd ajazat ki mntak ko mnzam krty hayn۔larywl akdamat ko ajazat denay kay do bnyady tarykay mhaya krta haay: ghyts aur palysyan۔ghyts ajazat kay l a ayk sadha ، bndsh par mbny nktaha nzar fraham karty hain ، jabky palysyan kesi khasa madal ya wsail kay ghrd mntak ki ghrwp hawty hayn۔larywl ki ajazat ki palysywn ko astamal karnay kay akdamat yeh hayn: palysyan ki wzuahat: palysyan klaswn kay tawr par byan ki gain hain jo rwshn \ auth \ rsaiy \ hayndalystraizayshn klas main twsya krty hayn۔ham apni larywl ayply kyshn ki ayp/palysywn ki daairktry main palysywn ki wzuahat krsktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، pwst madal kay liye kesi palysy ki wzuahat karnay kay l we ، hum ayp/palysywn ki daairktry main ayk pwstwlysy klas tshkyl dy saktay hayn۔ ajazat kay kwaad ki wzuahat kryn: ajazat kay kwaad ko palysy klas kay tarykwn kay tawr par byan kya gaya haay۔an tarykwn ko saarf ki msaal aur madal msaal mlty hay aur ayk bwlyn wylyw lwtatay hain js sy yeh zaahar hawta hay keh aya saarf madal par karrwaiy karnay ka mjaza hay ya nhayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، kesi ajazat kay asawl ki wzuahat karnay kay liye jo sirf pwst kay malk ko pwst ko ap dayt karnay ki ajazat dyta hay ، hum pwstwlysy klas kay baray main ayk tazaha kary kay tarykha kar ki wzuahat krsktay hain jo chyk krta hay keh agar saarf pwst kay malk haay۔ rjstr palysyan: hum palysyan main rjstr krsktay hayn۔ghyt :: palysy ka tarykha astamal krkay Autherserviceprovider klas۔yha tarykha ayk madal klas ko is sy mtalkha palysy klas main nkshha bnata haay۔msaal kay tawr par ، pwst madal kay liye pwstwlysy klas ko rjstr karnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl kwda ka astamal krsktay hayn: ghyt :: palysy (pwst :: klas ، pwstwlysy :: klas) ؛. karrwaiywn ko akhtyar dyn: hum akhtyarat kay tarykha kar ko akhtyar dy saktay hayn۔hamaray kntrwlrza ya rastay۔as tarykha kar ko ajazat kay asawl aur madal msaal ka nam mlta haay۔msaal kay tawr par ، kesi pwst par ap dayt aykshn ko akhtyar denay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl kwda ka astamal krsktay hayn: $ yha-> akhtyar ('ap dayt' ، $ pwst) ؛۔ yahan larwyl ki ajazat ki palysywn ki wzuahat aur astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: //palysywn kay tabkay ki tay .n {hayndalys mjaza astamal karain ؛pblk fnkshn ap dayt (saarf $ saarf ، pwst $ pwst) {wapsy $ saarf-> ID === $ pwst-> ywzar_ aai day ؛}} // rjstr palysyan ghyt :: palysy (pwst :: klas ، pwstwlysy :: klas) ؛ // aykshn aspblk fnkshn ap dayt ko akhtyar dyn (drkhwast $ drkhwast ، pwst $ pwst) {$ this-> akhtyar ('ap dayt' ، $ pwst)؛// pwst ko ap dayt kryn} is msaal main ، hum ayk pwstwlysy klas ki wzuahat karty hain jo chyk krta hay keh aya saarf pwst ka malk hay ya nhayn۔ham ghyt :: palysy kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey pwst madal kay liye pwstwlysy klas rjstr karty hayn۔ham apnay kntrwlr main akhtyar kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey kesi pwst par ap dayt aykshn ki ajazat dytay hayn۔ khlasaha main ، larywl ki ajazat ki palysyan ayk aysy khsawsayt hain jo dawylprza ko un ki drkhwastwn kay liye danay dar rsaiy kntrwl kay kwaad ki wzuahat karnay ki ajazat dyty hayn۔ham palysywn ki wzuahat krsktay hain ، akhtyarat kay kwaad ki wzuahat krsktay hain ، palysyan rjstr krsktay hain ، aur akhtyar kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey akdamat ko mjaza krsktay hayn۔larywl ki ajazat ki palysywn ka astamal krkay ، hum apni drkhwastwn ki slamty aur wshwsnyyta ko bhatr bnasktay hain aur is bat ko ykyny bnasktay hain keh saarf sirf mjaza akdamat anjam dy saktay hayn۔

Question: larywl ki task ktaaryn kya hayn؟aap larywl main ps mnzar ki prwsysngh kay liye ktaar main mlazamtwn ki wzuahat aur rwanha karty hayn؟
Answer: larywl ayk blt main HTTP klaint fraham krta hay jo byrwny APIs kay sath bat chyt karna aasan bnata haay۔aych ty ty py klaint py aych py kay ghwzal aych ty ty py klaint kay awpry hasaay par bnaya gaya hay aur yeh twsayk ، rwtngh ، aur mwsar aabjykt sy mtalk mypngh (aw aar aym) jesi khsawsayat mhaya krta haay۔LARAVEL main HTTP ki drkhwastyn karnay aur API kay rdaml par aml karnay kay akdamat yeh hayn: HTTP drkhwastyn bnaiyn: larwyl ka HTTP klaint HTTP drkhwastyn bnanay kay tarykay fraham krta hay ، jesay GET ، POST ، PUT ، aur hazaf kryn۔ham un tarykwn ko byrwny APIs ko drkhwastyn bhyjnay aur jwabat bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal krsktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، kesi byrwny API ko haasal karnay ki drkhwast karnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl kwda ka astamal krsktay hayn: http :: get ('https://api.example.com/users') ؛. aml API kay rdaml: larwyl ka HTTP klaint tarykay fraham krta haay۔API kay rdaml par karrwaiy karnay kay liye ، jesay JSON ، jsm ، aur haysayt۔ham un tarykwn ko API kay rdaml sy dayta nkalnay aur ghltaywn ko snbhalnay kay liye astamal krsktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، kesi API kay jwab sy JSON dayta ko nkalnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl kwda astamal krsktay hayn: $ jwab = http :: get ('https://api.example.com/users') ؛$ dayta = $ rspans-> json () ؛. yahan ayk msaal hay keh HTTP ki drkhwastyn kesay bnaiyn aur LARAVEL main API kay rdaml par aml kryn: // HTTP ki drkhwastyn $ jwab = HTTP :: get ('https: //api.example).com/saarfyn ') ؛ // aml API RESPORSESIF ($ rdaml-> haysayt () === 200) {$ dayta = $ rspans-> JSON () ؛// dayta par karrwaiy kryn} else {// ghltay ko snbhalyn} is msaal main ، hum byrwny API ko haasal karnay ki drkhwast karnay kay liye larywl kay HTTP klaint ka GET tarykha astamal karty hayn۔as kay bad hum API kay rdaml par karrwaiy kay liye haysayt aur JSON tarykwn ka astamal karty hayn۔aghr rdaml ki haysayt 200 hay tou ، hum JSON dayta ko rdaml sy nkaltay hain aur is par karrwaiy karty hayn۔bsawrt dyghr ، hum ghltay ko snbhaltay hayn۔ khlasaha main ، larywl ka HTTP klaint byrwny APIs kay sath bat chyt karnay ka ayk aasan aur aasan astamal karnay ka tarykha fraham krta haay۔ham HTTP klaint ko HTTP drkhwastyn bnanay aur API kay rdaml par karrwaiy karnay kay liye astamal krsktay hayn۔larywl kay HTTP klaint ka astamal krkay ، hum aysy ayply kyshnza bnasktay hain jo byrwny API kay sath mrbwta hon aur saarf ka bhatr tjrbha fraham krskyn۔

Question: larywl kay aywnt snnay walon kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur woh drkhwast kay andr mkhsawsa wakaat ka kya jwab dy saktay hain
Answer: larywl ki task ktaaryn ayk aysy khsawsayt hain jo dawylprza ko drkhwast ki karkrdghy ko mtasar kyay baghair ، ps mnzar main wkty kam anjam denay ki ajazat dyty hayn۔ktaaryn mkhtlf ksm kay mkhtlf byk byk ، jesay aymyzawn ays kyw ays ، rydays ، ya yahan tak keh ayk rshtha dar dayta bys main ayk mthad API fraham krty hayn۔larywl main ps mnzar ki prwsysngh kay liye ktaar main mlazamtwn ki wzuahat aur bhyjnay kay akdamat yeh hayn: mlazamtwn ki wzuahat: mlazamtwn ko klaswn kay tawr par byan kya gaya hay jo alywmynyt \ maahadwn \ ktaar \ kywiyw antrfys ko nafza karty hayn۔ham apni larywl ayply kyshn ki ayp/mlazamtwn ki daairktry main mlazamtwn ki wzuahat krsktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، kesi mlazamt ki wzuahat karnay kay liye jo ay myl bhyjta hay ، hum ayp/jabs daairktry main ayk synda myl klas tshkyl dy saktay hayn۔as tarykha kar sy ps mnzar ki prwsysngh kay liye mlazamt ko ktaar main shaml kya jata haay۔msaal kay tawr par ، synda myl ki nwkry bhyjnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl kwda ko astamal krsktay hayn: synda myl :: bhyjnay ($ saarf) ؛ prwsys mlazamtwn: larywl main ayk karyghr kmanda shaml hay jo ktaar ka karkn shrwa kray ga aur niy mlazamtwn par amldraamd kray ga kywnkha inhain is par dhkyl diya jaye gha۔ktaar.ham ktaar ka astamal karty hoey karkn ko chla saktay hayn: wrk aartyzan kmanda۔nwt karain keh ayk bar ktaar: wrk kmanda shrwa hochuki hay ، jab tak isy dsty tawr par band nah hony ya trmynl band nahin kya jata hay is wkt tak chltay rahain ghay۔ yahan ayk msaal hay keh larywl main ps mnzar ki prwsysngh kay liye ktaar main mlazamtwn ki wzuahat aur rwanha kya jaiay: // jabsklas synda myl ki wzuahat kryn۔awzaar kay mtaabk quessed daspych aybl ، antrayktw kywiyw ، kwibl ، syrylaiza mwdalza ka astamal kryn۔mhafwza $ saarf ؛awamy fnkshn __ knstrkt (saarf $ saarf) {$ this-> saarf = $ saarf ؛} pblk fnkshn hayndal () {// ay myl bhyjyn}} // mlazamt bhyjnay ki mlazamt :: bhyjnay ($ saarf) ؛ // prwsys jab ays py py aartyzan ktaar: is msaal kay tawr par ، hum ayk synda myl mlazamt ki wzuahat karty hain jo saarf ko ay myl bhyjta haay۔ham daspych kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey synda myl ki nwkry bhyjtay hayn۔ham ktaar ka astamal karty hoey kam par karrwaiy karty hayn: wrk aartyzan kmanda۔ khlasaha main ، larywl ki task ktaaryn ayk aysy khsawsayt hain jo dawylprza ko ps mnzar main wkty kamwn ko anjam denay ki ajazat dyty hayn۔ham mlazamtwn ki wzuahat krsktay hain ، mlazamtwn ko bhyj saktay hain ، aur larywl kay ktaar kay nzaam ka astamal karty hoey mlazamtwn par karrwaiy krsktay hayn۔larywl ki task ktaar ka astamal krkay ، hum apni ayply kyshnza ki karkrdghy aur wshwsnyyta ko bhatr bnasktay hain aur apnay saarfyn ko bhatr saarf ka tjrbha fraham krsktay hayn۔

Question: larywl main aap dayta bys kay lyn dyn ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟lyn dyn main swalat ko anjam denay aur tranzaykshnl aapryshnwn ko snbhalnay kay aml ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: larywl kay aywnt kay snnay waly ayk khsawsayt hain jo dawylprza ko un ki drkhwast kay andr mkhsawsa wakaat snnay aur isi kay mtaabk un ka jwab denay ki ajazat dyty haay۔yhaan larwyl kay aywnt snnay walon kay kam kesay hawtay hayn: jab ayplykyshn main kuch hawta hay tou wakaat athaiay jatay hayn۔ lstnrza ko un wakaat ko snnay aur is kay mtaabk rd aml zaahar karnay ki taryf ki jati haay۔ larwyl kay aywnt snnay waly mbsaryn kay nmwnay par mbny hain ، jo dawylprza ko kesi sstm main ajzaaa ko daykwpl karnay ki ajazat dyta hay bsawrt dyghras kay ntyjay main mzubwtay sy jwraay hoey kwda ka ntyjha hawgha۔ larwl ayk blt un aywnts srws prwwydar klas mhaya krta hay jo dawylprza ko ayplykyshn kay liye aywnt snnay waly nkshwn ki wzuahat karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔ dawylprza baltrtyb ayp/aywnts aur ayp/snnay walon ki daairyktryza main apni mrzuy kay mtaabk wakaat aur samayn ki wzuahat krsktay hayn۔ dawylprza kar saktay hayn۔wakaat aur samayn ko aywnts srws prwpraidar klas main snyn۔rjstrda۔ yahan larwyl kay aywnt kay snnay walon ki wzuahat aur astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: // wakaat ki wzuahat kay aardar ki wzuahat karain {daspych aybl ، antrayktw sakts ، syrylaizasmwdalza ka astamal kryn۔awamy $ aardar ؛awamy fnkshn __ knstrkt (aardar $ aardar) {$ yha-> aardar = $ aardar ؛}} // samayn kay bhyjnay kay slslay ki wzuahat {pblk fnkshn hayndal (aardar hapda $ aywnt) {// kstmr ko shpmnt ki atalaa bhyjyn}} // rjstrda wakaat aur snnay walon ko rjstrda $ snyn = [aardar hapda :: klas => [synt shpmnt nwtyshn :: klas ، klas ،] ،] ؛ // bhyjnay waly wakaat ki trtyb :: daspych ($ aardar) ؛ is msaal main ، hum ayk aardar shp aywnt ki wzuahat karty hain js main aardar aabjykt hawta haay۔ham ayk bhyjnay ki wzuahat karnay waly snnay walon ki wzuahat karty hain jo ghahak ko khyp ka nwtyfkyshn bhyjta haay۔ham aywntsrwais prwwydar klas main aardar shp aywnt aur bhyjnay kay liye bhyjnay waly snnay waly ko rjstr karty hayn۔ham aardarza shp aywnt ko rwanha karty hain aur aardar aabjykt ko is kay pas bhyj dytay hayn۔ khlasaha main ، larwyl kay aywnt kay snnay waly ayk aysy khsawsayt hain jo dawylprza ko un ki drkhwast kay andr mkhsawsa wakaat snnay ki ajazat dyty hay aur isi kay mtaabk un ka jwab dyty haay۔ham wakaat aur snnay walon ki wzuahat krsktay hain ، wakaat aur snnay walon ko rjstr krsktay hain ، aur larwyl kay aywnt sstm ka astamal karty hoey wakaat ko bhyj saktay hayn۔larywl kay aywnt snnay walon ka astamal krkay ، hum apni drkhwast main ajzaaa ko daykpl krsktay hain aur apnay kwda ki brkrar rkhnay aur askyl ayblty ko bhatr bna saktay hayn۔

Question: "larywl ki atalaaat kya hayn؟ aap mkhtlf chynlza (ay myl ، ays aym ays ، wghyrha) kay zaryaha saarfyn ko atalaaat ki wzuahat aur bhyjtay hayn؟"
Answer: larywl main ، dayta bys kay lyn dyn ka astamal dayta bys aapryshnwn kay ayk syt ko kam kay wahad ywnt kay tawr par anjam denay kay liye kya jata haay۔lyn dyn is bat ko ykyny bnanay main mdd krta hay keh dayta bys mstkl haalt main rhata hay ya tou tamam aapryshn ka artkab krkay ya kesi ghltay ki sawrt main un ko waps lwt kr۔larywl main dayta bys kay lyn dyn ko snbhalnay kay akdamat yeh hayn: ayk lyn dyn shrwa kryn: hum dayta bys knkshn par shrwaat kay tarykha kar ko kal krkay tranzaykshn shrwa krsktay hayn۔yha tarykha dayta bys ko ayk nya tranzaykshn shrwa karnay kay liye btata haay۔ tranzaykshn kay andr aykstykyt swalat: hum DB aghwaraay ka astamal krkay lyn dyn kay andr swalat par amldraamd krsktay hayn۔lyn dyn kay andr paiay janay waly tamam swalat ko kam ki ayk akaiy kay tawr par smjha jaye gha۔ kmyt ya rwl byk tranzaykshn: swalat ko anjam denay kay bad ، hum ya tou tranzaykshn ka artkab ya rwl byk krsktay hayn۔aghr tamam swalat ko kamyaby kay sath phansy di hogi tou hum kmt kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey lyn dyn ka artkab krsktay hayn۔aghr koi astfsar nakam ho gaya hay tou ، hum rwl byk tarykha ka astamal karty hoey lyn dyn ko rwl byk krsktay hayn۔ yahan larwl main dayta bys kay lyn dyn ko kis tarah snbhalnay ki ayk msaal haay: // tranzaykshn day by shrwa karain :: byghntransykshn () ؛ tranzaykshn day by kay andr {// par aml draamd kryn:: tybl ('saarfyn')-> ap dayt (['ayktw' => sch]) ؛db :: tybl ('aardar')-> hazaf () ؛// tranzaykshn day by ka artkab karain :: kmt () ؛} kych (\ astsanaa $ ay) {// rwl byk tranzaykshn day by :: rwl byk () ؛} is msaal main ، hum shrwaat kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey tranzaykshn shrwa karty hayn۔ham day by aghwaraay ka astamal karty hoey lyn dyn kay andr do swalat par amldraamd karty hayn۔as kay bad hum kmt kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey lyn dyn ka artkab karty hain agar dono swalat ko kamyaby kay sath phansy di ghiy۔aghr koi astfsar nakam hogaya tou ، hum rwl byk tarykha ka astamal karty hoey is astsana aur lyn dyn ko rwl byk karty hayn۔ khlasaha main ، dayta bys kay lyn dyn ko larywl main kam kay ayk wahad ywnt kay tawr par dayta bys aapryshnza kay ayk syt ko anjam denay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ham ayk lyn dyn shrwa krsktay hain ، lyn dyn kay andr swalat par amldraamd krsktay hain ، aur tranzaykshn ka artkab ya rwl byk krsktay hayn۔dayta bys kay lyn dyn ka astamal krkay ، hum apni ayply kyshnza main dayta mstkl mzaajy aur salmyt ko ykyny bnasktay hayn۔

Question: larywl kay bradakastngh chynlza kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur woh kis tarah wyb skat ka astamal karty hoey ryil taim mwasalat ko ahal bnatay hayn۔
Answer: larywl ki atalaaat ayk aysy khsawsayt hain jo dawylprza ko mkhtlf chynlza ، jesay ay myl ، ays aym ays ، slyk aur bohat kuch kay zaryaay saarfyn ko atalaaat bhyjnay ki ajazat dyty hayn۔larywl main mkhtlf chynlza kay zaryaha saarfyn ko atalaaat ki wzuahat aur bhyjnay kay akdamat yeh hayn: atalaaat ki wzuahat: atalaaat ko klaswn kay tawr par byan kya gaya hay jo rwshn \ atalaaat \ atalaaaty tabkay ko braha dytay hayn۔ham apni larywl ayply kyshn ki ayp/atalaaat ki daairktry main atalaaat ki wzuahat krsktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، kesi saarf ko ay myl bhyjnay waly nwtyfkyshn ki wzuahat kay l we ، hum ayp/nwtyfykyshn daairktry main ayk synda mylnwtyfykyshn klas tshkyl dy saktay hayn۔ nwtyfkyshn chynlza ki wzuahat kryn: larywl mkhtlf nwtyfkyshn chynlza ، jesay ay myl ، ays aym ays ، slyk aur bohat kuch ki hamayt krta haay۔ham nwtyfkyshn klas kay zaryaay nwtyfkyshn chynlza ki wzuahat krsktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، ay myl nwtyfkyshn chynl ki wzuahat karnay kay liye ، hum mndrjha zayl kwda ko astamal krsktay hayn: awamy fnkshn ($ kabl mtalk) {wapsy ['myl'] ؛} .synda atalaaat: hum mtala karnay waly adaray par mtala karnay waly tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey atalaaat bhyj saktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، kesi saarf ko ay myl ki atalaa bhyjnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl kwda ka astamal krsktay hayn: $ saarf-> mtala karain (nya bhyjnay wala mylnwtyfykyshn ($ dayta)) ؛۔ yahan mkhtlf chynlza kay zaryaha saarfyn ko atalaaat ki wzuahat aur bhyjnay ki ayk msaal haay۔larywl myn: // atalaaat ki wzuahat karain klaslas synda mylnwtykyshn nwtyfkyshn main twsya krta hay {kwiwibl astamal karain ؛mhafwza $ dayta ؛awamy fnkshn __ knstrkt ($ dayta) {$ yha-> dayta = $ dayta ؛} awamy fnkshn ($ mtala karnay wala) {wapsy ['myl'] ؛} pblk fnkshn twmyl ($ kabl zakr) {wapsy (nya myl mysyj) -> lain ('haylw'۔('/')) -> lain ('hamary drkhwast astamal karnay kay liye aap ka shkryha!') ؛}} // nwtyfykyshn bhyjyn $ saarf-> mtala karain (nya bhyjay janay wala mylnwtyfykyshn ($ dayta)) ؛ is msaal main ، hum ayk synda mylnwtyfykyshn klas ki wzuahat karty hain jo saarf ko ay myl bhyjta haay۔ham nwtyfkyshn klas kay wya kay tarykha kar main ayk ay myl atalaaaty chynl ki wzuahat karty hayn۔ham kesi saarf ko mtala karnay waly hasty par mtala karnay waly tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey ayk ay myl ki atalaa bhyjtay hayn۔ khlasaha yeh keh larywl ki atalaaat ayk aysy khsawsayt hain jo dawylprza ko mkhtlf chynlza ، jesay ay myl ، ays aym ays ، slyk aur bohat kuch kay zaryaay saarfyn ko atalaaat bhyjnay ki ajazat dyty hayn۔ham atalaaat ki wzuahat krsktay hain ، nwtyfkyshn chynlza ki wzuahat krsktay hain ، aur larywl kay nwtyfkyshn sstm ka astamal karty hoey atalaaat bhyj saktay hayn۔larywl kay nwtyfkyshn sstm ka astamal krkay ، hum saarfyn ko mtala aur apni drkhwast kay sath mshghwl rakh saktay hayn۔

Question: "aap larywl main saarf kay krdar aur ajazatwn ko kis tarah nafza krsktay hayn؟ krdar ki wzuahat ، ajazatyn tfwyzu karnay aur ajazat ki janch pratal kay aml ki wzuahat kryn۔"
Answer: larywl kay bradakastngh chynlza ayk aysy khsawsayt hain jo wyb sakts ka astamal karty hoey srwr aur klaint kay mabyn hakyky wkt kay mwasalat ko kabl bnaty hayn۔bradakastngh chynlza ayk mntaky mwasalat ka zaryaha fraham karty hain jo wyb sakt knkshn sy zayada malwmat ko shaia karnay aur sbskraib karnay main mdd krta haay۔yhaan yeh hay keh larywl kay bradakastngh chynlza kis tarah kam karty hayn: nshryaty chynlza ko klaswn kay tawr par byan kya gaya hay jo rwshn \ bradakastngh \ chynl klas main twsya karty hayn۔ larwl tyn ksm kay chynlza fraham krta haay: awamy chynlza ، njy chynlza ، aur mwjwdghy chynlza۔ pblk chynlza kesi bhi mؤkl kay zaryaha kesi bhi mؤkl kay zaryaha kesi bhi mؤkl kay zaryaha astamal kya jaskta haay۔، jabky njy chynlza tak rsaiy kay l requess tsadyk ki zurwrt hawty haay۔kstm chynlza ki wzuahat krsktay hain aur inhain bradakast srwys prwwaidar klas main rjstr krsktay hayn۔ dawylprza bradakast kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey prwghramwn ko nshr krsktay hain aur aywnt ko kesi bhi zurwry aadad wa shmar ko mntkl krsktay hayn۔ jab koi wakaha nshr kya jata hay tou ، is chynl kay tamam saarfyn ko ryil taim main mtala kya jata haay۔larywl kay bradakastngh chynlza ki wzuahat aur astamal karnay kay tarykha ki ayk msaal: // chynlza kay asklas ki chytanl ki wzuahat chynl {awamy fnkshn main shaml hony ($ saarf ، $ kmray myn) {schaiy waps ؛} awamy fnkshn rkhsat ($ saarf ، $ kmrha) {sch waps ؛}} // rjstr chynlza brwdakast :: chynl ('chyt۔ {kmrha id}' ، chytanl :: klas) ؛ // nshryaty wakaat ki brwdakast (nya chyt mysyj ($ pygham))-> taؤn () ؛ is msaal main ، hum ayk chytanl ki wzuahat karty hayn۔klas jo saarfyn ko shaml hony aur chyt rwm chhwranay ki ajazat dyty haay۔ham chyt kay liye chychynl klas rjstr karty hayn۔ {rwmyda} chynl bradakast :: chynl ka tarykha kar ka astamal karty hawiay۔ham nshryaty tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey chyt rwm main dusray saarfyn ko chyt mysj aywnt nshr karty hayn۔ khlasaha main ، larywl kay bradakastngh chynlza ayk aysy khsawsayt hain jo srwr aur klaint kay mabyn wyb skat ka astamal karty hoey hakyky wkt kay mwasalat ko kabl bnaty hayn۔ham larywl kay bradakastngh sstm ka astamal karty hoey chynlza ، chynlza ko rjstr karnay aur nshryat kay prwghramwn ki wzuahat krsktay hayn۔larywl kay bradakastngh chynlza ka astamal krkay ، hum ryil taim ayply kyshnza tyar krsktay hain jo saarf ka bhatr tjrbha fraham karty hain aur apni ayply kyshnza ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnatay hayn۔

Question: larywl ka kychngh sstm kya haay؟aap kis tarah mhanghay kamwn ko kysh karty hain aur larywl main kychda dayta ko bazayaft karty hayn؟
Answer: larywl main saarf kay krdar aur ajazatwn ko nafza karnay kay l we ، hum nechay dyiay gaye mrahal par aml krsktay hayn: ayk pykyj anstal kryn: larywl saarf kay krdar aur ajazatwn ko nafza karnay kay liye mtadd pykyj mhaya krta hay ، jesay aspyty larywl ki ajazat ، baؤnsr ، aur sprd۔ham kmpwzar ka astamal karty hoey un main sy kesi bhi pykyj ko anstal krsktay hayn۔ krdar aur ajazatwn ki wzuahat kryn: hum pykyj kay API ka astamal karty hoey krdarwn aur ajazatwn ki wzuahat krsktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، kesi krdar ki wzuahat kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl kwda ko astamal krsktay hayn: krdar :: tkhlyk karain (['nam' => 'aydamn']) ؛.ajazat ki wzuahat kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl kwda ka astamal krsktay hayn: ajazat :: bnaiyn (['nam' => 'mzuamyn main trmym kryn']) ؛ krdar ko ajazatyn tfwyzu kryn: hum pykyj kay API ka astamal karty hoey krdarwn ko ajazatyn tfwyzu krsktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، kesi krdar ko ajazat denay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl kwda ka astamal krsktay hayn: $ rwl-> ghywpryshnw ('mzuamyn main trmym kryn') ؛ saarfyn ko krdar tfwyzu kryn: hum pykyj kay API ka astamal karty hoey saarfyn ko krdar tfwyzu krsktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، kesi saarf ko apna krdar tfwyzu karnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl kwda ka astamal krsktay hayn: $ saarf-> tfwyzu ('aydamn') ؛۔ ajazat chyk kryn: hum pykyj kay API ka astamal karty hoey ajazat chyk krsktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، yeh chyk karnay kay liye keh aya kesi saarf kay pas ajazat hay ، hum mndrjha zayl kwda ko astamal krsktay hayn: agar ($ saarf-> haaspryshntw ('mzuamyn main trmym kryn')) {// kuch kryn} .yha saarf kay krdar ko kis tarah nafza karnay ki ayk msaal haay۔awr aspyty larywl ajazat pykyj ka astamal karty hoey ajazat: // krdar aur ajazat namha ki wzuahat karain :: bnaiyn (['nam' => 'aydamn']) ؛ ajazat :: tkhlyk karain (['nam' => 'mzuamyn main trmym kryn']) ؛// krdarwn ko ajazat namha $ rwl-> denay wala pysh karnay wala ('mzuamyn main trmym kryn') ؛ // saarfyn ko krdar tfwyzu karain $ saarf-> tfwyzu rwl ('aydamn') ؛ // chyk ki janch pratal ($ saarf-> haaspryshntw ('mzuamyn main trmym kryn')) {// kuch kryn} khlasaha main ، hum larywl main saarf kay krdar aur ajazatwn ko ayk pykyj anstal krkay ، krdar aur ajazat ki wzuahat krkay ، krdarwn ko ajazatyn tfwyzu ، saarfyn ko krdar tfwyzu krkay ، aur ajazat ki janch pratal krsktay hayn۔saarf kay krdar aur ajazatwn ka astamal krkay ، hum apni drkhwast kay kuch hasawn tak rsaiy ko mhadwd krsktay hain aur apnay kwda ki slamty aur wshwsnyyta ko bhatr bna saktay hayn۔

Question: larywl kay task shydawlngh kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain keh krwn azahaarat ka astamal karty hoey aur mkhsawsa wkfwn par chlanay kay liye kis tarah kamwn ka shydawl kya jaiay۔
Answer: larywl ka kychngh sstm ayk aysy tknyk hay jo ayply kyshn ki karkrdghy ko tyza karnay kay liye aadad wa shmar ko aarzuy tawr par kyshay main mhafwza karnay kay liye astamal hawty haay۔aaly karkrdghy aur askyl ayblty kay hasawl kay liye kychngh zurwry hay ، aur larywl kychngh aur mkhtlf kychngh byk aynda ka ayk mzubwta aur astamal main aasan aml draamd fraham krta haay۔yhaan mhanghay kamwn ko kysh karnay aur larywl main kychda dayta ko bazayaft karnay kay akdamat hayn: ayk kychngh daraiywr ka antkhab kryn: larywl mkbwl kychngh byk aynda jesay mym kychda ، rydays ، daainwmwda by ، aur rshtha dar dayta bys ko baks sy bahar ki hamayt krta haay۔phalay sy taay shuda tawr par ، larywl ko fail kyshay kay daraiywr ko astamal karnay kay liye tshkyl diya gaya hay ، jo srwr kay fail sstm par syrylaizada ، kychda aabjykt ko mhafwza krta haay۔as fail main ، hum yeh btasktay hain keh hum kis kyshay daraiywr ko apni drkhwast main dayfalt kay zaryaha astamal karna chahayn ghay۔ham dusray akhtyarat jesay kyshay ka sabkha ، kysh laif taim ، aur zayada sy zayada ki bhi wzuahat krsktay hayn۔ kysh dayta: hum kyshay aghwaraay ka astamal krkay dayta kysh krsktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، 10 mnt kay liye mhanghay dayta bys kay astfsar kay ntyjay main ، hum mndrjha zayl kwda ka astamal krsktay hayn: kyshay :: yad rakhien ('saarfyn' ، 10 ، fnkshn () {wapsy DB :: tybl ('saarfyn')->haasal karain () ؛}) ؛.msaal kay tawr par ، saarfyn kay astfsar kay kyshda ntaij ko bazayaft karnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl kwda ko astamal krsktay hayn: $ saarfyn = kyshay :: haasal karain ('saarfyn') ؛. yahan ayk msaal hay keh kis tarah mhanghay kamwn ko kysh kya jaye aur larywl main kychda dayta ko bazayaft kya jaiay۔: // kychngh kych :: syt dayfalt daraywr ('rydas') ki tshkyl karain ؛ // kyshay ka dayta $ saarfyn = kyshay = kyshay :: yad rakhien ('saarfyn' ، 10 ، fnkshn () {wapsy DB :: tybl ('saarfyn')-> haasal karain (haasal karain (') ؛}) ؛ // kyshda dayta ko bazayaft karain $ saarfyn = kyshay :: get ('saarfyn') ؛ is msaal main ، hum rydays daraiywr ko astamal karnay kay liye kychngh ko tshkyl dytay hayn۔ham yad rkhnay kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey 10 mnt kay liye ayk
