mhanghay dayta bys kay astfsar ka ntyjha nkaltay hayn۔ham ghyt tarykha ka astamal karty hoey saarfyn kay astfsar kay kychda ntaij ko bazayaft karty hayn۔ khlasaha yeh keh ، larywl ka kychngh sstm ayk aysy tknyk hay jo ayply kyshn ki karkrdghy ko tyza karnay kay liye aadad wa shmar ko aarzuy tawr par ayk kyshay main mhafwza karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ham ayk kychngh daraiywr ka antkhab krsktay hain ، kychngh ، kych dayta ko tshkyl dy saktay hain ، aur larywl kay kychngh sstm ka astamal karty hoey kychda dayta ko bazayaft krsktay hayn۔kychngh ka astamal krkay ، hum apni ayply kyshnza ki karkrdghy aur askyl ayblty ko bhatr bnasktay hain aur apnay saarfyn ko bhatr saarf ka tjrbha fraham krsktay hayn۔

Question: larywl main aap farm un pt aur CSRF thafza ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟farm un pt ki twsayk karnay aur CSRF hamlwn ko rwknay kay aml ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: larywl kay kam ka nzaam alawkat dawylprza ko bar bar kamwn ko khud kar bnanay aur mkhsawsa wkfwn par chlanay ki ajazat dyta haay۔task shydawlngh sstm ywnks krwn daymwn kay upar bnaya gaya hay aur shydawl kamwn ki wzuahat kay liye ayk aasan aur bdyhay nhaw fraham krta haay۔larywl main mkhsawsa wkfwn par chlanay kay liye kamwn ko shydawl karnay kay akdamat yeh hayn: shydawl tasks ki wzuahat kryn: larywl kay task shydaywlr ki wzuahat ayp/knswl/krnl daat py py fail main ki hogi haay۔ham shydawl kamwn ki wzuahat shydawl kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey krsktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، hr mnt ko chlanay kay liye kesi kam ko shydawl karnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl kwda: $ shydawl-> kmanda ('myra: task')-> hr mnyt () ؛. task frykwinsy ki wzuahat kryn: hum kam ki tadd ki wzuahat krsktay hayn۔dstyab tarykwn ka astamal karty hoey jesay hr mnؤt ، hr fywymynts ، ghhntha ، rwzaanha ، haftha war ، mahaanha aur salanha۔ham CRON kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey kstm wkfwn ki bhi wzuahat krsktay hayn۔ kam ki rkawtwn ki wzuahat kryn: jab koi kam chlana chahaiay tou hum kam ki rkawtwn ko mhadwd karnay ki wzuahat krsktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، hum haftay kay dn kay tarykha kar ko sirf haftay kay dn ko chlanay kay liye astamal krsktay hayn۔ task shydaywlr: larwyl kay task shydawlr ko srwr par ayk krwn mlazamt ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ham larywl kmanda shydawlr ko chlanay kay liye srwr main drj zayl krwn antry ko shaml krsktay hayn: * * * * * * py aych py/raha/rastha/tw/aartyzan shydawl: chlaiyn >>/dev/null 2> & 1. shydawl ki ayk msaal hay keh kis tarah shydawl kya jaiay۔larywl main mkhsawsa wkfwn par chlanay kay kam: // shydawl tasks ki wzuahat karain $ shydawl-> kmanda ('myra: task')-> hr mnyt () ؛ // task frykwiynsy ki wzuahat karain $ shydawl-> kmanda ('myra: task')--> rwzaanha () // kam ki rkawtwn ki wzuahat $ shydawl-> kmanda ('myra: task')-> haftay kay dn () ؛ // task shydawlr chlaiyn * * * * * py aych py/path/tw/aartysn shydawl: rn>> /dev /null 2> & 1 main yeh msaal ، hum hr mnt ko hr mnt kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey chlanay kay liye ayk shydawl task ki wzuahat karty hayn۔ham rwzaanha kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey rwzaanha chlanay kay liye ayk taay shuda kam ki wzuahat karty hayn۔ham haftay kay dn kay tarykha kar ko astamal karty hoey sirf haftay kay dn chlanay kay liye ayk shydawl task ki wzuahat karty hayn۔ham srwr par krwn jab ka astamal karty hoey larywl kmanda shydawlr chlatay hayn۔ khlasaha main ، larwyl kay task shydawlngh sy dawylprza ko bar bar kamwn ko khwdkar karnay aur mkhsawsa wkfwn par chlanay ki ajazat mlty haay۔ham shydawl kamwn ki wzuahat krsktay hain ، task frykwiynsy ki wzuahat krsktay hain ، task ki rkawtwn ki wzuahat krsktay hain ، aur larwyl kay task shydawlngh sstm ka astamal karty hoey task shydawlr chla saktay hayn۔larywl kay task shydawlngh ka astamal krkay ، hum apni ayply kyshnza ki karkrdghy aur wshwsnyyta ko bhatr bnasktay hain aur apnay saarfyn ko bhatr saarf ka tjrbha fraham krsktay hayn۔

Question: "larywl ka fail astwryj sstm kya haay؟ larywl main aap mkhtlf fail astwryj daraiywr (mkamy ، S3 ، wghyrha) ko kis tarah tshkyl dytay hain aur astamal karty hayn؟"
Answer: larywl main ، hum farm un pt ko snbhal saktay hain aur kras sait ki drkhwast jalsazay (CSRF) kay hamlwn ko nechay dyiay gaye akdamat par aml karty hoey rwk saktay hayn: ayk CSRF twkn tyar kryn: larwyl ayply kyshn kay zayr antzaam hr faal saarf syshn kay liye CSRF twkn tyar krta haay۔as twkn ko yeh tsadyk karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay keh tsadyk shuda saarf drasal drkhwast ko drkhwastyn dy raha haay۔ CSRF twkn ko farm main shaml kryn: jab bhi hum apni drkhwast main kesi HTML farm ki wzuahat karty hain ، hamain shkl main ayk pwshydha CSRF twkn fylda ko shaml karna chahaiay۔takha CSRF prwtykshn mdal wyir drkhwast ki twsayk krskay۔ham twkn fylda tyar karnay kay liye CSRF blyda hadayt ka astamal krsktay hayn۔ham kntrwlr main twsayk kay kwaad ki wzuahat krsktay hain aur un pt ko drst karnay kay liye twsayk karnay ka tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، is ki twsayk karnay kay liye keh kesi fylda ki zurwrt hay ، hum mndrjha zayl kwda ko astamal krsktay hayn: $ drst dayta = $ drkhwast-> twsayk karain (['nam' => 'mtalwbha']) ؛۔ yahan farm un pt ko snbhalnay ki ayk msaal haay۔awr larywl main sy ays aar ayf prwtykshn: // ayk CSRF twknlrwl tyar karain hr faal saarf syshn kay liye khud bkhwd ayk CSRF twkn tyar krta haay۔@sy ays aar ayf ... </farm> // farm un pt pblk fnkshn astwr (drkhwast $ drkhwast) ki twsayk karain {$ drst dayta = $ drkhwast-> twsayk karain (['nam' => 'mtalwbha' ، 'ay myl' => 'mtalwbha | ay myl'،' pas wrda '=>' mtalwb | kam sy km: 8 '،]) ؛// farm dayta par karrwaiy kryn} is msaal main ، hum ayply kyshn kay zaryaha mnzam hr faal saarf syshn kay liye khud bkhwd ayk CSRF twkn tyar karty hayn۔ham CSRF blyda hadayt ka astamal karty hoey CSRF twkn ko farm main shaml karty hayn۔ham larywl kay twsayk kay nzaam ka astamal karty hoey farm un pt ki twsayk karty hain aur farm dayta par karrwaiy karty hain agar twsayk sy ghzar jata haay۔ khlasaha yeh hay keh ، hum farm main CSRF twkn smyt CSRF twkn pyda krkay ، aur farm main CSRF twkn tyar krkay CSRF hamlwn ko rwk saktay hain aur larywl main CSRF hamlwn ko rwk saktay hayn۔larywl kay twsayk kay nzaam ka astamal karty hoey un pt۔larywl kay blt un sy ays aar ayf prwtykshn aur twsayk kay nzaam ka astamal krkay ، hum apni ayply kyshnza ki slamty aur wshwsnyyta ko bhatr bnasktay hain aur apnay saarfyn ko bhatr saarf ka tjrbha fraham krsktay hayn۔

Question: "larywl main larywl kay ktaar lghanay waly nzaam kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur larywl main mkhtlf ktaar daraiywr (rydays ، dayta bys ، wghyrha) ko tshkyl aur astamal karnay ka tarykha۔"
Answer: larywl ka fail astwryj sstm ayk aysy khsawsayt hay jo dawylprza ko mkhtlf astwryj daraiywrwn ، jesay mkamy fail sstm ، aymyzawn ays 3 ، aur ryk aspys klaؤda astwryj sy failwn ko zakhyrha karnay aur bazayaft karnay ki ajazat dyty haay۔larywl main mkhtlf fail astwryj daraiywrwn ki tshkyl aur astamal karnay kay akdamat yeh hayn: fail astwryj daraiywr ka antkhab kryn: larywl mkhtlf fail astwryj daraiywrwn ko baks sy bahar ki hamayt krta hay ، jesay mkamy fail sstm ، aymyzawn ays 3 ، aur ryk aspys klaؤda astwryj۔ham is daraiywr ka antkhab krsktay hain jo hamari ayply kyshn ki zurwryat ko bhatryn tawr par mnasb bnaiay۔as fail main ، hum yeh btasktay hain keh hum kis fail astwryj daraiywr ko apni drkhwast main dayfalt kay zaryaha astamal karna chahti hayn۔ham dusray akhtyarat jesay astwryj lwkyshn ، asnad ، aur bohat kuch ki bhi wzuahat krsktay hayn۔ fail astwryj ka astamal kryn: hum astwryj aghwaraay ka astamal krkay fail astwryj ka astamal krsktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، fail ko pehlay sy taay shuda dask main astwr karnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl kwda astamal krsktay hayn: astwryj :: daalyn ('fail daat ty ayks' ، 'mshmwlat') ؛.phalay sy taay shuda dask sy fail ko bazayaft karnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl kwda ka astamal krsktay hayn: $ mshmwlat = astwryj :: get ('file.txt') ؛. yahan larwl main mkhtlf fail astwryj daraiywrwn ko tshkyl denay aur astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay:// fail astwryj 'dasks' => ['mkamy' => ['daraiywr' => 'mkamy' ، 'jra' => astwryj_path ('ayp') ،] ، 's3' => ['daraiywr' =>'s3' ، 'key' => 'aap ki klydy' ، 'khfyha' => 'aap ka khfyha' ، 'alakha' => 'aap ka alakha' ، 'balty' => 'aap ka-bkt' ،] ،]] ، // fail astwryj astwryj ka astamal karain :: dask ('mkamy')-> put ('file.txt' ، 'mshmwlat') ؛ $ mshmwlat = astwryj :: dask ('lwkl')-> haasal karain ('fail daat ty ayks') ؛ is msaal main ، hum mkamy aur S3 daraiywrwn ko astamal karnay kay liye fail astwryj ko tshkyl dytay hayn۔ham mkamy dask main fail ko zakhyrha karnay aur mkamy dask sy fail kay mndrjat ko bazayaft karnay kay liye astwryj kay aghwaraay ka astamal karty hayn۔ khlasaha un ka khlasaha ، larywl ka fail astwryj sstm ayk aysy khsawsayt hay jo dawylprza ko mkhtlf astwryj daraiywrwn sy failwn ko zakhyrha karnay aur bazayaft karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔ham fail astwryj daraiywr ka antkhab krsktay hain ، fail astwryj ko tshkyl dy saktay hain ، aur larywl kay astwryj aghwaraay ka astamal karty hoey fail astwryj ka astamal krsktay hayn۔larywl kay fail astwryj sstm ka astamal krkay ، hum apni ayply kyshnza ki karkrdghy aur askyl ayblty ko bhatr bnasktay hain aur apnay saarfyn ko bhatr saarf ka tjrbha fraham krsktay hayn۔

Question: larywl kay blt un twsayk kay nzaam ka astamal karty hoey aap saarf ki twsayk ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟saarfyn ko twsayk karnay aur saarf kay syshnwn ka antzaam karnay kay aml ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: larywl ka ktaar lghanay wala nzaam ayk aysy khsawsayt hay jo dawylprza ko wkt kay astamal kay kamwn ko mwkhr karnay ki ajazat dyty hay ، jesay ay mylza bhyjna ، tsaawyr prwsysngh ، aur bohat kuch ، ps mnzar main is par karrwaiy ki jaskty haay۔ktaaryn drkhwastwn ki karkrdghy aur askyl ayblty ko bhatr bnanay main mdd krty hain js ki wjha sy woh blyzangh aspyda kay sath wyb drkhwastwn ka jwab dy saktay hain aur saarfyn ko bhatr saarf ka tjrbha fraham karty hayn۔larwl main mkhtlf ktaar daraiywrwn ko tshkyl denay aur un ka astamal karnay ka tarykha yahan haay: ayk ktaar daraiywr ka antkhab kryn: larywl baks sy bahar mkhtlf ktaar daraiywrwn ki hamayt krta hay ، jesay rydays ، dayta bys ، aymyzawn ays kyw aur bohat kchh۔ham daraiywr ka antkhab krsktay hain jo hamari drkhwast ki zurwryat kay mtaabk haay۔as fail main ، hum yeh btasktay hain keh hum kis ktaar daraiywr ko apni drkhwast main dayfalt kay zaryaha astamal karna chahayn ghay۔ham dusray akhtyarat jesay ktaar knkshn ، ktaar dwbarha kwshsh karnay ki kwshshwn ، aur zayada sy zayada ki bhi wzuahat krsktay hayn۔ mlazamtwn ki wzuahat: mlazamtwn ko klaswn kay tawr par byan kya gaya hay jo rwshn \ maahadwn \ ktaar \ kywiyw antrfys ko nafza karty hayn۔ham apni larywl ayply kyshn ki ayp/mlazamtwn ki daairktry main mlazamtwn ki wzuahat krsktay hayn۔ das pych mlazamtyn: hum daspych kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey mlazamtyn bhyj saktay hayn۔as tarykha kar sy ps mnzar ki prwsysngh kay liye ktaar main kam shaml hawta haay۔ prwsys mlazamtyn: larywl main ayk karyghr kmanda shaml hay jo ktaar ka karkn shrwa kray ga aur niy mlazamtwn par karrwaiy kray ga kywnkha inhain ktaar main dhkyl diya jata haay۔ham ktaar ka astamal karty hoey karkn ko chla saktay hayn: wrk aartyzan kmanda۔ is ki ayk msaal hay keh kis tarah larywl main mkhtlf ktaar daraiywrwn ko tshkyl aur astamal kya jaiay: // ktaar daraiywr 'daydafalt' => env ('ktaar_ daraywr' ، 'rydays') ،'rabtaay' => ['redis' => ['daraiywr' => 'rydays' ، 'knkshn' => 'dayfalt' ، 'ktaar' => 'dayfalt' ، 'rytry_ftr' => 90 ،] ،] ،]// nwkry kay klas bhyjnay waly myl ki wzuahat karain {awamy fnkshn hayndal () {// ay myl bhyjyn}} // mlazamt bhyjnay ka myl :: daspych () ؛ // prwsys jabsf py aartyzan ktaar: is msaal kay tawr par ، hum ktaar daraiywr ko dwbarha astamal karnay kay liye tshkyl dytay hayn۔ham ayk synda myl mlazamt ki wzuahat karty hain jo ay myl bhyjta haay۔ham daspych kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey synda myl ki nwkry bhyjtay hayn۔ham ktaar ka astamal karty hoey mlazamt par karrwaiy karty hayn: wrk aartyzan kmanda۔ khlasaha main ، larywl ka ktaar lghanay wala nzaam ayk aysy khsawsayt hay jo dawylprza ko wkt kay astamal kay kamwn ko ps mnzar main amldraamd karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔ham ayk ktaar daraiywr ka antkhab krsktay hain ، ktaar daraiywr ko tshkyl dy saktay hain ، mlazamtwn ki wzuahat krsktay hain ، mlazamtwn ko bhyjna ، aur larywl kay ktaar main lghnay waly nzaam ka astamal karty hoey mlazamtwn par karrwaiy krsktay hayn۔larywl kay ktaar main lghnay waly nzaam ka astamal krkay ، hum apni ayply kyshnza ki karkrdghy aur askyl ayblty ko bhatr bnasktay hain aur apnay saarfyn ko bhatr saarf ka tjrbha fraham krsktay hayn۔

Question: larywl palysyan kya hayn؟saarf ki ajazat par mbny mkhsawsa wsail tak rsaiy ko kntrwl karnay kay liye aap palysywn ki wzuahat aur astamal kesay karty hayn؟
Answer: larywl ayk blt main twsayk ka nzaam mhaya krta hay jo dawylprza ko saarfyn ki twsayk karnay aur saarf kay syshnwn ka antzaam karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔yhaan larywl kay blt un twsayk kay nzaam ka astamal karty hoey saarf ki twsayk ko snbhalnay ka tarykha yeh haay: twsayk kay mhaafzawn ki wzuahat kryn: larywl ka twsayk ka nzaam "mhaafza" aur "fraham knndghan" par mushtamil haay۔ghardaza is bat ki wzuahat karty hain keh kis tarah saarfyn ko hr drkhwast kay liye twsayk kya jata haay۔syshn gharda kay sath larywl jhaaza jo syshn astwryj aur kwkyza ka astamal karty hoey ryast ko brkrar rkhtay hayn۔ham tsadyk kay dyghr tarykwn kay liye azuafy mhaafzawn ki wzuahat krsktay hain ، jesay twkn par mbny twsayk۔ tsadyk ki twsayk fraham karnay walay: fraham knndghan is bat ki wzuahat karty hain keh saarfyn ko mstkl astwryj sy kesay bazayaft kya jata hay ، jesay ays kyw ayl dayta bys۔ayk fsaahat fraham knndha kay sath larywl jhaaza jo fsaahat ORM ka astamal karty hoey saarfyn ko bazayaft karty hayn۔ham astwryj kay dyghr mykanzam kay l additional azuafy fraham knndghan ki wzuahat krsktay hain ، jesay ayl day aay py۔ twsayk ki twsayk kay rastwn aur aaraa ki wzuahat kryn: larywl pehlay sy tamyr shuda twsayk kay rastay aur aaraa fraham krta hay jo baks sy bahar astamal hawsktay hayn۔ham apni drkhwast ki zurwryat ko pora karnay kay liye un rastwn aur khyalat ko apni mrzuy kay mtaabk bna saktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، kesi saarf ko ay myl aur pas wrda kay sath twsayk karnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl kwda ka astamal krsktay hayn: auth :: kwshsh (['ay myl' => $ ay myl ، 'pas wrda' => $ pas wrda]) ؛ saarf kay syshn ka antzaam kryn: larwylsyshn aghwaraay ka astamal karty hoey saarf kay syshn ka antzaam krta haay۔ham baltrtyb pwt aur tarykwn ko astamal krkay syshn sy dayta astwr aur bazayaft krsktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، syshn main saarf ki shnakht ko zakhyrha karnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl kwda ka astamal krsktay hayn: syshn :: daalyn ('saarf_ayda' ، $ saarf-> ID) ؛.twsayk kay nzaam myn: // twsayk kay mhaafzawn ki wzuahat karain '=> [' wyb '=> [' daraiywr '=>' syshn '،' fraham knndha '=>' saarfyn '،] ، // tsadyk fraham karnay waly prwwaidarza ki wzuahat kryn'=> [' saarfyn '=> [' daraiywr '=>' fsaahat '،' madal '=> ayp \ madal \ saarf :: klas ،] ،] ، // twsayk kay rastwn aur nzaaray ki wzuahat karain :: rastay () ؛// saarfyn ki twsayk kryn۔.ham larywl kay pehlay sy tamyr shuda twsayk kay rastwn aur aaraa ka astamal karty hayn۔ham kesi saarf ko ay myl aur pas wrda kay sath tsadyk karty hain jo Auth fasad par kwshsh kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hayn۔ham pwt kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey syshn main saarf ki shnakht ko astwr karty hain aur ghyt tarykha ka astamal karty hoey syshn sy saarf ki shnakht ko bazayaft karty hayn۔ khlasaha yeh hay keh larywl ka blt un twsayk nzaam dawylprza ko saarfyn ki twsayk karnay aur saarf kay syshnwn ka antzaam karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔ham twsayk karnay waly mhaafzawn aur fraham knndghan ki wzuahat krsktay hain ، twsayk kay rastwn aur aaraa ki wzuahat krsktay hain ، kwshsh kay tarykha kar ko astamal karty hoey saarfyn ki twsayk krsktay hain ، aur syshn aghwaraay ka astamal karty hoey saarf kay syshnwn ka antzaam krsktay hayn۔larywl kay blt un twsayk kay nzaam ka astamal krkay ، hum apni ayply kyshnza ki slamty aur wshwsnyyta ko bhatr bnasktay hain aur apnay saarfyn ko bhatr saarf ka tjrbha fraham krsktay hayn۔

Question: larywl ki drkhwast laif saiykl kay tsawr aur wakaat ki trtyb ki wzuahat karain jo larywl main drkhwast par karrwaiy karty hayn۔
Answer: larywl palysyan aysy klas hain jo kesi khasa madal ya wsail kay ard ghrd ajazat ki mntak ko mnzam krty hayn۔wha dawylprza ko hr wsail kay liye mkhsawsa kwaad ki wzuahat karnay ki ajazat dytay hain ، is bat ko ykyny bnatay hain keh sirf mjaza saarfyn un tak rsaiy haasal krskyn۔palysyan larywl main klaswn kay tawr par byan ki jati hain ، jahan hr ayk drkhwast main kesi khasa madal ya wsail sy mtaabkt rkhta haay۔palysy klas main aysay tarykay hain jo wabstha madal ya wsail tak rsaiy kay liye ajazat kay kwaad ki wzuahat karty hayn۔yha tarykay ya tou sahayha ya ghalat lwttay hain ، is par mnhasar hay keh saarf is tak rsaiy ka akhtyar hay ya nhayn۔palysyan rsaiy par kabw panay kay kwaad ki wzuahat karnay ka ayk aasan aur taaktwr tarykha mhaya krty hain js ko aasany sy mnzam aur brkrar rakha jaskta haay۔ yahan saarf ki ajazat par mbny mkhsawsa wsail tak rsaiy par kabw panay kay liye palysywn ki wzuahat aur astamal karnay kay akdamat: ayk palysy ki wzuahat: palysywn ko klaswn main byan kya gaya haay۔larywl ، jahan hr ayk drkhwast main kesi khasa madal ya wsail sy mtaabkt rkhta haay۔palysy klas main aysay tarykay shaml hain jo mtalkha madal ya wsail tak rsaiy kay liye ajazat kay kwaad ki wzuahat karty hayn۔ palysy ko rjstr kryn: ayk bar jab palysy mwjwd hay tou isy rjstr karnay ki zurwrt haay۔tazaha larywl ayply kyshnza kay sath shaml Autherserviceprovider main ayk palysyan praprty mwjwd hay jo un ki mtalkha palysywn kay liye fsaahat madal ka nkshha bnaty haay۔ksy palysy kay andraj sy larywl ko hadayt di jaye gi keh jab kesi madal kay khlaf karrwaiywn ko mjaza karty wkt astamal kya jaye tou ajazat kay kwaad: palysy klas main aysay tarykay shaml hain jo mtalkha madal ya wsail tak rsaiy kay liye ajazat kay kwaad ki wzuahat karty hayn۔yha tarykay ya tou sahayha ya ghalat lwttay hain ، is par anhasaar karty hain keh aya saarf is tak rsaiy haasal karnay ka akhtyar hay ya nhayn۔ palysywn ka astamal karty hoey akdamat ko trtyb dyn: hum ghyt kay aghwaraay par atharty kay tarykha kar ko kal krkay palysywn ka astamal karty hoey akdamat ko akhtyar dy saktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، kesi saarf ko kesi pwst ko ap dayt karnay ka akhtyar denay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl kwda: ghyt :: akhtyar ('ap dayt' ، $ pwst) astamal krsktay hayn۔ khlasaha yeh keh larywl ki palysyan wyb main wsail tak rsaiy ko kntrwl karnay ka ayk taaktwr tarykha fraham krty hayn۔drkhwastwha dawylprza ko ajazat kay kwaad ko ayk aasan aur lchkdar andaza main byan karnay ki ajazat dytay hain js ko aasany sy mnzam aur brkrar rakha jaskta haay۔ham kesi palysy ki wzuahat krsktay hain ، palysy ko rjstr krsktay hain ، ajazat kay kwaad ki wzuahat krsktay hain ، aur larywl main palysywn ka astamal karty hoey akdamat ki ajazat dy saktay hayn۔larywl palysywn ka astamal krkay ، hum apni ayply kyshnza ki slamty aur wshwsnyyta ko bhatr bnasktay hain aur apnay saarfyn ko bhatr saarf ka tjrbha fraham krsktay hayn۔

Question: aap larywl main tlash ki faalyt ko kis tarah nafza karty hayn؟dayta bys ki tlashyn anjam denay aur tlash kay ntaij ko fltr karnay kay aml ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: larywl ki drkhwast laif saiykl wakaat ka tslsl hay jo is wkt pysh aata hay jab drkhwast par larywl ki drkhwast main karrwaiy ki jati haay۔dawylprza kay liye mwsar aur kabl aatmad ayply kyshnza ki tamyr kay liye drkhwast laif saiykl ko smjhna zurwry haay۔yhaan larywl ki drkhwast laif saiykl main shaml akdamat hayn: antry pwaint: larywl ki drkhwast par tamam drkhwastyn awamy/andayks daat py aych py fail ko hadayt ki jati hayn۔yha fail ayply kyshn ko shrwa krty hay aur mahawl ko mrtb krty haay۔ bwtstrypngh: pblk/andayks daat py py py fail larywl bwtstryp failwn ko lwda krty hay ، jo drkhwast ka mahawl mrtb krty hay ، khdmt fraham karnay walon ko lwda krty hay ، aur fysdas ko rjstr krty haay۔ is kay bad drkhwast pas ki jati haay۔raؤtr kay liye ، jo mnasb rwt aur kntrwlr sy drkhwast sy mmasal haay۔ drmyanay drjay kay saman: mdal wyir klaswn ka ayk slslha hay jo drkhwast ko kntrwlr ko phanchanay sy pehlay hi aml main laya jata haay۔mdal wyir drkhwast ya rdaml main trmym krskta hay ، twsayk anjam dy sakta hay ، aur zayadha۔ kntrwlr: kntrwlr drkhwast par karrwaiy karnay aur jwab waps karnay ka zamha dar haay۔rdaml pyda karnay kay liye kntrwlr madal ، khdmat aur dyghr ajzaaa kay sath bat chyt krskta haay۔ jwaby jwab: rdaml kntrwlr kay zaryaha tyar kya jata hay aur mؤkl ko waps kya jata haay۔rdaml HTML ، JSON ، ya dyghr shklwn ki shkl main hawskta haay۔drkhwast laif saiykl kay mkhtlf mrahal par dawylprza ko apni apni mrzuy kay mtaabk mntak shaml karnay kay liye haks mhaya krta haay۔ khlasaha karnay kay liye ، larywl ki drkhwast laif saiykl wakaat ka ayk slslha hay jab larywl ki drkhwast main drkhwast par karrwaiy ki jati haay۔drkhwast kiy mrahal sy ghzarty hay ، bshmwl antry pwaint ، bwtstrypngh ، rwtngh ، mdal wyir ، kntrwlr ، rspans ، aur khtm۔drkhwast laif saiykl ko smjhnay sy ، dawylprza mwsar aur kabl aatmad ayply kyshnza tyar krsktay hain jo saarfyn ko bhatr saarf ka tjrbha fraham karty hayn۔

Question: larywl kay dayta bys sydar kya hayn؟aap damy dayta kay sath dayta bys ko aabad karnay kay liye sydarza ki wzuahat aur astamal kesay karty hayn؟
Answer: larywl main tlash ki faalyt ko amly jamha phananay kay l we ، hum nechay dyiay gaye mrahal par aml krsktay hayn: dayta bys sy rabtaha kaim kryn: larywl main srch fnkshn ko nafza karnay kay l we ، hamain larywl ayp ko dayta bys sy mrbwta karnay aur tlash ki shraita 1 kay liye dayta bys sy astfsar karnay ki zurwrt haay۔ tlash kay rastay ki wzuahat kryn:hamyn ayk aysay rastay ki wzuahat karnay ki zurwrt hay jo tlash ki drkhwast ko snbhal skay aur tlash kay ntaij ko zaahar kray۔ tlash kay farm ki wzuahat kryn: hamain ayk aysy srch farm ki wzuahat karnay ki zurwrt hay js sy saarfyn ko tlash ki shraita drj krskyn aur srch ki drkhwastyn pysh krskyn۔larywl kay astfsar bldar ya fsaahat ORM ka astamal karty hoey dayta bys ki tlashyn anjam dyn۔ham tlash ki shraita 1 sy mmasal rykardawn ki tlash kay l the jahan tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔ fyltr tlash kay ntaij: hum larywl kay astfsar bldar ya fsaahat ORM ka astamal karty hoey tlash kay ntaij ko fltr krsktay hayn۔ham kesi mkhsawsa kalm 3 kay zaryaha tlash kay ntaij ko trtyb denay kay liye aardar baiy tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔ is ki ayk msaal hay keh larywl main tlash ki faalyt ko kis tarah nafza kya jaiay: // srch rwtrwt ki wzuahat karain :: haasal karain ('/tlash' ، 'srch kntrwlr@andayks'))-> nam ('tlash') ؛ // srch farm <farm aykshn = "{{rwt ('tlash')}}" tarykha = "get"> <an pt ki ksm = "mtn" nam = "astfsar" plys hawldar ki wzuahat kryn= "tlash ..."> <btn ki ksm = "jma kryn"> tlash </btn> </farm> // dayta bys srch aspblk fnkshn andayks anjam dyn (drkhwast $ drkhwast) {$ astfsar = $ drkhwast-> un pt ('astfsar') ؛$ ntaij = DB :: tybl ('pwsts') -> kahan ('anwan' ، 'psnd' ، "٪ $ astfsar ٪") -> ya kahain ('jsm' ، 'psnd' ، "٪ $ astfsar ٪"))-> get () ؛rytrn wyw ('tlash' ، kmpykt ('ntaij')) ؛} // fltr tlash kay ntaij $ ntaij = DB :: tybl ('pwsts') -> kahan ('anwan' ، 'psnd' ، "٪ $ astfsar ٪") -> ya jahan ('baday' ، 'jysay' ،" ٪ $ astfsar ٪ ") -> aardar baiy ('tkhlyk_t' ، 'daysk') -> get () ؛ is msaal main ، hum ayk aysay srch rwt ki wzuahat karty hain jo hawghatlash ki drkhwast ko snbhalyn aur tlash kay ntaij ko zaahar kryn۔ham ayk srch farm ki wzuahat karty hain jo saarfyn ko tlash ki shraita drj karnay aur tlash ki drkhwast jma krwanay ki shawlt fraham kray gha۔ham aardar baiy kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey larywl kay astfsar bldar aur fltr srch kay ntaij ka astamal karty hoey dayta bys ki tlashyn anjam dytay hayn۔ khlasaha main ، larywl main tlash ki faalyt ko nafza karnay main dayta bys sy rabtaha kaim karna ، srch rwt ki wzuahat karna ، srch farm ki wzuahat karna ، dayta bys ki tlashyn anjam dena ، aur tlash kay ntaij ko fltr karna shaml haay۔larywl kay astfsar bldar ya fsaahat ORM ka astamal krkay ، hum aasany sy apni ayply kyshnza main tlash ki faalyt ko nafza krsktay hain aur apnay saarfyn ko bhatr saarf ka tjrbha fraham krsktay hayn۔

Question: larywl kay srws kntynr kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur yeh kis tarah anhasaar anjykshn fraham krta hay aur drkhwast main aabjykt ki msaalwn ka antzaam krta haay۔
Answer: larywl kay dayta bys sydar klas hain jo dawylprza ko damy dayta kay sath dayta bys ko aabad karnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔sydarza ko tazaha hajrt par kuch jaly dayta ya kuch lazmi dayta dakhl karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ya jo bhi sawrthaal ho ghy۔damy dayta kay sath dayta bys ko aabad karnay kay liye sydarza ki wzuahat aur astamal karnay kay akdamat yeh hayn: sydar ki wzuahat kryn: hum myk: sydar aartyzan kmanda ka astamal karty hoey sydar ki wzuahat krsktay hayn۔yha kmanda dayta bys/sydarza daairktry main sydar klas tyar krta haay۔sydar klas main ayk rn ka tarykha hawta hay jsay day by: syda aartysn kmanda par aml draamd kya jata haay۔ham dayta bys 2 main dayta dakhl karnay kay liye astfsar bldar ya fsaahat ORM ka astamal krsktay hayn۔ sydar ko khtm kryn: hum day by: syda aartysn kmanda ka astamal karty hoey sydar chla saktay hayn۔yha kmanda dayta bys/sydarza daairktry 2 main tamam sydarza chlata haay۔ is ki ayk msaal hay keh damy dayta kay sath dayta bys ko aabad karnay kay liye sydarza ki wzuahat aur astamal kesay kryn: // sydarfp aartyzan ki wzuahat kryn: sydar ywzar astybl ays aydar // sydada pblk fnkshn hony kay liye dayta ki wzuahat kryn۔chlaiyn () {db :: tybl ('saarfyn')-> dakhl karain (['nam' => 'jan daw' ، 'ay myl' => 'john@example.com' ، 'pas wrda' => bcrypt ('pas wrda') ،]) ؛} // sydarfp aartyzan day by ko chlaiyn: yeh msaal kay tawr par ، hum myk: sydar aartyzan kmanda ka astamal karty hoey ayk sydar ki wzuahat karty hayn۔ham sydar klas kay rn kay tarykha kar main syda karnay kay liye dayta ki wzuahat karty hayn۔ham day by ka astamal karty hoey syda ko chlatay hayn: syda aartysn kmanda۔ khlasaha yeh hay keh ، larywl kay dayta bys sydar klas hain jo dawylprza ko damy dayta kay sath dayta bys ko aabad karnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔ham sydar ki wzuahat krsktay hain ، syda hony kay liye dayta ki wzuahat krsktay hain ، aur larywl kay karyghr kmanda ka astamal karty hoey sydar chla saktay hayn۔larywl kay dayta bys sydarza ka astamal krkay ، hum aasany sy damy dayta kay sath dayta bys ko aabad krsktay hain aur hakykt psndanha dayta kay sath apnay ayply kyshnza ki janch krsktay hayn۔

Question: aap larywl main fail daaؤn lwda ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟saarfyn ko fail daaؤn lwda tyar karnay aur bhyjnay kay aml ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: larywl ka srws kntynr klas anhasaar ka antzaam karnay aur anhasaar anjykshn ko anjam denay kay liye ayk taaktwr twl haay۔srws kntynr anhasaar ko hal karnay aur drkhwast main aabjykt msaalwn kay antzaam kay liye zamha dar haay۔yhaan yeh hay keh larywl srws kntynr anhasaar anjykshn fraham krta hay aur drkhwast main aabjykt msaalwn ka antzaam krta haay: baindangh: srws kntynr ayk antrfys ko thws nfaza kay liye bandhta haay۔as sy hamain poray ayply kyshn main antrfys ka astamal karnay aur antrfys ka astamal karnay waly kwda ko tbdyl kyay baghair thws nfaza ko tbdyl karnay ki ajazat mlty haay۔ dwbarha hal krna: srws kntynr klas ki msaal tshkyl dy kar aur is ki anhasaar ko anjykshn laga kar anhasaar ka hal krta haay۔srws kntynr klas kay anhasaar ka tayn karnay kay liye akasy ka astamal krta hay aur inhain bar bar hal krta haay۔ snghltn: srws kntynr ayk klas ka snghltn msaal tshkyl dy sakta hay jo pori drkhwast main brkrar rhata haay۔as sy hamain pori drkhwast main klas ki ayk hi msaal ka dwbarha astamal karnay aur ghair zurwry aabjykt ki tkhlyk sy bchnay ki ajazat mlty haay۔ mythwda anjykshn: srws kntynr anhasaar ko kesi tarykha kar main anjykshn dy sakta haay۔as sy hamain un tarykwn main anhasaar anjykshn ka astamal karnay ki ajazat mlty hay jo knstrktr nahin hayn۔ mwjwd wakaat: srws kntynr aysay wakaat mhaya krta hay jo hamain kntynr kay laif saiykl main dakhl karnay aur apni mrzuy kay mtaabk mntak ko anjam denay ki ajazat dyta haay۔ khlasaha yeh hay keh ، larywl ki khdmt kntynr klas anhasaar ka antzaam karnay ka ayk taaktwr zaryaha haay۔awr anhasaar anjykshn anjam dyna۔srws kntynr drkhwast main aabjykt ki msaalwn ka antzaam karnay kay liye pabnd ، hal karnay ، snghltn ، tarykha kar anjykshn ، aur kntynr aywnts mhaya krta haay۔larywl kay srws kntynr ka astamal krkay ، hum klynr aur zayada brkrar rkhnay wala kwda lkh saktay hain aur apnay saarfyn ko bhatr saarf ka tjrbha fraham krsktay hayn۔

Question: larywl ki farm ki drkhwast ki klasza kya hayn؟farm un pt aur hayndalngh farm ki ghzaarshat ki twsayk kay l you aap farm ki drkhwast ki klaswn ki wzuahat aur astamal kesay karty hayn؟
Answer: larywl main fail daaؤn lwda ko snbhalnay kay l we ، hum nechay dyiay gaye mrahal par aml krsktay hayn: fail tyar kryn: hamain woh fail tyar karnay ki zurwrt hay jsay hum daaؤn lwda karna chahti hayn۔yha srwr par fail bnanay ya dayta bys sy fail bazayaft krkay kya jaskta haay۔ daaؤn lwda kay rastay ki wzuahat kryn: hamain ayk aysay rastay ki wzuahat karnay ki zurwrt hay jo daaؤn lwda ki drkhwast ko snbhalay aur fail ko saarf ko waps krday۔larywl kay jwab ()-> daaؤn lwda () ka tarykha astamal krkay saarf ko fail waps kryn۔yha tarykha fail ka rastha ، fail ka nam ، aur haydarwn ki ayk saf ko pyramytrza kay tawr par lyta haay۔ yahan larwyl main fail daaؤn lwda ko kis tarah snbhalnay ki ayk msaal haay: // daaؤn lwda raؤtr aaؤt :: haasal karain ('/daaؤn lwda/{fail}' ،fnkshn ($ fail) {$ rastha = astwryj_path ('ayp/'. $ fail) ؛ $ haydarza = ['mwad ki ksm' => 'ayply kyshn/py day ayf' ،] ؛ wapsy ka jwab ()-> daaؤn lwda ($ rastha ،$ fail ، $ haydar) ؛}) ؛ is msaal main ، hum ayk daaؤn lwda kay rastay ki wzuahat karty hain jo fail pyramytr lyta haay۔ham astwryj_path haylpr fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey fail ka rastha tyar karty hayn۔ham haydarza ko ayply kyshn/py day ayf par syt krdha mwad ki ksm kay sath ayk saf kay tawr par byan karty hayn۔ham larywl kay jwab ()-> daaؤn lwda () tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey saarf ko fail waps krdytay hain ، larwyl main fail daaؤn lwda ko snbhalnay kay liye ، hamain fail tyar karnay ، daaؤn lwda kay rastay ki wzuahat karnay ، aur larywl kay astamal sy saarf ko fail waps karnay ki zurwrt haay۔jwab ()-> daaؤn lwda () tarykha۔larywl kay blt un tarykwn ka astamal krkay ، hum aasany sy apni ayply kyshnza main fail daaؤn lwda ko snbhal saktay hain aur apnay saarfyn ko bhatr saarf ka tjrbha fraham krsktay hayn۔

Question: larywl wyw kmpwzarwn kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur woh aap ko mtadd aaraa kay sath dayta shyir karnay ya ajzaaa dykhnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔
Answer: larywl ki farm ki drkhwast ki klasyn kstm drkhwast klas hain jo un ki apni twsayk aur ajazat ki mntak ko shaml krty hayn۔wha dawylprza ko farm un pt kay liye twsayk kay kwaad ki wzuahat karnay aur farm ki ghzaarshat ko zayada mnzam aur brkrar rkhnay kay tarykay sy hayndal karnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔farm un pt ki twsayk karnay aur farm un pt ki twsayk kay l form farm ki drkhwast ki klaswn ki wzuahat aur astamal karnay kay akdamat yeh hayn: farm ki drkhwast ki klas ki wzuahat kryn: hum myk ap ki drkhwast ki klas ki wzuahat krsktay hayn: aartyzan kmanda ki drkhwast kryn۔yha kmanda ayp/HTTP/drkhwastwn ki daairktry main farm ki drkhwast klas tyar krta haay۔farm ki drkhwast klas main ayk kwaad ka tarykha hay jo farm un pt kay liye twsayk kay kwaad ki wzuahat krta haay۔ farm ki drkhwast klas ka astamal kryn: hum apnay kntrwlr tarykwn main farm ki drkhwast klas ko taip karain js ki ksm ko asharha krkay is ko astamal krsktay hayn۔larywl khud bkhwd farm un pt ki twsayk kray ga aur agar twsayk nakam hawjaty hay tou ghltay ka jwab waps krday ghy۔ham farm ki drkhwast msaal kay tawr par twsayk shuda tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey twsayk shuda farm un pt tak rsaiy haasal krsktay hayn۔ is ki ayk msaal hay keh farm un pt ki twsayk karnay aur farm ki ghzaarshat ko hayndal karnay kay liye farm ki drkhwast ki klaswn ki wzuahat aur astamal kesay kryn: // ayk farm ki drkhwast klas py aych py aartyzan bnaiyn: drkhwast kryn: drkhwast krynStoreSerRequest // farm ki drkhwast klas pblk fnkshn astwr (StoRuserRequest $ drkhwast) {// twsayk pas shuda ، saarf $ saarf = saarf bnaiyn :: bnaiyn ($ drkhwast-> drst ()) bnaiyn ؛wapsy ry daairykt ('/saarfyn') ؛} is msaal kay tawr par ، hum myk: drkhwast aartyzan kmanda ka astamal karty hoey ayk farm ki drkhwast klas ki wzuahat karty hayn۔ham apnay kntrwlr astwr kay tarykha kar main farm ki drkhwast ki klas ko taip karty hoey astamal karty hayn۔larywl khud bkhwd farm un pt ki twsayk kray ga aur agar twsayk nakam hawjaty hay tou ghltay ka jwab waps krday ghy۔ham farm ki drkhwast msaal kay tawr par twsayk shuda tarykha ka astamal karty hoey twsayk shuda farm un pt tak rsaiy haasal karty hayn۔ khlasaha main ، larwyl ki farm ki drkhwast ki klasyn farm un pt aur hayndal farm ki ghzaarshat kay liye twsayk kay kwaad ki wzuahat karnay kay liye ayk zayada mnzam aur brkrar rkhnay ka tarykha fraham krty hayn۔ham myk ap ka astamal karty hoey ayk farm ki drkhwast klas ki wzuahat krsktay hayn: aartyzan kmanda ki drkhwast karain aur isy taip asharay kay zaryaha apnay kntrwlr tarykwn main astamal kryn۔larywl ki farm ki drkhwast ki klaswn ka astamal krkay ، hum apni ayply kyshnza ki slamty aur wshwsnyyta ko bhatr bnasktay hain aur apnay saarfyn ko bhatr saarf ka tjrbha fraham krsktay hayn۔

Question: aap larywl main aaram dha API akhttamy nkat ko kis tarah nafza karty hayn؟API rastwn ki wzuahat karnay aur API ki drkhwastwn aur rdaml ko snbhalnay kay aml ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: larywl kay nzaaray kay kmpwzar kal byks ya klasza hain jo dawylprza ko mtadd aaraa kay sath dayta shyir karnay ya ajzaaa dykhnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔yha hay keh larywl kay nzaaray kay kmpwzar kis tarah kam karty hayn: taryf: ayk wyw kmpwzar ayk kal byk ya klas ka tarykha hay jsay jab ayk nzaarha pysh kya jata hay tou kaha jata haay۔yha mntak ko mnzam karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay jo aadad wa shmar ko kesi ayk jghha par pabnd krta haay۔ ywzayj: wyw kmpwzar khasa tawr par mfyd hawtay hain jab ayk hi nzaryha ko kesi ayply kyshn kay andr mtadd rastwn ya kntrwlrza kay zaryaha waps kya jata hay aur hamyshha aadad wa shmar kay kesi khasa hasaay ki zurwrt hawty haay۔an ka astamal mtadd aaraa kay sath dayta ko shyir karnay ya ajzaaa dykhnay kay liye kya jaskta haay۔ rjstryshn: dekhain kmpwzar aam tawr par drkhwast kay khdmt fraham karnay waly main sy kesi ayk main rjstrda hawtay hayn۔wyw aghwa kay kmpwzar ka tarykha wyw kmpwzar ko rjstr karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔larywl main klas par mbny wyw kmpwzarwn kay liye pehlay sy taay shuda daairktry shaml nahin hay ، lhazaa dawylpr un ko mnzam karnay kay liye aazaad hayn۔pysh kya jata hay ، larywl ki khdmt kntynr wyw kmpwzar ko hal krta hay aur is kay mtayn tarykha ko kal krta haay۔as kay bad wyw kmpwzar aadad wa shmar ko wyw sy bandh sakta haay۔ khlasaha main ، larwyl kay wyw kmpwzar mtadd aaraa ya wyw ajzaaa kay sath dayta ko shyir karnay ka ayk taaktwr zaryaha hayn۔wha dawylprza ko is mntak ko mnzam karnay ki ajazat dytay hain jo aadad wa shmar ko kesi ayk jghha par ayk nzaaray sy mnslk krta haay۔wyw kmpwzar drkhwast kay ayk khdmt fraham karnay waly main sy kesi ayk main rjstrda hain aur ayk sath main mtadd aaraa kay sath mnslk hawsktay hayn۔larywl kay nzaaray kay kmpwzarwn ka astamal krkay ، dawylpr saaf sthra aur zayada brkrar rkhnay wala kwda lkh saktay hain aur apnay saarfyn ko bhatr saarf ka tjrbha fraham krsktay hayn۔

Question: larywl kay nshryaty wakaat kya hayn؟hakyky wkt main snnay waly mؤklwn kay zaryaha aap ko kis tarah astamal kya jata haay؟
Answer: larywl main aaram dha API akhttamy nkat ko nafza karnay kay l we ، hum nechay dyiay gaye mrahal par aml krsktay hayn: API rastwn ki wzuahat kryn: hamain API kay rastwn ki wzuahat karnay ki zurwrt hay jo API ki drkhwastwn ko snbhalyn ghay۔ham un rastwn ko rastwn/api.php fail main byan krsktay hayn۔ham yw aar ayl dahanchay aur isi tarah kay kntrwlr tarykha ki wzuahat krsktay hain jsay jab is akhttamy nktaha tak rsaiy haasal hawty hay tou isy blaya jana chahaiay۔ API kntrwlrza ki wzuahat kryn: hamain API kntrwlrza ki wzuahat karnay ki zurwrt hay jo API ki drkhwastwn ko snbhalyn ghay۔ham un kntrwlrza ko aay py py/aych ty ty py/kntrwlrza daairktry main byan krsktay hayn۔ham un tarykwn ki wzuahat krsktay hain jo hum nay pehlay byan krdha API rastwn sy mtaabkt rkhtay hayn۔ API ki drkhwastwn aur rdaml ko pysh kryn: hum larywl ki blt un drkhwast aur rspans klaswn ka astamal karty hoey API ki drkhwastwn aur rdaml ko snbhal saktay hayn۔ham drkhwast ki klas ko drkhwast sy dayta aur rspans klas ko klaint ko waps karnay kay liye astamal krsktay hayn۔ twsayk ki twsayk aur ajazat: hum larywl ki blt un twsayk aur ajazat ki khsawsayat ka astamal karty hoey twsayk aur ajazat ko nafza krsktay hayn۔ham API rastwn ki hafazat kay liye mdal wyir ka astamal krsktay hain aur is bat ko ykyny bnasktay hain keh sirf mjaza saarf un tak rsaiy haasal krsktay hayn۔ yahan larwyl main RESTFOL API kay akhttamy mkamat ko kis tarah nafza kya jaiay: // API rwts raؤt :: haasal karain ('/aaitmza' ، 'aaitmkntrwlr@andayks') ؛ rwt :: pwst ('/aaitmza '،' aaitm kntrwlr@astwr ') ؛ rwt :: haasal karain ('/aaitmza/{ID} '،' aaitm kntrwlr@shw ') ؛ rwt :: daalyn ('/aaitmza/{ID} '،' aaitmkntrwlr@ap dayt ')) ؛ rwt :: hazaf karain ('/aaitmza/{ID} '،' aaitmkntrwlr@tbaha karain ') ؛ // API kntrwlrzaklas aaitm kntrwlr ki wzuahat karain kntrwlr {awamy fnkshn andayks () items aaitmza= aaitm :: tamam () ؛wapsy ka jwab ()-> JSON ($ aaitmza) ؛} awamy fnkshn astwr (drkhwast $ drkhwast) {$ aaitm = aaitm :: bnaiyn ($ drkhwast-> tamam ()) ؛wapsy ka jwab ()-> JSON ($ aaitm) ؛} awamy fnkshn shw ($ ID) {$ aaitm = aaitm :: tlash karain ($ ID) ؛wapsy ka jwab ()-> JSON ($ aaitm) ؛} awamy fnkshn ap dayt (drkhwast $ drkhwast ، $ ID) {$ aaitm = aaitm :: tlash karain ($ ID) ؛$ aaitm-> ap dayt ($ drkhwast-> tamam ()) ؛wapsy ka jwab ()-> JSON ($ aaitm) ؛} awamy tkryb ko tbaha karain ($ ID) {$ aaitm = aaitm :: tlash karain ($ ID) ؛$ aaitm-> hazaf karain () ؛wapsy ka jwab ()-> JSON ('aaitm kamyaby kay sath hazaf hawa') ؛}} // API ki drkhwastwn aur jwaby aspwrk fnkshn astwr (drkhwast $ drkhwast) {$ aaitm = aaitm :: bnaiyn ($ drkhwast-> tamam ()) ؛rytrn rspans ()-> json ($ aaitm) ؛} // twsayk aur ajazat namha par aml draamd :: mdal wyir ('auth: api')-> ghrwp (fnkshn () {rwt :: get ('/items' ، 'aaitmkntrwlr@andayks ') ؛ rwt :: pwst ('/aaitmza '،' aaitmkntrwlr@astwr ') ؛ rwt :: haasal karain ('/aaitmza/{ID} '،' aaitm kntrwlr@shw ') ؛ rwt :: daalyn ('/aaitmza/{id} '،' aaitmkntrwlr@ap dayt ') ؛ rwt :: hazaf karain ('/aaitmza/{ID} '،' aaitm kntrwlr@tbaha karain ') ؛}) ؛ is msaal main ، hum API ki drkhwastwn ko snbhalnay waly API rastwn ki wzuahat karty hain jo API kay rastwn ki wzuahat karty hayn۔ham API kntrwlrza ki wzuahat karty hain jo API ki drkhwastwn ko snbhaltay hain aur JSON jwabat waps karty hayn۔ham larywl ki blt un drkhwast aur rspans klaswn ka astamal karty hoey API ki drkhwastwn aur rdaml ko snbhaltay hayn۔ham larwyl ki blt un twsayk aur ajazat ki khsawsayat ka astamal karty hoey twsayk aur ajazat ko nafza karty hayn۔ khlasaha main ، larywl main aaram dha API akhttamy mkamat par aml draamd main API kay rastwn ki wzuahat ، API kntrwlrza ki wzuahat ، API ki drkhwastwn aur rdaml ko snbhalna ، aur twsayk aur ajazat ko nafza karna shaml haay۔larywl ki blt un khsawsayat ka astamal krkay ، hum aasany sy apni ayply kyshnza main aaram dha API akhttamy nkat ko nafza krsktay hain aur apnay saarfyn ko bhatr saarf ka tjrbha fraham krsktay hayn۔

Question: larywl kay kntynr baindangh kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur yeh keh woh aap ko antrfys ya klaswn kay liye kstm baindangh ki wzuahat karnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔
Answer: larywl kay nshryaty wakaat ayk aysy khsawsayt hain jo dawylprza ko srwr saiyda par kuch hony par klaint ki taraf hakyky wkt ki atalaaat bhyjnay ki ajazat dyty haay۔nshryaty wakaat py aych py main ryil taim ayps bnana aasan bnatay hayn۔hakyky wkt main snnay waly mؤklwn kay zaryaha astamal karnay kay liye wakaat ki wzuahat aur nshryat ka tarykha yeh haay: ayk wakaha ki wzuahat: hum ayk bakaadha larwl aywnt tshkyl dy kar aur kyda brdakast namy antrfys ko nafza krkay kesi wakaay ki wzuahat krsktay hayn۔as antrfys kay liye hamain apnay aywnt klas kay andr ayk tarykha ki wzuahat karnay ki zurwrt hay jsay bradakastn kehty hayn۔as ko tarwn ki ayk saf ko waps karna chahaiay jo chynlza hain keh is prwghram ko nshr kya jana chahaiay۔ aywnt ki rjstr kryn: hamain aywnt srws prwwaidar main aywnt ko apnay snnay walon main nkshha bna kar rjstr karnay ki zurwrt haay۔larywl ka nshryaty tarykha۔yha tarykha aywnt ki msaal ko pyramytr kay tawr par lyta hay aur isy bradakastn kay tarykha kar main byan krdha tamam chynlza par nshr krta haay۔ wakaha: hum klaint saiyda jawa askrpt laibryry jesay pshr ya sakt.yw ka astamal karty hoey aywnt ka astamal krsktay hayn۔ham bradakastn kay tarykha kar main byan krdha chynlza ko sbskraib krsktay hain aur wakaat ko sn saktay hayn۔ is ki ayk msaal hay keh hakyky wkt main snnay waly mؤklwn kay zaryaha wakaat ki wzuahat aur nshr kya jaiay: // ayk wakaha klas nyw mysj kay awzaar ki wzuahat karain ، js ka astamal karain ، daspch aybl ka astamal karain ،antrayktw sakts ، syrylaiza mwdalza ؛awamy $ pygham ؛awamy fnkshn __ knstrkt ($ pygham) {$ yha-> pygham = $ pygham ؛} awamy fnkshn bradakastn () {wapsy ['pyghamat'] ؛}} // aywnt sy tyar krdha $ snyn = [newmessage :: class => [SendMessagenotification :: class ،] ،] ؛ // aywnt aywnt (nya nya mysj ($ pygham)) ko nshr karain ؛ // aywnt pwshr astamal kryn۔pyghamat ')hawna chahaiay antrfys۔ham aywnt ko aywnt srws prwwaidar main aywnt ko apnay snnay walon ko nkshha bna kar rjstr karty hayn۔ham nay larwyl kay nshryaty tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey aywnt ko nshr kya۔ham pshr jawa askrpt laibryry ka astamal karty hoey aywnt ka astamal karty hayn۔ khlasaha main ، larywl kay bradakastngh wakaat jab srwr saiyda par kuch hawta hay tou klaint ki taraf sy hakyky wkt ki atalaaat bhyjnay ka ayk taaktwr zaryaha haay۔ham kesi wakaay ki wzuahat krsktay hain ، aywnt ko rjstr krsktay hain ، aywnt ko nshr krsktay hain ، aur klaint saiyda jawa askrpt laibryry ka astamal karty hoey aywnt ka astamal krsktay hayn۔larywl kay bradakastngh aywnts ka astamal krkay ، hum py aych py main ryil taim ayps tshkyl dy saktay hain aur apnay saarfyn ko bhatr saarf ka tjrbha fraham krsktay hayn۔

Question: aap larywl main saarf ki atalaaat aur antbahaat ko kis tarah nafza karty hayn؟saarfyn ko atalaaat ki nmaish aur atalaa ki trjyhaat ka antzaam karnay kay aml ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: larywl kay kntynr baindangh dawylprza ko antrfys ya klaswn kay liye kstm pabnd karnay ki wzuahat karnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔yha kesay kam krta haay: taryf: ayk pabnd larywl kay srws kntynr ko yeh btanay ka ayk tarykha hay keh klas ya antrfys ko kesay hal kya jaiay۔jb kntynr sy kesi klas ya antrfys ki drkhwast ki jati hay tou ، larywl baindangh ka astamal is bat ka tayn karnay kay liye kray ga keh kon sy knkryt par aml draamd waps karna haay۔ pabnd tarykay: bainda ، snghltn ، msaal kay tawr par ، aur kab bainda ، snghltn ، msaal kay tawr par pabndywn ki wzuahat kay liye bohat sary tarykay dstyab hayn۔bainda ka tarykha ayk antrfys ko thws nfaza kay liye bandhnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔snghltn ka tarykha ayk klas ko khud hi ayk hi msaal kay tawr par bandhnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔msaal kay tarykha kar ka astamal klas ki mwjwdha msaal ko kntynr sy bandhnay kay liye kya jata haay۔jb tarykha kar ka astamal syak wa sbak sy mtalk pabndwn ki wzuahat kay liye kya jata haay۔ pabnd aksam: larywl main do ksm kay pabndyan hayn: klas baindangh aur antrfys baindangh۔klas baindangh ka astamal knkryt klas ko kntynr sy bandhnay kay liye kya jata haay۔antrfys baindangh ka astamal kesi antrfys ko knkryt kay nfaza sy bandhnay kay liye kya jata haay۔ pabnd chabyan: baindangh kyza kntynr main pabnd hony ki nshandhay karnay kay liye astamal ki jati hayn۔wha ya tou ayk tar ya klas ka nam hawsktay hayn۔ aatwmytk ryzawlwshn: larywl ka srws kntynr klaswn kay liye anhasaar khud bkhwd hal krskta hay jo kntynr kay pabnd hayn۔as ka mtalb yeh hay keh jab kesi klas sy kntynr sy drkhwast ki jati hay tou ، larywl khud bkhwd kesi bhi anhasaar ko hal krday ga js ki klas ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ khlasaha main ، larywl kay kntynr baindangh dawylprza ko antrfys ya klaswn kay liye kstm pabnd karnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔pabndyan larywl kay srws kntynr ko btanay kay liye astamal ki jati hain keh klas ya antrfys ko kesay hal kya jaiay۔pabndywn ki wzuahat kay l several kiy tarykay dstyab hain ، aur do ksm kay pabndyan hayn: klas baindangh aur antrfys baindangh۔baindangh chabyan kntynr main pabnd hony ki nshandhay karnay kay liye astamal ki jati hain ، aur larywl kay srws kntynr klaswn kay liye anhasaar khud bkhwd hal krsktay hain jo kntynr kay pabnd hayn۔

Question: larywl kay mddghar kam kya hayn؟aam tawr par astamal hony waly mddghar afaal aur un kay mksad ki msaalyn fraham kryn۔
Answer: larywl main saarf ki atalaaat aur antbahaat ko nafza karnay kay l we ، hum nechay dyiay gaye mrahal par aml krsktay hayn: atalaaat ki wzuahat kryn: hamain atalaaat ki wzuahat karnay ki zurwrt hay jo saarfyn ko bhyjy jien ghy۔ham larywl kay blt un nwtyfkyshn sstm ka astamal karty hoey atalaaat ki wzuahat krsktay hayn۔atalaaat ko mkhtlf chynlza jesay ay myl ، ays aym ays ، dayta bys ، bradakast ، aur bohat kuch kay zaryaha bhyja jaskta haay۔yha tarykha ayk nwtyfkyshn msaal lyta hay aur isy mkhsawsa chynl kay zaryaha saarf ko bhyjta haay۔yha ajzaaa hamain mstkl aur mnzam tarykay sy saarfyn ko atalaaat ko aasany sy zaahar karnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔ nwtyfkyshn ki trjyhaat ka antzaam: hum larywl kay blt un nwtyfkyshn trjyhay nzaam ka astamal karty hoey atalaaaty trjyhaat ka antzaam krsktay hayn۔yha sstm saarfyn ko yeh mntkhb karnay ki ajazat dyta hay keh woh kon sy atalaaat wsawl karna chahti hain aur woh kon sy chynlza ko un par wsawl karna chahti hayn۔ is ki ayk msaal hay keh kis tarah larywl main saarf ki atalaaat aur antbahaat ko nafza kya jaiay: // atalaaat kay baray main atalaaat klas anwais pyda ki nwtyfkyshn main twsya require astamal kryn۔awamy fnkshn ($ mtala karnay wala) {wapsy ['myl' ، 'dayta bys'] ؛} awamy fnkshn twmyl ($ kabl zakr) {wapsy (nya myl mysyj) -> lain ('aap ki anwais ki adaiyghy ki hogi haay۔') -> aykshn ('anwais dykhyn' ، yw aar ayl ('/anwais')) -> lain ('shkryhaaap hamari drkhwast astamal karnay kay liay! ') ؛} awamy fnkshn toarray ($ kabl mtalk) {wapsy ['anwais_yda' => $ yha-> anwais-> ID ، 'rkm' => $ this-> anwais-> rkm ،] ؛}} // nwtyfykyshn bhyjyn $ saarf-> mtala karain (nya anwais pyda ($ anwais)) ؛ // dasplay nwtyfykyshnza@pyshn ghwiy (auth ()-> saarf ()-> ghair prahaiy kay tawr par ghair prahaiy) {{$ nwtyfkyshn-> dayta ['pygham']}} @endforeach // nwtyfkyshn ki trjyhaat ka antzaam karain $ saarf-> nwtyfkyshn_pryfrns ()-> bnaiyn ([[['chynl' => 'ay myl' ، 'ksm' => 'anwais_pyda' ، 'kabl' => sch ،])) ؛ is msaal main ، hum larywl kay blt un nwtyfykyshn sstm ka astamal karty hoey atalaaat ki wzuahat karty hayn۔ham larywl kay mtala karnay kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey atalaaat bhyjtay hayn۔ham larywl kay blt un nwtyfkyshn blyda ajzaaa ka astamal karty hoey saarfyn ko atalaaat zaahar karty hayn۔ham larywl kay blt un nwtyfkyshn trjyhay nzaam ka astamal karty hoey atalaaaty trjyhaat ka antzaam karty hayn۔ khlasaha main ، larywl main saarf ki atalaaat aur antbahaat ko nafza karnay main atalaaat ki wzuahat ، atalaaat bhyjna ، atalaaat ki nmaish ، aur nwtyfkyshn ki trjyhaat ka antzaam shaml haay۔larywl ki blt un khsawsayat ka astamal krkay ، hum aasany sy apni ayply kyshnza main saarf ki atalaaat aur antbahaat ko nafza krsktay hain aur apnay saarfyn ko bhatr saarf ka tjrbha fraham krsktay hayn۔

Question: larywl kay mkamy trkyaty mahawl kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur kis tarah hawmstda ya walyt jesay twlza ko tshkyl aur astamal karnay ka tarykha۔
Answer: larywl kay mddghar afaal aalmy py aych py afaal ka ayk mjmwaha hain jo larywl frym wrk main shaml hayn۔yha afaal aam prwghramngh kamwn ko aasan bnanay aur kwda tnzaym ko brahanay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔yhaan kuch aam tawr par astamal hony waly larywl mddghar afaal aur un kay mksad hayn: DD (): DD () fnkshn daybghngh kay mkasad kay liye astamal hawta haay۔yha ayk mtghyr ko phynk dyta hay aur askrpt par aml draamd khtm krta haay۔awr jawa askrpt failyn۔ csrf_field (): csrf_field () fnkshn shklwn kay liye pwshydha CSRF twkn fylda pyda karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔) fnkshn ka astamal kesi srny sy ayk mjmwaha bnanay kay liye kya jata haay۔kntynr.brypt (): bcrypt () fnkshn Bcrypt alghwrythm.str_slygh () ka astamal karty hoey pas wrda haysh karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay: str_slug () fnkshn un blt- kay alawha kesi tar ko yw aar ayl dwstanha slgh main tbdyl karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔mddghar afaal main ، dawylprza larywl main apnay kstm haylpr afaal bhi tshkyl dy saktay hayn۔an kstm haylpr afaal ki wzuahat ayk alyhadha fail main ki jaskty hay aur kmpwzar ka astamal karty hoey khud bkhwd bhry jaskty haay۔larywl kay mddghar afaal ka astamal krkay ، dawylpr saaf sthra aur zayada brkrar rkhnay wala kwda lkh saktay hain aur apnay saarfyn ko bhatr saarf ka tjrbha fraham krsktay hayn۔

Question: larywl ki farm ki drkhwast ki twsayk ka astamal karty hoey aap farm ki twsayk ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟twsayk kay kwaad ki wzuahat aur twsayk ki ghltaywn ki nmaish kay aml ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: larywl ka mkamy trkyaty mahawl ayk syt ap hay jo dawylprza ko braha rast srwr main taynat karnay sy pehlay apni mkamy mshynwn par apnay kwda ko lkhnay aur janchnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔larywl main mkamy trkyaty mahawl ki tshkyl aur astamal kay l several bohat sary twlza dstyab hain ، jn main hawmstda ، walyt ، XAMPP ، aur bohat kuch shaml haay۔rhaaish ghaha ya srwr ko tshkyl denay aur astamal karnay ka tarykha yeh hay kha: hawm astyda: hawm astyda ayk pry pykyjda waghrnt baks hay jo larywl kay liye ayk mkml trkyaty mahawl mhaya krta haay۔hawm astda ko astamal karnay kay l we ، hamain apni mkamy mshyn par waghrnt aur wrchwil baks anstal karnay ki zurwrt haay۔as kay bad hum hawmstda daat ya aym ayl fail main trmym krkay aur waghrnt ap kmanda chla kar hawmstda tshkyl dy saktay hayn۔hawmstda mkhtlf ksm ki khsawsayat mhaya krta hay ، bshmwl py aych py ، ayn jy ayn ayks ، ays kyw ayl ، rydays ، aur bohat kchh۔ wylyt: walyt larywl kay liye halka phlka trky ka mahawl hay jo khasa tawr par myk aw ays kay liye dayzaain kya gaya haay۔walyt ko astamal karnay kay l we ، hamain apni mkamy mshyn par hawmbryw aur kmpwzar anstal karnay ki zurwrt haay۔as kay bad hum kmpwzar ka astamal krkay srwr anstal krsktay hain aur walyt anstal kmanda chla saktay hayn۔walyt mkhtlf ksm ki khsawsayat mhaya krta hay ، bshmwl py aych py ، ayn jy ayn ayks ، ays kyw ayl ، aur bohat kchh۔ kuch aam tawr par astamal hony waly larywl haylpr afaal main shaml hayn: day day (): daybghngh mkasad kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔yha ayk mtghyr ko phynk dyta hay aur askrpt par aml draamd khtm krta haay۔farmwn kay liye pwshydha CSRF twkn fylda۔ayply kyshn kntynr ki msaal kay tawr par bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ۔bkrpt (): Bcrypt alghwrthm.str_slygh () ka astamal karty hoey pas wrda haysh karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay: kesi tar ko yw aar ayl dwstanha slgh main tbdyl karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔as sy dawylprza ko braha rast srwr main taynat karnay sy pehlay apni mkamy mshynwn par apnay kwda ko lkhnay aur janchnay ki ajazat mlty haay۔larywl main mkamy trkyaty mahawl ki tshkyl aur astamal kay l several bohat sary twlza dstyab hain ، jn main hawmstda ، walyt ، XAMPP ، aur bohat kuch shaml haay۔larywl kay mddghar afaal aalmy py aych py kay afaal ka ayk mjmwaha hain jo larywl frym wrk main shaml hain aur aam prwghramngh kay kamwn ko aasan bnanay aur kwda tnzaym ko brahanay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔

Question: larywl kay wsail sy mtalk kntrwlrza kya hayn؟aap kesi khasa wsail kay liye CRUD aapryshnwn ko snbhalnay kay liye ryswrs kntrwlrza ki wzuahat aur astamal kesay karty hayn؟
Answer:
larywl ki farm ki drkhwast ki twsayk ayk taaktwr khsawsayt hay jo dawylprza ko zayada mnzam aur brkrar rkhnay waly tarykay sy farm ki twsayk ko snbhalnay ki ajazat dyty haay۔larwyl kay farm ki drkhwast ki twsayk ka astamal karty hoey farm ki twsayk ko kis tarah snbhalnay ka tarykha haay: twsayk kay kwaad ki wzuahat kryn: hamain farm un pt kay liye twsayk kay kwaad ki wzuahat karnay ki zurwrt haay۔ham un kwaad ko farm ki drkhwast klas kay kwaad kay tarykha kar main byan krsktay hayn۔ farm ki drkhwast klas ka astamal kryn: hum apnay kntrwlr tarykwn main farm ki drkhwast klas ko taip kryn۔larywl khud bkhwd farm un pt ki twsayk kray ga aur agar twsayk nakam hawjaty hay tou ghltay ka jwab waps krday ghy۔ham farm ki drkhwast msaal kay tawr par twsayk shuda tarykha ka astamal karty hoey twsayk shuda farm un pt tak rsaiy haasal krsktay hayn۔yha ajzaaa hamain mstkl aur mnzam tarykay sy saarfyn ko aasany sy twsayk ki ghltaywn ko aasany sy zaahar karnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔ is ki ayk msaal hay keh larywl ki shkl ki drkhwast ki twsayk ka astamal karty hoey farm ki twsayk ko kis tarah snbhalyn: // twsayk ki twsayk kay kwaadwn kay astwrpwstrykwst main twsya ki hogi haay۔['anwan' => 'mtalwb | zayada sy zayadha: 255' ، 'baday' => 'mtalwbha' ،] ؛}} // farm ki drkhwast klas pblk fnkshn astwr (astwrpwstrykyst $ drkhwast) ka astamal karain {// twsayk pas ki hogi ، pwst $ pwst = pwst :: bnaiyn ($ drkhwast-> drst ()) ؛ryda daairykt ('/pwsts') ؛} // dasplay ki twsayk ki ghltayan @if ($ ghltayan-> koi ())
    @farwrch ($ ghltayan-> tamam ()btawr $ ghltay)
  • {{$ ghltay}}
    • endforeach
endifin is msaal kay tawr par ، hum farm ki drkhwast klas main farm un pt kay liye twsayk kay kwaad ki wzuahat karty hayn۔ham apnay kntrwlr astwr kay tarykha kar main farm ki drkhwast ki klas ko taip karty hoey astamal karty hayn۔larywl khud bkhwd farm un pt ki twsayk kray ga aur agar twsayk nakam hawjaty hay tou ghltay ka jwab waps krday ghy۔ham farm ki drkhwast msaal kay tawr par twsayk shuda tarykha ka astamal karty hoey twsayk shuda farm un pt tak rsaiy haasal karty hayn۔ham larywl kay blt un twsayk ki ghltay blyda ajzaaa ka astamal karty hoey saarfyn ko twsayk ki ghltayan zaahar karty hayn۔ khlasaha ، larwyl ki farm ki drkhwast ki twsayk ka astamal karty hoey farm ki twsayk ko snbhalnay main twsayk kay kwaad ki wzuahat ، farm ki drkhwast klas ka astamal karna ، aur twsayk ki ghltaywn ko zaahar karna shaml haay۔larywl ki farm ki drkhwast ki twsayk ka astamal krkay ، hum klynr aur zayada brkrar rkhnay wala kwda lkh saktay hain aur apnay saarfyn ko bhatr saarf ka tjrbha fraham krsktay hayn۔

Question: larywl kay astfsar askwps kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur woh aap ko fsaahat kay madalza par dwbarha kabl astamal astfsar ki rkawtwn ki wzuahat karnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔
Answer: larywl kay wsail sy mtalk kntrwlrza ayk aysy khsawsayt hain jo dawylprza ko zayada mnzam aur brkrar rkhnay waly tarykay sy ayk mkhsawsa wsail kay liye CRUD (tkhlyk ، prahnay ، ap dayt aur hazaf krnay) ko snbhalnay ki ajazat dyty hayn۔ryswrs kntrwlrza ki wzuahat aur astamal karnay ka tarykha yahan haay: ryswrs kntrwlr ki wzuahat kryn: hum larywl kay myk ap ka astamal karty hoey ryswrs kntrwlr ki wzuahat krsktay hayn: -ryswrs aapshn kay sath kntrwlr aartyzan kmanda۔yha kmanda tamam CRUD aapryshnza sy pehlay sy blt kay sath ayk kntrwlr tyar krta haay۔ wsail kay rastwn ki wzuahat kryn: hum larywl kay rastay :: wsail kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey wsail kay rastwn ki wzuahat krsktay hayn۔as tarykha kar sy wsail kay kntrwlr main mtalkha tarykwn sy CRUD ki karrwaiywn ka nkshha tyar hawta haay۔ ryswrs kntrwlr ka astamal kryn: hum hr CRUD aapryshn kay liye mnasb tarykwn par kal krkay apni drkhwast main ryswrs kntrwlr ko astamal krsktay hayn۔larwyl khud bkhwd ryswrs kntrwlr main isi tarykha kar ki drkhwast ko rwt kray gha۔ yahan wsail kay kntrwlrza ki wzuahat aur astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: // wsail kntrwlr py aar py aartyzan bnaiyn: kntrwlr pwst kntrwlr -ryswrs // wsail kay rwtsrwt ki wzuahat kryn:: wsail ki wzuahat kryn۔fnkshn astwr (drkhwast $ drkhwast) {// ayk niy pwst} pblk fnkshn shw ($ ID) {// ayk mkhsawsa pwst} pblk fnkshn aydayt ($ ID) {// kesi mkhsawsa pwst main trmym karnay kay liye farm dkhaiyn} awamy astwr krynfnkshn ap dayt (drkhwast $ drkhwast ، $ ID) {// ayk mkhsawsa pwst ko ap dayt kryn} awamy fnkshn ko tbaha karain ($ ID) {// kesi mkhsawsa pwst ko hazaf kryn}} is msaal main ، hum larwyl kay myk ap ka astamal karty hoey ayk ryswrs kntrwlr ki wzuahat karty hayn: kntrwlr aartysn kmandawsail kay aapshn kay sath۔ham larywl kay rastay :: wsail ka tarykha astamal karty hoey wsail kay rastwn ki wzuahat karty hayn۔ham hr CRUD aapryshn kay liye mnasb tarykwn par kal krkay apni drkhwast main ryswrs kntrwlr ka astamal karty hayn۔ khlasaha main ، larywl kay wsail sy mtalk kntrwlrza ayk mkhsawsa wsail kay liye CRUD aapryshnwn ko zayada mnzam aur brkrar rkhnay kay tarykay sy nmtnay kay liye ayk taaktwr zaryaha hayn۔ham larywl kay myk ap ka astamal karty hoey ayk ryswrs kntrwlr ki wzuahat krsktay hayn: kntrwlr aartyzan kmanda js main ryswrs aapshn kay sath hawta hay ، larywl kay rwt :: wsail ka tarykha astamal karty hoey wsail kay rastwn ki wzuahat krsktay hain ، aur hr krwda aapryshn kay liye mnasb tarykwn par kal krkay ryswrs kntrwlr ka astamal krsktay hayn۔larywl kay wsail sy mtalk kntrwlrza ka astamal krkay ، hum klynr aur zayada brkrar rkhnay wala kwda lkh saktay hain aur apnay saarfyn ko bhatr saarf ka tjrbha fraham krsktay hayn۔

Question: "aap larywl main smajy lagh un (jysay ، fys bk ، ghwghl) kay sath saarf ki twsayk ko kis tarah nafza karty hayn؟ smajy fraham karnay walon ka astamal karty hoey saarfyn ko twsayk karnay kay aml ki wzuahat kryn۔"
Answer: larywl kay astfsar askwps ayk aysy khsawsayt hain jo dawylprza ko fsaahat madalza par dwbarha kabl astamal astfsar ki rkawtwn ki wzuahat karnay ki ajazat dyty haay۔yhaan woh kis tarah kam karty hayn: taryf: astfsar ka dairha kar ayk mshtrkha un rkawtwn ko smytnay ka ayk tarykha hay js ko aap kesi astfsar par drkhwast dena chahti ho ، aur is mntak ko apni drkhwast kay mtadd hasawn main dwbarha astamal kryn۔askwps ko kesi astfsar kay zaryaha waps krdha dayta ko fltr karnay ، trtyb denay ya is main trmym karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، aur pychydha swalat ki tamyr kay liye aasany sy jkraay jasktay hayn۔ askwps ki ksm: larywl main do ksm kay askwps hayn: aalmy aur mkamy۔har bar jab aap madal ko btawr dayfalt kehty hain tou aalmy askwps ka atalak hawta haay۔mkamy askwps aap ko rkawtwn kay mshtrkha sytwn ki wzuahat karnay ki ajazat dytay hain jo aap apni pori drkhwast main dwbarha astamal krsktay hayn۔aap mkamy askwps ka astamal sirf is wkt karty hain jab aap ko zurwrt ho aur is ka atalak nahin kya jaye ga jab bhi aap madal ko kal kryn۔ dairha kar ki wzuahat: askwps ki wzuahat ya tou madal klas main ya ayk alyhadha askwp klas main ki jaskty haay۔ayk dairha kar mkamy ya aalmy hawskta hay ، aur mthark hawskta hay ، yany jab astamal kya jata hay tou pyramytrza wsawl krna۔ dairha kar ka astamal karty hawiay: hum madal par mnasb tarykha par kal krkay apni drkhwast main ayk dairha kar astamal krsktay hayn۔larywl khud bkhwd astfsar par dairha kar ka atalak kray ga aur fltr shuda ntaij ko waps krday gha۔ is ki ayk msaal hay keh larywl main astfsar kay dairha kar ki wzuahat aur astamal kesay kryn: // ayk mkamy askwp klas pwst ki wzuahat karain madal {awamy fnkshn askwp shaia shuda ($ astfsar) {wapsy$ astfsar-> kahan ('shaia' ، sch) ؛}} // askwp astamal karain $ pwsts = pwst :: shaia shuda ()-> get () ؛ is msaal main ، hum pwst madal par shaia hony waly ayk mkamy dairha kar ki wzuahat karty hayn۔ham pwst madal par shaia shuda tarykha par kal krkay apni drkhwast main dairha kar astamal karty hayn۔larywl khud bkhwd astfsar par dairha kar ka atalak kray ga aur fltr shuda ntaij ko waps krday gha۔ khlasaha main ، larywl kay astfsar askwps fsaahat waly madalza par dwbarha astamal kay kabl astfsar ki rkawtwn ki wzuahat kay liye ayk taaktwr zaryaha hayn۔ham madal klas main ya ayk alyhadha askwp klas main kesi dairha kar ki wzuahat krsktay hain ، aur madal par mnasb tarykha par kal krkay apni drkhwast main dairha kar astamal krsktay hayn۔larywl kay astfsar askwps ka astamal krkay ، hum klynr aur zayada brkrar rkhnay wala kwda lkh saktay hain aur apnay saarfyn ko bhatr saarf ka tjrbha fraham krsktay hayn۔

Question: larywl ka HTTP klaint kya haay؟HTTP drkhwastwn ko bhyjnay aur API kay rdaml ko snbhalnay kay liye aap HTTP klaint ko kis tarah astamal karty hayn؟
Answer: larywl main smajy lagh un (jysay ، fys bk ، ghwghl) kay sath saarf ki twsayk ko nafza karnay kay l we ، hum larywl swshlait ka astamal krsktay hain ، jo ayk srkary larywl pykyj hay jo larywl ayp main maashrty twsayk ko aasan bnata haay۔maashrty fraham knndghan ka astamal karty hoey saarfyn ki twsayk karnay kay liye amwmy akdamat yeh hayn: larwl swshlait anstal kryn: hamain kmpwzar ka astamal karty hoey larywl swshlait anstal karnay ki zurwrt haay۔ham kmanda kmpwzar ko chlanay kay zaryaha yeh kar saktay hain larywl/swshlait ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ smajy lagh un btnwn ko tshkyl dyn: hamain hr fraham knndha kay liye smajy lagh un btn bnanay ki zurwrt hay js ki hum hamayt karna chahti hayn۔an btnwn ko mnasb fraham knndha kay twsayk kay safhaay sy lnk karna chahaiay۔ kal byk ko haynda kryn: saarf fraham knndha kay sath twsayk karnay kay bad ، fraham knndha saarf ko hamari drkhwast par rsaiy twkn kay sath waps bhyj dy gha۔hamyn ayk aysa rastha bna kar is kal byk ko snbhalnay ki zurwrt hay jo kntrwlr kay tarykha kar ki taraf asharha krta haay۔as tarykha kar main ، hum fraham knndha sy saarf ki malwmat ko bazayaft karnay kay liye larywl swshlait ka astamal krsktay hayn۔ saarf ko tyar karain ya ap dayt kryn: ayk bar jab hamary pas saarf ki malwmat mwjwd hay tou ، hum saarf ko apnay ayply kyshn kay dayta bys main tshkyl ya ap dayt krsktay hayn۔hamary drkhwast main saarf ko un main lagh un krkay twsayk karnay ki zurwrt haay۔ yahan kuch wsail hain jo larywl swshlait ka astamal karty hoey larywl main swshl lagh un kay sath saarf ki twsayk ko nafza karnay kay baray main mazeed tfsayly akdamat fraham karty hayn: [hany byjr] 1: yeh tywtwryl ayk kdm bha kdm fraham krta haay۔ghwghl ، fys bk ، aur ght hab kay liye larywl swshlait kay sath smajy lagh un ko kis tarah nafza karnay kay baray main mrhalha ghaiyda۔dayzaain] 3: yeh tywtwryl ayk mrhalha war ghaiyda fraham krta hay keh kis tarah larywl swshlait ko astamal kya jaye takha saarfyn ko twytr ka astamal karty hoey larywl ayp main sain un karnay ki ajazat di jaskay۔smajy twsayk kay liye larywl swshlait ka astamal kryn۔ [larwyl kwda] 5: yeh sbk ayk mrhalha war ghaiyda fraham krta hay keh kis tarah larywl 8 main larywl swshlait kay sath swshl lagh un ko nafza kya jaiay۔ghwghl jy myl akaؤnt kay sath larwyl swshlait ka astamal karty hoey swshl lagh un ko larwl 7/6. smry main kis tarah nafza kya jaye ، is main larwl main swshl lagh un kay sath saarf ki twsayk ko nafza karnay main larywl swshlait anstal karna ، smajy lagh un btn bnana ، kal byk ko snbhalna ، saarf ko ap dayt karna ،awr saarf ki twsayk krna۔larywl swshlait ka astamal krkay ، hum aasany sy apnay larywl ayply kyshnza main maashrty twsayk ko shaml krsktay hain aur apnay saarfyn ko saarf ka bhatr tjrbha fraham krsktay hayn۔

Question: larywl kay aywnt kay snnay walon aur saarfyn kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur woh aap ko drkhwast kay andr wakaat ko mnzam aur snbhalnay ki ajazat kesay dytay hayn۔
Answer: larywl ka aych ty ty py klaint ayk aysy khsawsayt hay jo dyghr wyb ayply kyshnza kay sath bat chyt karnay kay liye aych ty ty py ki drkhwastyn karnay ka ayk aasan aur azahaar karnay wala tarykha fraham krty haay۔HTTP drkhwastwn ko bhyjnay aur API kay jwabat ko snbhalnay kay liye HTTP klaint ko kis tarah astamal karnay ka tarykha yeh haay: larywl swshlait anstal kryn: hamain kmpwzar ka astamal karty hoey larywl swshlait anstal karnay ki zurwrt haay۔ham kmanda kmpwzar ko chlanay kay zaryaha yeh kar saktay hain larywl/swshlait ki zurwrt hawty haay۔aych ty ty py ka aghwaraa HTTP ki drkhwastyn karnay ka ayk aasan aur azahaar karnay wala tarykha fraham krta haay۔an tarykwn ko ayk URL aur pyramytrza ki akhtyary saf ko dlail kay tawr par liya jata haay۔ API kay rdaml ko byan kryn: hum HTTP facade kay JSON tarykha ka astamal karty hoey API kay rdaml ko snbhal saktay hayn۔yha tarykha khud bkhwd rspans baday ko daykwda krta hay aur JSON aabjykt ko lwtata haay۔ is ki ayk msaal hay keh HTTP klaint ko HTTP drkhwastwn ko bhyjnay aur API kay jwabat ko snbhalnay kay liye kis tarah astamal kya jaiay: // HTTP facadeuse rwshn \ spwrt \ facades \ http ؛ // bhyjynayk HTTP drkhwast $ jwab = http :: get ('https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts') ؛ // API kay jwab ko snbhalyn $ pwsts = $ jwab-> json () ؛ is msaal main ، hum draamd karty hain ، hum draamd karty haynastamal kay byan ka astamal karty hoey hamari fail kay awpry hasaay main HTTP aghwaraa۔ham HTTP fistad kay GET tarykha ka astamal karty hoey JSON plys hawldar API ko ayk HTTP GET drkhwast bhyjtay hayn۔ham rspans aabjykt par JSON kay tarykha kar ko kal krkay API kay rdaml ko snbhaltay hain ، jo khud bkhwd rspans baday ko daykwda krta hay aur JSON aabjykt ko waps krta haay۔ khlasaha main ، larwyl ka HTTP klaint dyghr wyb ayply kyshnza kay sath bat chyt karnay kay liye HTTP ki drkhwastwn ko bnanay ka ayk aasan aur azahaar karnay wala tarykha fraham krta haay۔ham HTTP ki drkhwastyn bhyjnay kay liye HTTP Fistade kay Get ، post ، put ، pych ، aur hazaf karnay kay tarykwn ، aur API kay rdaml ko snbhalnay kay liye JSON tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔larywl kay HTTP klaint ka astamal krkay ، hum aasany sy byrwny API kay sath bat chyt krsktay hain aur apnay saarfyn ko bhatr saarf ka tjrbha fraham krsktay hayn۔
